well_activity_remarks_html:
WELL_NAME API12 WAR_START_DT TEXT_REMARK
0 001a 608124002900 2007-08-15 08/15/07: MOVE TO WR 677; TEST PMS RECOVERY SYSTEM; DEPLOY COMPATTS; PERFORM DP CALIBRATIONS; P/UP 36". 08/16/07: FINISH P/U 36" - RUN IN WITH DP; HAD TO PULL ENTIRE ASSY BACK TO SURFACE DUE TO LOOSE CONNECTION - CORRECT & RE-RUN. 08/17/07: RUN 36" CASING AND JETTING STRING. JET 36" CASING AND DRILL AHEAD W/ 26" BHA TO 7750'. 08/18/07: DRILL 26" SECTION FROM 7750' TO 8900' - AVG ROP FOR 24 HRS = 48 FPH.
1 001a 608124002900 2007-08-19 08/19/07: Drill f/ 8900' t/ 9110'. Circ & spot 13.5 PPG pad mud. Check f/ flow & POOH. Prep rig f/ storm evasion (Hurricane Dean). Begin rig transit to the East. 08/20/07: Rig in transit due East f/ storm evasion. 08/21/07: Rig in transit due East f/ storm evasion. Rig holding position to monitor storm track. Rig in transit back to WR 677. 08/22/07: Rig in transit back to WR 677. Rig on location & begin prep for well work. P/U BHA and begin wiper trip t/ 1653'. 08/23/07: Con't RIH w/ clean out BHA to 8100'. Wash & ream f/ 8100' t/ 8300'. TIH t/ 8900'. Wash & ream t/ 9110'. Pump pill & circ & condition. Pump pad mud; check flow (OK); & POOH t/ 7130'. Drop ball & wash LPH. POOH t/ surface. RU & begin running 22" csg t/ 1038'. 08/24/07: Cont. to run 22" csg to 9051'. R/U cmt equip; test lines & begin to cmt. 22" csg. 08/25/07: Finish pumping cmt (5625 Cu.Ft.). TOC 6960'. Release from MRLD & POOH w/ landing string to mud line; jet around well head & cont. to POOH. R/U and begin running BOP's & riser.
2 001a 608124002900 2007-08-26 08/26/07: Continue to run riser t/ 2389'. 08/27/07: Continue to run riser t/ 5769'. 08/28/07: Continue to run riser. Install 25' riser pup. N/U choke; kill; & boost lines. Flush same & begin testing. 08/29/07: Continue testing lines - test failed on choke line. Fly ROV to stack and discover leak coflex hose above choke line test valve. R/U & begin pulling riser & stack. 08/30/07: POOH w/ riser & stack t/ 699'. 08/31/07: Finish pulling riser and land stack on BOP cart. Begin changing out coflex hose. 09/01/07: Change out Mux cable & terminate.
3 001a 608124002900 2007-09-02 09/02/07: Run stack & pull stack due to problems w/ Blue POD SEM B. Trouble shoot POD problems. 09/03/07: Continue trouble shooting & repair of stack. Function Test & run same. 09/04/07: Continue to run riser; trouble shoot & change out OLM on blue mux reel. Run riser. 09/05/07: Trouble shoot loss of comms. Finish running riser & installing fairings. Rig up slip jt & latch BOPs. 09/06/07: R/D riser handing equip. TIH & Test BOPs. POOH w/ test assy & TIH w/ 18-1/8" drilling assy. 09/07/07: TIH w/ 18-1/8" drilling assy. Wash f/ 8;885' to 8;964'. Drill hard cmt to 9;022'. Displace well to SBM. Drill cmt f/ 9;022' t/ 9054'. Wash & ream to 9;110'. Drill new formation to 9120'. Circ btms up. Perform FIT @ 9;054' w/ 10.2 ppg SOBM to 614 psi @ .03 BPM; EMW= 11.5 ppg; 6 bbls pumped & 6 bbls bled back. Open well & pump up max ESD - 11.91 fro; PWD. 09/08/07: Drill 18-1/8" hole section t/ 9;959'. Trouble shoot rig repair issues.
4 001a 608124002900 2007-09-09 09/09/07: Trouble shoot rig repair issues. Drill at reduced rate due to rig cooling system problems and make repairs to cooling system f/ 9959' to 10;358'. Circ Btms up. POOH to 6;340'. Displace to seawater; in case we have to disconnect. POOH to 230' & redress wear sleeve. 09/10/07: RIH to 6;340' & displace to 10.2 SBM. TIH & drill f/ 10;358' to 11;220'. ROV inspected BOP & Riser - OK 09/11/07: Drill to 11;352'. POOH to 9;022' & repair drier. TIH & wash & ream f/ 11;429' t/ 11;610'. Drill to 12;218'. 09/12/07: Drill to 13;360'. ROV inspected BOP & Riser - OK 09/13/07: Drill to 14;800'. 09/14/07: Drill to 16;080'. ROV inspected BOP & Riser - OK 09/15/07: Drill to 16;210'. Make short trip to 11;429'. TIH to TD; Circ. to Cond. hole & treat mud for running csg.
5 001a 608124002900 2007-09-16 09/16/07: POOH F/ 16;210' TO 15;037'; REAMING TIGHT SPOTS AS REQUIRED. TIH TO 16;210' AND INCREASE MW TO 10.8 PPG. POOH TO 6;400'. ROV INSPECTED BOP & RISER - OK. 09/17/07: POOH AND RACK BHA. SLIP AND CUT DRILLING LINE. R/U AND RUN 16" CASING TO 4;690'. 09/18/07: CONT RUNNING 16" CASING; LAND SAME & CIRC / COND MUD. ROV INSPECTED BOP & RISER - OK. 09/19/07: CMT 16" CSG; SET & TEST SEAL ASSY AND POOH W/ R/T. TIH W/ SBOPTT & TEST BOP'S. 09/20/07: CONT TESTING BOP'S; TEST CASING AND EVALUATE WEATHER CONDITIONS. TIH W/ BHA. 09/21/07: CONT TIH W/ BHA; DRILL OUT SHOE TRACK & CBU. ROV INSPECTED BOP & RISER - OK. 09/22/07: CBU; PERFORM FIT & DRILL T/ 16;750'.
6 001a 608124002900 2007-09-23 09/23/07: Drill f/ 16750' t/ 18075'. Wt. up mud system to 11.0 PPG. ROV made riser inspection - OK. 09/24/07: Drill f/ 18075' t/ 19347'. Circ & condition mud w/ one bottoms up. Drill f/ 19347' t/ 19370'. Wt. up mud system to 11.2 PPG. 09/25/07: Drill f/ 19347' t/ 20410'. ROV make riser inspection - OK. 09/26/07: Drill f/ 20410' t/ 21685'. 09/27/07: Drill f/ 21685' t/ 22150'. Function test BOP's. Drill f/ 22150' t/ 22780'. ROV made riser inspection - OK. 09/28/07: Drill f/ 22780' t/ 23476'. 09/29/07: Drill f/ 23476' t/ 23580'. CBU. Flow check well; well static. POOH to 14;131'. ROV made riser inspection - OK.
7 001a 608124002900 2007-09-30 09/30/07: POOH w/ 14 3/4" x 16 1/2" drilling assembly. R/U Schlumberger and run PEX-PPC-GR log (Run #1). 10/01/07: POOH w/ PEX-PPC-GR log (Run #1). P/U & Run MDT (Run #2). ROV riser inspection OK. 10/02/07: POOH w/ MDT's; rig down e-line; slip & cut Drill line; rig up & run 13-5/8" casing. 10/03/07: Finish running 13-5/8" casing on landing string; set hanger; CIRC hole prior to cementing. ROV riser inspection OK. 10/04/07: Cmt 13-5/8" casing; POOH w/ landing string; TIH with BOP Test Assy. 10/05/07: Finish TIH with BOP Test Assy; trouble shoot & correct issues with Cmt unit (unable to test); test BOPs; POOH with BOP Test Assy. ROV riser inspection OK. 10/06/07: Test BSR's & Csg; TIH with 12-1/4 X 13-1/2" Drilling Assy; drill out cmt; float equip.
8 001a 608124002900 2007-10-07 No Wireline Logs Run 10/07/07: FINISH DRILLING OUT CMT & SHOE; CIRC B/U; PERFORM FIT; WT UP & DRILL 12-1/4" x 13-1/2" SECTION f/ 23;580' t/ 24;040'. ROV RISER INSPECTION OK. 10/08/07: CONT DRILLING 12-1/4" x 13-1/2" SECTION f/ 24;040' t/ 25;075'. 10/09/07: CONT DRILLING 12-1/4" x 13-1/2" SECTION f/ 24;075' t/ 25;800' - WT UP MUD AS PER SCHEDULE. YELLOW ALERT - LOST GPS SIGNAL. 10/10/07: CONT DRILLING 12-1/4" x 13-1/2" SECTION f/ 25;800' t/ 26;500'. 10/11/07: CONT DRILLING 12-1/4" x 13-1/2" SECTION f/ 26;500' t/ 26;540' (TD). FUNCTION BOP. PUMP SWEEP & CIRC OUT. PUMP SLUG & POOH. 10/12/07: CONT POOH W/ 12-1/4" DRLG BHA. S&C DRL LINE. MONITOR WELL - SLIGHT FLOW; WT UP RISER TO 13.9PPG; RIH TO KILL WELL. 10/13/07: CONT RIH W/ 12-1/4" BHA F/ 1;500' TO 15;038'. WT UP WELLBORE f/ 13.1 t/ 13.5PPG. RIH f/ 15;038' TO 24;275'.
9 001a 608124002900 2007-10-14 10/14/07: CONT RIH W/ 12-1/4" CLEAN OUT BHA TO 26;540'. WT UP WELLBORE F/ 13.1 TO 13.5PPG. POOH F/ 26;540' T/ 16;900'. 10/15/07: FINISH POOH W/ 12-1/4" BHA. FLOW CHECK WELL. R/U & RUN 3308' 11-7/8" LNR ON 6-5/8" DP F/ 3;310' T/ 12;500'. 10/16/07: CONT TIH W/ 11-7/8" LNR ON 6-5/8" DP. CCM. MIX & PUMP 122 BBLS OF 17PPG CMT (688 CU FT) AND DISPLACE SAME. 10/17/07: CONT TO DISPLACE CEMENT & BUMP PLUG. EXPAND LINER HANGER & TEST SAME. CBU & POOH W/ R/T. 10/18/07: RUN WEATHERFORD 60 ARM CSG CALIPER IN 16" CASING. POOH & R/D E/L. SLIP & CUT DRILL LINE. RIH W/ RETAINER TO 16;452'; SET SAME. PUMP 400' (F/ 16448' T/ 16048') BALANCED CEMENT PLUG (337 CU FT CMT). POOH TO 9;450'. 10/19/07: CBU & POOH TO 9;500'. P/T FASDRILL T/ 1000 PSI. PERFORM NEGATIVE TEST & DISPLACE WELLBORE TO SEAWATER. SET 500' (F/ 9500' T/ 9000') CMT PLUG (606 CU FT CMT). POOH. 10/20/07: RETRIEVE NOMINAL BORE PROTECTOR. R/U & UNLATCH BOP'S. PULL SLIP JOINT ASSEMBLY.
10 001a 608124002900 2007-10-21 10/21/07: PULLED BOP'S & L/D DP. CLEANED MUD PROCESSING MODULE AND ACTIVE MUD TANKS #1 TO #7. 10/22/07: PULLED BOP'S & L/D 42 STDS OF 34# DP. CLEANED RESERVE MUD TANKS - PORT SIDE #1 TO #4 AND STRB SIDE #1. 10/23/07: BOP & RISER MAINT.; L/D 29 STDS OF 34# DP & MAG-TRAP STD F/ DERRICK. CLEAN RESERVE MUD TANKS - STBD SIDE. 10/24/07: CONT BOP MAINT.; INSTALL TDS TRACTION MOTOR & LOAD PIN; R/B 5-7/8" CTM-57 DP; OFFLOAD DRILL LINE SPOOL; B/L 34# DP & RETRIEVE COMPATT. MOVE 1 MILE OFF LOCATION. FINAL REPORT FOR WR677.
11 001a 608124002900 2007-12-27 12/27/07: DEPLOY COMPATTS ON WR 677 OCSG 18753 #001 (ST MALO 3) LOCATION. BOP MAINTENANCE; SAFETY STAND DOWN. 12/28/07: STUMP TEST BOP ON 6-5/8" AND 4-1/2" DP; PERFORM BOP MAINTENANCE. 12/29/07: STUMP TEST BOP; PERFORM BOP MAINTENANCE. REMOVING ANNULAR.
12 001a 608124002900 2007-12-30 12/30/07: PERFORM BOP MAINTENANCE. INSTALLING NEW ANNULAR IN ANNUFLEX. 12/31/07: INSTALL ANNUFLEX ASSEMBLY. INSPECT & CLEAN ANNULAR CAP & PISTON. 01/01/08: PREPARE/ATTEMPT TO INSTALL ANNULAR PISTON. WOW TO INSTALL ANNULAR PISTON AND PERFORM PM'S ON BOP. 01/02/08: SUBSEA CONTINUE WITH GENERAL PM'S. RIG CREWS CONTINUE WITH GENERAL RIG MAINTENANCE. 01/03/08: CONTINUE TO WOW AND PERFORM GENERAL PM'S. ASSEMBLE THE ANNULAR; CHOKE AND KILL LINES AND CONTROL TUBING. 01/04/08: PRESSURE TEST BOP & FAILSAFE VALVES. FUNCTION TEST BOP W/YELLOW & BLUE PODS. RE-TORQUED ALL CONNECTIONS. 01/05/08: COMPLETE PRESSURE/FUNCTION TESTS ON BOP; SKID SAME TO WELL CENTER. PERFORM INITIAL PRESS ON CHOKE; KILL; BOOST & RIGID CONDUIT LINES. RUN RISER TO 1;318'. TEST CHOKE; KILL; BOOST & CONDUIT LINES.
13 001a 608124002900 2008-01-06 01/06/08: CONTINUE TO RUN BOP AND MARINE RISER. PRESSURE TEST CHOKE; KILL & CONDUIT LINES WHILE TIH. 01/07/08: CONTINUE TO DRIFT WHILE RUNNING RISER TESTING CHOKE; KILL; BOOST & CONDUIT LINES. R/U JEWELRY IN MOON POOL. LAND/LATCH BOP. 01/08/08: R/D RISER HDLG EQUIP. TIH NBP/ BOP TEST TOOL. RELEASE NBP. LAND BOP TEST TOOL & TEST BOPs ON 6-5/8" DRILL PIPE. POOH W/TEST TOOL. 01/09/08: SLIP & CUT DRILL LINE. TIH W/14-3/4" CLEANOUT BHA. TAG CMT INSIDE 16" CASING @ 9025'. DISPLACE INHIBITED FLUID & WELL TO 13.5 PPG SBM. DRILL CMT F/9025' - T/9440'. 01/10/08: CONT. DRILL CMT PLUG F/9440' T/9558'. CONTINE TO TIH W/14-3/4" CLEANOUT BHA T/15;755'. CIRC & COND MUD. POOH W/14-3/4" CLEANOUT BHA. TIH W/12-1/4" CLEANOUT BHA. 01/11/08: TEST BOPs ON 5-7/8" DRILL PIPE. Slacked back off and set 55;000 lbs down on the fish and got 300 psi pressure increase. Released torque and picked up 985;000 lbs pick-up weight. Bumped fish with bumper jars and 60;000 lbs down 3 times to make sure fish was swallowed. Checked with pump; 100 spm (1;900 psi). Mud weight in equaled mud weight out. No indication of influx. Pumped slug; checked flow; and tripped out of the hole. Did not recover fish. Scarring on the 9-5/8" grapple indicated that the fish was in the overshot up to the stop at the top sub. The packoff was missing; and the shear disc was not ruptured. Broke overshot down and redressed with 9-1/2" grapple; added upper extention sub. Made up BHA and TIH. Tagged fish without rotating with 8;000 lbs and had 200 psi increase while pumping 131 spm = 1;800 psi. Bumped down on fish with bumper jars 2 times using 60;000 lbs; 90 spm = 1;650 psi. Monitored well for flow; slugged pipe; & tripped out of the hole from 24;277' to 22;178'. Flow checked well again. Continued tripping out of the hole to 15;045'. Picked up test plug & TIH to 6;930'. Pumped 85 bbls of Barolift sweep. Spotted 20 bbls of 16.2 ppg mud on bottom. Pulled above 16.2 ppg mud and continued to circulate. Flow checked; pumped slug; and pulled out of the hole to 100'.

Landed casing with shoe at 24;251' and hanger at 6;935'. Made up cement stand. Tested lines to 8;000 psi. Pumped (with rig pumps) 150 bbls of 14.0 ppg spacer with 30% returns. Displaced cement at 11 bbls/min with 2;750 bbls of 12.8 ppg. Final circulating pressure was 1;200 psi; bumped the plug with 1;000 psi over that. Set the seal assembly & tested to 7;700 psi. Opened shear rams. Continued to RIH. Landed wear bushing at 6;934'. Pulled wear bushing running tool; indicators showed wear bushing was left in hole. Continued to POOH with wear bushing running tool. Wear bushing came back with the tool. Inspected tool & wear bushing. None of the shear pins on the wear bushing were sheared. Replaced o-rings. Added 2 stands of HWDP under running tool. RIH with wear bushing to 5;341'. Finished TIH with wear bushing; boosted riser with 13.4 ppg mud. Landed wear bushing. Pulled past choke line with 1;200 psi. Indicators indicated wear bushing was set. Pumped slug & POOH. The wear bushing was still on the running tool. Tested casing to 4;300 psi for 30 min while POOH. Tested both seta of shear rams to 250/4;300 psi. Rigged up & tested Top Drive valves to 250/7;700 psi. Tested Kelly hose & swivel packing to 250/6;000 psi. Made up wear bushing running tool & TIH with same to 6;934'. Closed annular & pressured up with cement unit to 2;500 psi. to set wear bushing. Bled off pressure; opened well; and had 30;000 lb. shear out. Pumped slug & POOH. TIH with 12-1/4" HUghes MXC-1 to 9;091'. TIH to 23;734'. Washed & reamed from 23;734' to 24;010'. Drilled plugs; landing collar; shoe track; and rat hole to 24;277'. Circulated bottoms up to BOP stack. Flow checked well. Closed annular & located joint. Performed preliminary LOT with 12.7 ppg mud. LOT = 14.2 ppg EMW; 10 second casing shut in was 1;851 psi. No gas on bottoms up. Flow checked; pumps slug & POOH to 16;578'. Changed out ram guides and continued to POOH to 4;259'. On September 13; 2003 at 11:15; Leah Bade received verbal approval from Mr. John McCarroll with the Houma District MMS office to test the 13-5/8" casing string to 4;300 psi with a 12.4 ppg surface mud weight. 61 002 608124001100 2003-10-02 Performed LOT with 13.8 ppg surface mud weight. LOT = 15.1 EMW. Drilled from 26;461' to 26;760' w/mud motor. Suspended drilling operations. Riser tensioners S-1 and S-2 seals completely blew out & tensioner P-2 was leaking. Running in manual mode to keep up w/Nitorgen demand. Circulated 15 mins. & flow checked well. Pumped slug & started tripping out of the hole to replace tensioners. Repaired tensioners. Pumped up complete system ; all tensioners holding 1;200 psi; but S-2 was still leaking fluid slowly due to rod being scored in seal area. The nitrogen generator was repaired & back on line at 100%. Decision was made to TIH & drill. Loaded sources in Sperry tools & TIH with 10-5/8" drilling assembly. TIH from 266' to 12;250'. Tested MWD & pumped 600 gpm. Changed transducers & received signal. Function tested BOPs with yellow pod from toolpusher's panel & with blue pod from rig floor. Continued TIH from 12;250' to 26;419'. Washed & reamed from 26;419' to 26;760'. Drilled from 26;760' to 26;764' w/mud motor. Sperry's signal was too weak to detect; so pumps were slowed to 450 gpm & RPM to 80; & detection returned. Drilled from 26;764' to 26;946' at reduced pump rate of 480 gpm and 90 rpm (17'/hr) in order to get MWD to work real-time. The decision was made to increase pump rate & rotary speed to attain maximum penetration. Continued drilling to 27;272'; taking surveys w/400 gpm. Logged 3rd stand w/Sperry Sun from 27;145' to 27;272'. Continued drilling from 27;272' to 27;537'. Logged second stand from 27;402' to 27;531'. MWD/LWD signals were undetectable while drilling at 700 gpm & 125 rpm. Drilled from 27;537' to 27;990'. Logged w/MWD from 28;036' to 28;171'. Drilled from 28;171' to 28;297'. Logged w/MWD from 28;170' to 28;297'. Drilled from 28;297' to 28;427'. Troubleshot increase in pump pressure. Appeared to be a plugged nozzle. Continued to drill to 28;481'. Decision was made to POOH due to three plugged nozzles. Logged from 28;427' to 28;481' w/MWD while circulating bottoms up to POOH. Racked back one stand & logged from 28;297' to 28;427' w/MWD. Finished circulating bottoms up w/13.8 ppg mud. Pumped & rotated out of the hole from 28;436' to 28;164'. Flow checked & POOH to 10;902'. Pumped slug at the shoe & performed maintenance on pipe rubbers.

Attempt to bleed off pressure incrementally to determine if gain was formation ballooning (45 bbls injected @ higher pump rate). No success as pressure returned after each bleed. Attempted to circulate influx out of wellbore with annular shut-in unsuccessfully. Unable to maintain constant drill pipe pressure without losing returns. Decision was made to proceed with pumping cement with annular closed bull-heading cement slurry down the drill pipe. Reversed out excess proppant with 14.1 ppg CaBr. POOH from 28;115' to 27;799'.

TIH with Isolation and FS-1 ball valve assembly from 1;567' to 9;962' with 5-7/8" DP. 01/15/2015: TIH with Isolation and FS-1 ball valve assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 9;962' to 28;828'. Tagged the top of the PBR with the No-Go to confirm setting depth (27;283' DPM). TOH with PO running tool from 27;292' to 24;964' to test BOPs on 5-7/8" 34# test stands. Performed BOP function test from Driller's panel on Blue Pod. 01/16/2015: Pressure tested BOPs from the Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod; with annular and associated valves to 250/4;200 psi; VBRs and associated valves to 250/8;000 psi; service equipment and associated valves to 250/9;800 psi - good tests. TOH with PO running tool on 5-7/8" DP from 24;964' to 11;259'. 01/17/2015: TOH with PO running tool on 5-7/8" DP from 11;259' to surface. TIH with TNT permanent packer assembly on 5-7/8" DP from surface to 2;639'.

Function test BOP (Driller's panel; Blue Pod; and Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod) and Diverter (Driller's Panel); tests successful. Continue to TOH from 23;320' to surface. TOH from 7;310' to surface with the bore protector assembly on 5-7/8" DP. TIH with lower/upper seal assemblies. Tested CIMs and DHPTG. RIH with 4-1/2" tubing string from 306' to 4;963'. 01/22/2015: TIH with lower completion assembly from 4;963' to 17;534'. Pumped 13 fluid loss valve opening pressure cycles.
232 PS001 608124005700 2015-02-01 02/01/2015: Finished cycling fluid loss valve open. Bullheaded 50 bbls of base oil down kill line across SSPT and down the tubing. Closed SCSSV and Production Master Valve (PMV). Pumped 10 gal methanol through XT. Rigged up Upper Crown Plug (UCP) on slickline. RIH and installed UCP in setting profile. POOH with slickline. Tested top of UCP to 10;400 psi/ 15 minutes - good test. Tested between UCP and Lower Crown Plug (LCP) to 13;000 psi with Installation/Work Over Control System (IWOCS) - good test. Rigged down slickline equipment. Put trip tank online and observed lower diverter seal not holding. Inserted packing material between diverter and housing to form a seal. 02/02/2015: Attempted to repair leaking flowline seals on the diverter with no success. Scoped in and locked Compensated Coil Tubing Lift Frame (CCTLF) and engaged active heave. Closed annular and unlatched Tubing Hanger Running Tool (THRT). Displaced 6.6 ppg base oil out of landing string with 14.1 ppg CaBr2 by pumping down choke line and up landing string. Opened annular and pulled THRT above BOP. Wait on weather. Note: On 02/02/2015 @ 10:09 hrs; Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) notified Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) that Chevron plans to pull the diverter; repair; test and continue with well suspension. 02/03/2015: Wait on weather. Removed torpedo packers. Picked up to clear land and lock tool from BOP. Rigged down surface lines and broke out SFT from landing string. Transferred SFT to center mousehole. Rig down dolly; nitrogen/hydraulic hoses and electric line from CCTLF. Lay out CCTLF as per Transocean procedure. Transfer SFT to AFT rotary; rig up landing string handling equipment. Lay out SFT. 02/04/2015: Rigged up landing string handling equipment. POOH with landing string; removing cross coupling clamps. Filled up down boost line every 5 stands; keeping fluid level in riser ~10' below flow line. Note: On 02/04/2015 @ 15:29 hrs; Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) received written approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to forgo further BOP testing/functioning due to well barriers currently in place. 02/05/2015: Continued POOH to surface with landing string and land and lock tool. Transferred land and lock to Aft rotary. Rigged down landing string handling equipment. Note: Functioned Upper and Lower Blind Shear rams on Yellow pod from Toolpusher's panel - good test. P/U diverter running tool; latched onto diverter and pulled same. Landed diverter out on gimbal. Rigged down diverter and transferred to main deck. P/U and installed new diverter. Function tested diverter. Tested flowline seals to 400 psi - good test. Began displacing riser with seawater. 02/06/2015: Finish displacing riser to seawater. Bled tubing x casing annulus to SW hydrostatic. Performed negative test on SCSSV - good test. Displaced choke and kill lines to seawater. R/U riser handling equipment; laid down diverter; and P/U landing joint. Recovered IWOCS Umbilical Termination Assembly (UTA). 02/07/2015: Scoped in slip joint and lock. Unlatched BOP. Moved rig to DOZ ~1;000' from well. Tested choke and kill lines to 15;000 psi - good test. Removed SDC ring and secured in moonpool. Laid down landing joint and slip joint. Removed drape hoses and laid down termination joint. Began pulling LMRP/BOP on marine riser.
233 PS001 608124005700 2018-10-28 10/28/18 Rigged up temporary filters and pump spread. Pressure tested temporary equipment to 11;300 PSI. Shut-in well. Opened downhole chemical injection valve. Pumped Xylene pre-soak. Pumped Methanol buffer. Pumped umbilical volume of organic acid. 10/29/18 Stopped pumping and secured well for xylene soak period. Pumped acid package into well. 10/30/18 Pumped remainder of acid package into well. While pumping; cycled well open and closed to lift acid up well-bore. Pumped umbilical volume of preservation fluid to displace acid. Stopped for acid soak period. 10/31/18 Stopped for acid soak period and performed offline pump maintenance. Cleaned-up well to production facility. Pumped preservation fluid over-flush at max rate to displace any remaining acid from umbilical. Final Report.

Preload HPWH to 2 MM ft/lbs. 12/24/2016: TOH with landing string; MRLD; and inner string from 10;233' MD to 9;979' MD. Circulate 1.5x landing string and inner string volume. Lock tensioner ring to termination joint and release tensioner ring from diverter housing. Move to SM PS002 well center; land and latch BOP WellHead Connector at 18:30 hrs and perform slump test - good test. Performed weight down non-shear EDS - good test. Pressure test 22" casing to 2;700 psi for 30 minutes with 8.6 ppg seawater; utilizing IPT SureTec - good test. 12/29/2016: Installed diverter and energized seals. Installed packer housing. Re-splash BOP and began running BOP / Riser System. Mr. Matthew Spear (CVX) notified the BSEE that we would be latching the BOP stack at WR 677 in approximately 72 hrs and then proceed with Deadman testing. Mrs. Amy Wilson with the BSEE Houma District gave permission to proceed with the testing on 12/23/11 at 12:37 p.m. 12/24/2011: Continue running BOP and Riser. Test rigid conduit and boost line with subsea test pump to 5;000 psi. Test choke and kill lines to 250 psi low and 10;500 psi high for 5 minutes each and continuing to run BOP and Riser. On 12/24/11 at 12:42 p.m.; Mr. Matthew Spear (CVX) received verbal confirmation from Mrs. Amy Wilson that TOI ROV Function Test - Surface revision #4 Procedures is an acceptable replacement to TOI ROV Function Test - Surface revision #2 Procedures that was submitted in the RPD. Differences noted from procedures noted during the conversation were: (1) The bonnet doors were not open during the testing. Function was verified by looking down BOP. (2) USR; MVBR; and LMRP disconnect were performed at 2.5 GPM; all other functions were not metered.

Tagged top of fish at 18;155'. POOH and RIH with wireline fishing assembly (wire finder and spear) on braided slickline. Made 3 attempts to fish with no success. RIH with 2.7" magnet on slickline. POOH; recovered debris on magnet and RIH with same magnet on slickline.

Held well control drill while tripping.

Close 9-5/8" rams and pressure test to 250/8;000 psi for 5 mins. Rigidly lock down the HPWH to the LPH. Release the MRLD running tool from the HPWH and trip out of hole. Make up jet assembly and trip in hole to 10;266' and tag TOC. Set down 30k on firm cement. Displace well to 12.5 ppg inhibited WBM and pull out of hole with assembly. Move to DOZ.

Troubleshooting suspected poly pack seals on lower annular leaking test #25. Pressure increasing to 350 psi increments of 30 psi per minute on wellbore. Confirming operator poly pack seal is bad. Pressure test wellbore to 1;800 psi to verify wellbore poly pack is good; good test). Monitor annulus on trip tank. 08/12/2015: Continue pressure testing BOP and associated valves on dual cam isolation tool assembly with 8.6 ppg seawater from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod (see IPT version 3.1.7.24 execution summary for details; which was provided to Bobby Nelson and Josh Ladner). Rig down cement lines; disengage dual cam and POOH above BOPs. Monitor well on trip tank (proper displacement observed). Pressure test BOPs and associated valves on the blind shears to 250 psi low and 11;500 psi high for 5 min with 8.6 ppg seawater from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod; good test. Current mud weight 12.5 ppg SBM. 08/21/2015: Continue to work with equipment manufacturer to troubleshoot TDX Top Drive uncontrolled torque release issue. Perform successful diverter function test from Driller's panel on 6-5/8" DP. Good test. Run 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly back in hole from 8;581' MD to 19;100' MD. Close upper annular and squeeze cement at 1/2 bpm down drill string and kill line until 1;790 psi pump pressure met. Hold pressure between 1;690 psi to 1;790 psi for 10 hours for cement to achieve 500 psi compressive strength. Bled off pressure and POOH from 22;365' MD to 20;612' MD. Current mud weight is 12.2 ppg SBM. 09/09/2015: Continue TOH with diverter sub to surface. Slip and cut drill line. Make up and RIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA to 6;535' MD. Function test BSR/CSR from Driller's panel on Blue Pod; good test. Continue to TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA to 8;068' MD. Current mud weight is 12.2 ppg SBM. 09/10/2015: Continue to TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA to 9;174' MD. Function test BOP from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod and function tested diverter from Driller's panel; good test. Continue to TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA and tag top of cement at 23;029' MD. Drill out cement and 10' of new formation to 23;346' MD. POOH inside 16" casing to 23;194' MD. Perform successful FIT to 1700 psi surface pressure; 13.6 ppg EMW. TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA to 23;317' MD. Current mud weight is 12.2 ppg SBM. 09/11/2015: At 23;317' MD; open reamer and perform pull test to confirm open. Drill ahead from 23;346' MD to 24;566' MD; weighting up to 12.5 ppg. Unable to break out connection from TDX saver sub; connection eventually broke out 120K ft-lbs. POOH to 16" shoe and change out saver sub. Continue to drill ahead to 24;445' MD; weighting up to a 12.8 ppg. At 20:00 hrs; wait on weather as the ADCP current was above 2.0 knots. Weight up to 13.0 ppg while circulating while waiting on current. Note: On 09/11/2015 @ 16:37 hrs; Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to reduce the drilling margin to 0.3 ppg; provided no HC zones are anticipated or encountered. Downhole pressure measuring must be operational while drilling with reduced margin. 09/12/2015: Drill ahead to 24;976' MD while weighting up to 13.2 ppg. Shut down to wait on weather for 1h 30m at 02:30 hrs while current was above 2 knots. Drill ahead to 24;976' MD/ 24;602' TVD. Shut down to wait on weather from 09:00 to 15:00 hrs. Pump out of hole to the 16" shoe. Continue to wait on weather. Current mud weight is 13.2 ppg SBM.

Run in hole with 14" casing on landing string from 3;388' MD/TVD to 24;949' MD (24;575' TVD). Cement casing with 116 bbls (651 cu ft) 16.2 ppg cement and begin to displace. Drop 2-3/4" activation ball and set liner hanger with 4150 psi. Observe pressure increase on annulus to confirm liner hanger set. Test BSR and 14" casing to 250 psi low; 2700 psi high from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod. Good test. Function test BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Trip in hole from surface to 13;243' MD/TVD with 12.25" drilling BHA. Function test diverter from Toolpusher's panel. Function BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Drill 10 feet of new hole from 25;072' MD (24;694' TVD) to 25;082' MD (24;703' TVD). Perform FIT with 13.6 ppg mud and 1060 psi to 14.4 ppg equivalent mud weight. Spaced out and performed a diverter function test from Driller's Panel and then continued to pull out of hole to 341' MD. 09/24/2015: Continue pulling out of hole with 12.25" drilling assembly and function tested the BSR/CSR from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod. 325 PS005 608124011800 2017-05-14 NOTE: Conducted pre-spud meetings with drill crews on 05/09/2017 and on 05/10/2017. 05/14/2017: Run in hole (RIH) with 26" jetting assembly inside of 36" conductor casing from surface to 370' MD on 6-5/8" drill pipe. Make up (M/U) Cam Actuated Drill Ahead (CADA) tool to BHA and lowered/locked into the Low Pressure Wellhead housing (LPWH). Note: On 05/14/2017; Mr. Xianjie Yi (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) to proceed through Step #9 (testing BOPs) of the APD procedure. 05/15/2017: Tripped in hole (TIH) with 36" conductor casing with 26" jetting assembly and CADA tool from 370' MD to 6;070' MD. Moved vessel from DOZ to 300' away from WR 678 PS005 well center. Continued TIH from 6;070' MD/TVD to 6;338' MD/TVD in 8.6 ppg seawater. 05/16/2017: Continued to TIH with 36" conductor casing from 6;338' MD to the mudline at 7;132' MD. Drilled 26" hole section from 7;447' MD to 8;300' MD with 8.6 ppg seawater Drilled from 8;300' MD to 8;409' MD with 10.1 ppg PAD mud. Spotted 1;250 bbls of 11.0 ppg Pump and Dump (PAD) mud at 8;170' MD/TVD. 05/17/2017: Continued spotting 1;250 bbls of 11.0 ppg PAD mud in the wellbore at 8;409' MD/TVD. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 26" jetting BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 8;409' MD/TVD to 6;560' MD/TVD in 11.0 ppg PAD mud. Retrieved CADA tool. Moved rig from well center to DOZ. Continued to TOH with 26" jetting BHA from 6;560' MD/TVD to surface. TIH with 26" BHA from surface to 6;430' MD/TVD. Moved rig from DOZ to well center; Stabbed 26" bit into LPWH at 7;125' MD/TVD. Continued to TIH from 7;125' MD/TVD to 7;447' MD/TVD. Displaced drill string volume from 8.6 ppg seawater to 10.1 ppg PAD mud at 7;420' MD/TVD. Washed down from 7;420' MD/TVD to 7;636' MD/TVD. TIH with 26" directional BHA from 7;636' MD/TVD to 8;300' MD/TVD. Washed and reamed from 8;300' MD/TVD to 8;409' MD/TVD. Drilled 26" hole section from 8;409' MD/TVD to 8;697' MD/TVD. 05/18/2017: Continued drilling 26" hole section from 8;697' MD/TVD to 9;137' MD/TVD with 10.1 ppg PAD mud on 6-5/8" drill pipe. Displaced wellbore from 10.1 ppg PAD mud to 12.5 ppg PAD mud. TOH from 9;137' MD/TVD to 6;420' MD/TVD. Moved vessel from well center to DOZ. Continued TOH with 26" BHA from 6;420' MD/TVD to surface. 05/19/2017: TIH with 26" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from surface to 6;430' MD/TVD. Moved vessel from DOZ to well center. Washed down from 9;100' MD/TVD to 9;137' MD/TVD. Drilled 26" hole section from 9;137' MD/TVD to 9;657' MD/TVD with 10.1 ppg PAD mud. 05/20/2017: Continued drilling 26" hole section from 9;657' MD/TVD to section Total Depth (TD) of 10;550' MD/TVD with 10.1 ppg PAD mud. Spotted 33 bbls of 16.0 ppg pill in rathole and chased with 12.5 ppg PAD mud. Circulated 3;600 bbls of 12.5 ppg PAD mud down drill string. TOH with 26" BHA from 10;361' MD/TVD to 6;613' MD/TVD. Moved vessel from well center to DOZ.
326 PS005 608124011800 2017-05-21 05/21/2017: Trip in hole (TIH) with 22" x 23" casing from surface to 3;373' MD. Run in hole (RIH) with 6-5/8" inner string from surface to 3;153' MD. M/U Mechanical Rigid Lockdown (MRLD) tool to inner string. Installed MRLD tool to HPWH. 05/22/2017: Slacked off (S/O) MRLD and closed snorkel valves after purging air from 22" casing. TIH with 22" x 23" casing on 6-5/8" landing string from 3;379' MD to 6;547' MD. Moved vessel from DOZ to well center. Stab 22" casing shoe into LPWH. Displaced landing string; inner string; and casing from 8.6 ppg seawater to 12.5 ppg PAD mud. Continued TIH with 22" x 23" casing on 6-5/8" landing string from 7;155' MD to 10;427' MD. Landed and locked HPWH into LPWH. Circulated 1.5x landing string; inner string; and casing volume to condition mud prior to cement job. Pumped 100 bbls of 13.2 ppg spacer; 1;235 bbls (6;935 cu ft) of 13.8 ppg Lafarge Class H lead cement slurry; and 179 bbls (1;005 cu ft) of 16.4 ppg Lafarge Class H tail cement slurry. Displaced cement with 319 bbls of 8.6 ppg seawater. Cement in place at the mudline confirmed by 931 psi lift pressure and ROV pH meter reading increase at mudline. Confirmed float holding. Preloaded HPWH to 2MM ft/lbs. TOH 2 stands and pumped nerf ball down landing string with seawater at 5 barrels per minute. 05/23/2017: Continued TOH with landing string; MRLD; and inner string from 10;159' MD to 7;127' MD. Circulate 1.5x landing string and inner string volume while washing the HPWH with 12.5 ppg PAD mud. Continue TOH from 7;127' MD to 6;859' MD (200' above HPWH). Moved rig to DOZ. Made up (M/U) riser double and splashed BOP. Performed pressure testing of choke and kill (C&K) lines to 300 psi low/ 11;500 psi high for 5 minutes each; good tests. Performed pressure testing of boost line and rigid conduit lines to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes; good tests. All pressure tests conducted utilizing IPT SureTec software with 8.6 ppg seawater. Run in hole (RIH) with BOP on riser from 209' MD to 2;234' MD. 05/24/2017: Pressure test C&K lines to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Continue RIH with BOP from 2;234' to 4;785'. M/U test cap and pressure test C&K lines with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit with 8.6 ppg seawater to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Continue RIH to 5;314'. Troubleshoot riser torque wrenches due to improper function. Replaced hydraulic supply manifold. Continue RIH to 6;959'. Install 20' riser pup and BLAT pup. Slack off to 6;985'. M/U test cap and pressure test C&K lines to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes; good test. 05/25/2017: Move vessel over wellhead and perform dummy land out to confirm space out. P/U to safe working height and installed drape hose. Pressure test C&K lines with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit with 8.6 ppg seawater to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Install storm loops. Move over well center and land out BOP at 16:45 hrs. Latched connector with 1;500 psi and 20.7 gallons. Performed slump test with 600k down and 100k overpull test. Performed soft EDS from Driller's chair; good test. Performed 1;000 psi test with 8.6 ppg seawater between BSR and 22" casing; good test. Transfer weight to the tensioners. Performed 22" casing/ LBSR test with 8.6 ppg seawater to 2;700 psi for 30 minutes from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; good test. P/U and installed Diverter and performed function and flow line test; good test. Note: On 05/25/2017; Mr. Josh Ladner (BSEE) granted approval that after initial latch up testing of the 2x acatuated IBOPs and 1x manual IBOP top drive valves that subsequent tests could only require testing of the selected actuated IBOP and manual IBOP. 05/26/2017: Layout riser running tools. P/U and TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Unable to establish communication with the Sperry M5 gamma ray tool. Pressure test C&K manifold with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi; good test. Tested 6-5/8" FH FOSV and IBOP to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi; good test. TOH and rack back (R/B) bit stand. M/U and TIH with NuTec/ DrilQuip BOP test tool assembly and land in wellhead. Unlatch from NuTec tool and perform BOP acoustic function test to close the UBSR and test with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi; good test. Perform BOP ROV function test to close the UBSR and test with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300 psi/ 11;500psi; good test. ROV encounted an issue with its motor and tripped to surface to troubleshoot. Pressure tested the BOPs from the TCP on Blue Pod with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300/ 11;500 psi on UBSR; LBSR; Top drive IBOP'(x3); 300/ 6;500 psi on Kelly hose and choke manifold buffer valves; good test. Attempted to perform subsea deadman test; test failed. 05/27/2017: Continued troubleshooting BOP deadman test. Opened Deadman Auto-shear flood valve. Successfully fired deadman sequence. Pressure tested UBSR against BOP TT to 300/ 11;500 psi for 5 min with seawater; good test. Pressure tested UBSR; functioned from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod; against BOP TT to 300/ 11;500 psi for 5 min; good test. Pressure tested LBSR; functioned from TCP on Blue Pod; against BOP TT to 300/ 11;500 psi for 5 min; good test. TIH from 6;727' to 7;126' with NuTec running tool. M/U NuTec tool. Space out and performed accumulator drawdown test. Pressure tested the BOPs from the Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod on 6-5/8" drill pipe across the BOP with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300/ 11;500 psi on pipe rams and 300/ 6;500 psi on the annular; good test. Spaced out to perform diverter test. While performing diverter function; EDS was inadvertently pressed and LMRP lifted off BOP. Performed inspection of riser tensioners and ROV performed inspection of LMRP and BOP. Continued TOH to 767'. Note: On 05/27/2017; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Shane Young (Chevron) approval to proceed with operations with the BOP flood valve in open position. Note: On 05/27/2017; Mr. Justin Ledet granted Mr. Shane Young approval to proceed with operations utilizing the primary choke panel on the main assistant driller's chair and the remote panel on the choke manifold; while the secondary choke panel inside the driller's cabin is not operational.

Performed diverter function test - good test. Pressure tested 22" casing with seawater to 2;700 psi for 30 minutes; verified with IPT software - good test.

Note: On 10/03/2017 at 23:13 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) a 48 hour extension for BOP and Diverter function tests. 10/04/2017: TIH with 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" tieback on landing string from 24;648' to 26;434' MD. Observed pressure increase to 1;960 psi at 26;555' bit depth (6 ft in on cement stand) indicating the Seal Stem assembly seals were engaged in the lower PBR. Slack off to land the hanger at 26;570' bit depth (7;129' hanger depth) and slacked off 100 klbs of casing weight. Pressure tested the Seal Stem assembly against the PBR by applying 1;000 psi. Picked up to 26;514'. Circulated 900 bbls total. Pressure tested the cement lines to 10;000 psi. Pumped 14.4 ppg lead spacer; total 200 bbls. Slacked off and stabbed tieback casing into PBR and landed out 10-3/4" casing hanger on load shoulder. Bled off pressure to cement unit while slacking off - 15 bbls bled off. Slacked off 70 klbs down on hanger and turned string 6 rounds to the right to engage seal assy. Break circulation from cement unit down kill line; then close MVBR. Pressure up quickly to 4;000 psi and hold for 30 seconds. Ramp pressure from 4;000 psi to 9;550 psi and hold for 5 minutes. Bled off pressure - 3.9 bbls. Pressure back up to 9;550 psi and test per IPT for 5 mins - good test. Picked up casing hanger seal assembly running tool (CHSART) above hanger and breakout cement stand. Install two 7" nerf balls and pump down drill string until BU at surface. Performed flow check and pump 65 bbls 15.9 ppg slug. Trip out of hole with DQ CHSART and L/D same. WOC. Test LBSRs to 1;000 psi for 5 mins. Displace riser to SW from 13.9 ppg SBM. Pump SW overboard. 10/07/2017: Wait on weather from 00:00 hrs to 13:30 hrs. Strip pipe up through lower annular to reverse out remaining slurry. Reverse circulate fluid out of drill pipe; pumping 13.9 ppg CaBr2 down kill line until 13.9 ppg CaBr2 observed at surface. Open lower annular and lay down frac head. Trip out of Hole (TOH) with frac service tool from 30;805' MD to 30;740' MD. Close lower annular and pressure test down drill pipe to 500 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Rig up frac head and surface lines and test same to 10;000 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Open Zone #2 FCS and MCS. Flush and fill surface lines from frac boat with 8.6 ppg seawater. Attempt to pressure test same. Troubleshoot hydraulic valve control line for frac head. Pressure test surface lines from frac boat to 13;500 psi using 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. Displace surface lines from 8.6 ppg seawater to 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel. Pump 178 bbls of acid; 100 bbls of 10 ppg linear flush; and 75 bbls of mini-frac fluid down drill pipe. Displace same with 318 bbls of 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel. Bullhead acid into perforations and perform mini frac by pumping 100 bbls of 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel down drill pipe to bullhead mini frac fluid into formation. 11/07/2017: Perform Zone #2 frac job by pumping proppant and linear gel slurry from frac boat. Strip pipe up through lower annular to reverse out remaining slurry. Reverse circulate fluid out of drill pipe; pumping 13.9 ppg CaBr2 down kill line. Observe 400 klbs overpull while attempting to position service tool for reverse circulation. Close upper pipe ram and open lower annular. Continue reverse circulating fluid out of drill pipe. Close lower annular and open upper pipe ram. Establish pipe movement and close upper pipe movement and open lower annular. Continue reverse circulating fluid out of drill pipe. Attempt to work pipe free with no success. Continue reverse circulating fluid out of drill pipe; pumping two drill pipe volumes down kill line. Open lower annular and observe losses of 38 bph. Attempt to work pipe free with no success. Pump 180 bbls of 14.0 ppg lost circulation pill and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Observe losses slow to 15 bph. Attempt to work pipe free with no success. Function test BOP from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Function diverter from Toolpusher's Control Panel. 11/08/2017: Monitor fluid losses while waiting on wireline equipment with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 in hole - observe losses of 30-40 bph. Pump 160 bbls of 14.0 ppg lost circulation pill and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Observe losses of 16-40 bph. Pump another 160 bbls of 14.0 ppg lost circulation pill and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Continue to observe 16-40 bph losses. Pump 150 bbls of 14.0 ppg lost circulation pill and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. 11/09/2017: Monitor fluid losses while waiting on wireline equipment with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 in hole - observe losses of 16-44 bph. Pump 24 bbls of CaBr2/ lost circulation polymer mixture down drill string and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Observe losses reduce from 60 bph to 25-30 bph while rigging up wireline equipment. 11/10/2017: Pump 150 bbls of 14.0 ppg lost circulation pill and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Observe losses slow from 30 bph to 15 bph. Run in hole (RIH) with 2.7" gauge ring on wireline from surface to 28;927' MD. Pull out of hole (POOH) from 28;927' MD to surface. Pump 158 bbls of 14.0 ppg lost circulation pill and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. 11/11/2017: RIH with 1.75" plasma cutter from surface to 30;330' MD on wireline. Activate plasma cutter and hold 1;300 klbs hookload. Observe weight decrease to 860 klbs; giving a good indication that the cut was successful. POOH with plasma cutter from 30;300' MD to surface on wireline. TOH with frac service tool from 30;352' to 29;274' MD. Perform BOP acoustic function test on Middle Pipe Ram from SCU-1.
352 PS005 608124011801 2017-11-12 11/12/2017: Pump 25 bbls of CaBr2/ Lost Circulation Polymer mixture down drill string and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Trip out of Hole (TOH) from 29;274' MD to 29;049' MD with cut 4" washpipe. Pressure test BOP from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; to 300 psi low/ 7;600 psi high with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Pressure test Upper and Lower Annular from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; to 300 psi low/ 4;600 psi high with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. All pressure tests performed using IPT SureTec software. Function test BOP from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Function diverter from Driller's Control Panel. Pump 50 bbls of CaBr2/ Lost Circulation Polymer mixture down drill string and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. TOH with 4" cut washpipe from 29;049' MD to 22;120' MD. 11/13/2017: TOH from 22;120' MD to surface in 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Estimate top of fish at 30;335' MD; leaving 266' of service tool in the hole. Trip in hole (TIH) from surface to 6;545' MD with cleanout assembly. 11/14/2017: TIH from 6;554' MD to 30;212' MD. Wash down from 30;212' MD to 30;332' MD. TOH from 30;332' MD to 30;320' MD and reverse circulate 1;050 bbls of 13.9 ppg CaBr2 through drill string. Pump 24 bbls of CaBr2/ Lost Circulation Polymer mixture down drill string and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. TOH from 30;320' MD to 16;594' MD. 11/15/2017: TOH from 16;594' MD to surface in 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Trip in hole (TIH) with retrievable bridge plug from surface to 4;600' MD on wireline. TOH from 4;600' MD to surface on wireline to troubleshoot plug running tool. TIH with retrievable bridge plug from surface to 30;335' MD on wireline. Set plug at 30;319' MD. Observe losses stop initially; increase to 12 bph and then slow to 8-9 bph. TOH with plug running tool from 30;319' MD to surface on wireline. Note: BSEE Inspectors Joshua Naquin; Gabe Orellana; and Paul Reeves performed inspection. No INCs issued. 11/16/2017: TIH with backup retrievable bridge plug from surface to 30;320' MD on wireline. Set plug at 30;303' MD. Observe losses stop. TOH with plug running tool from 30;303' MD to surface on wireline. Pressure test retrievable bridge plug against upper blind shear rams (UBSR) to 5;000 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Pressure test performed using IPT SureTec software. Function test lower blind shear rams (LBSR) and upper blind shear rams (UBSR) from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. 11/17/2017: TIH with frac service tool from surface to 14;062' MD in 13.9 ppg CaBr2. 11/18/2017: TIH from 14;062' MD to 29;348 MD'. Open and close Zone #6 Mechanical Closing Sleeve (MCS). Pressure test same to 1;500 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. TIH from 29;348' MD to 29;627' MD. Open and close Zone #5 MCS. Pressure test same to 1;500 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. TIH from 29;627' MD to 29;846' MD. Open and close Zone #4 MCS. Pressure test same to 1;500 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. TIH from 29;846' MD to 30;203' MD. Open and close Zone #3 MCS. Pressure test same to 1;500 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Close lower annular and perform pressure test down backside to 500 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Perform stripping test on lower annular. Open lower annular and make up frac head. Rig up frac head and surface lines and test same to 10;000 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Pump 25 bbls of 6.9 ppg solvent pickle down drill pipe. Displace pickle with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 down drill pipe; then reverse circulate pickle out of drill pipe.
353 PS005 608124011801 2017-11-19 11/19/2017: Wait on weather. Bring frac boat alongside and connect hose. Position service tool to weight down squeeze position. Apply 2;000 psi on backside with rig pumps and inject into formation @ 2 bpm with cement unit. Suspend operations due to all thrusters on the Blue Dolphin being online @ 90% load (high seas & winds). Bleed off pressure on backside and open annular. Disconnect FRAC boat hose. Perform rig maintenance while waiting on weather. Called Blue Dolphin in to hook up hoses at 23:30 hrs. Function tested BOP from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod. Function tested Diverter on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's Control Panel. 11/20/2017: Closed Annular and reverse circulated at 2 bpm to fill surface lines while M/V Blue Dolphin connected hoses to rig for frac job. M/V Blue Dolphin flushed frac hoses and surface lines with seawater. Pressure tested lines from the frac boat to the supreme frac head and flushed with 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel. Perform acid treatment; bullheading into formation with 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel. Performed Zone #3 frac. Stripped up to reverse out positon and reversed out until 13.9 ppg CaBr2 at surface. Stripped up to close MCS. Reversed out 2x work string volumes. MCS to 500 psi. TOH with ESTMZ service tool to 11;785'. 11/21/2017: TOH with ESTMZ service tool from 11;785' to surface. P/U and TIH with ESTMZ from surface to 29;301'. Sting into VCH packer. Open/close MJPS; open/close MCS and FCS for Zones 6; 5 and 4. Pressure test 6 & 5 each to 1500 psi on DP and 500 psi on annulus to confirm closed. M/U to TDX and prepare to disconnect. WOW. Note: On 11/21/2017 at 11:10 hrs; Bobby Nelson (BSEE) notified Bobby Naumann (Chevron) that "Chevron may delay Casing/BSR pressure testing until November 27th or as soon as possible; whichever comes first." 11/22/2017: WOW. P/U and close MCS; FCS; MJPS. Test to confirm sleeves closed. Spaceout and P/U frac head. S/O 100k and mark pipe; close lower annular; strip to reverse position. Flush/test frac lines and spot pickle. Reverse pickle out of DP. S/O to weight down circulate position on ESTMZ tools. P/U to reverse out and reverse another 1.5x DP volume (1;000 bbls). Continue to wait on weather. 11/23/2017: WOW. MU frac hose; flush and test lines. Perform acid treatment; bullheading into formation with 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel. Performed Zone #4 frac. Overpull observed when stripping up to reverse position; continue to strip up to contingency reverse out positon. Attempted to reverse out; maintaining calculated pressure; due to losses unable to maintain DP pressure. Increase pump rate to 15 bpm with 5800 psi casing pressure. Returns at 5 bpm. At end of reporting time; reversed out 248 bbls and lost 623 bbls to formation. 11/24/2017: Continue attempts to reverse circulate with 13.9 ppg CaBr; clear out surface plugging with cement pump. Achieved partial returns and continue to reverse out 2 drill string volumes. Shut down and monitor pressures; observed ballooning. Continue to reverse out an adiditional drill string volume. Observed gas at 2;618 units and 1.5 bbls of crude oil. Captured oil and interface in separate containment. Total 3;948 bbl losses downhole during rerverse circulations. Shut down and monitor pressures; observed pressures decline from 560 psi Cp to 0 psi. Open well and flow check; observe 3.6 bph losses. Move service tool to weight down position and pressure test MCS to 1500 psi. Losses increased to 10 bph. Rigged down frac head and treatment lines. Monitor well while transferring TEK plug to cement unit. Loss rate at 9 bph average. 11/25/2017: Displaced and spotted 42 bbls of TEK plug at 30;015'. Flow check and TOH with ESTMZ service tool from 30;015' to surface. Cut and slipped drill line. P/U and TIH with 3-1/2" washpipe from surface to 1;063'. Note: Offline pressure test choke manifold to 250 psi/ 7600 psi.
354 PS005 608124011801 2017-11-26 11/26/2017: TIH with HES CleanWell VacTech assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 1;340' to 24;513'. P/U double dutch and SES. Perform BOP pressure test on 5-7/8" drill pipe to 300 psi/ 7;600 psi rams; and annular to 300 psi/ 4;600 psi; from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Perform BOP function test from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Perform Diverter function test from Driller's Panel. TIH with HES CleanWell VacTech assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 24;513' to 28;950'. Wash down to 29;700'. Close annular and staged up pressure to 4500 psi in attempt to bullhead TekPlug - no success. TIH and tag at 30;312'. 11/27/2017: Flushed grease out of choke manifold. Rigged up Side Entry Sub and surface lines. Reverse circulate 1400 bbls at 12 bpm/ 3900 psi to clean up Tek-Plug from wellbore. Attempt to pressure test Baker RBP to 5;000 psi; pressure broke over at 5;000 psi. Monitor 47 bph losses on T/T while mixing Tek-Plug. Re-tag top of packer at 30;316' with 10k down. Drop VacTech activation ball and circulate 100 bbls back to surface after tool activated. S/O 40k on packer. Drop Churchill SDD activation dart; and spot 38 bbl Tek-Plug. Monitor; losses decreased from 50 bph to 15 bph. TOH with Cleanout assembly from 30;248' to 16;093'. Note: On 11/27/2017 at 18:21 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) provided Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) approval to delay Casing/BSR pressure testing until 12/04/2017. 11/28/2017: TOH from 16;093' to surface; recovering 31 lbs of debris from CleanWell assembly. R/U wireline and P/U 3.75" lead impression block. RIH with LIB from surface to 29;304' (top of VCH). Attempt to work through VCH with no success. POOH with 3.75" LIB. Make up Baker 4.25" bridge plug assembly and function test; test good. Note: Ed Lacy; Robert Mosely and Dixon Whitley with the USCG arrived at 09:31 hrs on 11/28/2017 to perform annual COI of the DCQ. 11/29/2017: RIH with 4.25" PBP #1 and set on top of previous plug from 30;302.8' to 30;311'. Pull out of hole with wireline. Tested PBP #1 against UBSRs to 2;000 psi. Function LBSRs with ROV and function tested UBSRs and LBSRs from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panl; Blue Pod. RIH with 3.375" PBP #2 and set on top of previous plug from 30;295' to 30;302.8'. 11/30/2017: TOH with wireline setting tool to surface. Test upper permanent bridge plug to 5;000 psi with LBSR. R/D wireline equipment. RIH with ESTMZ BHA to 6;500'. Perform acoustic BSR function. Continue RIH with ESTMZ service tool on 5-7/8" DP to 26;615'; cycling zone 6 and 5 MCS open/closed on the way. Pressure test against zone 5 MCS to 1;500 psi; good test. Spaced out; picked up supreme frac head and rig up frac iron. Mark 100k wt down position and reverse positions on zone 5. Pressure test surface lines and frac head to 10;000 psi; good test. Prepare to reverse out drillstring volume. 11/01/2017: Reverse out 13.9 ppg CaBr. Diverted 199 bbls of dirty fluid to slop tank in moonpool and 105 bbls to sandtrap. Continue reversing fluid while filtering fluid on surface. Spot pickle in drill pipe and reverse out same. Open MCS sleeve and inject 7 bbls into formation with cement unit. Flush/Fill frac iron and test same. Spot acid down DP. 11/02/2017: Continue to reverse out proppant due to leak on frac boat. Reposition tool and perform seal test on MCS zone #5. Perform frac on zone #5. P/U to contingency reverse and reverse out proppant + 2 additional drillstring volumes. Rigged down frac head. Performed 500 psi test on sleeves; good test. Position service tool in weight down on zone #6 and test service tool seals against MCS. Test failed. TOH with ESTMZ service tool to 9;530'.
355 PS005 608124011801 2017-12-03 12/03/2017: TOH with ESTMZ service tool and observed missing top seals. Function test BOP on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function test diverter from Toolpusher's Control Panel. TIH with new service tool to zone 6. R/U frac head and surface iron; test same. Reverse out 1 DP volume. Locate tool positions and mark same. Pickle pipe. 12/04/2017: Test lines from frac boat. P/U to reverse position; spot acid down pipe; follow with frac job in weight down position. Reverse out proppant. Lay out frac head and test to verify sleeves closed. TOH from 29;251' to 17;817'. Note: On 12/04/2017 at 15:44 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) provided Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) approval to delay Casing/BSR pressure testing until 12/09/2017. 12/05/2017: TOH with service tool from 17;817' to 7;235'. Repair iron roughneck. Continue to TOH from 7;235' to surface. Slip and cut drill line. P/U cleanout assembly and TIH from surface to 5;325'. 12/06/2017: TIH with the ESTMZ cleanout assembly from 5;325' to 29;305' (tagged VCH packer at 29;305' DPM and worked through by P/U and S/O 2x). TIH with the ESTMZ cleanout assembly from 29;305' to 30;299' DPM (tagged the top of the permanent Baker packer with 10 klbs. Dropped 1.75" Vac-Tech activation ball and activated Vac-Tech. Circulated at 10 bpm (5;350 psi) through the Vac-Tech to remove any debris from below the VCH packer (pumped 100 bbls total). P/U 45 ft off bottom and monitor the well for 30 minutes. Re-tag the permanent Baker packer. TOH with the ESTMZ cleanout assembly from 29;305' to 1;384'. L/D ESTMZ cleanout assembly from 1;384' to 1;136'. Recovered 4.5 lbs of wet metal shavings from Mag Tech and 2 lbs of debris from Vac-Tech. 12/07/2017: TOH from 1;136' to surface with cleanout assembly washpipe. Clean/clear rig floor. R/U handling equipment for isolation assembly. P/U and TIH with the isolation assembly (Zones 3 - 6) from surface to 1;142'. TIH with isolation assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 1;142' to 21;945'. 12/08/2017: TIH with Halliburton isolation assembly from 21;945' to 29;228'. Continued TIH; opening MJPS and FCS production sleeves across zones 6 through 3. Monitored losses on a 2 pit system while boosting to keep up with CaBr2 loss rate. Made up TDX; slacked off and stung isolation assembly seals into VCH seal bore with a mule shoe depth of 30;292'; losses stopped. Lost a total of 173 bbls. Confirmed latch with 30 klbs overpull; slacked back off to neutral weight. Closed annular and pressure tested the FS-2 and seals in VCH packer seal bore to 1;000 psi for 5 minutes on IPT; good test. Dropped 1-7/8" diverter ball and pumped down workstring. Staged pressure up to 2;500 psi; P/U and released from the isolation assembly. Tagged the PBR with 10 klbs; closed the MVBRs to mark the painted stand across the stack. TOH with the isolation assembly running tool from 27;754' to 1;400'. Tested casing to 5;000 psi; good test. Repair racker and iron roughneck. TOH from 1;400' to 956'. 12/09/2017: TOH with Halliburton isolation assembly from 956' to surface. Rigged up Weatherford handling equipment for TNT packer assembly. TIH with TNT packer assembly to 26;360'.
356 PS005 608124011801 2017-12-10 12/10/2017: TIH with Halliburton TNT packer assembly on 5-7/8" TFM DP to 29;054'. S/O from 29;099' and stung into the isolation assembly PBR at 29;170' DPM; continued to 29;182' bit depth (DPM) to land out in isolation assembly. Lined up HAL cementer. Pressured up on annulus to 1;000 psi and tested short seal assembly. Lined up HAL cementer and began setting TNT permanent packer as per Halliburton: TNT permanent packer at 28;976' DPM (top of TNT PBR = 28;868' DPM). Pressure tested TNT permanent packer/casing to 5;000 psi for 30 mins with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Test performed from the Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Function tested BOP on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function tested diverter from Driller's Control Panel. Closed MVBRs on painted white stand 2 times. TOH with Hydraulic Setting Tool assembly from 29;170' to surface. 12/11/2017: Performed rig maintenance. Trip in hole with jetting/BPRRT assembly from surface to 7;522'. M/U test stand and tested BOP on 5-7/8" DP to 250-350 psi/ 7;600 psi rams; and 250-350 psi/ 4;600 psi annular; from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod via IPT Suretec. Hung well dynamic control line sheave in derrick. Jet SSPT bore protector from 7;423' to 7;433' DPM. Continue to TOH. 12/12/2017: TIH with BPRRT and jetting assembly from 7;433' to 7;725'. Landed the BPRRT in the SSPT bore protector at 7;118'. Pulled the SSPT bore protector free with 33 klbs overpull. TOH and positioned jet sub in SSPT. Jetted SSPT. TOH with BPRRT and jetting assembly to surface. Hung Expro umbilical in derrick sheave. Slipped and cut 155' of drill line. R/U Weatherford tubing handling equipment. Spotted ELSA (lower portion of SSTT) in center mousehole. P/U and RIH with HES seal assemblies and 1 joint of 4-1/2" tubing to 141'. 12/13/2017: Terminate injection line on Asphaltene CIM; pressure tested line. Terminate TEC line onto flat-pack and pressure tested line. Terminate injection line on Scale Inhibitor CIM and pressure tested line. Confirm injection through control lines. R/U WTFD control line mgmt system/ handling eqpt. RIH with 4-1/2" 17# Vam Top tubing to 7;445'. Functioned BSRs from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Note: BSEE Regulatory Inspection Visit (09:20 - 12:55 hrs): BSEE Inspectors Joshua Naquin; Troy Boudreaux; and Chris Treland onboard. No INC's issued. 12/14/2017: TIH with 4-1/2" 17# Vam Top tubing from 7;445' to 19;346'. Barrette tubing coupling and indexed for timing pup selection. P/U 180 deg timing pup. P/U SCSSV/CIM. Attempted to terminate control lines on SCSSV. Unable to get proper ferrule set and left lower wedge ferrule inside of both ports A and B on SCSSV. Attempted to recover ferrules from ports with no success. L/D SCSSV/CIM. P/U backup SCSSV/CIM. Attempted to terminate control lines on backup SCSSV with the same results. Recovered lower wedge ferrules from both ports. Troubleshot IDFC connections. Used ferrules from different batch to terminate control lines A and B on backup SCSSV and observed indication of good ferrule set. 12/15/2017: TIH with 4-1/2" Vam tubing to 20;255'. R/U 6" handling equipment. M/U 4-1/2" Vam x 6" VIT crossover. Attempt to M/U 6" 50 ppf; 13CR-115 VAM TOP VIT tubing; troubleshoot damaged connections from WTFD tong slippage. TIH with 6" 50 ppf; 13CR-115 VAM TOP VIT tubing from 20;253' to 21;797'. M/U 6" VIT Pin x 5-1/2" box crossover. R/U tubing hanger handling equipment. M/U timing pup. M/U tubing hanger. 12/16/2017: Terminated and tested control lines on TH. R/D tubing handling eqpt. R/U for SSTT. Transferred SSTT from center mousehole to main well center with crown tugger and main TDX (elevators). M/U SSTT-THRT to tubing hanger. Functioned THRT. Slacked off SSTT below the rotary. Began changing out equipment to handle landing string.
357 PS005 608124011801 2017-12-17 12/17/2017: R/D Weatherford 30' 500 ton bails. R/U 11' 750 ton bails and BX-5 elevators. M/U junk basket stand. TIH with SSTT on 7-5/8" MaXit landing string from 22;054' to 28;859'. Stung into PBR at 28;859'. Performed soft landout and confirmed 60 ft of seal engagement into PBR; with seal assembly at 28;919' and tubing hanger at 7;119'. Picked up 6 ft above PBR. Pumped and spotted 1;160 bbls of 13.9 ppg CaBr2 inhibited packer fluid in tubing x casing annulus. Slacked off to 28;875'. Broke out double from soft land stand. P/U CTLF. 12/18/2017: R/U CTLF and Surface Flow Tree. Install torpedo packers. Land out and lock tubing hanger in XT at 7;119'. Pressure tested tubing hanger; SCSSV1 & SCSSV2; gallery seal; production bore; casing x tubing annulus with cement unit to 5;000 psi for 30 mins. Engage and test electrical penetrators. Repeated gallery seal test. R/U slick line lubricator. 12/19/2017: Pressure test surface flow tree and slick line lubricator to 10;500 psi for 5 min. Pressure test landing string; SFT body; and production tubing against FS-2 HI valve to 4;500 psi for 30 min. Negative test SCSSV to 2;200 psi; 62 psi build in 30 mins - good test. Rig up slickline and test lubricator to 10;500 psi. Attempt to retrieve isolation sleeve; sheared pin on running tool. Retrieve to surface and re-pin. Installed centralizer to assist in running tool alignment. Unable to pass centralizer past 43' RKB. Pull centralizer to surface and observe mark on paint with similar dimensions 5.25" ID to a Teflon O-ring that is part of the test cap for the PXF landing joint. Rig down lubricator; surface control lines and Chiksans. Boost riser volume at 18 bpm. Unlatch THRT and pick up to remove Torpedo packers. Remove Teflon O ring from connection. Install Torpedo packers. Land and lock tubing hanger running tool. Pressure test THRT seals to 9;000 psig for 15 mins. R/U surface equipment control lines and slickline lubricator. 12/20/2017: Completed rig up surface pressure control equipment; test with 10;500 psi. Pressure test landing string against SSTT retainer valve to 7;650 psi. RIH with slickline; recover isolation assembly with all seals intact. Displace 13.9 ppg brine in landing string and kill line to 6.6 ppg base oil. RIH with slickline and set LCP in TH profile. Pressure test above Lower Crown Plug (LCP) using 6;6 ppg base oil to 10;400 psi surface pressure for 15 mins. Test below LCP using 6.6 ppg base oil to 8;100 psi surface pressure for 60 mins. Displace Choke; Boost line and riser from brine to seawater. 12/21/2017: Displace Riser from brine to seawater. Attempt to cycle FS-2HI valve 25 additional times for a total of 34 times. No success. Reduce baseline pressure by 500 psi to 2100 psi. Held for 85 minutes and restart cycling sequence for 6 cycles; total of 40 cycles; FS-2HI valve open. Bullhead total of 101 bbls of base oil to achieve 3900 psi surface pressure. Function SCSSV three times and close. Bleed off to 800 psi and Inflow test SCSSV to 3;100 psi for 30 mins - good test. RIH with slickline and set UCP in TH profile. Pressure test Upper Crown Plug (UCP) from above using 6.6 ppg base oil to 10;350 psi for 15 mins. Pressure test between UCP and LCP via IWOCS to 12;800 psi for 30 mins with methanol. 12/22/2017: Displaced base oil from surface lines and flow head with seawater. R/D slickline equipment. Unlatch THRT and displace landing string to seawater. Rig down surface control lines; Chiksans; and Torpedo packers. P/U to 7;069' and close UBSRs. Displace Kill line to SW while rigging down SFT and CTLF. Clear rig floor of equipment. Rig up Weatherford LS handling equipment. POOH with 7-5/8" LS from 7;069' to 129'. R/U and L/D SSTT. 12/23/2017: L/D SSTT on main rotary while continue to L/D 7-5/8" landing string on aux. R/D Expro umbilical. R/U riser handling equipment. R/U diverter running tool.
358 PS005 608124011801 2017-12-24 12/24/2017: Pull and lay out diverter. P/U landing joint and stroke in slip joint. Repair hoses on RRT. Unlatch from well at 06:00 hrs. Install Tertiary cap on wellhead while locking tensioner load ring. Remove storm loops and drape hoses. L/D landing joint. Repair hoses on RRT. L/D slip joint and pups. Replace auto slew proximity switch on riser yoke. Orient riser joints laid out on riser skate incorrectly to facilitate transfer to riser hold. 12/25/2017: Pull BOP on Marine Riser from 6;840' to surface. Secure BOP in transporter and remove IWOCS Guillotine. R/D riser running equipment. Calibrate Main TDX load pins.
359 PS007 608124012200 2018-01-03 01/03/2018: P/U and RIH with 6-5/8" drill pipe in doubles. TOH and R/B stands of 6-5/8" drill pipe. Waited on weather. 01/04/2018: R/U Weatherford casing handling equipment. P/U and TIH with 36" conductor housing from surface to 322'. Cycle tool to Reverse position to confirm FCS closed/ MCS open. Pressure tested lines from Frac boat to rig floor Frac head. Performed Acid Job and Main Frac for Zone #5. Reversed out per schedule. Rigged down Frac head and TOH to 23;770' and R/U double dutch. Pressure test BOPs on 5-7/8" drillpipe to 250 psi/ 7400 psi from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; with 14.0 ppg CaBr2; and pressure test annulars to 250 psi/ 4;600 psi.
379 PS007 608124012200 2018-05-20 05/20/2018: Pressure test BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe (DP) from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod to 250 psi/ 7;400 psi and pressure test Annular to 250 psi/ 4;600 psi with 14.0 ppg CaBr. Function BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function test diverter from Driller's Control Panel. Trip out of hole (TOH) with Halliburton enhanced single trip multi-zone (ESTMZ) assy from 23;770' to surface. Function BSRs from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; while boosting riser. Rig up (R/U) and run in hole (RIH) with Isolation assembly from surface to 747'. 05/21/2018: Trip in hole (TIH) with Isolation assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 747' to 1;535'. Total assembly weight: 21k. Rig down (R/D) Weatherford tripmaster; 3-1/2" elevators; becket and bails. Installed wiper rubber and SLT 1000T slips. TIH with the HES Isolation assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 1;535' to 28;909'. Conducted pre-job safety meeting (PJSM) and established circ on 2 pit system via boost. Continue TIH opening MJPS and frac closing production sleeves (FCS) across Zones 5 - 1. Monitored losses on a 2 pit system while boosting to keep up with CaBr2 loss rate. Made up TDX; slacked off and stung Isolation assembly seals into VCH seal bore with a mule shoe depth of 30;388'; losses stopped. Lost a total of 388 bbls. Confirmed latch with 30 klbs overpull; slacked back off to neutral weight. Closed annular and pressure tested the FS-2 and seals in VCH packer seal bore to 1;000 psi for 5 minutes on IPT; good test. Dropped 1-7/8" diverter ball and pumped down work string. Set Isolation packer at 28;872' MD/ 26;819' TVD and tagged polished bore receptacle (PBR); closing middle variable bore rams (MVBR) to mark pipe. Pump slug and TOH to 9;365'. 05/22/2018: TOH with Isolation assembly running tool (RT). Lay down (L/D) same. Slipped and cut drill line. Perform planned maintenance. R/U and TIH with TNT Packer. 05/23/2018: TIH with TNT packer assembly at 3 mins/std. Set TNT packer at 28;687' MD/ 26;636' TVD and tested packer to 5;000 psi. TOH to 9;000'. Changed out leaking swivel packing. Reversed out spike from drill pipe. Pumped and spotted 50 bbls of hydroxyethyl cellulose (HEC) pill. TOH to 8;236' 05/24/2018: TOH with TNT RT to surface. L/D same. TIH with CleanWell tools and boll weevil test tool (BWTT) from surface to 8;155' bit depth. Perform test to 2;000 psi to ensure BWTT seated. Back off NuTec tool and POOH 2 stands. Pressure tested lower blind shear ram (LBSR)/ upper blind shear ram (UBSR) to 250/7;400 psi for 5 mins each from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; with 14.0 ppg CaBr.. Make up (M/U) NuTec BSR TT. Pick up (P/U) 2 stands. Pressure tested BOPs to 250/ 7;400 psi and Annular to 250/ 4;600 psi with 14.0 ppg CaBr from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function tested BOP from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod. TOH from 7;899' to 6;900'. Function tested diverter from Toolpusher's Control Panel. TOH to 1;014'. B/O BWTT. 05/25/2018: Function tested UBSR/LBSR from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod. M/U and RIH with Bore Protector Running/Retrieval Tool. Jet BOP/ subsea production tree (XT) with jet sub. Land bore protector running retrieval tool (BPRRT) and pull bore protector with 30k overpull (O/P). P/U and jet XT. Pump 40 bbl HEC pill and circulate out same. Pump slug and TOH. Rack back (R/B) BRPRRT and inspect CleanWell Vali Tech and magnet. Boost riser. RIH with mule shoe and 10 stds of drillpipe. Grease/service block. M/U and RIH with Vali Tech/ Mag Tech from 1;356' to 9;474'. Reversed out HEC pill. TOH to 4;491'. 05/26/2018: TOH with Mag Tech; Vali Tech and mule shoe from 4;491' to surface. R/U Weatherford handling equipment. P/U and RIH with HES seal assemblies; 1 joint of tubing; HES R-Nipple assembly; 1 joint of tubing; and Well Dynamics tandem DCIN/DHPTG assembly. Terminated and pressure tested injection line on Asphaltene chemical injected mandrel (CIM). Terminated and pressure tested tubing encapsulated cable (TEC) line onto flat-pack. Terminated and pressure tested injection line on Scale Inhibitor CIM. Confirmed injection through control lines. RIH with stands of 4-1/2" tubing to 1;087'. Jumped pin out of box while backing out stand of tubing. Pin end of stand landed on the rotary; with the stand still retained in the elevator. Recovered stand and repaired top drive stand compensator (TDSC). RIH with stands of 4-1/2" tubing from 1;087' to 2;116'.
380 PS007 608124012200 2018-05-27 05/27/2018: TIH with 4-1/2" production tubing from 2;116' to 4;376'. High current causing tubing to rub spider pipe guide; ballasted rig to compensate. TIH with 4-1/2" tubing to 7;677'. Added rollers to control line sheaves due to control line sheath splitting. TIH with 4-1/2" tubing to 8;064'. Made adjustment to Weatherford control line management equipment and increased Well Dynamics spooler tension. TIH with 4-1/2" tubing to 13;961'. High current causing tubing to rub spider pipe guide; ballasted rig to compensate. TIH with 4-1/2" to 14;550'. 05/28/2018: TIH with production tubing from 14;550' to 19;085'. M/U pups; timed pup; and SCSSV to string. Terminated SCSSV. Ran remaining 4-1/2" tubing and 6" VIT. M/U tubing hanger. Began terminating control lines on tubing hanger. 05/29/2018: Terminated and tested control lines on tubing hanger. R/D 22' 500 ton bails and TDSC. R/U 15' 1000 ton bails and BX-5 elevators. M/U Land and Lock THRT to tubing hanger and tested same. TIH with upper completion on 7-5/8" MaXit landing string from 21;654' to 28;547'. 05/30/2018: Perform soft land out of tubing hanger into XT profile; confirm 59' of seal engagement into PBR. Spot inhibited packer fluid. R/U and test CTLF. Transfer SFT from CMH to main rotary. R/D WTFD equipment and install torpedo packers. Land and lock tubing hanger. R/U HPDU and surface iron. R/U SFT hydraulic lines and function valves. Flush surface lines prior to PT lines and tubing hanger. 05/31/2018: Pressure tested tubing hanger upper seals; SCSSV1 & SCSSV2 control lines; gallery seal; production bore; casing x tubing annulus to 5;000 psi. Engage and test electrical penetrators. Repeated gallery seal test. R/U slick line lubricator. Pressure tested SFT and lubricator. Pressure tested landing string; SFT body and production tubing. Performed operational SCSSV negative test. Retrieved isolation sleeve on slickline. Displaced kill line and land string from 14.0 ppg CaBr2 to base oil. M/U slickline LCP tool string and installed in lubricator. Pressure tested lubricator quick test sub. 06/01/2018: Set lower crown plug in TH. Pressure test LCP above/below (good tests). Displace choke; boost and riser to seawater. Open FS-2 HI valve with 19 cycles. Bullhead base oil below SCSSV and inflow test SCSSV - good test. R/U and RIH with upper crown plug on slickline to 7;000' (100 ft above tubing hanger). Note: BSEE Inspectors Joshua Naquin; Chris Treland; Daniel Ballard; and Adriano Garcia arrived at 09:10 hrs. No INCs issued. Departed at 14:00 hrs. 06/02/2018: RIH with slickline and set UCP in TH profile. Pressure test the top of UCP to 12;600 psia. Pressure test between UCP and LCP via IWOCS to 12;600 psia. Displaced base oil in surface lines and kill line with seawater. R/D slickline equipment. Unlatch THRT and displace landing string to seawater. Rig down surface control lines; Chiksans; and Torpedo packers. R/D SFT and move to center mousehole. R/D CTLF. R/U landing string handling equipment. DPO ballasting rig due to Expro umbilical rubbing at rotary.
381 PS007 608124012200 2018-06-03 06/03/2018: TOH with Land & Lock (L&L) on 7-5/8" LS. Transfer L&L to Aux and L/O same. Slip and cut 155 ft of drill line. R/U riser handling equipment. P/U diverter running tool. L/O diverter and running tool. M/U landing joint to slip joint. Unlatch BOP/LMRP at 22:22 hrs. Move 50 ft towards DOZ @ 270-deg vessel heading. ROV install trash cap on XT. Move 1;080 ft to DOZ @ 270-deg vessel heading. R/D moonpool drape hoses/ goosenecks. 06/04/2018: R/D and secure drape hoses and goosenecks in moonpool. Pull landing joint; riser pup; termination joint; BLAT pup; spacer pup and L/O same. Pull riser from 6;900' to surface (BOP/LMRP in moonpool with riser double above). Averaged 7-joints per hour for riser pull. Raise riser catwalk bridge. 06/05/2018: Remove work platform from BOP transporter. Secure BOP/LMRP onto BOP transporter (BOP on beam at 00:30 hrs). B/O riser double and L/O same. R/D IWOCS guillotine from BOP stack. Secure drape hoses for transit. Install tertiary cap on XT and pump TransAqua. Recover UDB with flying leads to surface. ROV repair tether at surface. ROV perform final PS-007 XT survey. ROV recover remaining 4 compatts to surface. Depart Jack/ St. Malo field to Tahiti field. Commence between well work per agreed schedule.

7/19/2009: Perform redundancy test on Aft MDDM. Inspect Hyd connections on Fwd MDDM. Start to P/U 5 stds of 5-7/8" DP on Aft. Conduct arrivals testing and performed black out drill. Set Compatts with ROV. Continued to P/U 5-7/8" DP. Held PJSM with drill crew for handling BHA. RIH 9-7/8" drilling assy. from surface to 137'. Plug into Anadril MWD & LWD tools and initialize same. Held Pre Job Safety Meeting. Cleared rig floor of all non-essential personnel while Anadril loaded source in ADN Tool. Continued RIH w/ 9-7/8" BHA f/ 137' to 750'. Wt below jars = 27K. Total BHA = 53K. M/U X/O and shallow test MWD/LWD tools at 400 gpm/250psi. Good Test. RIH w/ 9-7/8" BHA on 5-7/8" & 6-5/8" DP f/ 750' to 6;510'. ROV in water; Frugo Chance & DP positioned mud line bouy marker @ 0/0 coordinates for well. Position FWD rotary over well; obtain rotary parameters of 1k to 3k @ 40 rpm. TIH tagged mud line @ 6;898' RKB. Water depth 6;806'. Finish performing bottom survey as per MMS regs. While performing bottom survey; ROV TMS quit spooling in tether. ROV has approximately 200' of tether out from TMS. Penetrate mud line from 6;898' to 6;922' w/ 4 to 6k WOB. Made connection. Drilled 9-7/8" hole in open water from 6;922' to 7;074'; with 500 gpm and 2/3k WOB w/ 100 rotary w/ 3k torque w/ sea water.

7/20/2009: Drilled ahead 9-7/8" hole section from 7;074' to 7;892' w/ sea water.  Parameters: 500-600 gpm; 2-9k WOB; 100-120 rotary w/ 2-3k torque; Auto Driller feed rate set at 270 FPH. Pumped 50 bbl gel sweeps every 1-2 stds. Backreaming btm 40'. Due to LWD log quality concerns; continue to drill ahead 9-7/8" hole section at a reduced ROP from 7;892' to 9;136' w/ sea water. Parameters: 600-650 gpm; 7-10 k WOB; 120-170 rotary w/ 2-4k torque; Auto Driller feed rate set at 180 FPH. Pumped 50 bbl gel sweeps every other Std. Backreaming btm 80' due to inclination. Parameters: 600-650 gpm; 7-18k WOB; 120-170 rotary w/ 2-5k torque; Auto Driller feed rate set at 180 FPH. ECD 9.5 ESD 8.9.

DP position Aft rotary over well center; successfully stab cmt stinger into pilot hole on first attempt; cont TIH t/ 9652' tagged bottom picked up to 9;642'. Held pre-job safety meeting. Rigged up cement lines; pumped 15 bbl Mud Push spacer; test lines 1500 psi. Mix and pump balanced plug as follows: Pumped additional 60 bbl Mud Push spacer followed by 150 bbl (758 sks/ 842 cu/ft w/ 1.11 yield) mixed w/  .05 gps D144; .30 gps D168; .05 gps D185 and 4.29 gps sea water. Pulled out of hole from 8;008' to 7;500'

7/22/2009: POOH w/ stinger t/ 6890'. Drop dart; pump down dart and latch same w/ 1083 strokes; 125.5 bbls; sheared dart w/ 1900 psi. POOH f/ 6890' t/ 4878'. Move vessel into position over well. ROV perform survey around puddle area and well head area. Move vessel back over last compatt. ROV load basket w/ 3 compatts and 2 clump weights. TESTED BOPE AS ABOVE. BEGAN DRILLNG BYPASS #1. CURRENTLY RUNNING CASING.
