Note: Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) provided Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) via email on 12/31/2016 at 9:26 hours permission to proceed with operations on SM PS002.

08/25/2012: Continue preparations for Tropical Storm Isaac. Pull out of hole with 7-5/8" landing string and SSTT. Transfer SSTT to center mousehole. Displace choke line with drill water. Pressure test lower BSR to 250/8;000 psi for 5 minutes each with 14.1 ppg CaBr2.

08/26/2012: Displace riser from 14.1 ppg CaBr2 to seawater. Clean and L/O diverter. Unlatch LMRP. Pull riser pup joints.
	
08/27/2012: R/D drape hoses. Pull riser and IWOC's clamps. Suspend pulling riser while waiting for T.S. Isaac to pass. 
	
08/28/2012: Wait on Weather due to T.S. Isaac with LMRP at 5;852'. Hold position at 1;500' off location. 
	
08/29/2012: Wait on Weather due to T.S. with LMRP at 5;852'. Hold position at 1;500' off location.
	
08/30/2012: Wait on Weather due to Hurricane Isaac with LMRP at 5;852'. Move rig to 500' from wellhead; deploy ROV to latch LMRP. Run riser to re-latch.
	
08/31/2012: M/U Riser and drape hoses. Latch LMRP. 
	
09/01/2012: Test choke/kill lines. Install diverter. ROV install EFL and HFL. Function and pressure test UBSRs (250/10;000 psi) with saltwater for 5 min each. Function test diverter. Run side view camera to inspect BOPs and upper crown plug. R/U to run washout assembly.

09/02/2012: Run in hole with washout assembly. Test LMRP connector and Annular to 250 psi low/ 6800 psi high for 5 minutes each.
	
09/03/2012: Circulate with seawater to clean out tubing hanger; SSPT; and BOPs. Pull out of hole above BOPs with washout assembly. Circulate seawater down drill string. Flush down Choke; Kill; and Boost line with seawater. Run side view camera to inspect BOPs and SSPT. Bullhead base oil thru SSPT below SCSSV. Perform inflow test on lower crown plug to 8485 psi differential. Perform inflow test on SCSSV to 8440 psi differential. 
	
09/04/2012: Displace Kill line with seawater. Land tree cap in tubing hanger. 
	
09/05/2012: Complete internal tree cap installation. Perform inflow test on internal tree cap to 9890 psi differential. Pull out of hole with tree cap running tool. Pull diverter and begin unlatching BOPs.
	
09/06/2012:  Unlatch BOPs. Remove SDC ring. Pull and layout riser slip joint and termination joint. Begin pulling riser.
	
09/07/2012: Continue pulling riser. 
	
09/08/2012: Recover UTA. Finish pulling riser and surface BOPs. ROV survey of well site. Begin between well maintenance.

02/15/2019: Rig up.

02/16/2019: Pressure test temporary equipment to 11;300 psi. Begin pumping operations.

02/17/2019: Continue pumping acid into well.
02/18/2019: Continue pumping acid into well.
02/19/2019: Rig down temporary equipment and flow back well.

12/04/2011: Waiting on visibility to clear prior to moving rig over final location and spudding well. Went to offline from 13:00 hrs to 19:30 hrs to perform weight test on SM PS003 surface cement. Spudded well at 21:30 hrs and jetted from 7127' to 7232'.

12/05/2011: Jetted 36" conductor from 7232' to 7435'. Allowed 6 hours soak time on conductor. Released CADA. TOH with jetting assy to surface. Began preparations for rig move ¿ pulling compatts (4 out of 5 recovered to SS basket at midnight).

12/06/2011:  Recovered final compatt. Attempted to locate PS003 and PS004 wellheads - failed due to visibility. Recovered SS basket with compatts to surface. Pulled hydrophones. Moved off location at 09:00 hrs.

04/12/2015: Washed through 36" casing with 26" drilling assembly from 7;111' to 7;425'. Drilled ahead from 7;425' to 8;890'. Switched from seawater to 10.1 ppg water based mud (WBM) at 7;920'.

04/13/2015: Continue to drill 26" hole section to 10;324' MD with 10.1 ppg WBM.

04/14/2015: Drilled 26" hole section to TD at 10;546'. Pumped hi-vis sweep and displaced the well to 12.5 ppg WBM. POOH to surface with 26" drilling assembly. R/U and begin 22" casing run to 49'.

04/15/2015: Run 22"/23" casing from 49' to 3;379' and make up to the high pressure wellhead (HPWH). R/D casing running equipment and run 5-7/8" inner string to 773'.

04/16/2015: Continue running 5-7/8" inner string. Make up mechanical rigid lock down (MRLD) running tool to the HPWH. Continue running 22" casing on 6-5/8" landing string. 23"/22" casing shoe at 10;496' MD. Make up cement stand and land out the HPWH. Dredge with ROV around the LPWHH valves in attempt to improve visablity.

04/17/2015: Continue dredging operations. Slack off 570K lbs to check for subsidence. None observed. Circulate 12.5 ppg WBM in preparation for cementing operations. Commence cementing operations.

04/18/2015: Pumped 1;680 bbls of 13.8 ppg Class H lead cement followed by 279 bbls of 16.4 ppg Class H tail slurry. Total of 11;000 cu ft cement pumped. Rigidly lock down the HPWH to the LPH. Release the MRLD running tool from the HPWH and trip out of hole. Make up jet assembly and trip in hole to 10;266' and tag TOC. Set down 30k on firm cement. Displace well to 12.5 ppg inhibited WBM and pull out of hole with assembly. Move to DOZ.

08/09/2015: Run BOP on marine riser from 193' to 5;773'. 

08/10/2015: Complete running BOP on marine riser. Move on location. Make up Telescopic Joint. Land out and latch BOP; over pull and slump test BOP. Rig down riser running tool. P/U and install diverter. Fill up annulus and rig up to pressure test diverter.

08/11/2015: Pressure test diverter flowline seals to 350 psi for 5 min; good test. Function test diverter from Driller's panel; good test. Function test BSR/CSR from Blue Pod on Driller's panel; good test. Rig down diverter running tool and riser handling equipment. ROV function BSR closed via subsea intervention panel. Pressure test 22" casing and BSR to 250 psi low and 2100 psi high for 30 minutes with 9.9 ppg EMW; good test. Perform BOP EHBS emergency draw down test; good test. Rig up drill pipe running equipment. Make up dual cam tool and BOP test tool. Run in hole with same. Land out BOP test tool and rig up to test BOP stack. Pressure test BOP and associated valves on dual cam isolation tool assembly with 8.6 ppg SW from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod. Monitor annulus on trip tank. Troubleshooting suspected poly pack seals on lower annular leaking test #25. Pressure increasing to 350 psi increments of 30 psi per minute on wellbore. Confirming operator poly pack seal is bad. Pressure test wellbore to 1;800 psi to verify wellbore poly pack is good; good test). Monitor annulus on trip tank.

08/12/2015: Continue pressure testing BOP and associated valves on dual cam isolation tool assembly with 8.6 ppg seawater from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod (see IPT version 3.1.7.24 execution summary for details; which was provided to Bobby Nelson and Josh Ladner). Rig down cement lines; disengage dual cam and POOH above BOPs. Monitor well on trip tank (proper displacement observed). Pressure test BOPs and associated valves on the blind shears to 250 psi low and 11;500 psi high for 5 min with 8.6 ppg seawater from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod; good test. Make up top drive; wash down with 8.6 ppg SW to top of BOP Test Tool dual cam assy with 450 gpm @ 150 PSI. Re-engage; unseat test assembly from wellhead and start to pull to surface.

08/13/2015: POOH with dual cam test tool and bop test tool; clean and clear rig floor. Make up 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA and RIH with same. Wash down and tag TOC 10;254' MD. Begin displacing choke kill and boost with 11.2 ppg SBM.

08/25/2015: Decision made to POOH to check connections after Top Drive stall event. POOH from 21;432' MD to surface; checking connection on the way out. Troubleshoot Top Drive with equipment manufacturers onboard.

08/29/2015: Circulate hole clean. POOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 23;326' MD to 7;818' MD. Function tested BOPs from Driller's panel/ Blue Pod and functioned tested diverter from Driller's panel on the trip out.

Hold pressure between 1;690 psi to 1;790 psi for 10 hours for cement to achieve 500 psi compressive strength. Bled off pressure and POOH from 22;365' MD to 20;612' MD. 09/18/2015: Finish BOP pressure test on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod to 250 psi low for 5 min and 8;400 psi high for 5 min for pipe rams and 4800 psi on annular. Good test. 09/21/2015: Drill ahead 12.25" hole from 27;108' MD (26;651' TVD) to well TD of 28;692' MD (28;195' TVD) with 13.9 ppg MW.

09/25/2015: Continue logging with XPT (pressureXpress)/Gamma Ray and obtaining pressures. Pulled out of the hole with wireline tools due to tool failure. 11/2/18    Pumped remainder of acid package into well. While pumping; cycled well open and closed to lift acid up well-bore. Pumped umbilical volume of preservation fluid to displace acid. Stopped for acid soak period.

11/3/18    Completed acid soak period. Cleaned-up well to production facility.
11/04/18   Rigged down and demob temporary pumping equipment. FINAL REPORT

Note: Decision made to perform 2nd soak test after hose replacement. Finished soak testing on pipe. Pulled test joint. Soft fired Deadman Auto Shear (DMAS) - good test.

06/01/2017: Continue soak testing; deadman test and pressure testing BOP/LMRP on surface. Transferred BOP to center line. Skid BOP to well center and made up double to BOP/LMRP. Installed test cap assy. Performed pressure testing of choke and kill (C&K) lines to 300 psi low/ 11;500 psi high for 5 minutes each - good tests. Continue running riser from 209' to 1;409'.

06/02/2017: Pressure test C&K line to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Installed test cap and begin pressure testing on choke/kill lines; boost and rigid conduit lines. 

06/03/2017: Continued pressure testing C&K line to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Performed diverter function test - good test. Pressure tested 22" casing with seawater to 2;700 psi for 30 minutes; verified with IPT software - good test.

Performed acoustic function test; functioned UBSR with the acoustic controls and tested to 300/ 11;500 psi; good test. Performed ROV intervention test; unable to close within allotted 45 seconds. Recovered ROV; increased the pressure on pump and refilled bladder. Re-deployed ROV and performed ROV intervention test; functioned MPR and closed in 26 seconds. Pressure tested to 300/ 11;500 psi; good test. Performed Deadman test with BOPTT; good test. TIH and made up BSR tool. TOH with BOPTT from 7;920' to 7;804' and completed BOP testing. Pressure tested rams to 300/ 11;500 psi for 5 min and annulars to 300/ 6;500 psi for 5 min using seawater; all good tests. Performed Accumulator Drawdown test and BOP function test; good tests. TOH from 7;804' to 6;512' with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA.

Pressure test choke and kill manifold to 300 psi low/ 9;400 psi high using 8.6 ppg seawater - good tests. Test performed using IPT SureTec software.

10/23/2017: Unlatch BOP from Subsea Production Tree (XT). Inspect XT gasket with ROV - gasket damage observed. Inspect XT mandrel and BOP connector - no damage observed. Replace XT gasket. 10/24/2017: Replace XT gasket. Latch BOP to XT. Pressure test BOP connector to 1;000 psi with 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. Zone 6: 29;405' - 29;512' MD / 27;004' - 27;103' TVD

10/30/2017: TOH with TCP assembly from 30;048' to 9;620'. Observe losses of 7 bph. Close annular and circulate up Choke and Kill lines at 8 bpm. 11/30/2017: TOH with wireline setting tool to surface. Test upper permanent bridge plug to 5;000 psi with LBSR. R/D wireline equipment. RIH with ESTMZ BHA to 6;500'. Perform acoustic BSR function. Continue RIH with ESTMZ service tool on 5-7/8" DP to 26;615'; cycling zone 6 and 5 MCS open/closed on the way. Pressure test against zone 5 MCS to 1;500 psi; good test. Spaced out; picked up supreme frac head and rig up frac iron. Mark 100k wt down position and reverse positions on zone 5. Pressure test surface lines and frac head to 10;000 psi; good test. Prepare to reverse out drillstring volume. 

11/01/2017: Reverse out 13.9 ppg CaBr. Diverted 199 bbls of dirty fluid to slop tank in moonpool and 105 bbls to sandtrap. Continue reversing fluid while filtering fluid on surface. Spot pickle in drill pipe and reverse out same. Open MCS sleeve and inject 7 bbls into formation with cement unit. Flush/Fill frac iron and test same. Spot acid down DP.

11/02/2017: Continue to reverse out proppant due to leak on frac boat. Reposition tool and perform seal test on MCS zone #5. Perform frac on zone #5. P/U to contingency reverse and reverse out proppant + 2 additional drillstring volumes. Rigged down frac head. Performed 500 psi test on sleeves; good test. Position service tool in weight down on zone #6 and test service tool seals against MCS. Test failed. TOH with ESTMZ service tool to 9;530'.

12/03/2017: TOH with ESTMZ service tool and observed missing top seals. Function test BOP on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function test diverter from Toolpusher's Control Panel. TIH with new service tool to zone 6. R/U frac head and surface iron; test same. Reverse out 1 DP volume. Locate tool positions and mark same. Pickle pipe.

12/04/2017: Test lines from frac boat. P/U to reverse position; spot acid down pipe; follow with frac job in weight down position. Reverse out proppant. Lay out frac head and test to verify sleeves closed. TOH from 29;251' to 17;817'.

Note: On 12/04/2017 at 15:44 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) provided Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) approval to delay Casing/BSR pressure testing until 12/09/2017.

12/05/2017: TOH with service tool from 17;817' to 7;235'. Repair iron roughneck. Continue to TOH from 7;235' to surface. Slip and cut drill line. P/U cleanout assembly and TIH from surface to 5;325'.

12/06/2017: TIH with the ESTMZ cleanout assembly from 5;325' to 29;305' (tagged VCH packer at 29;305' DPM and worked through by P/U and S/O 2x). TIH with the ESTMZ cleanout assembly from 29;305' to 30;299' DPM (tagged the top of the permanent Baker packer  with 10 klbs. Dropped 1.75" Vac-Tech activation ball and activated Vac-Tech. Circulated at 10 bpm (5;350 psi) through the Vac-Tech to remove any debris from below the VCH packer (pumped 100 bbls total). P/U 45 ft off bottom and monitor the well for 30 minutes. Re-tag the permanent Baker packer. TOH with the ESTMZ cleanout assembly from 29;305' to 1;384'. L/D ESTMZ cleanout assembly from 1;384' to 1;136'. Recovered 4.5 lbs of wet metal shavings from Mag Tech and 2 lbs of debris from Vac-Tech.

12/07/2017: TOH from 1;136' to surface with cleanout assembly washpipe. Clean/clear rig floor. R/U handling equipment for isolation assembly. P/U and TIH with the isolation assembly (Zones 3 - 6) from surface to 1;142'. TIH with isolation assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 1;142' to 21;945'.

12/08/2017: TIH with Halliburton isolation assembly from 21;945' to 29;228'. Continued TIH; opening MJPS and FCS production sleeves across zones 6 through 3. Monitored losses on a 2 pit system while boosting to keep up with CaBr2 loss rate. Made up TDX; slacked off and stung isolation assembly seals into VCH seal bore with a mule shoe depth of 30;292'; losses stopped. Lost a total of 173 bbls. Confirmed latch with 30 klbs overpull; slacked back off to neutral weight. Closed annular and pressure tested the FS-2 and seals in VCH packer seal bore to 1;000 psi for 5 minutes on IPT; good test. Dropped 1-7/8" diverter ball and pumped down workstring. Staged pressure up to 2;500 psi; P/U and released from the isolation assembly. Tagged the PBR with 10 klbs; closed the MVBRs to mark the painted stand across the stack. TOH with the isolation assembly running tool from 27;754' to 1;400'. Tested casing to 5;000 psi; good test. Repair racker and iron roughneck. TOH from 1;400' to 956'.

12/09/2017: TOH with Halliburton isolation assembly from 956' to surface. Rigged up Weatherford handling equipment for TNT packer assembly. TIH with TNT packer assembly to 26;360'.

12/10/2017: TIH with Halliburton TNT packer assembly on 5-7/8" TFM DP to 29;054'. S/O from 29;099' and stung into the isolation assembly PBR at 29;170' DPM; continued to 29;182' bit depth (DPM) to land out in isolation assembly. Lined up HAL cementer. Pressured up on annulus to 1;000 psi and tested short seal assembly. Lined up HAL cementer and began setting TNT permanent packer as per Halliburton: TNT permanent packer at 28;976' DPM (top of TNT PBR = 28;868' DPM). Pressure tested TNT permanent packer/casing to 5;000 psi for 30 mins with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Test performed from the Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Function tested BOP on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function tested diverter from Driller's Control Panel. Closed MVBRs on painted white stand 2 times. TOH with Hydraulic Setting Tool assembly from 29;170' to surface.

12/11/2017: Performed rig maintenance. Trip in hole with jetting/BPRRT assembly from surface to 7;522'. M/U test stand and tested BOP on 5-7/8" DP to 250-350 psi/ 7;600 psi rams; and 250-350 psi/ 4;600 psi annular; from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod via IPT Suretec. Hung well dynamic control line sheave in derrick. Jet SSPT bore protector from 7;423' to 7;433' DPM. Continue to TOH. 

12/12/2017: TIH with BPRRT and jetting assembly from 7;433' to 7;725'. Landed the BPRRT in the SSPT bore protector at 7;118'. Pulled the SSPT bore protector free with 33 klbs overpull. TOH and positioned jet sub in SSPT. Jetted SSPT. TOH with BPRRT and jetting assembly to surface. Hung Expro umbilical in derrick sheave. Slipped and cut 155' of drill line. R/U Weatherford tubing handling equipment. Spotted ELSA (lower portion of SSTT) in center mousehole. P/U and RIH with HES seal assemblies and 1 joint of 4-1/2" tubing to 141'.

12/13/2017: Terminate injection line on Asphaltene CIM; pressure tested line. Terminate TEC line onto flat-pack and pressure tested line. Terminate injection line on Scale Inhibitor CIM and pressure tested line. Confirm injection through control lines. R/U WTFD control line mgmt system/ handling eqpt. RIH with 4-1/2" 17# Vam Top tubing to 7;445'. Functioned BSRs from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod.

Note: BSEE Regulatory Inspection Visit (09:20 - 12:55 hrs): BSEE Inspectors Joshua Naquin; Troy Boudreaux; and Chris Treland onboard. No INC's issued.

12/14/2017: TIH with 4-1/2" 17# Vam Top tubing from 7;445' to 19;346'. Barrette tubing coupling and indexed for timing pup selection. P/U 180 deg timing pup. P/U SCSSV/CIM. Attempted to terminate control lines on SCSSV. Unable to get proper ferrule set and left lower wedge ferrule inside of both ports A and B on SCSSV. Attempted to recover ferrules from ports with no success. L/D SCSSV/CIM. P/U backup SCSSV/CIM. Attempted to terminate control lines on backup SCSSV with the same results. Recovered lower wedge ferrules from both ports. Troubleshot IDFC connections. Used ferrules from different batch to terminate control lines A and B on backup SCSSV and observed indication of good ferrule set.

12/15/2017: TIH with 4-1/2" Vam tubing to 20;255'. R/U 6" handling equipment. M/U 4-1/2" Vam x 6" VIT crossover. Attempt to M/U 6" 50 ppf; 13CR-115 VAM TOP VIT tubing; troubleshoot damaged connections from WTFD tong slippage. TIH with 6" 50 ppf; 13CR-115 VAM TOP VIT tubing from 20;253' to 21;797'. M/U 6" VIT Pin x 5-1/2" box crossover. R/U tubing hanger handling equipment. M/U timing pup. M/U tubing hanger.

12/16/2017: Terminated and tested control lines on TH. R/D tubing handling eqpt. R/U for SSTT. Transferred SSTT from center mousehole to main well center with crown tugger and main TDX (elevators). M/U SSTT-THRT to tubing hanger. Functioned THRT. Slacked off SSTT below the rotary. Began changing out equipment to handle landing string.

12/17/2017: R/D Weatherford 30' 500 ton bails. R/U 11' 750 ton bails and BX-5 elevators. M/U junk basket stand. TIH with SSTT on 7-5/8" MaXit landing string from 22;054' to 28;859'. Stung into PBR at 28;859'. Performed soft landout and confirmed 60 ft of seal engagement into PBR; with seal assembly at 28;919' and tubing hanger at 7;119'. Picked up 6 ft above PBR. Pumped and spotted 1;160 bbls of 13.9 ppg CaBr2 inhibited packer fluid in tubing x casing annulus. Slacked off to 28;875'. Broke out double from soft land stand. P/U CTLF.

12/18/2017: R/U CTLF and Surface Flow Tree. Install torpedo packers. Land out and lock tubing hanger in XT at 7;119'. Pressure tested tubing hanger; SCSSV1 & SCSSV2; gallery seal; production bore; casing x tubing annulus with cement unit to 5;000 psi for 30 mins. Engage and test electrical penetrators. Repeated gallery seal test. R/U slick line lubricator.

12/19/2017: Pressure test surface flow tree and slick line lubricator to 10;500 psi for 5 min. Pressure test landing string; SFT body; and production tubing against FS-2 HI valve to 4;500 psi for 30 min. Negative test SCSSV to 2;200 psi; 62 psi build in 30 mins - good test. Rig up slickline and test lubricator to 10;500 psi. Attempt to retrieve isolation sleeve; sheared pin on running tool. Retrieve to surface and re-pin. Installed centralizer to assist in running tool alignment. Unable to pass centralizer past 43' RKB. Pull centralizer to surface and observe mark on paint with similar dimensions 5.25" ID to a Teflon O-ring that is part of the test cap for the PXF landing joint. Rig down lubricator; surface control lines and Chiksans. Boost riser volume at 18 bpm. Unlatch THRT and pick up to remove Torpedo packers. Remove Teflon O ring from connection. Install Torpedo packers. Land and lock tubing hanger running tool. Pressure test THRT seals to 9;000 psig for 15 mins. R/U surface equipment control lines and slickline lubricator.

12/20/2017: Completed rig up surface pressure control equipment; test with 10;500 psi. Pressure test landing string against SSTT retainer valve to 7;650 psi. RIH with slickline; recover isolation assembly with all seals intact. Displace 13.9 ppg brine in landing string and kill line to 6.6 ppg base oil. RIH with slickline and set LCP in TH profile. Pressure test above Lower Crown Plug (LCP) using 6;6 ppg base oil to 10;400 psi surface pressure for 15 mins. Test below LCP using 6.6 ppg base oil to 8;100 psi surface pressure for 60 mins. Displace Choke; Boost line and riser from brine to seawater.

12/21/2017: Displace Riser from brine to seawater. Attempt to cycle FS-2HI valve 25 additional times for a total of 34 times. No success. Reduce baseline pressure by 500 psi to 2100 psi. Held for 85 minutes and restart cycling sequence for 6 cycles; total of 40 cycles; FS-2HI valve open. Bullhead total of 101 bbls of base oil to achieve 3900 psi surface pressure. Function SCSSV three times and close. Bleed off to 800 psi and Inflow test SCSSV to 3;100 psi for 30 mins - good test. RIH with slickline and set UCP in TH profile. Pressure test Upper Crown Plug (UCP) from above using 6.6 ppg base oil to 10;350 psi for 15 mins. Pressure test between UCP and LCP via IWOCS to 12;800 psi for 30 mins with methanol.

12/22/2017: Displaced base oil from surface lines and flow head with seawater. R/D slickline equipment. Unlatch THRT and displace landing string to seawater. Rig down surface control lines; Chiksans; and Torpedo packers. P/U to 7;069' and close UBSRs. Displace Kill line to SW while rigging down SFT and CTLF. Clear rig floor of equipment. Rig up Weatherford LS handling equipment. POOH with 7-5/8" LS from 7;069' to 129'. R/U and L/D SSTT.

12/23/2017: L/D SSTT on main rotary while continue to L/D 7-5/8" landing string on aux. R/D Expro umbilical. R/U riser handling equipment. R/U diverter running tool.

12/24/2017: Pull and lay out diverter. P/U landing joint and stroke in slip joint. Repair hoses on RRT. Unlatch from well at 06:00 hrs. Install Tertiary cap on wellhead while locking tensioner load ring. Remove storm loops and drape hoses. L/D landing joint. Repair hoses on RRT. L/D slip joint and pups. Replace auto slew proximity switch on riser yoke. Orient riser joints laid out on riser skate incorrectly to facilitate transfer to riser hold.

12/25/2017: Pull BOP on Marine Riser from 6;840' to surface. Secure BOP in transporter and remove IWOCS Guillotine. R/D riser running equipment. Calibrate Main TDX load pins.

01/03/2018: P/U and RIH with 6-5/8" drill pipe in doubles. TOH and R/B stands of 6-5/8" drill pipe. Waited on weather. 
 
01/04/2018: R/U Weatherford casing handling equipment. P/U and TIH with 36" conductor housing from surface to 322'. Installed false rotary and TIH with 26" jetting BHA from surface to 322'. Changed out encoder wire on Aux TDX-1250. Decision made to adjust spaceout placing Bit Nozzles 4" inside the 36" shoe. 

01/05/2018: ROV verified bit spaceout and verified bit/motor function. Engaged CADA tool to LPWH. Installed bull-eyes and ball valves in moonpool. RIH with 36" conductor casing and 26" jet in BHA to 6;693'. Moved ship from DOZ to well center. Continued TIH to 7;095'; positioned ship for PS007 spud in. Tagged mudline at 7;132' and began jetting 36". Jetted 36" from 7;132' to 7;444'. Soaked 36" casing for 1.5 hours - no subsidence observed. Recorded RKB to top of LPWH at 7;122' and RKB to 36" shoe at 7;444'. Released from CADA tool and drilled 26" hole section from 7;444' to 7;671'.

01/06/2018: Drilled 26" hole section from 7;444' to 8;249'. Displaced the wellbore to 11.0 ppg PAD mud. TOH to 200 ft above the LPWH. Moved rig to DOZ. TOH to surface with 26" jetting BHA. P/U and TIH with the 26" drill ahead BHA #2 from surface to 6;633'. Move rig from DOZ to PS007 well center. TIH with 26" BHA #2 to 7;112' (10 ft above wellhead). ROV assisted with lining up 26" BHA #2; stabbed bit into 36" LPWH at 7;122'. Slacked off from 7;122' to 7;135' (marked pipe at the rotary for visual indication when TOH).

01/07/2017: TIH to 36" shoe at 7;444'. Displaced the drill string to 10.1 ppg WBM. TIH from 7;444' to 8;028'. Tagged tight spot at 8;028' with 30 klbs down. Reamed spot clean and worked through spot 2 times with no drag. Washed down to 8;249' with no fill observed. Drilled 26" hole from 8;249' to TOS at 8;347'. Adjusted drilling parameters and continued drilling 26" hole from 8;347' to 10;390'.

01/08/2018: Drilled 26" hole from 10;390' to section TD of 10;601'. Pumped 90 bbls of 16.0 ppg hi-vis pill followed by 12.5 ppg PAD mud; spotting 40 bbls of 16.0 ppg hi-vis pill in rathole. Displaced well to 12.5 ppg PAD mud. TOH with 26" BHA to 7;122'. Washed LPWH. TOH to 6;922'. Moved rig from PS007 to DOZ. TOH with 26" BHA from 6;922 to surface. P/U and M/U SES. R/U and ran 598 ft of 22" casing.

01/09/2018: P/U and RIH with 22" x 23" casing from 598' to 3;366'. R/U up and RIH with 6-5/8" 27# inner string to 3;266'. P/U and M/U MRLD to inner string and casing. Lowered MRLD to water line and purged air from 22" casing and inner string close snorkel valves. TIH with 22" x 23" casing on landing string from 3;582' to 5;721'.

01/10/2018: TIH with 22" x 23" casing on landing string to 6;595'. Moved rig from DOZ to PS007 well center. TIH to 7;122' and stabbed 22" casing shoe in LPWH. Displaced landing string and inner string from seawater to 12.5 ppg PAD mud. TIH to 10;495'. Made up cement SES and landed out 18-3/4" HPWH in LPWH (top of HPWH at 7;119' and 22" casing shoe at 10;542'). Circulated 1.5x landing string and inner string volumes with 12.5 ppg PAD mud. Pumped 1;268 bbls (7;113 cu ft); 28% excess; of 13.8 ppg lead cement and confirmed cement returns at mud line with ROV pH meter. Pumped 179 bbls (1;005 cuft) of 16.4 ppg tail cement. Displaced cement with 317 bbls of seawater. Bled back 4.75 bbls and confirmed floats were holding. Total cement returns 496 bbls. Set and pre-loaded HPHW to 2;000 klbs with MRLD. Released MRLD. R/B cement stand and TOH 2 stands. Circulated string clean. TOH to 7;127' and washed HPHW. TOH to 6;918'. Moved rig to DOZ. TOH to surface. P/U and RIH with 6-5/8" drill pipe in doubles. TOH and R/B stands of 6-5/8" drill pipe.  

01/11/2018: L/D 26" BHA #1 and #2. L/D cement SES. Lowered gooseneck hoses and performed maintenance on gooseneck swivels. L/D CADA stand. P/U 6-5/8" 34 ppf drill pipe. Continued with BOP work scope. 

01/12/2018: P/U 6-5/8" 34 ppf and 27 ppf DP. Continue with BOP work scope.

Note: Bobby Naumann (Chevron) provided Bobby Nelson (BSEE) with 72 hr notification of initial BOP latch up to WR 678 #PS007. 

01/13/2018: P/U and racked back 6-5/8" 50 ppf; 27 ppf and UD-165 DP. Continue with BOP work scope. R/U and function test riser running equipment.

Note: Mr Howard Smith (Chevron) informed Mr Bobby Nelson (BSEE) that the ADCP current meter was recovered for maintenance and repairs.

01/14/2017: Continue with BOP work scope. P/U and racked back 6-5/8" UD-165 DP. M/U and racked back NuTec BSR test tool x Dril-Quip BOPTT assembly. Begin P/U and R/B 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA. R/U and function test riser running equipment.

Note: On 1/14/2018; Mr. John Rankin (Chevron) received approval via email from Mr. Fred Brink (BSEE) to run the BOP stack and test the acoustic pod on the initial latch up. If the test fails for any reason; Chevron must either pull the stack to fix the issue or take the acoustic pod out of service for the remainder of the well.

01/15/2018: Continue with BOP work scope. P/U and R/B 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA. Continued offloading boat. Make repairs to the power mousehole and calibrate same. R/U WTFD casing equipment and function test same.

01/16/2018: Continue with BOP work scope. Install aux rotary sock. Change out Hydra-racker heads. Pick up and rack back 16" casing (6 total stands R/B).

Note: On 01/16/2018 at 13:59 hours; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) notified Mr. Robert Nelson (BSEE) via email that preparation of the BOP is still in progress and the initial latch up could be on Friday; January 19th; with BOP testing to begin on Saturday; January 20th.

01/17/2018: Continue with BOP work scope. General maintenance and PMs. P/U 16" casing.

01/18/2018: Drift BOP stack; raise riser catwalk bridge; skid BOP to well center; install guillotine; make up riser to BOP. Run BOP on riser.

01/19/2018: Drifted BOP stack; installed guillotine and skid BOP to well center. Make up BOP to double of riser. Splash stack at 15:30 hrs. Continue to run BOP on riser to 1;334'.

01/20/2018: Continue to run BOP on riser from 1;334' to 6;959'.

01/21/2017: Move from DOZ to SM PS007 well center while pressure testing Choke/Kill/Boost/RC lines. M/U BLAT pup and TJ. M/U spacer pup. Install drape hoses. Pressure test Choke/Kill/Boost/RC lines. Land and latched BOP welhead connector at 20:30 hours. Perform 100k pull test on BOP connector. Perform BOP slump test. Confirm bulls-eye readings. Perform Deadman UBSR and connector test to 300/ 3;000 psi for 5 min each. Unlock and stroke out TJ.

01/22/2018: Pressure test casing to 3;000 psi with seawater - good test. Install/function diverter. RIH with BOPTT/ 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Land at 7;118'. Perform BOP initial latch-up testing. Perform diverter function test; Pressure test UBSR/LBSR per IPT test summary from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; with 8.6 SW to 300/11;800 psi. Offline attempt to close BSR with ROV - failed.

01/23/2018: Function casing shear rams from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod. TIH and retrieve Nu-Tec test tool. Locate annular with tool joint. Pressure test BOPs; rams to 250-350/ 11;800 psi and Annulars to 250-350/ 6;800 psi on Yellow Pod from Toolpusher's Panel with 8.6 ppg seawater. Function tested BOPs from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod. Performed accumulator drawdown test. Functioned diverter from Driller's Panel. TOH with BOP test assembly to 558'. Performed ROV intervention test on LBSRs. ROV plugged in flying lead to LBSRs stab and functioned closed. Validated closed with pressure test to 250-350 psi/ 3;000 psi for 5 min each. Function UBSRs; LBSRs and CSRs. TIH with Dril-Quip wearbushing and running tool. Make up jars. Shallow test MWD. TIH from 971' to 7;615' (set Dril-Quip wearbushing at 7;118' LS depth). Continue TIH to 10;323'. Wash down from 10;323' and tag TOC at 10;453'. Displaced Choke/ Kill/ Boost lines from 8.6 ppg SW to 11.5 ppg SBM. 

01/24/2018: Displaced Choke line and Boost line to 11.5 ppg SBM. Pumped 100 bbls Hi-vis spacer followed by 11.5 ppg SBM. Started drilling cement once SBM exited bit from 10;543' to 10;516'. Circulate and condition mud to 11.5 ppg in/out. Flush choke manifold and MGS with 11.5 ppg SBM. Take SCRs and CLFs. Performed choke drill. Drilled cement and shoe from 10;516' to 10;542'. Drilled cement from 10;542' to 10;567'. Clean out rathole from 10;567' to 10;586'. Washed and reamed from 10;586' to 10;465' due to stalling and packing off. Clean out rathole from 10;586' to 10;601'; 5 ft fill on bottom. Drill 10 ft new formation from 10;601' to 10;611'. Circulate and condition mud for FIT. Perform FIT with 11.5 ppg SBM at 10;542' TVD. Achieved successful FIT to 13.0 ppg EMW (856 psi surface pressure). Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 10;611' to 10;634' MD.

01/25/2018: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section (reamer closed) from 10;634' to 10;746' MD. Drop 2-1/8" reamer activation ball and pump down the string at 300 gpm (450 psi). Performed ledge test (set down) at 10;736' bit depth with 15k.lbs - good test. Ream down with the 18-1/8" x 21" BHA (reamer open) from 10;736' to 10;746'. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 10;746' to 10;987' MD. Circulate and condition mud; waiting on BSEE approval to drill ahead. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 10;987' to 12;197' MD.

Note: Mr. Naquin; Mr. Orellana and Mr. Vial with BSEE Houma District arrived on rig at 09:15 hrs for routine rig visit. 1 INC issued. Departed rig at 13:30 hrs.

Note: On 01/25/2018 at 08:56 hours; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to resume drilling operations now that the 3rd Party Verification for the BOP has been reviewed.

01/26/2018: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 12;197' to 13;046'. Unable to maintain build rate. Circulate and condition mud at 13;046'. TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 13;046' to surface.

01/27/2018: Completed function testing the BHGE AutoTrak tool. Passed the 18-1/8" x 21" bit stand (#1) to the aux. Slip and cut drill line on the main drawworks and serviced the rig. M/U the 18-1/8" Kymera Bit. P/U and TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA #2 from surface to 971'. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 971' to 13;046'. Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 13;046' to 13;894' MD. Weighting up from 11.5 ppg to 11.8 ppg SBM.

01/28/2018: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 13;894' to 16;575' MD (2;681'). Raised mud weight from 11.8 ppg to 12.1 ppg (surface)/ 12.3 (downhole) SBM  at 14;330' and from 12.1 ppg to 12.5 ppg (surface)/ 12.8 (downhole) SBM at 15;547'.

01/29/2018: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 16;575' MD to 19;027' MD (2;452').

01/30/2018: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 19;027' MD (18;273' TVD) to 19;296' MD (18;535' TVD). Function tested BOPs on 6-5/8" DP from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Function tested Diverter from Toolpusher's Panel (35 secs to close) and from Driller's Chair (33 secs to close). Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 19;296' MD to 20;623' MD (19;528 TVD'). Began cutting mud weight to 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.2 ppg (downhole) at 19;296'. Note: Encountered Base of Salt at 19;939' MD (18;990' TVD).

01/31/2018: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 20;623' MD to 22;732' MD with 11.8 ppg (surface/ 12.2 ppg (downhole) SBM.

Note: On 01/31/2018 at 19:14 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) notified Mr. Adam Ersepke (Chevron) that Chevron may proceed with operations utilizing surface flowmeter for accurate gallon counts while the Blue Pod flowmeter is not currently functional.

02/01/2018: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 22;732' to 23;047'. Made repairs to mud pump #5. Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 23;047' to 24;145'.

02/02/2018: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 24;145' to 25;370'. Drilled an additional 5 ft from 25;170' to 25;375' with reamer closed to perform ledge test. Performed positive ledge test on reamer with 10 klbs down. Dropped 2-5/8" reamer deactivation ball and confirmed reamer locked closed. Hole section TD at 25;375' MD/ 23;396' TVD. Pumped weighted hi-vis sweep and began circulating 3x bottom's up.

02/03/2018: Circulated hole clean. Spotted 60 bbls of 16.5 ppg hi-vis pill in rathole. TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA to 24;074'.

02/04/2018: TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 24;074" to 8;315". Pressure tested BOP on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod; using IPT Suretec software. Note: On 05/02/2018 at 13:47 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave approval to Mr. Kevin Corbin (Chevron) to delay performance of chamber testing as requested until June 10th or as soon as the BOP is recovered to surface; whichever comes first.

Note: On 05/02/2018 at 17:55 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave approval to Mr. Bobby Naumann (Chevron) to temporarily suspend PS007 and unlatch BOP from production tree to change out SCM on production tree.

05/03/2018: TOH with Archer packer RT from 12;041' to 8;000'. Displaced riser from CaBr2 to seawater. TOH with Archer packer RT to surface. Picked up 4" wash pipe and performed derrick management; while waiting on new SCM for XT.

05/04/2018: Locked BLAT tool into BLAT riser pup profile. Recovered ROV to bleed air out of hydraulic lines. Offloaded new SCM and MRT from M/V Fast Deliverer. Unlatched BOP from XT at 04:45 hrs. Recovered faulty SCM from XT and installed new SCM on XT; using active heave crane. Latched BOP onto XT at 23:39 hrs. Confirmed BOP properly latched by pressure testing against LBSRs to 1;000 psi for 5 min.

05/05/2018: Laid out BLAT tool. TIH with Archer packer RT and NuTec/BWTT assy; landing BWTT at 7;110' in XT. Confirmed BWTT seals set with 2;000 psi test. Released NuTec BSR Test Tool from BWTT. P/U two stands to clear stack. Pressure tested WH Connector/ UBSR from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; with 8.6 ppg SW to 300/11;550 psi; good test. Unable to achieve low pressure test on LBSRs due to BWTT leaking. Function tested UBSR/LBSR from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Unseat BWTT; P/U; spaced out and pressure tested BOPs on 5-7/8" DP with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300/9;400 psi. Pressure tested annulars to 300/6;600 psi. Tests performed from the Toolpusher's Control Panel on Yellow Pod. Function tested BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. TOH with BWTT/NuTech BSR tool from 7;500' to 3;107'. Note: Uninstalled a new software update on the MCP and reset the JSM MCP & SEM software to the last known working version; which resolved the communication/power-up issues on the XT.

Note: On 05/05/2018 at 18:40 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave approval to Mr. Kevin Corbin (Chevron) to delay pressure testing of the lower blind shear rams for 48 hrs.

05/06/2018: Short tripped NuTec BSR and BWTT. Observed damage to top seal (primary) on BWTT. TIH with Archer Packer RT to 8;100'. Observed a leak while pressure testing choke manifold. Changed stem pack; greased valves and completed choke manifold test. Displaced riser; choke; kill and boost line with 14.0 ppg CaBr2. TIH with Archer Packer RT to 16;010'. Reversed out HEC pill. Latched onto Archer TimeLock packer mandrel at 16;016' and unset packer. TOH with Archer packer to 8;451'.

05/07/2018: TOH with Archer packer from 8;451' to surface and L/D packer assy. Pressure test LBSR x Casing to 300/7;400 psi from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod with 14.0 ppg CaBr2 (27.5 bbls pumped/bled back)- good test. R/U TCP handling equipment. M/U TCP guns/BHA to 1;978'. RIH with TCP assembly from 1;978' to 21;643'.

05/08/2018: TIH with TCP assy from 21;643' to 30;216'. Tag sump packer at 30;315'. R/U flow head. Verify guns on depth. Initiate TCP firing sequence. With guns fired 24 bph; initial losses observed; decreased to 12 bph. Reverse out 1.5x DP volumes (avg. 15 bph losses). Open annular and monitor 30 minutes; 2.8 bph losses observed. Unseat TCP packer and R/D surface iron. TOH with spent TCP guns from 30;306' to 29;051' to place TCP guns above perfs. Flow check for 30 minutes; 4.5 bph losses. TOH from 29;051' to 9;265'. Close annular and circulate down DP ad up Choke/Kill lines.

Perforated zone depths; IES; as follows:
Zone 5: 29;134' - 29;242' MD
Zone 4: 29;374' - 29;481' MD
Zone 3: 29;614' - 29;721' MD
Zone 2: 29;909' - 30;016' MD
Zone 1: 30;193' - 30;300' MD

05/09/2018: Circulate below BOPs prior to pulling spent TCP guns above BOP. TOH from 9;265' to 1;669'. R/U TCP handling equipment. L/D TCP BHA/ spent guns with no miss fire shots. Make up Deburr BHA. TIH with Deburr assembly to 24;452'.

05/10/2018: Establish baseline parameters and activate Vac-tech. Wash and ream down across perforation interval. Wash rathole with 4" washpipe to 30;479' and tag sump packer with no-go on depth at 30;315' (30;317 DPM)'. Pick up to place mule shoe above sump packer and circulate 1.5x bottoms up until clean brine returns observed. Flow checked (3-4 bph losses). TIH and verify "no fill"; tagging no-go onto sump packer at 30;315' (30;317 DPM). TOH from 30;479' to 29;969'. Pump slug and TOH from 29;969' to 3;527' (losses at 2-3 bph while TOH).

05/11/2018: TOH with Deburr BHA from 3;527' to 1;655'. L/O Deburr BHA and weigh debris captured from Power Mag and Mod Chambers. Slip and cut drill line. Rig maintenance. R/U for ESTMZ. P/U Sump Seal assembly extensions. Run service tool. Run GP equipment for Zone 1 and pressure test. Run GP equipment for Zone 2. Run GP equipment for Zone 3.

05/12/2018: M/U and RIH with Gravel Pack assemblies #3 - #5 to 2;987'. Pressure tested on top of Zone #5 Gravel Pack assembly. R/U WFT false rotary and R/D WFT tripmaster. M/U ratch-latch retrieval assembly; RIH on washpipe (fishing string). Latch into ratch-latch; pick up to spaceout service tool. R/B washpipe. PT lower zone assemblies and sleeve integrity. Spaceout ShurMAC and RIH to place intermediate seals in the MCS. Attempt to PT the "run in hole" position of lower service tool (C/O test tool and re-test; no success). Adjusted seal space out by -3.5 ft and pressure tested "RIH" position of lower service tool to 250 psi/5 mins - good test. M/U VCH packer.

Note: On 05/12/2018 at 16:33 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave approval to Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) to extend BOP and Diverter Function testing by 24 hrs.

05/13/2018: RIH with gravel pack assembly with bundle carrier below from 1;566' to 1;589'. M/U to drill string and broke circulation @ 1 bbl/min; monitor well on trip tank for returns. Continue RIH with ESTMZ assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 1;589' to 6;538'. Function test BSR's (DCP/Yellow; TCP/Blue). TIH form 6;538' to 20;888'. Functioned the UBSRs/LBSRs from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod. Performed BOP function tests on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod and from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod. Perform diverter function test from Toolpusher's Control Panel (35 secs to close). Function tested diverter from Driller's Chair in auto sequence (35 secs to close). Functioned Driller's Well Control button at Driller's Chair. TIH from 20;888' to 28;941'. 

05/14/2018: Set VCH Packer at 29;013' MD/ 26;958' TVD and test packer. Set Isolation Packers as follows: Zone 1 - 30;033'; Zone 2 - 29;734'; Zone 3 - 29;494'; Zone 4 - 29;255'. Performed service tool test. P/U Frac Head and M/U Lines to Frac Head; flush lines and pressure test lines/head. R/U Baker's electronic box. Pickle workstring and reverse out. Calibrate flow meters. Circulate and condition to spec. R/U Frac hose from boat. Conducted [re-job safety meeting. Fill and flush Frac hose/lines and pressure test.
 
05/15/2018: Line up to pump down DP with MPs. P/U ~70 ft and slacked off to open Zone #1 FCS/ MCS. Slacked off to "WDC" position. Confirmed tool position and sleeves open. P/U to "Full Reverse" position. Lined up and flushed/filled lines with seawater from Frac boat. Flushed lines from boat with SW. Pressure tested lines from Frac boat. Functioned boat pop-off and annulus side pop-off. Frac boat pumped 2x surface line volumes of 10.5 ppg NaBr linear gel to displace SW from lines to overboard. Pump acid and mini-frac fluid and displace with 315 bbls of 10.5 ppg NaBr to put acid 15 bbls from HES shifting tool. S/O and put tool in weight down circulating position with 90k down. Bullhead acid into perfs; following with Mini-Frac. Pump Frac job from Blue Dolphin; screened out at 517 bbls in flush. Stripped up to reverse position and established returns. Increased pump speed to 11 bpm/ 6;600 psi. Reverse fluid out of drill pipe until 14.0 ppg CaBr observed at surface. Strip up to contingency reverse; dump seals and close MCS/FCS. Performed test against system to 500 psi over trapped pressure. Continue reversing out 2x drill pipe volumes until fluid clean. Flow check; open annular and L/D Frac head. TOH 2 stands; spaceout and R/U Frac head and Frac lines. Confirm tool position for reverse position. 

05/16/2018: Pumped down KL and fill surface lines. Closed choke on Supreme manifold once returns observed at shakers and trapped fluid in treatment lines. Attempted to take reverse-out rate parameters through choke with rig pumps - Stbd turbine flowmeter not functioning properly. Re-dressed stbd turbine flowmeter with new kit and record reverse-out rate parameters. Opened the LA and monitored well. Tested lines to 8;000 psi. P/U ~70 ft from P/U mark and slacked off to open Zone #2 FCS and MCS; monitoring well on trip tank (no losses). Slacked off to "WDC" position with 90 klbs down. Broke circulation and confirmed tool position/sleeves are open. P/U to "Reverse" position. Flushed lines from boat with SW. Pressure tested lines from Frac boat to Frac head to 13;500 psi. Functioned boat and annulus side pop-offs. Lined up and pumped acid job. Shut down and slacked off to "WDC". Performed Mini-frac. Pumped Zone #2 Frac job and shut down 670 bbls in the flush at 10.0 bpm with 6;918 psi on the drillpipe - 2;421 psi on the annulus. Stripped up to reverse position and established returns. Increased pump rate to 12 bpm / 6;000 psi. Reverse fluid out of drillpipe holding constant BHP until 14.0 ppg CaBr2 was observed at surface. Strip up to Contingency Reverse; dumped seals and closed MCS/FCS. Performed test against system to 500 psi over 3;000 psi. Continued reversing out 2x drillpipe volumes until fluid clean. Flow check well and R/D Frac iron. L/O Frac head. TOH to Zone #3; spaceout and R/U Frac head and Frac lines. Confirm tool position for reverse position.

05/17/2018: Pumped down KL and fill surface lines. Closed choke on Supreme manifold once returns observed at shakers and trapped fluid in treatment lines. Recorded reverse-out rate parameters through flowmeters. Opened the LA and monitored well. Tested lines to 8;000 psi. P/U ~70 ft from P/U mark and slacked off to open Zone #3 FCS and MCS; monitoring well on trip tank (no losses). Slacked off to "WDC" position with 90 klbs down. Broke circulation and confirmed tool position/sleeves are open. P/U to "Reverse" position. Flushed lines from boat with SW. Pressure tested lines from Frac boat to Frac head to 13;500 psi. Functioned boat and annulus side pop-offs. Lined up and pumped acid job. Shut down and slacked off to "WDC". Performed Mini-frac. Pumped Zone #3 Frac job and shut down 591 bbls in the flush at 10.0 bpm with 5318 psi on the drillpipe - 1824 psi on the annulus. Stripped up to reverse position & established returns. Increased pump rate to 12 bpm/ psi. Reverse fluid out of drillpipe holding constant BHP until 14.0 ppg CaBr2 was observed at surface. Strip up to Contingency Reverse; dumped seals and attempted to close. MCS/FCS - sleeves not closed. Slacked off to WDC and strip up to Contingency Reverse; dumping seals and closing MCS/FCS. Performed test against system to 500 psi over 2;400 psi. Continued reversing out 1x drillpipe volumes while holding 1;000 psi back pressure on DP. Flow check well and R/D Frac iron. L/O Frac-head. TOH to Zone #4; test seals; spaceout and R/U Frac head and Frac lines.

05/18/2018: Verified HES service tool positions and made reference marks on pipe for Zone #4 Frac job. Cycled tool; opened FCS and MCS and slacked off to WDC; observed 66 bph losses. P/U to reverse position; losses slowed to 30 bph. Closed FCS and MCS and slacked off reverse postion; well static. Discussed plan forward with town. Decision made to perform Zone #4 in Weight Down Squeeze position. Flushed and tested surface lines. Performed Acid Job and Main Frac for Zone #4. Reversed out per schedule. Rigged down Frac head and TOH to Zone #5. R/U Frac head and open MCS/FCS - well static.

05/19/2018: Slacked off to "WDC" and P/U to Reverse position. Losses at 20 bph. Stand by waiting on Blue Tarpon to test lines. Transfer personnel from Blue Tarpon to DCQ. Decision made to pump job in Weight Down Squeeze position. P/U to close FCS & MCS on Zone #5 (losses at 30 bph after dumping seals; until MCS/FCS were closed). S/O to WDC and P/U to Reverse position. Pressure tested lines from Frac boat to rig floor Frac head to 13;500 psi - failed attempt. Blue Tarpon repair leak. Function MCS open and monitor losses - 30 bph. Cycle tool to Reverse position to confirm FCS closed/ MCS open. Pressure tested lines from Frac boat to rig floor Frac head. Performed Acid Job and Main Frac for Zone #5. Reversed out per schedule. Rigged down Frac head and TOH to 23;770' and R/U double dutch. Pressure test BOPs on 5-7/8" drillpipe to 250 psi/ 7400 psi from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; with 14.0 ppg CaBr2; and pressure test annulars to 250 psi/ 4;600 psi.

05/20/2018: Pressure test BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe (DP) from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod to 250 psi/ 7;400 psi and pressure test Annular to 250 psi/ 4;600 psi with 14.0 ppg CaBr. Function BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function test diverter from Driller's Control Panel. Trip out of hole (TOH) with Halliburton enhanced single trip multi-zone (ESTMZ) assy from 23;770' to surface. Function BSRs from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; while boosting riser. Rig up (R/U) and run in hole (RIH) with Isolation assembly from surface to 747'.

05/21/2018: Trip in hole (TIH) with Isolation assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 747' to 1;535'. Total assembly weight: 21k. Rig down (R/D) Weatherford tripmaster; 3-1/2" elevators; becket and bails. Installed wiper rubber and SLT 1000T slips. TIH with the HES Isolation assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 1;535' to 28;909'. Conducted pre-job safety meeting (PJSM) and established circ on 2 pit system via boost. Continue TIH opening MJPS and frac closing production sleeves (FCS) across Zones 5 - 1. Monitored losses on a 2 pit system while boosting to keep up with CaBr2 loss rate. Made up TDX; slacked off and stung Isolation assembly seals into VCH seal bore with a mule shoe depth of 30;388'; losses stopped. Lost a total of 388 bbls. Confirmed latch with 30 klbs overpull; slacked back off to neutral weight. Closed annular and pressure tested the FS-2 and seals in VCH packer seal bore to 1;000 psi for 5 minutes on IPT; good test. Dropped 1-7/8" diverter ball and pumped down work string. Set Isolation packer at 28;872' MD/ 26;819' TVD and tagged polished bore receptacle (PBR); closing middle variable bore rams (MVBR) to mark pipe. Pump slug and TOH to 9;365'.

05/22/2018: TOH with Isolation assembly running tool (RT). Lay down (L/D) same. Slipped and cut drill line. Perform planned maintenance. R/U and TIH with TNT Packer.
 
05/23/2018: TIH with TNT packer assembly at 3 mins/std. Set TNT packer at 28;687' MD/ 26;636' TVD and tested packer to 5;000 psi. TOH to 9;000'. Changed out leaking swivel packing. Reversed out spike from drill pipe. Pumped and spotted 50 bbls of hydroxyethyl cellulose (HEC) pill. TOH to 8;236'

05/24/2018: TOH with TNT RT to surface. L/D same. TIH with CleanWell tools and boll weevil test tool (BWTT) from surface to 8;155' bit depth. Perform test to 2;000 psi to ensure BWTT seated. Back off NuTec tool and POOH 2 stands. Pressure tested lower blind shear ram (LBSR)/ upper blind shear ram (UBSR) to 250/7;400 psi for 5 mins each from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; with 14.0 ppg CaBr.. Make up (M/U) NuTec BSR TT. Pick up (P/U) 2 stands. Pressure tested BOPs to 250/ 7;400 psi and Annular to 250/ 4;600 psi with 14.0 ppg CaBr from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function tested BOP from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod. TOH from 7;899' to 6;900'. Function tested diverter from Toolpusher's Control Panel. TOH to 1;014'. B/O BWTT.

05/25/2018: Function tested UBSR/LBSR from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod. M/U and RIH with Bore Protector Running/Retrieval Tool. Jet BOP/ subsea production tree (XT) with jet sub. Land bore protector running retrieval tool (BPRRT) and pull bore protector with 30k overpull (O/P). P/U and jet XT. Pump 40 bbl HEC pill and circulate out same. Pump slug and TOH. Rack back (R/B) BRPRRT and inspect CleanWell Vali Tech and magnet. Boost riser. RIH with mule shoe and 10 stds of drillpipe. Grease/service block. M/U and RIH with Vali Tech/ Mag Tech from 1;356' to 9;474'. Reversed out HEC pill. TOH to 4;491'.

05/26/2018: TOH with Mag Tech; Vali Tech and mule shoe from 4;491' to surface. R/U Weatherford handling equipment. P/U and RIH with HES seal assemblies; 1 joint of tubing; HES R-Nipple assembly; 1 joint of tubing; and Well Dynamics tandem DCIN/DHPTG assembly. Terminated and pressure tested injection line on Asphaltene chemical injected mandrel (CIM). Terminated and pressure tested tubing encapsulated cable (TEC) line onto flat-pack. Terminated and pressure tested injection line on Scale Inhibitor CIM. Confirmed injection through control lines. RIH with stands of 4-1/2" tubing to 1;087'. Jumped pin out of box while backing out stand of tubing. Pin end of stand landed on the rotary; with the stand still retained in the elevator. Recovered stand and repaired top drive stand compensator (TDSC). RIH with stands of 4-1/2" tubing from 1;087' to 2;116'.

05/27/2018: TIH with 4-1/2" production tubing from 2;116' to 4;376'. High current causing tubing to rub spider pipe guide; ballasted rig to compensate. TIH with 4-1/2" tubing to 7;677'. Added rollers to control line sheaves due to control line sheath splitting. TIH with 4-1/2" tubing to 8;064'. Made adjustment to Weatherford control line management equipment and increased Well Dynamics spooler tension. TIH with 4-1/2" tubing to 13;961'. High current causing tubing to rub spider pipe guide; ballasted rig to compensate. TIH with 4-1/2" to 14;550'.

05/28/2018: TIH with production tubing from 14;550' to 19;085'. M/U pups; timed pup; and SCSSV to string. Terminated SCSSV. Ran remaining 4-1/2" tubing and 6" VIT. M/U tubing hanger. Began terminating control lines on tubing hanger.

05/29/2018: Terminated and tested control lines on tubing hanger. R/D 22' 500 ton bails and TDSC. R/U 15' 1000 ton bails and BX-5 elevators. M/U Land and Lock THRT to tubing hanger and tested same. TIH with upper completion on 7-5/8" MaXit landing string from 21;654' to 28;547'. 

05/30/2018: Perform soft land out of tubing hanger into XT profile; confirm 59' of seal engagement into PBR. Spot inhibited packer fluid. R/U and test CTLF. Transfer SFT from CMH to main rotary. R/D WTFD equipment and install torpedo packers. Land and lock tubing hanger. R/U HPDU and surface iron. R/U SFT hydraulic lines and function valves. Flush surface lines prior to PT lines and tubing hanger.

05/31/2018: Pressure tested tubing hanger upper seals; SCSSV1 & SCSSV2 control lines; gallery seal; production bore; casing x tubing annulus to 5;000 psi. Engage and test electrical penetrators. Repeated gallery seal test. R/U slick line lubricator. Pressure tested SFT and lubricator. Pressure tested landing string; SFT body and production tubing. Performed operational SCSSV negative test. Retrieved isolation sleeve on slickline. Displaced kill line and land string from 14.0 ppg CaBr2 to base oil. M/U slickline LCP tool string and installed in lubricator. Pressure tested lubricator quick test sub.

06/01/2018: Set lower crown plug in TH. Pressure test LCP above/below (good tests). Displace choke; boost and riser to seawater. Open FS-2 HI valve with 19 cycles. Bullhead base oil below SCSSV and inflow test SCSSV - good test. R/U and RIH with upper crown plug on slickline to 7;000' (100 ft above tubing hanger).

Note: BSEE Inspectors Joshua Naquin; Chris Treland; Daniel Ballard; and Adriano Garcia arrived at 09:10 hrs. No INCs issued. Departed at 14:00 hrs.

06/02/2018: RIH with slickline and set UCP in TH profile. Pressure test the top of UCP to 12;600 psia. Pressure test between UCP and LCP via IWOCS to 12;600 psia. Displaced base oil in surface lines and kill line with seawater. R/D slickline equipment. Unlatch THRT and displace landing string to seawater. Rig down surface control lines; Chiksans; and Torpedo packers. R/D SFT and move to center mousehole. R/D CTLF. R/U landing string handling equipment. DPO ballasting rig due to Expro umbilical rubbing at rotary.

06/03/2018: TOH with Land & Lock (L&L) on 7-5/8" LS. Transfer L&L to Aux and L/O same. Slip and cut 155 ft of drill line. R/U riser handling equipment. P/U diverter running tool. L/O diverter and running tool. M/U landing joint to slip joint. Unlatch BOP/LMRP at 22:22 hrs. Move 50 ft towards DOZ @ 270-deg vessel heading. ROV install trash cap on XT. Move 1;080 ft to DOZ @ 270-deg vessel heading. R/D moonpool drape hoses/ goosenecks.

06/04/2018: R/D and secure drape hoses and goosenecks in moonpool. Pull landing joint; riser pup; termination joint; BLAT pup; spacer pup and L/O same. Pull riser from 6;900' to surface (BOP/LMRP in moonpool with riser double above). Averaged 7-joints per hour for riser pull. Raise riser catwalk bridge. 

06/05/2018: Remove work platform from BOP transporter. Secure BOP/LMRP onto BOP transporter (BOP on beam at 00:30 hrs). B/O riser double and L/O same. R/D IWOCS guillotine from BOP stack. Secure drape hoses for transit. Install tertiary cap on XT and pump TransAqua. Recover UDB with flying leads to surface. ROV repair tether at surface. ROV perform final PS-007 XT survey. ROV recover remaining 4 compatts to surface. Depart Jack/ St. Malo field to Tahiti field. Commence between well work per agreed schedule.

"},{"   ":1,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124002900,"WAR_START_DT":"2007-08-19","TEXT_REMARK":"08/19/07:  Drill f/ 8900' t/ 9110'. Circ & spot 13.5 PPG pad mud. Check f/ flow & POOH. Prep rig f/ storm evasion (Hurricane Dean). Begin rig transit to the East.

08/20/07:  Rig in transit due East f/ storm evasion.

08/21/07:  Rig in transit due East f/ storm evasion. Rig holding position to monitor storm track. Rig in transit back to WR 677.

08/22/07:  Rig in transit back to WR 677. Rig on location & begin prep for well work.  P/U BHA and begin wiper trip t/ 1653'.

08/23/07:  Con't RIH w/ clean out BHA to 8100'. Wash & ream f/ 8100' t/ 8300'. TIH t/ 8900'. Wash & ream t/ 9110'. Pump pill & circ & condition. Pump pad mud; check flow (OK); & POOH t/ 7130'. Drop ball & wash LPH. POOH t/ surface. RU & begin running 22" csg t/ 1038'.

08/24/07:  Cont. to run 22" csg to 9051'.  R/U cmt equip; test lines & begin to cmt. 22" csg.

08/25/07:  Finish pumping cmt (5625 Cu.Ft.). TOC 6960'. Release from MRLD & POOH w/ landing string to mud line; jet around well head & cont. to POOH. R/U and begin running BOP's & riser.
"},{"   ":2,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124002900,"WAR_START_DT":"2007-08-26","TEXT_REMARK":"08/26/07:  Continue to run riser t/ 2389'.

08/27/07:  Continue to run riser t/ 5769'.

08/28/07:  Continue to run riser.  Install 25' riser pup. N/U choke; kill; & boost lines. Flush same & begin testing.

08/29/07:  Continue testing lines - test failed on choke line. Fly ROV to stack and discover leak coflex hose above choke line test valve. R/U & begin pulling riser & stack.

08/30/07:  POOH w/ riser & stack t/ 699'.

08/31/07:  Finish pulling riser and land stack on BOP cart. Begin changing out coflex hose.

09/01/07: Change out Mux cable & terminate. 
"},{"   ":3,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124002900,"WAR_START_DT":"2007-09-02","TEXT_REMARK":"09/02/07:  Run stack & pull stack due to problems w/ Blue POD SEM B. Trouble shoot POD problems.

09/03/07:  Continue trouble shooting & repair of stack. Function Test & run same.

09/04/07:  Continue to run riser; trouble shoot & change out OLM on blue mux reel. Run riser.

09/05/07:  Trouble shoot loss of comms. Finish running riser & installing fairings. Rig up slip jt & latch BOPs.

09/06/07:  R/D riser handing equip. TIH & Test BOPs. POOH w/ test assy & TIH w/ 18-1/8" drilling assy.

09/07/07:  TIH w/ 18-1/8" drilling assy. Wash f/ 8;885' to 8;964'. Drill hard cmt to 9;022'. Displace well to SBM. Drill cmt f/ 9;022' t/ 9054'. Wash & ream to 9;110'. Drill new formation to 9120'. Circ btms up. Perform FIT @ 9;054' w/ 10.2 ppg SOBM to 614 psi @ .03 BPM; EMW= 11.5 ppg; 6 bbls pumped & 6 bbls bled back. Open well & pump up max ESD - 11.91 fro; PWD.

09/08/07:  Drill 18-1/8" hole section t/ 9;959'. Trouble shoot rig repair issues.
"},{"   ":4,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124002900,"WAR_START_DT":"2007-09-09","TEXT_REMARK":"09/09/07: Trouble shoot rig repair issues. Drill at reduced rate due to rig cooling system problems and make repairs to cooling system f/ 9959' to 10;358'. Circ Btms up. POOH to 6;340'. Displace to seawater; in case we have to disconnect. POOH to 230' & redress wear sleeve.

"},{"   ":5,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124002900,"WAR_START_DT":"2007-09-16","TEXT_REMARK":"09/16/07:  POOH F/ 16;210' TO 15;037'; REAMING TIGHT SPOTS AS REQUIRED. TIH TO 16;210' AND INCREASE MW TO 10.8 PPG. POOH TO 6;400'. ROV INSPECTED BOP & RISER - OK.

"},{"   ":12,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124002900,"WAR_START_DT":"2007-12-30","TEXT_REMARK":"12/30/07:  PERFORM BOP MAINTENANCE. INSTALLING NEW ANNULAR IN ANNUFLEX.

NOTE: JOANNE ZUNIGA (CHEVRON) RECEIVED APPROVAL F/ BEN COCO (MMS HOUMA) VIA EMAIL ON 01-04-08 @ 15:55 HRS TO DEFER THE PRESSURE TEST OR CALIPERING THE CASING UNTIL AFTER SETTING AND CEMENTING THE 7¿ LINER.

"},{"   ":18,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124002900,"WAR_START_DT":"2008-02-10","TEXT_REMARK":"02/10/08:  POOH W/ 16" RTTS ASSEMBLY & LAY DOWN SAME. R/U & RIH W/HP-MDT/HT-GC.

02/11/08:  CONT RIH W/HP-MDT/HTGC. COMMUNICATION FAILURE W/TOOL. POOH W/E-LINE. REPLACE POWER CARTRIDGE ON TOOL. RIH W/HP-MDT/HTGC.

02/14/08:  CONT TAKING FLUID SAMPLES W/HP-MDT/HTGC. POOH W/E-LINE. C/O E-LINE SPOOL.  RIH W/ MSCT/HTGC. TAKE ROTARY SIDEWALL CORES. POOH W/E-LINE.

02/15/08:  CONT POOH W/ MSCT/HTGC. C/O TOOL STRING. RIH W/ MSCT/HTGC. TAKE ROTARY SIDEWALL CORES. POOH. C/O TOOL STRING. RIH W/ MSCT/HTGC.

02/16/08:  CONT RIH W/MSCT/HTGC. TAKE ROTARY SIDEWALL CORES.
"},{"   ":19,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124002900,"WAR_START_DT":"2008-02-17","TEXT_REMARK":"02/17/08:  FINISH CORING; POOH; LAY DOWN & RIG DOWN WIRELINE; MAKE UP & TIH WITH
10-5/8" CLEANOUT ASSEMBLY.

02/18/08:  FINISH TIH & WASH DOWN TO BOTTOM; CIRCULATE BOTTOMS UP; FLOW CHECK WELL; POOH; R/U & TEST BOP'S.

02/21/08:  CONTINUE TO WOE; CONTINUE GENERAL RIG MAINT & HOUSEKEEPING.

02/22/08:  CONTINUE WOE; RIH WITH VSI-40; COMMENCE VSP LOGGING PROGRAM.

02/23/08:  FINISH WITH VSI-40; PERFORM VSI-40 NEAR OFFSET; POOH WITH VSI-40 AND LAY DOWN SAME. TIH WITH VSI-4; FINISH OPEN HOLE VSI-4; POOH WITH WIRELINE.
"},{"   ":20,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124002900,"WAR_START_DT":"2008-02-24","TEXT_REMARK":"02/24/08:  FINISH WIRELINE; RIG DOWN SLB; PICK UP TOP DRIVE; RIG UP FRANK'S CASING TOOLS; RUN 7" LINER ON LANDING STRING; TIH WITH 7" LINER.

02/25/08:  TIH WITH 7" LINER; SET & CEMENT SAME; CIRCULATE BOTTOMS UP; POOH WITH LANDING STRING AND HANGER RUNNING TOOL.

02/26/08:  POOH; TEST CASING; TIH WITH CIBP; SET CIBP. WEIGHT TEST CIBP. SPOT 200' CEMENT PLUG ON TOP OF CIBP; POOH.

02/27/08:  PULL UP TO SPOT 500' CEMENT PLUG. POOH. TEST PLUG TO 1000 PSI AND PERFORM NEGATIVE TEST. DISPLACE TO SEAWATER AND SPOT 500' SURFACE PLUG.

02/28/08:  POOH AND LAY DOWN RUNNING TOOL; SLIP AND CUT DRILL LINE; RIG UP TO PULL RISER.

"},{"   ":21,"WELL_NAME":"  001aa","API12":608124004400,"WAR_START_DT":"2009-07-19","TEXT_REMARK":"7/19/2009: Perform redundancy test on Aft MDDM. Inspect Hyd connections on Fwd MDDM. Start to P/U 5 stds of 5-7/8" DP on Aft. Conduct arrivals testing and performed black out drill. Set Compatts with ROV. Continued to P/U 5-7/8" DP. Held PJSM with drill crew for handling BHA. RIH 9-7/8" drilling assy. from surface to 137'. Plug into Anadril MWD & LWD tools and initialize same. Held Pre Job Safety Meeting. Cleared rig floor of all non-essential personnel while Anadril loaded source in ADN Tool. Continued RIH w/ 9-7/8" BHA f/ 137' to 750'. Wt below jars = 27K. Total BHA = 53K. M/U X/O and shallow test MWD/LWD tools at 400 gpm/250psi. Good Test. RIH w/ 9-7/8" BHA on 5-7/8" & 6-5/8" DP f/ 750' to 6;510'. ROV in water; Frugo Chance & DP positioned mud line bouy marker @ 0/0 coordinates for well. Position FWD rotary over well; obtain rotary parameters of 1k to 3k @ 40 rpm. TIH tagged mud line @ 6;898' RKB. Water depth 6;806'. Finish performing bottom survey as per MMS regs. While performing bottom survey; ROV TMS quit spooling in tether. ROV has approximately 200' of tether out from TMS. Penetrate mud line from 6;898' to 6;922' w/ 4 to 6k WOB. Made connection. Drilled 9-7/8" hole in open water from 6;922' to 7;074'; with 500 gpm and 2/3k WOB w/ 100 rotary w/ 3k torque w/ sea water.

7/20/2009: Drilled ahead 9-7/8" hole section from 7;074' to 7;892' w/ sea water.  Parameters: 500-600 gpm; 2-9k WOB; 100-120 rotary w/ 2-3k torque; Auto Driller feed rate set at 270 FPH. Pumped 50 bbl gel sweeps every 1-2 stds. Backreaming btm 40'. Due to LWD log quality concerns; continue to drill ahead 9-7/8" hole section at a reduced ROP from 7;892' to 9;136' w/ sea water. Parameters: 600-650 gpm; 7-10 k WOB; 120-170 rotary w/ 2-4k torque; Auto Driller feed rate set at 180 FPH. Pumped 50 bbl gel sweeps every other Std. Backreaming btm 80' due to inclination. Swapped over to 10 ppg DKD @9;136'. (Precautionary) Continue drilling ahead from 9;136' to 9;275'. Parameters: 600-650 gpm; 7-18k WOB; 120-170 rotary w/ 2-5k torque; Auto Driller feed rate set at 180 FPH. ECD 9.5 ESD 8.9.

7/21/2009: Continue drilling ahead 9-7/8" hole section from 9;275' to 9;652' with 10 - 10.3ppg WBM. Parameters: 650 gpm; 10-20k WOB; 150-170 rotary w/ 4-5k torque; Auto Driller feed rate set at 80 - 100 FPH.  ECD 9.56 ESD 9.31.  Note: TOS = 9;630. Back reamed a single; circulate 2 x annulus vol w/ 10.3ppg WBM; P/U off Btm and flow check well for 10 mins - well static. Pumped a 50 bbl 10.5 ppg sweep and chase with 12.5 ppg WBM.  Displaced OH to 12.5 ppg WBM and down linked Anadril Acoustic tool to POOH Mode. Total 12.5 ppg WBM pumped = 545 bbls. POOH w/ 9-7/8" BHA f/ 9;652' to 6;953'. Hole in good condition - no overpulls. Displace top 25' of OH to seawater to attempt to improve visibility to stab cement stinger on Aft. Pull swivel packing on AFT MDDM; top o-ring rolled; repair same; test packing t/ 5000 psi for 5 minutes w/ rig pumps; good test. DP position Aft rotary over well center; successfully stab cmt stinger into pilot hole on first attempt; cont TIH t/ 9652' tagged bottom picked up to 9;642'. Held pre-job safety meeting. Rigged up cement lines; pumped 15 bbl Mud Push spacer; test lines 1500 psi. Mix and pump balanced plug as follows: Pumped additional 60 bbl Mud Push spacer followed by 150 bbl (758 sks/ 842 cu/ft w/ 1.11 yield) mixed w/  .05 gps D144; .30 gps D168; .05 gps D185 and 4.29 gps sea water. Followed slurry w/ 13 bbl MudPush spacer; displaced and spotted 1500' cement plug from 8;142' to 9;642' w/ 162 bbl sea water @ 10 bpm 60 psi. Caught up to cmt w/ 138 of 162 bbl pumped. Final disp. press 425 psi. Cement in place @ 21:00hrs. Pulled out of hole from 9;642' to 8;008'. Spot 13.3 ppg pad mud from 8;008' to 6;898' DPM RKB @ 20 bpm. Pulled out of hole from 8;008' to 7;500'

7/22/2009: POOH w/ stinger t/ 6890'. Drop dart; pump down dart and latch same w/ 1083 strokes; 125.5 bbls; sheared dart w/ 1900 psi. POOH f/ 6890' t/ 4878'. P/U pad eye sub and r/u to work basket in moon pool; TIH w/ 4' x 8' basket on 6 5/8" DP to recover compatts from ROV @ 6500'; ROV p/u compatts @ 0700 hrs. ROV recovering clump weights and compatts. Move vessel into position over well. ROV perform survey around puddle area and well head area. Move vessel back over last compatt. ROV load basket w/ 3 compatts and 2 clump weights. Waiting on helicopter and crew boat to depart before recovering last compatt (to avoid issues with US Customs). Recovered last compatt @ 15:15. Placed final compatt in work basket. Recover ROV to surface. Pull basket w/ compatts on Fwd Rotary to moonpool & unload same. Departed from WR 634 for Tahiti Field GC 640 @ 21:15 hrs. While in route; FWD derrick removed bails for inspection.  Installed mechanical swivel packing on FWD TDS. Discoverer Spirit underway to Walker Ridge 678 at 18:30 hrs. on 5/04/02. Discoverer Spirit on location; Dana Point; Walker Ridge 678 #1 BP02 at 07:40 hrs on 5/06/04. Location: Latitude 26? 17' 20.5879" ;  Longitude 91? 04' 06.8318". Assisted AFT rotary w/trip to retrieve TA cap. Assisted ROV w/setting compatts. Assisted Sub Sea department w/BOP maintenance. Assisted AFT rotary make up FMC jet sub & MPT. Assisted w/trip & retrieve wear bushing in wellhead. Tripped out of the water w/wear bushing from 7;113' to 4;512'. Tripped out of the water w/wear bushing; laid down same; MPT & wash sub. Made up Nu-Tech test assembly. Made up cross over sub on 9-1/2" drill collar stand & racked back same. Picked up one 9-1/2" drill collar & function tested AFT PLS. Held pre-job safety meeting. Started picking up 4" drill pipe; 4" hevi-wate drillpipe; 5" drillpipe; & racked back in the derrick. Assisted Sub Sea department w/BOP maintenance & testing. Finished BOP testing at 01:00 hrs. Tested BOP with 6-5/8"; 5"; & 4" drillpipe. Rigged up riser handling equipment on rig floor. Function tested BOP on both pods from the toolpusher's & driller's panel; good test. Skidded BOP to well center & made up riser																		
double. Rigged BOP restraint & landed BOP on hang off beams. Secured Mux lines & lowered BOP into the water at 17:40 hrs. Rigged up & tested choke & kill lines to 250 & 10;000 psi. Tested rigid conduit & boost lines to 250 & 5;000 psi. Picked up & ran riser joints 3 - 15; washed boxes & pins. Checked choke & kill lines seals & changed as needed. Installed new mud seals on each riser joint.																		
"},{"   ":41,"WELL_NAME":"  001aaa","API12":608124000402,"WAR_START_DT":"2004-05-16","TEXT_REMARK":"Provide a daily summary of well activities.																		
5/23/04 - TIH with BHA #5 from 1;229' to 12;389'' on 4" drill pipe. Changed out 5" drill pipe handling equipment to 6-5/8" & tested forward PRS. Continued TIH from 12;389' to 15;860'. Hole gave back 45 bbls over wet pipe displacement. Filled pipe & broke circulation while boosting riser & rotating slowly to prevent surging the well. Tested MWD; ok. TIH from 15;860' to 22;741'. Circulated on riser while staging pumps to 45 spm. TIH from 22;741' to 26;900'. Tagged ledges at 25;437' & 26;335' bit depth wiped through ledges; did not tag up. TIH to 26;900'; took survey & slow pump rates. Washed & reamed from 26;900' to 27;057'. Drilled from 27;057' to 27;221'. Circulated at 275 gpm. After discussion 27;255' was agreed as core point; based on log correlation. Noted: at 21:30 hrs. MWD tool stopped working at 27;160'.																		
5/24/04 - Drilled 27;221' to 27;255'. Flow checked; ok. Performed swab test & circulated bottoms up. No gas on bottoms up. Continued to circulate to clean hole. Flow checked well; ok. POOH wet to 25;057'. Flow checked at 7" shoe & continued to POOH to 20;718'. POOH from 20;718' to 7;120'. Made up BOP test assembly. TIH from 7;120' to 10;627'. Troubleshot communication problems on forward & aft PRS. 																		
5/25/04 - TIH from 10;627' to 14;044' with test plug & Nu-Tec joint. Landed test plug in wellhead on top of wear bushing. Tested BOP equipment. Tested annular to 250/3;500 psi & rams to 250/7;500 psi on the blue pod from the rig floor. Function tested on yellow pod from tool pusher's office. Tested on 4" & 6-5/8" pipe. Unseated test plug; flow checked well; ok. POOH wet from 14;044' to 11;866'. Pumped 70 bbls of 16.8 ppg slug; pipe did not slug. POOH wet from 11;866' to 7;039'. Latched Nu-Tec stand in aft blocks. POOH from 6;904' to 5;922'. Troubleshot ESD system. Rig down time. POOH from 5;922' to 1;229'. POOH from 1;229' with BHA. TIH with 6-1/8"  coring BHA #1 to 4;682'. Rigged up pump in sub on 4" drill string & steel lines to cement hose; filled pipe with 13.8 SBM. TIH from 4;682' to 9;253'. 																		
5/26/04 - TIH with core barrel assembly #1 from 9;253' to 22;748'. Filled pipe & broke circulation at 22;748' before entering 7" liner. Continued to TIH from 22;748' to 27;240'. Broke circulation at 27;240'. Washed from 27;240' to bottom at 27;255'. Dropped 1" steel ball & pumped same down at 100 gpm. Ball seated with 200 psi increase in pump pressure. Cored from 27;255' to 27;345'. Flow checked well; well static. Pumped out of the hole from 27;345' to 26;557'. TOH from 26;557' to 22;900'. Troubleshot forward PRS system; travel fault/rotation VFD fault. Rig down time. POOH from 22;900' to 21;387'.																		
5/27/04 - POOH from 21;387' to 12;502'. Changed out handling equipment to 5". POOH from 12;502' to 6;170'. Pulled above BOP stack & closed USR. Continued to POOH from 1;997' to 1;245'. Finished pulling core barrel to surface. Broke off bit & transferred core barrel to aft. Total core recovered was 12.2'. TIH with core assemblt #2 from 1;345' to 9;283'. Filled pipe every 30 stands.																		
5/28/04 - Tripped in hole from 9;283' to 27;209' in intermediate gear with block retracted. Filled pipe and recorded parameters for coring; pick up weight 783 K lb; slack off weight 740 K lb; rotating weight 750 K lb; torque off bottom 9 - 10 K ft lb. Washed to 27;345' (no fill); circulated at 200 gpm with 1;250 psi. Dropped 1" steel ball and pumped down same at 400 gpm with 2;200 psi; ball seated pressure increased to 3;000 psi (800 psi increase); slowed pumps down to 100 gpm with 1;500 psi. Cored from 27;345' to 27;402' (57') at 120 gpm with 2;160 psi; 60 rpm; on bottom torque 11 - 12 k ft lbs; 6 - 10 k lb weight on bit. Cored from 27;398' to 27;402'  & noted that torque increased to 16 - 18 k ft lbs and ROP slowed to 5 ft/hr.  Pumped out of the hole from 27;402' to 26;589'.  Flow checked well; pulled out of the hole from 26;589' to 8;600'. 																		
5/29/04 - Pulled out of the hole from 8;600' to 2;000' in high gear with block retracted. Closed upper shear rams and pulled pipe without filling back side.  Pulled out of hole with core assembly # 2 from 2;000' to surface; following pulling schedule.  Recovered 57' of core. Tripped in the hole with core bottom hole assembly # 3 to 25;605' in intermediate gear with block retracting. 																		
Received verbal approval from Mr. John McCarroll; MMS Houma District Office; to test rams on 4" and 6-5/8" pipe only and test annular on 4" pipe only. Permission was granted on 5/24/04 at 20:00 hours.

5/30/04 - Tripped in the hole with core assembly # 3 from 25;605' to 27;259'.  Broke circulation and washed from 27;259' to 27;402'. Cored from 27;402' to 27;422'. Pumped out of the hole from 27;422' to 26;695'. Pulled out of the hole from 26;695' to 12;500'. Changed out inserts in elevators and PS-30 from 6-5/8 to 5" drill pipe. Pulled out of the hole with core assembly as per schedule. Note: Only recovered 8.5' of core. 																		
5/31/04 - Tripped in hole with drilling assembly to 6;838'. Flushed choke and kill lines while tripping in the hole. Tripped in hole from 6;383' to 12;390'. Shallow tested MWD equipment (ok) while changing out equipment. Tripped in the hole form 12;390' to 14;540'. Located annular; function tested (diverter and over board valves) annular; lower pipe rams; middle pipe rams; upper pipe rams on 5" drill pipe and all fail safe valves. Tripped in the hole from 14;540' to 27;240'. Logged in the hole from 27;240' to 27;422' at 60 ft/hr; pumping at 300 gpm with rotary speed of 30 rpm. Drilled from 27;422' to 27;525'.																		
6/1/04 - Drilled from 27;525' to 27;940'. Flowed checked well (static).  Circulated and conditioned mud. Drilled from 27;940' to 27;990'. Flow checked well (static). Circulated bottoms up at 27;990'. Pumped out of the hole from 27;990' to 27;400'. Pulled out of the hole from 27;400' to 26;477'. 																		
6/2/04 - Continued to trip out of the hole from 26;477' to 25;000' in low gear with blocks retracted. Flow checked well at 7" shoe (25;300'). Continued to trip out of the hole from 25;000' to 12;527'. Pumped 30 bbl. slug. Continued to trip out of the hole from 12;527' to surface. Serviced block and top drive. Tripped in the hole with core assembly #4. Continued to trip in the hole to 16;651'. 																		
6/3/04 - Continued to trip in the hole from 16;651' to 27;848'. Washed from 27;848' to 27;884'. Dropped ball; washed to bottom at 27;990' and continued to circulate until ball seated. Cored from 27;990' to 28;082'. Pumped out of the hole from 28;082' to 27;303'. Flow checked well; static. Tripped out of the hole from 27;303' to 6;158'. Closed blind rams while pulling out of the hole above the stack; allowing the annulus to drop. Monitored the BOP wellhead pressure gauge. 																		
6/4/04 - Tripped out of the hole from 6;158' to 2;245'. Continued to trip out of the hole from 2;245' as per coring procedure. Note: Upper shear rams closed and well being monitored on the BOP gauge. Filled riser with 56.2 barrels. Full core recovery: 2-5/8" x 92.2' of core in barrel. Tripped in the hole with core assembly #5 to 26;685'. 																		
6/5/04 - Tripped in the hole from 26;685' to 27;941'. Dropped 1" ball; washed from 27;941' to 28;082'.  At core depth (28;082'); started the rotary at 40 rpm off bottom with 9/9;500 ft.lbs. of torque. Tagged bottom; set 2/10;000 lbs. of weight on bit and observed torque decreased to 6/6;500 ft.lbs. Increased rotary rpm to 50 with no increase in torque. Attempted to core with no success; increased bit weight up to 17;000 lbs. Picked up and restarted bit with no success. Decision was made that the core had jammed in the barrel. Started coring at 28;082' and stopped at 28;083.50'. Total footage made was 1.5'. Pumped out of the hole from 28;083' to 27;396'.
