NOTE: Bobbie Jo Kull (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Benjamin Coco (MMS Houma District) via e-mail at 13:28 hrs on 04/16/08 to utilize a 0.3 ppg margin for the 12-1/4" x 13-1/2" interval.

04/17/08:  CIRCULATE TO RAISE MUD WEIGHT TO 13.2 PPG; DRILL TO 25;004'.  
NOTE: Bobbie Jo Kull (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Benjamin Coco (MMS Houma District) via e-mail at 11:23 hrs on 04/17/08 to utilize a mud weight not to exceed 13.3 ppg to 25;500' MD for the 12-1/4" x 13-1/2" interval.

04/18/08:  DRILL TO 25;383' & CIRCULATE AND CONDITION MUD.

04/19/08:  CIRCULATE; SHORT TRIP; CIRCULATE TO WEIGHT UP FROM 13.2 PPG TO 13.3 PPG; SHORT TRIP; CIRCULATE BOTTOMS UP.
"},{"   ":76,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124003100,"WAR_START_DT":"2008-04-20","TEXT_REMARK":"04/20/08:  CIRCULATE BOTTOMS UP. PUMP OUT OF HOLE FROM 25;383' TO 19;957'. POOH WITH 12 1/4" X 13 1/2" BHA F/ 992' TO SURFACE. CHANGE OUT SAVER SUB.

04/21/08:  TRIP IN HOLE. FUNCTION TEST BOP. CONTINUE TRIPPING IN HOLE TO 25;120'. WASH DOWN TO 25;259'. OPEN 12-1/4" HOLE TO 13-1/2" F/ 25;259' TO 25;350'.

04/22/08:  OPEN 12-1/4" HOLE TO 13-1/2" FROM 25;350' TO 25;383'. PUMP OUT OF HOLE @ 130 GPM F/ 25;383' TO 20;000'. FLOW CHECK - OK. POOH F/ 20;000' TO 11;872'.

04/23/08:  POOH F/ 11;872' TO SURFACE. SLIP & CUT DRILL LINE. RIG UP & RUN IN HOLE WITH 11-7/8" LINER TO 7;037'.

04/24/08:  TIH WITH 11-7/8" LINER ON LANDING STRING F/ 7;037' TO 25;363'.

04/25/08:  CEMENT 11-7/8" LINER. TOTAL CEMENT PUMPED: 679 CUFT; SET VERSAFLEX EXPANDABLE LINER HANGER (TOL @ 23;109'). CIRCULATE BOTTOMS UP. POOH WITH LINER HANGER SETTING TOOL F/ 23;081' TO 178'.

04/26/08:  CONTINUE POOH WITH LINER HANGER RUNNING TOOL AND LAY DOWN SAME. SERVICE RIG AND TRIP IN HOLE WITH 10-5/8" X 12-1/4" BHA TO ABOVE TOP OF STACK. TEST 11-7/8" CASING; UPPER BLIND SHEAR RAMS AND LOWER BLIND SHEAR RAMS TO 2800 PSI. CONTINUE TRIPPING IN HOLE. WASH AND REAM CEMENT TO 25;022'. 
"},{"   ":77,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124003100,"WAR_START_DT":"2008-04-27","TEXT_REMARK":"04/27/08:  WASH AND REAM. DRILL LANDING COLLAR AND FLOAT COLLAR. WASH AND REAM FIRM CEMENT BELOW LANDING COLLAR. DRILL SHOE. WASH AND REAM RAT HOLE BELOW SHOE. DRILL 
10-5/8" HOLE FROM 25;383' TO 25;388'. PORT ENGINE ROOM FIRE AT 0800 HRS. SPACE OUT AND CLOSE MVBR'S. DISPLACE RISER TO SEAWATER.

04/28/08:  WAITING ON WEATHER. DISPLACE RISER TO 13.5 PPG SBM. CIRCULATE AND CONDITION RAISING MUD WEIGHT TO 13.8 PPG. PERFORM FIT FOR TEMPORARY ABANDON PURPOSES TO 1055 PSI; 14.6 PPG EQUIVALENT MUD WEIGHT. PULL OUT OF THE HOLE WITH 10-5/8" X 12-1/4" DRILLING ASSEMBLY. HOLE TAKING PROPER FILL UPS.

04/29/08:  CONTINUE PULLING OUT OF HOLE TO SURFACE. SLIP AND CUT DRILL LINE. RIG UP WIRELINE. RUN IN HOLE WITH 11-7/8" FASDRILL ON WIRELINE. ATTEMPT TO SET AT 25;100'. NO INDICATION OF FASDRILL SET. ATTEMPT TO PULL OUT OF HOLE; FASDRILL STUCK AT 25;030'. PULL WIRE FREE AT WEAK POINT; LEAVING RUNNING TOOL AND FASDRILL IN HOLE. PULL OUT OF THE HOLE WITH WIRELINE AND RIG DOWN SAME. TRIP IN HOLE WITH 13-5/8" FASDRILL ON DRILL PIPE.

04/30/08:  CONTINUE TRIPPING IN HOLE WITH FASDRILL. SET SAME AT 22;000'. SET 25K DOWN TO WEIGHT TEST AND TEST TO 500 PSI - GOOD TEST. STING OUT OF FASDRILL AND SET 500' BALANCED PLUG FROM 21;985' TO 21;485'. PULL UP TO 17;800'.

05/01/08:  SPOT 800' CEMENT PLUG FROM 17;800' TO 17;000'. PICK UP ABOVE PLUG; DISPLACE HOLE FROM 16;624' TO 9;000' WITH 14.7 PPG SBM. TEST PLUG TO 1000 PSI FOR 15 MINUTES. PERFORM NEGATIVE TEST TO 2;435 PSI BY PUMPING 224 BBL OF BASE OIL DOWN THE DRILL PIPE. DISPLACE HOLE FROM 9000' TO SURFACE WITH SEAWATER. SET SURFACE PLUG FROM 9;000' TO 8;500'. PULL OF OF THE HOLE.

05/02/08:  CIRCULATE A DRILL PIPE VOLUME AND CONTINUE PULLING OUT OF THE HOLE TO SURFACE. RIG UP RISER HANDLING EQUIPMENT AND PREPARE TO UNLATCH. UNLATCH BOP'S AT 21:22 HRS.

05/03/08:  PULL BOP AND RISER TO 1;318' AT MIDNIGHT.

"},{"   ":80,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124003100,"WAR_START_DT":"2008-06-08","TEXT_REMARK":"06/08/08:  WOE. TEST KL 250 - 12K PSI. M/U SDC. LAND BOP. TEST KL & BREAK CIRC. TEST CONN 1K PSI. L/D LANDING JT. R/D RISER EQ.

"},{"   ":81,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124003100,"WAR_START_DT":"2008-06-15","TEXT_REMARK":"06/15/08:  POOH. L/D FISHING ASSEMBLY #1. RECOVERED PIECE OF COMPOSITE AND PACKER RUBBER FROM 13-5/8" FASDRILL. SLIP AND CUT DRILL LINE. TIH W/ BAKER VACS TOOL; FISHING ASSEMBLY #2; TO 15;380'.

13-5/8" FASDRILL RETAINER AND 11.95' OF WL TOOLSTRING. STILL REMAINING IS 1.19' OF DPU TOOL; THE SETTING SLEEVE AND THE 11-7/8" FASDRILL PACKER. SERVICE RIG. REPAIR TOP DRIVE. P/U FISHING BHA #3. TIH W/ CONCAVE MILL ASSY.

06/18/08:  TIH W/ CONCAVE MILL ASSY (FISHING ASSEMBLY #3). TAG TOP OF FISH @ 25;383'. MILL F/ 25;383' T/ 25;388'. PUMP HI VIS SWEEP AND CIRC B/U.

@ 1/2 BPM. PRESSURE UP TO 1356 PSI; 14.8 EMW; PUMPED 14 BBLS. BLED BACK 11.5 BBLS. WASH & REAM ON BOTTOM CLEANING UP ANY JUNK. DRILL 10-5/8" HOLE F/ 25;388' T/ 25;426'.

NOTE: BOBBIE JO KULL (CHEVRON) RECEIVED EMAIL APPROVAL FROM MR. BENJAMIN COCO (MMS HOUMA DISTRICT) ON 06/20/08 AT 15:02 HRS TO RE-START OUR 30-DAY CASING TEST REQUIREMENTS TO TODAY - JUNE 20TH. THEREFORE; OUR NEXT CASING TEST WILL BE DUE ON
JULY 20TH.

06/21/08:  CONTINUE TO DRILL 10-5/8" HOLE TO 25;459' WITH LOW ROP. FLOW CHECK. PUMP SLUG. POOH TO ASSESS BIT CONDITION. CLEAN RIG FLOOR. P/U REVERSE CIRCULATING JUNK BASKET (FISHING ASSY #4). TIH TO 765'.
"},{"   ":82,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124003100,"WAR_START_DT":"2008-06-22","TEXT_REMARK":"06/22/08:  TIH W/ 10-1/8" REVERSE CIRC BASKET ASSY. CIRC & COND. POOH W/ 10-1/8" REV CIRC BASKET ASSY.

"},{"   ":85,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124003100,"WAR_START_DT":"2008-07-13","TEXT_REMARK":"07/13/08:  WASH DOWN TO LANDING COLLAR AND TAG AT 26;377'. NO CEMENT ON TOP OF LC. "},{"   ":93,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124003101,"WAR_START_DT":"2008-08-31","TEXT_REMARK":"08/31/08    CONTINUE TO EVADE HURRICANE GUSTAV.

09/02/08    CONTINUE TRANSIT TO WELL LOCATION; SKID LMRP TO MOONPOOL; MAKE UP RISER DOUBLE; RUN 10 JOINTS OF RISER.

09/03/08    CONTINUE RUNNING RISER.

09/04/08    FINISH RUNNING RISER; LATCH LMRP; RIG DOWN RISER HANDLING EQUIPMENT; TRIP IN HOLE WITH EDPHT  RETRIEVIAL BOTTOM HOLE ASSEMBLY.

09/05/08    DISPLACE RISER TO 14.1 PPG SYNTHETIC BASE MUD ; SCREW INTO EDPHOT & TEST RISER CONNECTOR; PICK UP ON EDPHOT; BREAK CIRCULATION; PULL OUT OF HOLE WITH EDHOT ASSMBLY. RIG UP LINES AND BEGIN TESTING BOP'S ON 5-7/8" AND 6-5/8" TEST MANDREL.  TEST ANNULAR TO 250 PSI/ 3500 PSI AND PIPE RAMS TO 250 PSI / 6500 PSI.

09/06/08    FINISH TESTING BOP'S; PULL OUT OF THE HOLE WITH BOP TEST PLUG & TEST MANDREL.  LAYOUT SAME.  (DECISION MADE TO SECURE WELL FOR HURRICANE IKE). TRIP IN HOLE WITH EDPHOT; LAND SAME IN WELLHEAD.  RELEASE FROM EDPHOT.   DISPLACE RISER TO SEAWATER.
