Note: Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) on 06/06/2015 @ 10:47 AM to delay the BOP function test by 24 hours."},{"   ":142,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-06-07","TEXT_REMARK":"06/07/2015: POOH and perform post jarring inspection; function BSR/CSR from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod. Make up 18-1/8" by 21" BHA and RIH. Perform function test on BOPs from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Continue RIH in preparation of testing BOPs. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in the hole.

06/08/2015: TIH and successfully pressure tested BOP components to 250/11;600 psi high on the Rams and 250/6;500 psi high on the Annulars for 5 minutes each on 6-5/8" drill pipe using 11.8 ppg SBM from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod using IPT. Continue TIH and drill from 19;855' MD to 19;877' MD. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in the hole.

06/09/2015: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 19;877' MD to 21;158' MD. 100k overpulls observed at 19;996' MD - worked pipe free with no jarring required. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in the hole.

06/10/2015: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 21;158' MD to 22;970' MD. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in the hole.

06/11/2015: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 22;907' MD to TD at 23;129' MD. Pumped 200 bbls Hi-Vis sweep and CBU. Continued to circulate another 1.5x BU. Spot 16.0 ppg pill in rathole; TOH. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in the hole.

06/12/2015: Continue to POOH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly. Performed BOP function test on 6-5/8" 34# drill pipe from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow pod. Performed Diverter function test from the Toolpusher's panel and continued to POOH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in the hole.

06/13/2015: Rigged up to run 16" casing and ran in hole to 6;013' MD. Function tested BSRs/CSRs from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in the hole. Operations suspended due to high loop current and impending Tropical Storm Bill.
"},{"   ":143,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-06-14","TEXT_REMARK":"06/14/2015: Operations suspended due to high loop current and impending Tropical Storm Bill. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in hole.

06/15/2015: Operations suspended due to high loop current and impending Tropical Storm Bill. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in hole.

06/16/2015: Operations suspended because of the high current and the impending Tropical Storm Bill. Function tested BSR and CSR from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod. Begin running 16" casing from 6;013' MD to 11;985' MD. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in hole.

06/17/2015: RIH with 16" casing to 15;832'. Rig down casing handling equipment. Rig up drill pipe handling equipment. RIH with 16" casing on landing string from 15;832' MD to 22;988' MD. Land out 16" casing hanger @ 7;158' MD. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in hole. Circulate and condition prior to cementing.

06/18/2015: Cemented 16" casing. Pumped a total of 1330 bbls (7461 cu ft) cement (1022 bbls Lead cement - Class H; 13.0 ppg; 308 bbls Tail cement - Class H; 16.2 ppg). Set and test 16" seal assy to 5000 psi. Release 16" running tool.

06/19/2015: Function test the BOP stack from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Function test diverter from Driller's panel. Continued to POOH with 16" running tool. Make up 14.5" x 16.5" drilling assembly and selectable wear bushing and RIH with same. Set selectable wear sleeve. POOH with selectable wear bushing running tool. Commence pressure tested 16" casing against the BSRs to 250 low for 5 min and 3;800 psi high for 30 min. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in hole.

06/20/2015: Completed testing BSRs and casing - good test. RIH with 14.5" x 16.5" drilling assembly. Function tested CSR/BSR from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Pressure test BOP stack to 250 low/ 6500 psi high for the rams and 250 low/ 5500 psi high for the annulars on Driller's panel; Yellow Pod. Continue to RIH with 14.5" x 16.5" drilling assembly. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg in hole.
"},{"   ":144,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-06-21","TEXT_REMARK":"06/21/2015: Continued to RIH with 14.5" x 16.5" drilling assembly. Washed down and confirmed TOC @ 22;519' MD/ 22;208' TVD with 20k down; no rotation. Complete choke drill. Drill out shoe track and 10' of new formation. Complete LOT to 13.56 ppg EMW; with 12.2 ppg MW and 1550 psi. Begin drilling 14.5' x 16.5' hole section with 12.2 ppg from 23;129' MD/ 22;785' TVD to 23;205' MD / 22;857' TVD.

06/22/2015: Drill 14.5" x 16.5" hole section from 23;205' MD/ 22;857' TVD to 23;620' MD/ 23;249' TVD with 12.2 ppg mud. Increased mud weight from 12.2 ppg to 12.4 ppg mud. Drilled ahead from 23;620' MD/ 23;249' TVD to 24;037' MD/ 23;644' TVD with 12.4 ppg mud. Increased mud weight from 12.4 ppg to 12.7 ppg mud. Drilled ahead from 24;037' MD/ 23;644' TVD to 24;180' MD/ 23;779' TVD with 12.7 ppg mud. Begin weighting up from 12.7 ppg to 12.9 ppg mud.

06/23/2015: Drill 14.5" x 16.5" hole section from 24;180' MD/ 23;779' TVD to 24;817' MD/ 24;382' TVD while weighting up from 12.7 ppg to 12.9 ppg mud. Drill ahead from 24;817' MD/ 24;382' TVD to 25;150' MD/ 24;697' TVD with 12.9 ppg mud. Weight up from 12.9 ppg mud to 13.0 ppg mud. Drill ahead from 25;150' MD/ 24;697' TVD to 25;340' MD/ 24;877' TVD with 13.0 ppg mud. Drill ahead from 25;340' MD/ 24;877' TVD to 25;373' MD/ 24;908' TVD while weighting up from 13.0 ppg mud to 13.1 ppg mud.

Note: On 06/23/2015; Mr. Grant Bathgate (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to increase the surface MW to 13.2 ppg with a LOT of 13.5 ppg EMW.

06/24/2015: Drill 14.5" x 16.5" hole section from 25;373' MD/ 24;908' TVD to 25;407' MD/ 24;940' TVD while weighting up from 13.0 ppg mud to 13.1 ppg. Rack back stand and activate reamer; begin going back down and reaming at bit depth of 25;274'. Ream back to 25;407' MD/ 24;940' TVD with near bit reamer. Weight up from 13.1 ppg to 13.2 ppg mud. 

06/25/2015: POOH with 14.5" x 16.5" drilling BHA; rig up to run casing. Function test BOP on Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod; and Diverter on 6.625" DP from Toolpusher's panel on the trip out. Function tested BSR/CSR from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod. Note: At 08:40 hrs; Sperry unit lost power and was out of service. Unit was later back in service at 21:00 hrs. Current mud weight in hole 13.2 ppg.

06/26/2015: Monitor well while waiting on OES elevators. Began running 14' casing from 0' MD to 222' MD. Stop operations and monitor well while making repairs to Sperry mud logging unit when a faulty LEL sensor caused unit to be shut down. Continue to run casing from 222' MD to 1;143' MD. Current mud weight in hole 13.2 ppg.

06/27/2015: Ran 14" casing from 1;143' to 3;941'; R/D casing elevators. Rig up drill pipe elevators to handle hanger assembly. Pick up and make up 14" liner hanger. Ran in hole from 3;941' to 4;014'. Rig down 14" casing slips. Install drill pipe slips. RIH with 14" casing on 6.625" landing string from 4;014' MD to 18;769' MD/ 18;661' TVD. Current mud weight in hole 13.2 ppg.
"},{"   ":145,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-06-28","TEXT_REMARK":"06/28/2015: Continue 14" casing to 25;363' MD. Cement the 14" liner with 674 cu ft (120 bbls) of 16.2 ppg Class H cement. Displace cement with 1120 bbls of 13.2 ppg SBM. Observed 295 psi cement lift pressure at end of job. Losses encountered at cement job - wellbore ballooning after cement job; well shut in on annular. Set Versaflex liner hanger. 

06/29/2015: Bleed off trapped annular pressure. Sweep BOPs; release hanger; pull two stands; circulate one and a half drill pipe volumes; then trip out of hole. Current mud weight is 13.2 ppg SBM.

06/30/2015: Continued to POOH with Liner Hanger Running Tool. Pick up 12.25" x 13.5" drilling assembly and trip in hole to 6;181' and prepare to slip and cut drill line. Pressure tested casing and BSRs to 250 psi low for 5 minutes and 2;900 psi high for 30 minutes successfully. Current mud weight is 13.2 ppg SBM.

07/01/2015: Trip in hole to 17;692'; function testing BSR/CSR on the way in from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Pressure test BOPs. Rams tested to 250 psi low for 5 minutes and 7;900 psi high for 5 minutes; annular tested to 250 psi low for 5 minutes and 4;900 psi high for 5 minutes on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's panel; Blue POD. Successful test. Current mud weight is 13.2 ppg SBM. 

07/02/2015: Lay down BOP test assembly. Continue to trip in hole to 17;948' and completed BOP test; rams tested to 250 psi low for 5 minutes and 7;900 psi high for 5 minutes; annular tested to 250 psi low for 5 minutes and 4;900 psi high for 5 minutes on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's panel; Blue POD. Test completed successfully. Performed Diverter function test from Driller's panel. Pick up 6-5/8" 34# drill pipe and run in hole to 23;205'. Current mud weight is 13.2 ppg SBM. 

07/03/2015: Continue to run in hole to 24;444'. Perform choke drills with crews. Continue to trip in hole and confirm hard cement at 25;162'. Drill out cement shoe track; wash and ream rathole and drill 10 feet of new formation to 25;417' MD in preparation for FIT. Weight up to 13.4 ppg SBM while drilling out shoe track. Pull inside casing and space out for FIT. Current mud weight is 13.4 SBM.

07/04/2015: Perform FIT test to 1580 psi surface pressure (14.6 ppg EMW) with 13.4 ppg SBM; FIT successful. Begin drilling 12.25" x 13.5" hole section while weighting up 13.6 ppg SBM to 25;560'. Continue to drill ahead to 26;007' while weighting up to 13.8 ppg. Current mud weight is 13.8 ppg SBM.
"},{"   ":146,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-07-05","TEXT_REMARK":"07/05/2015: Drilled 12.25" x 13.5" hole section from 26;007' to 26;950'. Current mud weight is 14.0 ppg SBM.

07/06/2015: Drilled 12.25" hole section from 26;950' to 27;850'. Closed reamer at bit depth of 27;005' MD; placing 13.5" ledge at 26;850' MD. Take Stethoscope pressure measurements. Current mud weight is 14.0 ppg SBM.

07/07/2015: Drilled 12.25" hole section from 27;850 to 28;721' (TD) with the 13.5" reamer closed. Take Stethoscope pressure measurements. Current mud weight is 14.0 ppg SBM.

07/08/2015: Continue obtaining Stethoscope pressures. Circulate hole clean; Circulate 14.2 ppg SBM around to account for trip margin. TOH with 12.25" x 13.5" BHA from 28;721' to 21;665'. Current mud weight is 14.2 ppg SBM.

07/09/2015: TOH with 12.25" x 13.5" BHA to surface and lay down same. While TOH; perform BOP function test from Driller's panel; Blue Pod; and Diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel. Good tests. Rig up wireline logging string #1 (ZAIT/HLDS/QCNT/HNGS). Current mud weight is 14.2 ppg SBM.

07/10/2015: Performed wireline logging operations from 25;363' to 28;771' Wireline Depth. TOH to surface and lay down logging string #1 (ZAIT/HLDS/QCNT/HNGS). Make up wireline logging string #2 (XPT/CMR/NEXT); and performed wireline logging operations from 25;363' to 28;785' Wireline Depth. Current mud weight is 14.2 ppg SBM.

07/11/2015: Continued performing wireline logging operations from 26;950' to 27;451'. Experienced minor set down at 27;108'; P/U and re-logged section with no further issues. Current mud weight is 14.2 ppg SBM.
"},{"   ":147,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-07-12","TEXT_REMARK":"07/12/2015: POOH with wireline logging tools and rig down same. R/U and run 9-7/8" liner from surface to 3;719' MD. P/U Versa-Flex liner hanger and R/D OES casing equipment. Current mud weight 14.2 ppg.

07/13/2015: TIH with 9 7/8" liner on 6-5/8" landing string from 3;806' MD to 24;219' MD. Performed BSR/CSR function test from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod. Current mud weight 14.2 ppg.

07/14/2015: Continued to TIH with 9-7/8" liner on 6-5/8" landing string from 24;219' MD to 28;721' MD. Pick up 5 ft off bottom. Circulate and condition mud in preparation for cement job. Cement 9-7/8" liner with 1005 cu ft (179 bbls) of 16.2 ppg Class H cement. Displace cement with 1;011 bbls of 14.2 ppg SBM. Observed 590 psi cement lift pressure at end of job. Losses encountered at cement job - wellbore ballooning after cement job; well shut in on annular. Set Versa-Flex liner hanger. Current mud weight 14.2 ppg.

07/15/2015: Circulate 1.5 times landing string volume. Perform flow check well static. TOH with 9-7/8" liner hanger running tool from 24;684' MD to 9;694' MD. Breaking out every joint due to cement rings in 34# pipe. Current mud weight 14.2 ppg.

07/16/2015: TOH with 9-7/8" liner running tool from 9;694' MD to 600' MD; breaking out every joint to clean cement rings in pipe. Pressure tested 9-7/8" liner to 250 psi low for 5 min and 1;600 psi high pressure; good test. Pressure tested BSR to 250 psi low for 5 min and 1;600 psi high pressure for 5 min from the Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod; with 14.2 ppg SBM; good test. Performed BSR/CSR function test from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Perform Diverter function test from Driller's panel; good test. Current mud weight 14.2 ppg.

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Neslon (BSEE) to delay the BOP pressure test 24 hours.

07/17/2015: Continued to TOH with 9-7/8" liner hanger running tool from 600' MD to 85' MD. Lay down 9-7/8" liner running tool. Trip in hole with 9-7/8" EZSV from surface to 7;941' MD. Rig up and began pressure testing BOPs on 5-7/8" DP with 14.2 ppg SBM from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod; to 250/7;900 psi for rams. Current mud weight 14.2 ppg.

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Neslon (BSEE) to delay the BOP pressure test 6 hours.

07/18/2015: Continue pressure testing BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 14.2 ppg SBM from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod; to 250 psi low for 5 minutes and 7;900 psi high for 5 minutes. Annular tested to 250 psi low for 5 minutes and 4;630 psi high for 5 minutes. TIH with EZSV from 7;941' MD to 18;216' MD. Test BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 14.2 ppg SBM from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod; to 250 psi low for 5 minutes and 7;900 psi high for 5 minutes. Current mud weight 14.2 ppg.
"},{"   ":148,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-07-19","TEXT_REMARK":"07/19/2015: Pressure test BOP and associated valves on 6-5/8" DP with 14.2 ppg SBM  to 250 psi low for 5 min and 7;900 psi high for 5 min from Driller's panel with Yellow Pod; good test. Performed diverter function test; close diverter from Toolpusher's panel; 33 seconds closing time; verify starboard overboard valve open; flow line valve closed; and port overboard valve closed. Opened diverter; verify all overboard valves closed; flow line valve is open. TIH with 9-7/8" EZSV from 18;216' MD to 27;776' MD. Set EZSV at 28;000' MD top; 28;002' MD bottom. Pressure test below packer to 1;600 psi; good test. Test on top of packer to 1600 psi for 15 minutes; good test. Pulled out of packer and circulated bottoms up. Began inflow testing to 2;345 psi + 500 psi safety factor. Current mud weight in hole 14.2 ppg.

07/20/2015: Continued bleeding back base oil to Halliburton cement unit in 7 bbl increments from 2;140 psi to 100 psi. Held for 15 minutes at 100 psi; then bled off pressure and confirmed well static for 30 minutes. Good negative test. Pumped back down drill string to restore pressure and then opened rams. Reversed test fluid out of the drill string. Spotted 300' balanced plug from 28;000' MD to 27;700' MD with 123.5 cu ft (22 bbls) of 16.2 ppg Class H cement. Tripped out of the hole from 27;426' MD to 4;526' MD on 6-5/8" drill pipe. 

07/21/2015: Pulled out of the hole with EZSV running tool from 4;526' MD to surface. Change out hydratong cassettes. Trip in hole with jet sub assembly to 7703' MD. Wash wellhead at 410 GPM. Land out in wellhead with wear sleeve running tool and retrieve wear sleeve. POOH with wear sleeve to 5;277'

07/22/2015: Pulled out of hole from 5;277' MD to surface and retrieved wear sleeve. Rigged up and began to run casing from surface to 5;967' MD.

07/23/2015: Function test BSR/CSR from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod. Continue to run 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" casing from 5;967' MD to 13;390' MD. Rig down casing fill up tool and rig up casing elevator compensator tool. 

07/24/2015: Pulled out of the hole with 10-3/4" casing from 13;390' MD to 9;693' MD. Verified casing changes and tally; began to trip back in the hole with 10-3/4" casing from 9;693' MD to 12;331' MD.

07/25/2015: Made up and tripped in hole with 10-3/4" casing from 12;331' MD to 18;101' MD. Verified casing joints on deck and continue to run casing on 6-5/8" landing string.
"},{"   ":149,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-07-26","TEXT_REMARK":"07/26/2015: Continued tripping in hole with 10.75" x 9.875" tieback on landing string from 21;857' MD to 24;880' MD. Functioned diverter from Driller's panel. Took pick up and slack off weights prior to landing out tieback. Landed the dummy casing hanger in wellhead at 24;984' MD. Picked up and sheared out of dummy hanger and spaced out so that mule shoe was above the top of the liner. Broke circulation and circulated landing string plus casing volume while rigging up to cement. Performed cement job with 1483 bbls of lead cement follow with 127 bbls of tail cement.

Note: On 07/26/2015; Mr. Grant Bathgate (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) for a 24 hr delay of BOP function testing of components that are restricted by casing and cementing operations or as soon as possible.

07/27/2015: Finished displacing cement; slacked off and engaged seal assembly in PBR while landing casing hanger. Pressure tested seal assembly to 9;600 psi (good test). Sheared out of hanger and picked up to circulate string volume. Performed a partial BOP function test from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod due to tool joint being across lower rams. Pulled out of hole to surface with 10-3/4" hanger running tool. Made up lead impression tool and jet sub assembly and tripped in to 7;716'.

Note: On 07/27/2015; Mr. Grant Bathgate (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) for a 24 hr delay of BOP function testing of components that are restricted by casing and cementing operations or as soon as possible

07/28/2015: Continue tripping in with lead impression tool from 7;716' MD to 9;804' MD. Space out and performed BOP function test from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Continued tripping in to 11;808' MD. Landed lead impression tool in wellhead with 40k down. Pulled out of the hole with lead impression block. Tripped back in the hole with lock down sleeve to 11;898' MD (tail pipe depth). Set lock down sleeve and pressure test to 9;600 psi. Pulled out of hole to 5;473' MD.

Note: On 07/28/2015; Mr. Doug Nally (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson to TIH and set the EZSV.

07/29/2015: Continue pulling out of hole with lock down sleave running tool and lay down same. Slip and cut drill line. Perform casing test to 7;550 psi for 30 min (good test). Make up and TIH with 9-7/8" EZSV and set top of EZSV at 17;011' MD

Note: On 07/29/2015 @ 7:20 PM; Mr. Doug Nally (Chevron) received verbal approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to proceed through step 7 of the proposed abandonment procedure. 

07/30/2015: Set and tested EZSV plug at 17;011' MD (good test). Performed negative test to 2;451 psi differential (good test). Mixed and pumped 22 bbls of 16.4 ppg cement and placed balanced plug on top of EZSV. Tripped out of hole to 7;880' MD and began to displace well to seawater.

07/31/2015: Continued displacing 14.2 ppg SBM to 8.6 ppg seawater. Mixed and pumped 25 bbls of 16.4 ppg cement and spotted 300' balanced plug at 7;880' MD. Pulled up two stands; drop two 8" nerf balls and circulate 1.5 drill string volumes. Spotted treated drill water across wellhead and pulled out of the hole with the EZSV running tool from 7;880' MD to surface. Rigged down pipe handling equipment and rigged up riser handling equipment.

08/01/2015: Stroked in slip joint and unlatched BOP. Picked up and locked in hands free goose neck. Moved vessel to safe handling zone and laid out TJ and began pulling BOP on riser from 6;887' to 3;073'. 
"},{"   ":150,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-08-02","TEXT_REMARK":"08/02/2015: Pull BOPs to surface and perform between well maintenance.

08/03/2015: Perform between well maintenance. Install temporary abandonment cap on PN002 wellhead. Inject preservation fluid below the TA cap.
"},{"   ":151,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-04-18","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.



04/18/2016: Ran BOP on drilling riser with Installation and Workover Control System (IWOCS) attached; from surface to 4;922' MD.

Note: On 04/18/2016 at 14:23 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) notified Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) that Chevron may proceed with steps 1-5 of the proposed PN002 completion operation. 

04/19/2016: Ran BOP stack on drilling riser with IWOCS attached; from 4;922' to 6;879' MD. Positioned drillship over well center. Landed and latched BOP to Subsea Production Tree (XT). 

04/20/2016: Performed Diverter function test from Driller's Panel and Toolpusher's Panel - good test. TIH with Boll Weevil Test Tool (BWTT) and Dual Cam on 5-7/8" drill pipe in 8.6 ppg seawater from surface to 7;005' MD. Performed the subsea accumulator drawdown test - good test. Began BOP pressure testing with 8.6 ppg seawater on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; utilizing IPT SureTec software. 

Offline: 
Performed Autoshear/Deadman system test; pressure tested UBSRs to 250/1;000 psi surface pressure with 8.6 ppg seawater for 5 min - good test.
Performed ROV Intervention test; used ROV to function the LBSRs closed. Pressure tested LBSRs to 250/1;000 psi surface pressure with 8.6 ppg seawater for 5 min; good test.

04/21/2016: Completed BOP pressure testing with 8.6 ppg seawater from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and function testing from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; on 5-7/8" drill pipe utilizing IPT SureTec software. Pressure tested the annular to 250/6;500 psi surface pressure - good test. Pressure tested variable bore rams (VBRs) to 250/11;500 psi surface pressure - good tests. Pressure tested surface well control equipment (choke manifold; lines; FOSV; IBOP) to 250/11;500 psi surface pressure - good tests. TIH from 7;005' to 7;169' MD; landed BWTT in XT and released from the Dual Cam. Pressure tested UBSRs; LBSRs; and wellhead connector from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; to 250/11;500 psi surface pressure - good test. Function tested UBSRs and LBSRs from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. Re-engaged Dual Cam and TOH with BWTT and Dual Cam on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 7;169' MD to surface. TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from surface to 7;556' MD. Displaced well from 8.6 ppg seawater to 14.0 ppg SBM. 

04/22/2016: Drilled cement with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 7;556' to 7;847' MD. Washed and reamed from 7;847' to 8;697' MD. TIH from 8;697' to 13;411' MD.

Note: On 04/22/2016 at 08:54 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) notified Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) that Chevron may flush the lower choke outlet every twelve hours with the added condition that the well must be in a stable state.

04/23/2016: TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 13;411' to 15;305' MD. Washed and reamed from 15;305' to 16;557' MD. Drilled cement from 16;557' to 17;014' MD. Drilled bridge plug from 17;014' to 17;019' MD.
"},{"   ":152,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-04-24","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.



04/24/2016: Circulated Hi-Vis sweep to surface. TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 17;136' to 22;271'. Washed and reamed down to 24;180'. Drilled partial EZSV and cement from 24;180' to 24;186'.

04/25/2016: Continued to drill cement from 24;186' to 24;794'. Drilled out orifice collar from 24;794' to 24;796'. Drill out cement from 24;796' to 24;941'.

04/26/2016: Continued to drill out cement from 24;941' to 24;994'. TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly to 25;367'. Washed and reamed down to EZSV at 28;003'. Drilled EZSV from 28;003' to 28;004'.

04/27/2016: Continued to drill EZSV from 28;004' to 28;006'. Washed and reamed down to upper float collar at 28;539'. Drilled out upper float collar from 28;539' to 28;548'. Drilled out cement from 28;548' to 28;670'. Pumped a Hi-Vis sweep and circulated to surface. TOH to tieback gap and washed from 25;100' to 24;960'. TOH from 24;960' to 22;405'.

04/28/2016: Continued to TOH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 22;405' to 19;973'. Function tested BOPs from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good test. Function tested diverter from Toolpusher's Panel - good test. Continued to TOH from 19;973' to surface. R/U to run wireline. RIH with Gamma Ray/ Junk basket with 8.293" gauge ring on wireline and tagged bottom at 28;669' WLM (28;693' IES). POOH with wireline assembly from 28;669' WLM to 17;000' WLM.

04/29/2016: Continued to POOH with wireline assembly from 17;000' WLM to surface. RIH with Isolation Scanner/ Sonic Scanner/ CBL/ GR on wireline to 28;688' IES. Logged up from 28;688' IES to 24;800' IES (TOC behind 9-7/8" liner at 26;430'; Top of Wilcox 27;180'). POOH with wireline assembly. RIH with plugged packer/ ReSOLVE tool/ GR/ CCL on wireline and tagged bottom at 28;693' IES. Picked up and set packer at 28;684' IES (top of packer). POOH with wireline assembly to 300'.

04/30/2016: POOH with wireline assembly from 300' to surface. Slipped and cut drill line. RIH with displacement assembly from surface to 26;646'.

Offline: Pressure tested 10-3/4" x 9-7/8" tieback casing against plugged packer to 7;500 psi for 30 min - good test.
"},{"   ":153,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-01","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.



05/01/2016: Tripped in hole with displacement assembly to 28;399'. Installed new swivel packing and tested to 250/7;500 psi (good test). Tripped in hole with displacement assembly and tagged permanent plugged packer at 28;648'. Pumped 122 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil down the drill pipe to inflow test permanent high differential bridge plug. Differential pressure of 2;100 psi achieved. Bled off drill pipe pressure in 500 psi increments to 0 psi to mini-strip tank. Total 12 bbls bled back. Monitored no-flow and 0 psi for 30 min (good test). Pressured up drill pipe to 2;100 psi with 10 bbls. U-tubed 108 bbls of base oil back. Began to displace well to 14.0 ppg CaBr2.

05/02/2016: Finished displacing well from 14.0 ppg SBM to 14.0 ppg CaBr2. Started flushing and lancing lines clean. 

05/03/2016: POOH with displacement assembly from 28;620' to 28;400'. Flushed and lanced lines clean.

Offline: Pressure tested BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod using 14.0 ppg CaBr2. Tested annular and associated valves to 250/4;800 psi (good test). Tested kelly hose to 250/7;000 psi (good test). Tested VBRs and associated valves to 250/8;000 psi (good test). Tested MDDM and associated valves to 250/10;000 psi (good test). Pressure tested surface well control equipment (choke manifold; lines; FOSV; IBOP) to 250/10;000 psi surface pressure - good tests. Function tested BOP and Diverter from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod (good tests). 

05/04/2016: Tripped out of hole with displacement assembly from 28;400' to 25;267' to inspect upper riser brush. Flushed and lanced lines clean.

05/05/2016: Tripped in hole with cleanout assembly from 25;267' to 28;574'. Washed down and tagged permanent high differential bridge plug at 28;648'. Reverse circulated 2;128 bbls up drill pipe at 13 bpm and 3;100 psi. Dropped 2.75" jet sub activation ball and activated same. Jetted BOP stack with 15 bpm and 1;030 psi. Deactivated jet tool and circulated CaBr2 to spec.

05/06/2016: Circulated surface to surface volume and filtered 14.0 ppg CaBr2 to spec at 17 bpm with 4;300 psi. Pulled out of hole with cleanout assembly from 28;533' to surface. Ran in hole with sump packer on E-line from surface to 20;000'.

05/07/2016: Continue running in hole and set sump packer on e-line at 28;462'. POOH. Tripped in hole with 6.625" TCP (tubing conveyed perforation) assembly from to 1;253' (Total: 28 loaded guns; 31 blank guns). Continued to make up firing head and SLB TCP assembly to 2;049'. Tripped in hole with SLB TCP Gun assembly to 13;727' on 5-7/8" DP.

Offline: Tested 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" casing against UBSRs to 7;500 psi for 30 mins with 14.0 ppg CaBr2 (good test). Tested UBSRs and LBSRs to 250/7;500 psi for 5 mins each with 14.0 ppg CaBr2 (good test). 
"},{"   ":154,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-08","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.



05/08/2016: TIH with 6-5/8" TCP gun assembly and tagged sump packer at 28;434'. Placed TCP guns on depth at 28;419'. R/U circulating iron and tested to 3;000 psi. Set packer. Successfully perforated Wilcox sand overbalanced. POOH with TCP gun assembly to 23;574'.

05/09/2016: POOH with 6-5/8" TCP gun assembly from 23;574' to surface.

05/10/2016: TIH with deburr assembly to 27;390'. Function tested BOPs from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod (good test); and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod (good test). Function tested diverter from Toolpusher's Panel (good test). Washed down and tagged sump packer at 28;434' (bottom of mule shoe at 28;595').

05/11/2016: POOH above perfs to remove burrs from perforated production liner. POOH to 25;771' to space out across BOP. Performed BOP pressure test on 6-5/8" Frac Tech pipe from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; using 14.0 ppg CaBr2. Tested annular and associated valves to 250/4;500 psi for 5 mins (good test). Tested Kelly hose to 250/6;500 psi for 5 mins (good test). Tested VBRs and associated valves to 250/8;000 psi for 5 mins (good test). Tested MDDM and associated valves to 250/10;000 psi for 5 mins (good test). POOH to 25;502' to space out 5-7/8" drill pipe across BOP. Performed BOP pressure test on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; using 14.0 ppg CaBr2. Tested annular and associated valves to 250/4;500 psi for 5 mins (good test). Tested VBRs and associated valves to 250/8;000 psi for 5 mins (good test). Function tested diverter from Driller's Panel. Function tested BOPs from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod (good test). POOH to 17;419'.

05/12/2016: Continued to POOH with deburr assembly from 17;419' to surface. TIH with 4" wash pipe. TOH and laid down 5 joints of 4" wash pipe.

05/13/2016: M/U and RIH with gravel pack assembly for zones 1 & 2 and tested each zone to 250 psi for 5 mins (good test). M/U and RIH with gravel pack assembly for zone 3 to 2;499'. 

05/14/2016: Continued to RIH with zone 3 gravel pack assembly to 2;700'. Tested zones 1;2;3 to 250 psi for 5 mins (good test). Function tested BSRs from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod (good test). M/U and RIH with zone 4 gravel pack assembly to 3;003'. Tested zones 1;2;3;4 to 250 psi for 5 mins (good test). TIH with ESTMZ assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe to 15;467'.
"},{"   ":155,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-15","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.



05/15/2016: Continue to RIH from 15;467' with single trip multi zone gravel pack assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe and landed out on sump packer at 28;434'. Set gravel pack packer at 27;076' with 2;500 psi in 500 psi increments; confirmed packer set. Tested packer to 1;500 psi - good test. Set isolation packers between the perforated intervals with 4;500 psi in 500 psi increments. Rigged up frac head and iron and tested lines. 

05/16/2016: Spotted 70 bbl pickle down drill pipe. Reversed pickle out of drill pipe and circulated 14.0 ppg CaBr2 until 14.0 ppg in/out. Tested lines and performed acid job. Performed mini frac stimulation. Shut down and redesign main fracpack stimulation. Perform main fracpack stimulation treatment on Zone 1. Reverse circulated per schedule.

05/17/2016: POOH from 28;434' to 28;282' and spaced out for zone 2 fracpack stimulation. Pressure tested lines. Opened sleeves. Flushed and tested lines from frac boat. Performed acid job. Performed mini frac stimulation. Shut down and redesign main fracpack stimulation. Perform main fracpack stimulation treatment on zone 2. Reverse circulated per schedule. 

05/18/2016: POOH from 28;282' to 27;744' and spaced out for zone 3 fracpack stimulation. Pressure tested lines. Opened sleeves. Flushed and tested lines from frac boat. Performed acid job. Performed mini frac stimulation. Shut down and redesign main fracpack stimulation. Performed main fracpack stimulation treatment for zone 3. Reverse circulated per schedule. POOH from 27;744' to 27;426' and spaced out for Zone 4 fracpack stimulation.

05/19/2016: Pressure tested service tool on back side - good test. Attempted to pressure test service tool down drill pipe without success. POOH from 27;426' to 700' with gravel pack service tool assembly.

05/20/2016: POOH with service tool from 700' to surface. RIH with new service tool assembly from surface to 27;414'. Pressure tested service tool seals - good test. Rigged up frac head and iron. 

05/21/2016: Spaced out service tool for zone 4 fracpack stimulation. Flushed and tested frac lines from frac boat. Performed acid job on zone 4.

"},{"   ":156,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-22","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.



05/22/2016: Performed main fracpack stimulation treatment for zone 4. Reversed circulated per schedule. POOH with service tool from 27;424' to surface.

05/23/2016: P/U and TIH with isolation assemblies on 5-7/8" drill pipe from surface to 27;076'. Function tested UBSR and LBSR from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod - good tests.

Note: On 05/23/2016 at 15:05 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) notified Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) via email that Chevron may delay BOP pressure testing for 36 hours to allow running of isolation string and permanent packer.

05/24/2016: Continue to TIH with isolation assemblies from 27;076' to 28;519'; opening MJPS and FCS sleeves in zones 1-4. Stung seals into gravel pack packer and pressure tested seals against FS-1 valve to 1;000 psi for 5 min - good test. Dropped diverter ball and pressured up to 2;500 psi to release from isolation assembly. POOH with setting tool from 26;970' to surface. Pressure tested UBSR and LBSR against FS-1 valve to 250/1;000 psi for 5 min each from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; with 14.0 ppg CaBr2 - good tests. TIH with production packer assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from surface to 3;568'.

05/25/2016: Continue to TIH with production packer assembly from 3;568' to 26;748'. Function tested the BOPs from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and function tested diverter from Driller's Panel - good tests. Continue to TIH with production packer assembly from 26;748' to 26;988'. Set production packer and tested same to 4;000 psi for 30 minutes - good test. Released from running tool and POOH from 26;988' to 23;380'.

05/26/2016: Continue to POOH with setting tool from 23;380' to 10;014'. Pressure tested BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; using 14.0 ppg CaBr2. Tested annular and associated valves to 250/4;500 psi for 5 min each - good tests. Tested VBRs and associated valves to 250/8;000 psi for 5 min each - good tests. Tested MDDM and associated valves to 250/10;000 psi for 5 min each - good tests. Tested kelly hose to 250/7;000 psi for 5 min - good tests. Function tested BOPs from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod - good tests. POOH with setting tool assembly from 10;014' to surface.

05/27/2016: TIH with bore protector retrieval assembly from surface to 7;151'. Jetted BOP and SSPT from 6;834' to 6;890'. Landed BPRRT on bore protector at 6;881'. Closed annular and pressure tested BPRRT to 2;000 psi for 5 min - good test. Tested 9-5/8" fixed rams against BPRRT to 250/8;000 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Pulled bore protector. Jetted tubing hanger profile from 6;878' to 6;887'. POOH with BPRRT assembly from 6;878' to surface. 

05/28/2016: R/U tubing handling equipment. TIH with lower and upper seal assemblies; landing nipple assembly; and DHPT/CIM assembly. Hung control line sheaves in derrick. Function tested LBSR and UBSR from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod - good tests. TIH with 4-1/2" tubing from surface to 567'.
"},{"   ":157,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-29","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.



05/29/2016: Tripped in hole from 567' to 15;196' with 4-1/2" tubing stands. Installed cross coupling clamps on each connection.

05/30/2016: Tripped in hole from 15;196' to 17;183' with 4-1/2" tubing stands. Terminated control lines to SCSSV; function tested both ports 3 times; pressure tested port "A" and "B" to 13;000 psi for 15 mins each on chart (good tests). Terminated LDHI-CIM and pressure tested to 10;000 psi (good test). Tripped in hole from 17;183' to 18;350' with 4-1/2" tubing and 4-1/2" x 6" crossover assembly. Tripped in hole from 18;350' to 19;852' with 6" tubing. M/U tubing hanger assembly.

05/31/2016: Terminated and externally tested SCSSV control lines (good test). Tested CIMs and TEC gauge line fitting (good test). Conducted Tronic test on DHPTGs. Function tested SCSSV on both ports 3 times each (good test). Internally pressure tested both ports on SCSSV to 10;000 psi/ 10 min (good tests). Recorded downhole gauge pressures and temperatures. Re-installed the helix and secured all control lines. Latched land and lock to tubing hanger from 19;852' to 20;001'. Tripped in hole with 4-1/2" x 6" production tubing and associated jewelry on 7-5/8" landing string from 20;001' to 20;174'.

06/01/2016: Tripped in hole with 4-1/2" x 6" production tubing and associated jewelry on 7-5/8" landing string from 20;174' to 26;640'. Made up land out stand. Soft landed hanger with 58' of seals in PBR and confirmed. Picked up to 26;646' (20' above PBR). Pumped 1;106 bbls of 14.0 ppg inhibited packer fluid down the tubing string. Rigged up Compensated Coiled Tubing Lift Frame (CCTLF).

06/02/2016: Continued rigging up Compensated Coiled Tubing Lift Frame (CCTLF) and surface flow tree assembly. Landed tubing hanger. Pressure tested tubing hanger to 8;000 psi (good test). Stroked out CCTLF; adjusted pressures and position. Engaged and tested electrical penetrators (good tests). Performed casing x tubing pressure test to 5;000 psi for 30 minutes (good test).

06/03/2016: Pressure tested the surface flow tree and landing string (good tests). Pressure tested tubing to 4;500 psi (good test). Performed negative test on the SCSSV with 4;300 psi differential pressure (good test). Rigged up Halliburton slickline and made up toolstring. Tested lubricator to 10;000 psi for 5 min (good test). Retrieved tubing hanger isolation sleeve. Displaced landing string and kill line to base oil. Bled off landing string. Ran in hole with slickline and set lower crown plug. Pulled out of hole with slickline.

06/04/2016: Lined up and pressure tested lower crown plug to 10;100 psi surface pressure from above (good test). Pressure tested lower crown from below to 8;300 psi surface pressure (good test). Displaced C/B/riser to seawater. Cycled FS-1 valve open. Bullheaded 50 bbls of base oil past SCSSV. Ran in hole with upper crown plug on slickline and set upper crown plug. Tested upper crown plug from above and below to 10;600 psi surface pressure (good tests).
"},{"   ":158,"WELL_NAME":"PN002","API12":608124005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-06-05","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.



06/05/2016: Bled tubing x casing annulus and kill line to seawater hydrostatic. Negative tested SCSSV (surface control subsea safety valve) to seawater hydrostatic for 60 minutes; good test. Displaced base oil out of kill line. U-tubed base oil up landing string then reversed out 512 bbls. Rig down chiksan and control lines to Expro SFT (surface flow tree). Broke out and tranferred SFT to aft. Rigged down CCTLF (compensated coil tubing lift frame).

06/06/2016: Laid down CCTLF. POOH with 7-5/8" landing string from 6;793' to surface. Rig down Frank's tubing running equipment.

Note: On 06/06/2016 at 08:55 hrs; Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) received approval via email from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to extend Casing/BSR pressure test 36 hours due to St. Malo (SM) PN002's completed state and imminent BOP unlatch.

06/07/2016: Rigged down knuckle links from MDDM. Rigged up 1000 ton links and hydraulic running tool on Fwd Rotary. Pulled outer and master bushings; installed and rigged up riser gimbal. Rigged up RTA for riser handling. Pulled and laid down diverter. Made up landing joint and stroked in slip joint. Performed ROV intervention all stabs retract/ riser connector unlock and wellhead connector unlock per APM and unlatched from wellhead at 13:50 hrs. 14.0 ppg CaBr2 in wellbore. Positioned rig ~55 ft from wellhead at 250 deg. Juan "C" ROV attempted to clean wellhead but experienced pump problems. DCL ROV followed down tertiary cap and installed. DCL ROV returned to surface and redressed to clean wellhead and remove ring gasket while Juan "C" ROV making repairs. DCL ROV dove back to XT and removed cap; Juan "C" ROV cleaned top of XT down to crown plug and removed ring gasket. DCL ROV installed cap and released subsea winch line. Passed winch line to Juan "C" ROV and they brought it to 1;000' from surface while DCL ROV locked down cap.

06/08/2016: Positioned rig into SM PN002 DOZ. Removed IWOC's (intervention workover control system) and mux cable jewelry. Laid out landing jt. Removed drape hoses. Laid out slip jt. Removed clamps from old slip jt. Backloaded old slip jt to M/V and offloaded new slip jt from M/V. Began transit to SM PN007 DOZ at 12:00 hrs."},{"   ":159,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2011-11-22","TEXT_REMARK":"11/22/2011: Rig up forward rotary and run 36" casing and inner BHA offline. TIH; test downhole tool for baseline pressure and jetting 36" structural casing.

11/23/2011: Jet in 36" casing and soak same. Release CADA tool and POOH from 7;203'. ROV recover compatts and equipment from seafloor. Recover subsea basket and ROV surface. Begin transit to St. Malo PS003. 

Clear Bottom Survey performed by ROV on entire drill center before departing to St. Malo PS003.

"},{"   ":160,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-12-31","TEXT_REMARK":"12/31/2014: Complete between well maintenance. P/U 26" drilling assembly and move rig to DOZ fairway. Hold pre-spud meeting with crews.

01/01/2015: TIH with 26" drilling assembly from surface to 6;718'. Position ship over PN003 and stab 26" drilling assembly into LPWH. Wash down to 36" shoe at 7;193'. Drill 26" hole section from 7;193' to 7;746'.

01/02/2015: Continued to drill 26" hole section from 7;746' to 8;125'. Pump out of hole from 8;125' to 7;106' and repair IBOP air swivel on TDX. TIH and drill from 8;125' to 8;942'. 

01/03/2015: Drill 26" hole from 8;942' to 10;290'. ROV monitor 36" LPWH during drilling operations. Note: 03:30 hrs at 9;200'; start drilling with 10.1 PAD mud. Top of salt at 9;469'.
"},{"   ":161,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-01-04","TEXT_REMARK":"01/04/2014: Continued drilling 26" hole section to 10;495' TD. Spotted 16.0 ppg WBM in rat hole. Circulated 2x hole volume with 12.5 ppg low fluid loss PAD mud. Spaced out PBL across low pressure wellhead and displace drill string to seawater. Activate PBL and wash wellhead. Deactivated PBL and pull 26" bit above wellhead. Moved vessel to safe zone and continue to trip with 26" drilling assembly.

01/05/2015: Finished tripping with 26" drilling assembly. Rigged up and ran 22" casing from surface to 3;343'.

01/06/2015: Finished picking up and running 23" casing. Picked up high pressure housing and ran 5-7/8" inner string. Ran 22" casing on 6-5/8" landing string to 200' above mudline and moved vessel to PN003 well center. Ran 22" casing on 6-5/8" landing string to 6;850'.

01/07/2015: Ran 22" casing to setting depth. Circulated and conditioned prior to cementing operations. Landed and locked high pressure housing in low pressure housing. Performed 22" cementing operations. Pumped 10;623 cu ft of 13.8 ppg Class H Cement Lead until returns confirmed at mudline via PH meter/visual. Pumped 1;274 cu ft of 16.4 ppg Class H Cement Tail. Released running tool from high pressure housing and pull 2 stands. Circulated landing string and inner string clean. Pulled landing string.

01/08/2015: Pulled inner string 200' above PN003 wellhead and ROV installed trash cap on wellhead. Moved vessel from PN003 well center to safe zone. Pulled landing and inner string to surface. Began rig up for riser run on main rotary. Waited on weather conditions to improve to allow crane operation. Once weather subsided; continued to rig up for riser run.

01/09/2015: Finished riser running rig up. Skid BOP to main rotary well center. Made up pup joint to BOP. Calibrated deadman load cell on main top drive. Waited for weather and sea state to lay down to take on remaining riser from work boat. Once riser offloaded; splashed BOP stack and rigged up to test. Tested choke/kill and boost lines.

01/10/2015: Ran riser and BOP to 3;343'. Pressure tested boost and rigid conduit lines. Attempted to test choke and kill lines. Pressure kept bleeding off from cement unit and Subsea test pump. Began troubleshooting steps to identify cause of leak. ROV inspected riser to 50% of depth at midnight."},{"   ":162,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-01-11","TEXT_REMARK":"01/11/2015: Finished troubleshooting pressure testing issues with BOP #2 during riser run. Identified kill side on stack as leak. Pulled BOP from 3;342' to 1;003'.

01/12/2015: Finished pulling BOP #2 to surface and began troubleshooting to identify source of leak on kill line. Found damaged O-ring on kill stab. Repaired and pressure tested inner choke/kill valves. Successful test.

01/13/2015: Finished surface testing BOP #2 - good test. Skidded BOP to well center and made up double. Tested choke/kill; boost and conduit lines; good test. Ran riser and BOP to 913'.

01/14/2015: Continued to run BOP #2 and riser from 913' (Joint #9) to 5;413' (Joint #59) .

01/15/2015: Ran riser and BOP to 6;743'. Picked up Telescopic Joint and moved vessel to PN003 wellhead. While running Telescopic Joint; power was lost to MODU ESD control panel. Pulled Telescopic Joint above rotary table and moved vessel back to Safe Handling Zone. Identified source of power loss.

01/16/2015: Made repairs to MODU ESD system. Moved over PN003 well center and landed BOP. Performed IAT testing as per procedure. Picked up and landed out diverter housing. Attempted to pressure test diverter and noticed pressure bleeding off. Repaired manifold block on diverter. Attempted to pressure test diverter to 500 psi
and continued to show signs of pressure bleeding off.

01/17/2015: Identified source of leak for diverter pressure test as mud fill valve. Repaired mud fill valve and pressure tested diverter to 500 psi - good test. Performed flow and function test on diverter - good test. Rigged down riser running equipment.
"},{"   ":163,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-01-18","TEXT_REMARK":"01/18/2015: Finished rigging down riser handling equipment. Picked up and TIH with BOP test assembly. Landed BOPTT and identified HPH depth of 6;872' in respect to Pacific Sharav RKB. Began pressure testing BOP using seawater from Driller's panel;  Blue Pod. Rams tested to 250/11;600 psi; Annulars tested to 250/6500 psi. Good tests. 

01/19/2015: Finished BOP pressure testing on 6-5/8" drill pipe with seawater from Driller's panel; Blue Pod; using IPT. Troubleshoot failed blind shear pressure test. Pulled Dual Cam tool off seat and reset. Finished pressure testing against BSR from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; to 250/11;600 psi (good test). Re-engaged Dual Cam tool and pulled out of hole to 500'.  

01/20/2015: POOH with BOP test tool. RIH with 18-1/8 x 21" drilling BHA. Tag TOC at 10;296' with 10k down. Displace well to 11.2 PPG SBM. 

01/21/2015: Complete displacement to 11.2 SBM. Held choke drill with crew. Drilled cement and 10' of new formation. Circulated bottoms up. Performed FIT at shoe depth of 10;446' MD to 13.0 ppg EMW (980 psi). Begin drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section to 10;598' MD. 

01/22/2015: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section to 11;992'. Weighted up from 11.2 ppg to 11.4 ppg. Began POOH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assy due to adverse weather conditions.  

01/23/2015: POOH 1 std above BSR. Displace choke and kill lines to seawater. Close BSR. Displace riser and drill pipe to seawater. POOH to wear sleeve and redress same. TIH to 7;761 and displace drill pipe and riser to 11.4 ppg SBM.  

01/24/2015: Displaced from seawater to 11.4 SBM. Check wellbore for pressure; and opened BSR. Function test BSR and CSR. Function tested BOP and diverter. RIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assy to 11;992; and wash last stand down. Continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section to 12;633' MD. 
"},{"   ":164,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-01-25","TEXT_REMARK":"01/25/2015: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 12;633' MD to 14;427' MD. Weighted up to 12.0 ppg.

01/26/2015: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 14;427' MD to 15;847' MD. Weighted up to 12.5 ppg.

01/27/2015: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 15;847' MD to 17;555' MD with 12.5 ppg.

01/28/2015: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 17;555' MD to 19;041' MD. Circulated 200 bbls of 14.5 ppg high viscous sweep and begin circulating bottoms up in preparation to POOH.

01/29/2015: Continue circulating bottoms up. Pull out of hole to surface. 

01/30/2015: Function test BSRs/CSRs from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Make up second 18-1/8" x 21" BHA and run in hole to 10;205'. Test BOPs on Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod; to 250/6;500 psi for rams and 250/4;900 psi for annulars.

01/31/2015: Completed BOP testing. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA to 19;041'. Drill from 19;041' to 19;112' while troubleshooting powerdrive jamming issue. Rig experienced a partial loss of power when bringing thruster #4 back on line after preventative maintenance was completed. Station Keeping not affected during power management issue. Troubleshoot power management issues. Continue drilling from 19;112' to 19;217' while troubleshooting powerdrive jamming issues. 
"},{"   ":165,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-02-01","TEXT_REMARK":"02/01/2015: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;217' to 19;223' while troubleshooting Powerdrive jamming issues. Circulate bottoms up and POOH to surface. Change out Powerdrive assembly and RIH to 178'.

02/02/2015: Function test BSRs/CSRs from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly to 19;223'. Drill from 19;223' MD to 19;254' MD while troubleshooting Powerdrive jamming issue. POOH from 19;254' to 16;347'.

02/03/2015: POOH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly from 16;347' to surface. Make up new Powerdrive assembly and TIH to 2;151'.

02/04/2015: Function test BSRs/CSRs from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod. TIH from 2;151' to 19;254'. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole to 19;765' MD. 

02/05/2015: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;765' to 19;926' MD. Cut mud weight back from 12.5 ppg to 11.8 ppg in preparation for exiting salt. Continued drilling from 19;926' to 20;055'. While back reaming to make a connection at 20;055'; pipe became stuck. Was able to break free by jarring. Jars were fired a total of 4 times.

02/06/2015: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 20;055' to 20;141'. While attempting to back ream. the hole pipe became stuck. Was able to regain movement by jarring. Jars were fired a total of 10 times. Continued drilling from 20;141' to 20;369'. Base of salt was located at 20;167' MD. 

02/07/2015: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 20;369' to 20;411'. ROP was less than 1 ft/hr. POOH with drilling assembly from 20;411' to 17;244'. Function test diverter from Toolpusher's panel - good test.
"},{"   ":166,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-02-08","TEXT_REMARK":"02/08/2015: POOH from 17;244' to surface. Slip and cut drill line. Make up 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA and TIH from surface to 3;557'. 

02/09/2015: RIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assy from 3;557' to 4;200'. Function test BSR and CSR from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod. Continue RIH from 4;200' to 10;580'. Shallow tested BHA; activate reamer and pull test against shoe. Continued RIH from 10;580' to 20;300'. Wash and ream from 20;300' to 20;411'. Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 20;411' to 20;550'.

02/10/2015: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 20;550' to 21;140'. 

02/11/2015: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 21;140' to 21;760'. 

02/12/2015: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 21;760' to 22;485'. 

02/13/2015: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 21;760' to 22;485'. 

NOTE: Mr. Steve Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay the casing pressure test and BSR pressure test until February 20th while 16" casing is being run.

02/14/2015: Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 23;380' to 23;550'; section TD. Pumped 200 bbl weighted sweep and circulated same surface to surface. Pumped out of hole from 23;550' to 22;630' due to high drag. TOH from 22;630' to 20;256'. Performed full diverter function test from Driller's panel.

NOTE: Mr. Steve Scruggs received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson to defer BOP pressure test for 12 hours.
"},{"   ":167,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-02-15","TEXT_REMARK":"02/15/2015: Continued to TOH from 20;194' to 19;853' for BOP pressure test. Pressure test BOP to 250/6500 psi for 5 mins each test with 11.8 ppg SBM from the Driller's panel; Blue Pod; successful test. Performed BOP function test from the Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. TIH from 19;810' to 23;273'. Wash from 23;273' to tag 23;550' (TD).  

02/16/2015: Perform short trip 380' to evaluate hole conditions. TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly from 25;550' to 8;157'.

Note: Mr. Steve Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) for 12 hour BSR/CSR function test extension.

02/17/2015: Continued to TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Function tested BSR and CSR from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod. R/U and run 16" casing.

02/18/2015: Continued running 16" casing.

02/19/2015: Continued running 16" casing.

02/20/2015: Completed running 16" casing. Make up 16" casing hanger. Laid out casing hanger due to damaged seal assembly. Picked up new 16" hanger; seal assembly; and R/T.

Note: Mr. Steve Scruggs received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson to delay the casing pressure test and BSR pressure test until February 23rd while 16" casing is being run.

02/21/2015: Completed change out of 16" seal assembly. Made up hanger and begin running in hole with 16" casing hanger. Troubleshoot landing string slips due to slips not holding.
"},{"   ":168,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-02-22","TEXT_REMARK":"02/22/2015: Waiting on new slips to arrive on location. Made up Top Drive to string; and reciprocate 16" casing string every hour to ensure casing free. Monitor well on trip tank; well static. 

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received verbal approval from Mr. Christopher Martens (BSEE) granting a 24 hour BOP function test extension to February 23rd. 

02/23/2015: Waiting for new slips to arrive on location. Monitor well on trip tank; well static. Rig up new slips and equipment. Continue RIH with 16" casing on 6-5/8" landing string from 16;583' to 16;615'. 

Note: Mr. Steve Scruggs (Chevron) received verbal approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay the BOP function test; BSR/Casing pressure tests and Diverter function test until Wednesday; February 25th; at midnight.

02/24/2015: Continued RIH with 16" casing on 6-5/8" landing string from 16;615' to 23;347'. Made up cement stand and landed out 16" casing hanger. Circulated and conditioned mud at 12 BPM with full returns. Performed cement job: 12.0 ppg Lead slurry #1 - 3;638 cu ft (648 bbls); 14.0 ppg Lead Slurry #2 - 2;594 cu ft (462 bbls); 16.2 ppg Tail Slurry - 1;639 cu ft (292 bbls). 

02/25/2015: Completed pumping cement. Displace cement with 3;580 bbls of 11.8 ppg SBM; observed partial losses while placing cement. Final Cement lift pressure of 530 psi - calculated top of cement at 18;400' MD. Verified floats were holding. Set and tested 16" seal assembly. Released 16" casing hanger running tool. Perform BOP function test on Driller's panel; Yellow Pod. POOH from 7;051' to 6;507' with Casing Hanger Running Tool. Performed Diverter function test from Toolpusher's panel. Performed BSR and CSR function tests from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Monitor well on trip tank; well static. 

Note: Mr. Grant Bathgate (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Christopher Martens (BSEE) to delay the BSR/Casing pressure tests until Thursday; February 26th; at midnight. 

02/26/2015: POOH with 16" Casing Hanger Running Tool from 6;471' to surface. Pressure test BSR and 16" casing to 250/4;450 psi. Performed BSR and CSR function tests from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. 

02/27/2015: Made up 14.5" x 16.5" drilling BHA and TIH to 6;210'. Continue RIH from 6;210' to 8;124'. 

Note: Mr. Steve Lance (Chevron LDSM) sent Houma district after hours BSEE a courtesy email that "we are due a Marine riser and BOP inspection today (last inspected 02/24/2015). We are unable to perform this due to surface currents of over 2 knots. This has prevented us from launching an ROV for inspection. We will perform this inspection as soon as weather permits."

02/28/2015: Pressure test BOP at 250/6;500 psi from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Pressure test Lower and Upper Annular at 250/4;900 psi. Pressure test Choke manifold at 250/7;900 psi. POOH (wet) with 14.5" x 16.5" drilling assembly on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 8;124' to 6;593'. Perform Diverter function test from Driller's panel. Waiting on weather from 13:00 hrs to midnight. Monitoring well on trip tank; well static. 
"},{"   ":169,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-03-01","TEXT_REMARK":"03/01/2015: Continue WOW until 16:30 hrs. Waited total 27.5 hrs. Function BSR and CSR from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod. Trip in the hole from 6;593' to 22;599'. Wash down from 22;599' to TOC at 22;990' MD.

03/02/2015: Drill cement; float equipment from 22;990' to 23;380'. Continue drilling cement and cleaning out rathole from 23;380' to 23;550'. Drill new formation from 23;550' to 23;560'. Pick up to 23;368' and begin performing LOT.

03/03/2015: Finish LOT to 1;855 psi equivalent to 13.7 ppg. Begin drilling 14.5" x 16.5" hole section from 23;560' to 24;394' MD.

03/04/2015: Drill 14.5" x 16.5" hole from 24;394' to 25;163' MD. 

03/05/2015: Drill 14.5" x 16.5" hole from 25;163' to 25;923' (TD) with 13.2 ppg mud weight. Pump out hole to 25;770' and activate reamer near bit reamer. Ream from 25;800' to 25;892' MD.

03/06/2015: Continue reaming rat hole from 25;892' to 25;923' MD. Pump 200 bbls weighted sweep and circulate around with 13.3 ppg SBM. Pump out from 25;921' to 25;895' and trip back to 25;923'. Pump and spot 25 bbls 17.0 ppg pad mud
in rat hole. Pull out hole from 25;923' to 8;124'.

03/07/2015: Function test BOP from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod. POOH from 8;124' to 6;210' and function test BSR and CSR from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Function test diverter from Toolpusher's panel. POOH from 6;210' to surface. Slip and cut drill line. Rig up 14" casing equipment. Run in hole with 14" liner from surface to 1;102'.
"},{"   ":170,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-03-08","TEXT_REMARK":"03/08/2015: Continue picking up and running 14" casing off the deck in singles from 1;102' to 4;485'. Rig down OES casing handling equipment; rig up 6.625" pipe handling equipment. Make up hanger and run in the hole from 4;485' to 11;773'. 

03/09/2015: Trip in hole (TIH) from 11;773' to 25;863'. Establish circulating rates - losses encountered during pre-job circulation. Halliburton broke circulation and tested lines. Mix and pump 130 bbls (730 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg cement. Losses encountered during cement job. Set 14" liner hanger.

03/10/2015: Trip out of hole (TOH) with 14" liner hanger running tool from 21;370' to 21;114' to surface. Rig down 1;250 ton casing bails and elevators.

03/11/2015: Function BSR/CSR from Driller's pane; Yellow Pod. Performed 14" casing and BSR pressure test to 250 psi @ 5 min hold and 3;100 psi @ 30 min hold with 13.3 ppg. Good test. TIH with 12-1/2" drilling assembly from surface to 8;153'. Pressure test BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's panel; Blue Pod; with 13.3 ppg. Annulars tested to 250/4;900 psi. Rams tested to 250/6;500 psi. Surface equipment tested to 250/7900 psi. 

03/12/2015: Continued pressure testing BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's panel; Blue Pod; with 13.3 ppg. Good test. TIH with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 8;153' to 17;743'. Pressure test BOPs on 6-5/8" DP on Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Rams tested to 250/6;500 psi; Annulars to 250/4900 psi. Good Test. Performed diverter function test from Driller's panel. TIH from 17;743' to 21;350'. Wash and ream through TOL at 21;370'. Continued TIH from 21;450' to 25;434'. 

03/13/2015: Wash down from 25;434' and tag TOC at 25;676' with 15k down. Perform choke drill with crews and key business partners. Drill cement from 25;676' to 25;875'. Drill 14" shoe from 25;875' to 25;878'. Wash and ream rat hole from 25;878' to 25;923'. Drill 10' new formation to 25;933'. P/U into 14" shoe and perform FIT; 1;570 psi applied surface pressure; 14.8 ppg EMW with 13.6 ppg SBM.

03/14/2015: Circulate and weight up mud from 13.6 ppg to 13.8 ppg. Drill 12-1/4" hole section from 25;933' to 26;546'. At 26;100'; begin increasing mud weight from 13.8 ppg to 13.9 ppg. At 26;450'; began increasing MW from 13.9 ppg to 14.1 ppg. 
"},{"   ":171,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-03-15","TEXT_REMARK":"03/15/2015: Continued to drill 12-1/4" hole section from 26;546' to 27;486' with 14.1 ppg MW. 

03/16/2015: Continued to drill 12-1/4" hole section from 27;486' to 28;340' with 14.1 ppg MW. 

03/17/2015: Drill 12-1/4" hole section from 28;340' to 29;255 (well TD) while boosting riser. Circulated bottoms up.

03/18/2015: Continue circulating. Perform flow check and POOH with 12-1/4" BHA from 29;255' to 17;700'. Function test BOP from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod; on 6-5/8" DP.  Perform Diverter function test from Toolpusher's panel. Continue POOH with 12-1/4" BHA from 27;700' to 460'.

03/19/2015: POOH with 12-1/4" BHA to surface and L/D BHA. R/U for wireline. RIH with logging tools ZAIT; HLDS; QCNT; GR from surface to 10;180'. RIH with logging tools on wireline to 29;250'. 

03/20/2015: POOH with wireline logging tool string. Make up MDT wireline tools and RIH. Take pressures and samples. Wireline unit discovered a loss of telemetry due to collector wire damage. POOH with wireline tools from 28;885' to 25;800'. Repair collector wire on wireline unit. Monitor well on trip tank (static). 

03/21/2015: Continue repairing collector wire damage. RIH with MDT from 25;800 to 27;700'. Continue taking pressure and fluid samples. 
"},{"   ":172,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-03-22","TEXT_REMARK":"03/22/2015: Completed MDT run and pulled out with same. Broke down MDT tool string. Made up MSCT-B tool string and ran in the hole with the same on wireline. Began taking cores per Chevron G&G Ops. 

03/23/2015: Completed getting MSCT-B cores. Pulled out with coring tools and broke down MSCT-B tool string. Made up USIT/CBL tool string and ran in with the same. Began logging per Chevro G&G Ops.

03/24/2015: Completed USIT/CBL run. POOH and broke down tool string. Made up 60 arm caliper tool string. Began running in the hole with tools.

03/25/2015; Finished running 60 arm caliper and POOH with same and broke down 60 arm caliper tool string. R/D Schlumberger wireline. TIH and function test BSR/CSR from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. TIH with cement stinger to 20;114'. Begin pressure testing BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe. Pressure test Annulars to 250/4900 psi and rams to 250/6500 psi.

03/26/2015: Test BOP stack and associated valves with 14.1 ppg mud. Pressure test Annulars to 250/4900 psi and rams to 250/6500 psi. TIH with jet sub assembly; testing choke and kill manifold offline to 250/7900.

03/27/2015: Continue testing choke and kill manifold. Offline; TIH with jet sub assembly to TD of 29;255' (breaking circulation at 14" shoe). Stage pumps up to 900 GPM and circulate and condition mud. 

03/28/2015: Circulate and condition mud at 29;255' while finish testing choke and kill manifold. R/U cement stand and spot #1 abandonment cement plug at 16.2 ppg from 29;255' to 28;355' MD (131 bbls; 736 cf). Pull above cement plug to 28;173' and begin circulating bottoms up.
"},{"   ":173,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-03-29","TEXT_REMARK":"03/29/2015: Set abandonment cement plugs at 16.2 ppg: Plug # 2 from 28;255' to 27;355' (131 bbls; 736 cu ft); plug #3 from 27;255' to 26;355' (131 bbla; 736 cu ft); and #4 from 26;255' to 25;555' (104 bbls; 584 cu ft).

03/30/2015: Finish spotting abandonment plug #4 from 26;255' to 25;555' (104 bbls; 584 cu ft) and pull out of cement to 24;750'. Launch 2x 8" nerf balls and circulate 1.5x bottoms up. Slip and cut drill line.

03/31/2015: TIH with EZSV to 4;108'. Function test CSR/BSR and attempt to test cement plug #4 to 2;000 psi (failed test). Pumping in at 1.85 BPM with 1;330 psi. Continue TIH with EZSV to 24;973'. Weight taken at 14" liner top; wash EZSV through liner top.

Note: On 03/31/2015; Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to set EZSV and squeeze cement through the EZSV to leave cement plug across the shoe per regulation.

04/01/2015: Continue to TIH with EZSV; weight taken on cement stringers when approaching setting depth. Attempt to set EZSV at 25;375' MD. Go back to tag top of EZSV and observed it was being pushed downhole. Pushed same from 25;375' to 25;947' in open hole until 20 klbs taken on firm cement. POOH with EZSV running tool to surface - Damaged EZSV mechanical setting tool observed at surface.

04/02/2015: Function test BSR and CSR from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod; on way in hole. TIH with EZSV and set same at 25;272'MD - above where cement stringers were previously encountered. R/U cement head and break circulation. Function tested BOP from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod.

04/03/2015: Squeezed (plug #5) 108 bbls (606 cu ft) cement below EZSV from 25;947' to 25;270'. Pulled out and set cement plug #6 (76 bbls; 426 cu ft) from 25;270' to 24;770'. POOH to 21;655'; perform positive test 2000 psi for 15 min (good test). Pump 170 bbls base oil in drill pipe and perform negative test with 2270 psi differential for 30 min. Good test.

04/04/2015: Reversed out base oil from negative test. Pressure test EZSV to 2000 psi for 30 minutes (good test). Spot 16.4 ppg cement plug #7 from 21;670' to 21;070' (109 bbl; 612 cu ft). POOH.

*Narrative for 4/4 and 4/3 modified to correct plug numbers*
"},{"   ":174,"WELL_NAME":"PN003","API12":608124005500,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-04-05","TEXT_REMARK":"04/05/2015: POOH with EZSV running tool. Positive test cement plug #7 with cement unit to 2000 psi for 30 min. PU/RIH EZSV #2/ WS retrieval tool and brush assy BHA. Set EZSV @ 7;420'. Perform positive test @ 2000 psi for 30 mins. Perform negative test (Initial Shut in pressure after displacing with base oil was 2280 psi). Bleed off pressure and monitor for no flow for 30 minutes. Good test.

04/06/2015: Completed negative test. Displaced riser to seawater. Spot 16.4 ppg cement plug #8 (43 bbls; 241 cu ft) from 7;420' to 7;220' MD. POOH retrieving Wear Sleeve on the trip out. 

04/07/2015: TOH with EZSV running tool; wear bushing; and riser brush assembly from 3;932' to surface. R/U to pull riser/BOP. L/D Diverter. Unlatch BOP from wellhead and lift off same. L/D slip joint. Transit to BOP safe handling zone.

04/08/2015: Continued to pull BOP on marine riser from 6;743' to 2;083'.

04/09/2015: Continued pulling BOP on marine riser from 2;083' to surface. Secure BOP and commence transit from WR 633 #PN003 to WR 677 #PS004.
"},{"   ":175,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010700,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-10-26","TEXT_REMARK":"10/26/2015: Continued with between well maintenance. Make up and rack back 36" jet-in BHA. Begin picking up 26" powerdrive BHA.

10/27/2015: Made up the 30" jet-in BHA and the 26" drilling BHA in the aux side. Picked up and ran the 36" casing to 322'. Ran the 30" jet-in inner string inside the 36" casing. Installed the ROV diverter valves and the bulls-eyes on to the LPWH.

10/28/2015: Tripped in with 36" conductor and 30" jetting BHA to 500' above the mud line and moved the rig from the DOZ to the PN007 well center. Spudded PN007 at 08:00 hrs and jetted 36" conductor with 30" jetting BHA to 7;195'; pumping pre-hydrated gel sweeps when necessary. Soaked 36" conductor for 4 hours and released running tool/ 30" jetting BHA from LPWH (top of LPWH 6;873'). Tripped out of the LPWH into the open water with the running tool and the 30" jetting BHA to 4;089'.

10/29/2015: Tripped out with the 36" Dril-Quip running tool and the 30" jet-in BHA. Picked up the 26" drilling BHA and tripped in 500' above mud line. Moved rig from DOZ to PN007 well center and stabbed 26" drilling BHA in LPWH at 11:20 hrs. Tripped in the hole to 7;195' and began drilling 26" hole section from 7;195' to 7;331'. While drilling; standpipe pressure gradually decreased during drilling operations to a 600 psi loss. Tripped out of the hole with the 26" drilling BHA to 500' above the mud line. Moved the rig from PN007 to DOZ. Continued to trip out of hole to surface and laid out the PowerDrive. 

10/30/2015: Changed out PowerDrive and tripped to 500' above mud line. Stabbed into LPWH and drilled 26" hole section from 7;331' to 7;422'. Surveys indicated that BHA was not dropping inclination as required. Tripped out to 500' above the mud line and move the rig to the DOZ. Tripped to surface with PowerDrive BHA.

10/31/2015: Changed out the PowerDrive BHA to a Mud Motor BHA. Tripped to 200' above the sea floor and moved the rig to PN007 well center. Stabbed the bit into LPWH and tripped down to 7;422'. Drilled 26" hole section from 7;422' to 8;500'. Slided as needed to directionally control well to vertical.
"},{"   ":176,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010700,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-11-01","TEXT_REMARK":"11/01/2015: Drill ahead with mud motor from 8;500' MD/TVD to 9;335' MD/TVD; pumping sweeps every stand. Trip out of hole with bent motor; wiping any tight spots on trip. While tripping out of hole; the position reference proximity sensors A & B were no longer detecting the position of the block. Repaired and calibrated the sensors. Continue tripping out of hole with 26" bent motor assembly. Picked up 26" PowerDrive BHA and tripped in hole to 75'.

11/02/2015: Continued tripping in hole with 26" PowerDrive BHA to 7;195' MD/TVD and began washing down to 8;355' MD/TVD. Began reaming and washing at 8;355' MD/TVD to 9;335' MD/TVD. Continued drilling to 9;453' MD/TVD. Unable to break out from the save sub. Broke out with manual tongs and replaced the same. Drill ahead to 9;783'; pumping sweeps every stand. Drill pipe elevators unable to close; changed out for back up set and continued drilling ahead to 10;045' MD/TVD. 

11/03/2015: Continue drilling ahead to section TD at 10;562' MD/ 10;561' TVD. Pumped sweep to clean hole and spot heavy weighted WBM in the rathole. Pull above weighted pill and displace well to 12.5 ppg WBM. Pull out of hole; washing and reaming any tight spots. Once at the wellhead; displaced the string to seawater and washed the LPWH with the circulating sub. Continue tripping out to 75' MD/TVD.

11/04/2015: Continue pulling out of hole with 26" PowerDrive BHA. Picked up Dril-Quip MRLD tool and functioned on main rotary; then transferred to the AUX. Rigged up 22" casing running equipment and began running 22" casing per running tally to 994'. Shut down and waited on current. Changed out elevators due to bent cylinder. Continue running to 1;400'. Attempted to make up cross over joint and galled the connection. Laid down both joints and picked up back up joints. Continued to run in hole to 1;706'. 

11/05/2015: Continued running 22" casing to 3;182'. Changed out single joint elevators for 23" and continued running to 3;586' per tally. Rigged down casing running elevators and rigged up drill pipe elevators. Picked up Dril-Quip high pressure wellhead and made up the same. Rigged up 5-7/8" inner string handling equipment and tripped inside casing to 3;463'. Picked up Dril-Quip MRLD and changed out elevator inserts to 6-5/8". Troubleshoot and repair elevators. Made up MRLD and began running 22" x 23" casing on 6-5/8" landing string to 3;708'.

11/06/2015: Continued to run 22" x 23" casing to 4;311'. Troubleshoot and repair elevators. Continue running 22" x 23" casing to 4;696'. Shut down and troubleshoot elevators for a close signal issue. Continue tripping to 4;952'. Shut down and troubleshoot elevators. Rig down 1250T handling equipment and rig up 750T equipment to test the elevator signal connection with top drive.

11/07/2015: Installed 750T equipment on main rotary and confirm functional. Continue trip in hole to 6;574'. Rigged down 750T handling equipment and rig up BX7 1250T handling equipement. Trip in hole to 6;900' and displace drill string to 12.5 WBM. Continue in hole with 22" x 23" casing to 10;510' MD/ 10;509' TVD and land in low pressure wellhead. Circulate 462 bbls with 12.5 WBM in preparation for the cement job. Break circulation with 13.2 ppg spacer and test line to 3;000 psi. Good test. Pump 200 bbls of 13.2 ppg spacer at 6 bpm. 
"},{"   ":177,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010700,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-11-08","TEXT_REMARK":"11/08/2015: Continued 22" cement job. Pumped the remaining 200 bbls of 13.2 ppg spacer. Mixed and pumped 9;664 cu ft (1;721 bbls) of 13.8 ppg lead cement slurry. Once the ROV PH meter started increasing to above PH 8.5; swapped to tail slurry. Mixed and pumped 1275 cu ft (227 bbls) of 16.2 ppg tail cement slurry. Displaced cement with 267 bbls of 8.6 ppg seawater. Cement returns confirmed back to surface. Verified floats holding; bled back 6 bbls. Locked down HPWH and released MRLD. Tripped out and pumped nerf ball with seawater to clear the landing string and the inner string. Tripped to 500' above the mud line and moved the vessel to DOZ. Tripped to surface with landing and inner string. 

Note: Stump testing of BOPs was completed on 11/03/2015.

Note: Mr. Dale Sanderson (Chevron) gave 72-hour email notice to Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) of initial latch up on St. Malo PN007.

11/09/2015: Rigged up riser handling equipment. Skidded BOP over to well center and made up double of riser. Splashed BOP and ran riser as per PDC running tally to 1;813'.

11/10/2015: Ran the BOP #1 from 1;813' to 5;863'. Stand by with the BOP due to a riser bolt torque wrench lost socket/retainer through the rotary (overboard ). Investigated; inspected; functioned and rigged up an alternate riser wrench and inspected the other riser torque wrenches. Troubleshot the Riser Gantry Crane for issues. Continued to the run the BOP from 5;863' to 6;738'.

Note: Mr. Dale Sanderson (Chevron) notified Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) of marine debris at WR 634. Dropped Torque Wrench Socket weighing 21.6 lbs fell into the water.

11/11/2015: Made up the telescopic joint to the riser and mobilized the vessel over PN007 well location. Slacked off the telescopic joint to the spider and then inspected the stroke inspect and greased the inner barrel of the telescopic joint. Locked the telescopic joint to the hands free goose necks and flushed the conduit lines. Tested the choke; kill; boost and conduit lines. Position vessel over PN007 and latched up BOP. Performed a slump and an overpull test. Tested the connector to 1;500 psi for 10 minutes. Installed diverter.

11/12/2015: Pressure tested the diverter to 350 psi. Rigged down the riser handling equipment and then rigged up the pipe handling equipment. Test 22" casing to 250 psi low/ 2;600 psi high for 30 min each. Made up the BOPTT and the Dual Cam assembly and ran in hole to 7;693'. Performed the BOP accumulator draw down test from Driller's panel on the Yellow Pod.

11/13/2015: Continued to perform the BOP accumulator draw down test from Driller's panel on the Yellow Pod. Functioned and pressure tested BOPs on 6-5/8" DP from Drillers panel; Yellow Pod: Test pressures 250/11;600 psi for rams; 250/6600 psi for annulars. Function tested BOPs from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod; and from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod. Installed Dual Cam test tool; released from tool; and P/U above BOPs.
