Perform a function test of BSR/CSR and pressure test the BSR at 250 psi/ 5 minutes and 11;600 psi/ 5 minutes. Made back up to Dual Cam test tool.

Note: Mr. William Averill (Chevron) notified Mr. Justin Ledet and Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) regarding a leaking valve on the acoustic control pod. Mr. Justin Ledet granted approval to proceed with BOP testing on behalf of Bobby Nelson.

11/14/2015: Tripped out hole with BOPTT. Performed diverter function from Driller's panel. Make up 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA. RIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly; taking survey check shots. Performed BSR/CSR function test from the Driller's panel on the Blue Pod. Performed diverter function test from Toolpusher's panel.
 
Note: After landing out the test plug in St. Malo PN007; the wellhead depth was verified to be 6;874' MD/TVD. Please note that all reports will be adjusted and will carry the new verified depth from this point forward. All casings string depths already set will be adjusted accordingly.

Note: Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave verbal approval to Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) to continue permitted operation upon receipt of the DNV well compatibility document.
"},{"   ":178,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010700,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-11-15","TEXT_REMARK":"11/15/2015: Tripped in hole with the 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA. Washed the last stand down and tagged the TOC at 10;403' MD/TVD with 15k. P/U and displaced well from seawater to 11.2 ppg SBM. Perform choke drills with rig crew.

11/16/2015: Performed choke drills with crew. Troubleshoot and repair local/remote choke panels and gauges. Drilled out the cement/shoe track and washed/reamed the rathole. Drilled 10' of new formation and pulled into shoe for FIT test.

11/17/2015: Performed FIT to with 11.2 ppg MW to a surface pressure of 985 psi resulting in 13.0 ppg EMW. Drilled ahead 18-1/8" x 21" hole to 12;610' MD/TVD. Activated reamer at 10;664' MD/TVD and confirmed against shoe.

11/18/2015: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 12;610' MD/TVD to 14;900' MD/ 14;897' TVD. Weighted up to 12.0 ppg at 13;230' MD and to 12.3 ppg at 14;500' MD.

11/19/2015: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 14;900' MD/ 14;897' TVD to 17;290' MD/ 17;248' TVD. Weighted up to 12.5 ppg at 15;550' MD.

11/20/2015: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 17;290' MD/ 17;247' TVD to 19;081' MD/ 18;924' TVD. Circulate cuttings above BOP. Function tested BOP from Driller's panel on Blue Pod and function tested the diverter from the Driller's panel. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 19;081' MD/ 19;591' TVD to 19;213' MD/ 19;046' TVD. 

11/21/2015: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;213' MD/ 19;046' TVD to 19;716' MD/ 19;512' TVD. Displaced well from 12.5 ppg SBM to 11.8 ppg SBM in preparation for Base of Salt exit. Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;716' MD/ 19;512' TVD to 19;952' MD/ 19;730' TVD; exited BOS at 19;927' MD/ 19;707' TVD. Jarred pipe free at 19;801' MD/ 19;591' TVD and 19;886' MD/ 19;669' TVD and reamed back into salt. Had to jar pipe free at 19;927' MD/ 19;707' TVD and 19;920' MD/ 19;701' TVD. Performed flow check. Reamed back to bottom and drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;952' MD/ 19;730' TVD to 20;140' MD/ 19;905' TVD.
"},{"   ":179,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010700,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-11-22","TEXT_REMARK":"11/22/2015: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section to 20;452' MD/ 20;193' TVD (the pipe had to be jarred 4 times during the interval from 20;400' MD/ 20;147' TVD to 20;452' MD/ 20;193' TVD as stalling was occurring while attempting to drill). Pumped hi-vis sweeps and circulate hole clean. Performed flow check and pulled out of hole to 19;595' MD/ 19;400' TVD.

11/23/2015: Continued to pull out of hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 19;595' MD/ 19;400' TVD to surface. When PowerDrive was at surface; it was noted that one pad was missing along with the Orbit balls behind the pad (decision was made to bypass junk in wellbore). Slipped and cut drill line. Tripped in hole with bull nose sub from surface to 2;816' MD/TVD in preparation for BOP pressure test. 

11/24/2015: Continued to trip in hole with bull nose sub to 7;032' MD/TVD. Rigged up BOP test assembly and tested BOP with 11.8 ppg SBM from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod; to 250 psi low/ 4;000 psi high. Pulled out of hole with bull nose sub to 254' MD/TVD. Performed diverter function test from Toolpusher's panel.

Note: Mr. Rory Chalmers (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to proceed with open hole plugging. Pulled out of hole with bull nose sub to surface. Tripped in hole with cement assembly and wear sleeve from surface to 7;071' MD/TVD.

11/25/2015: Continue TIH with cement assembly from 7;071' MD/TVD to 8;828' MD/TVD and set wear sleeve. Continued trip in hole with cement assembly to 20;462' MD/ 20;205' TVD and tagged bottom with 10 klbs. Circulated bottoms up and installed cement stand. Pumped cement kick-off plug (372 bbls/ 2089 cu ft/ 1;577 sacks of 17.0 ppg cement) followed by 16 bbls of 15.0 ppg spacer and displaced cement with 554 bbls of 11.8 ppg SBM. Pulled out of hole to 19;000' MD/ 18;849' TVD and circulated two times the drill string volume. Pulled out of hole with cement assembly to 16;420' MD/ 16;397' TVD.

11/26/2015: Continued to pull out of hole with cement assembly from 16;420' MD/ 16;397' TVD to surface. Made up 18-1/8" motor kick-off assembly. Function tested BSR/CSR from Toolpushers panel; Blue Pod. Tripped in hole to 7;220' MD/TVD and set wear sleeve. Continued to trip in hole with kick-off assembly to 14;514' MD/ 14;513' TVD.

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received verbal approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to proceed with step 1 of the bypass operation to drill to section TD.

11/27/2015: Continued to trip in hole with motor kick-off assembly to 19;386' MD/ 19;207' TVD. Wash down and tagged cement at 19;640' MD/ 19;442' TVD with 20 klbs down. Drilled firm cement to 19;950' MD/ 19;730' TVD. Began bypass operations; holding 70°-120° GTF and drilled to 20;080' MD/ 19;849' TVD (projection to bit indicated 4.92' center to center separation from main wellbore). Circulated bottoms up and pulled out of hole to 13;873' MD/TVD. 

11/28/2015: Continued to pulled out of hole with motor kick-off assembly to surface. Slipped and cut drill line. Tripped in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly to 8;066' MD/TVD. Function tested BSR/CSR from Toolpushers panel; Yellow Pod.

Pumped hi-vis sweeps and circulate hole clean. Performed flow check and pulled out of hole to 19;595' MD/ 19;400' TVD.

Continued trip in hole with cement assembly to 20;462' MD/ 20;205' TVD and tagged bottom with 10 klbs. Circulated bottoms up and installed cement stand. Pumped cement kick-off plug (372 bbls/ 2089 cu ft/ 1;577 sacks of 17.0 ppg cement) followed by 16 bbls of 15.0 ppg spacer and displaced cement with 554 bbls of 11.8 ppg SBM. 11/27/2015: Continued to trip in hole with motor kick-off assembly to 19;386' MD/ 19;207' TVD. Wash down and tagged cement at 19;640' MD/ 19;442' TVD with 20 klbs down. Drilled firm cement to 19;950' MD/ 19;730' TVD. Began bypass operations; holding 70°-120° GTF and drilled to 20;080' MD/ 19;849' TVD (projection to bit indicated 4.92' center to center separation from main wellbore). Circulated bottoms up and pulled out of hole to 13;873' MD/TVD. 

11/28/2015: Continued to pulled out of hole with motor kick-off assembly to surface. Slipped and cut drill line. Tripped in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly to 8;066' MD/TVD. Function tested BSR/CSR from Toolpushers panel; Yellow Pod.
"},{"   ":181,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-11-29","TEXT_REMARK":"11/29/2015: Tripped in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly to 8;066' MD/TVD. Performed function test of BOP from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Function tested diverter from Driller's panel. Continued tripping in hole to 19;950' MD/ 19;729' TVD; and washed down from 19;950' MD/ 19;729' TVD to 20;080' MD/ 19;849' TVD. Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 20;080' MD/ 19;849' TVD to 20;141' MD/ 19;906' TVD. Pumped 100 bbl 13.8 ppg sweep and circulated sweep above BOP. Pumped out of hole from 20;141' MD/ 19;906' TVD to 19;743' MD/ 19;537' TVD; dropped ball and activated reamer. Reamed from 19;650' MD/ 19;451' TVD (reamer depth) to 20;018' MD/ 19;792' TVD (reamer depth). Continued drilling 18-1/8" x 21" from 20;141' MD/ 19;906' TVD to 20;832' MD/ 20;547' TVD. Current mud weight 11.8 ppg.

11/30/2015: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 20;832' MD/ 20;547' TVD to 23;032' MD/ 22;586' TVD. Current mud weight is 11.8 ppg.

12/01/2015: Drilled 18-1/8" hole section from 23;032' MD/ 22;586' TVD to 24;072' MD/ 23;582' TVD. Pumped 200 bbl 13.8 ppg hi-vis sweep and circulated bottoms up. Current mud weight is 11.8 ppg.

12/02/2015: Continued circulating 200 bbl 13.8 ppg hi-vis sweep out of hole. Circulated another bottoms up. Performed flow check; well static. Spotted 43 bbls of 16.0 ppg SBM in rat hole from 24;072' MD/ 23;582' TVD to 23;950' MD/ 23;464' TVD. Tripped out of hole wet from 24;072' MD/ 23;582' TVD while monitoring displacement on trip tank. Tight spot observed with 30 k-lbs overpull at 23;832' MD/ 23;349' TVD. Worked through with no issues. Flow check well at 22;798' MD/ 22;367' TVD for 10 minutes; no flow. Tight spot observed at 19;345' MD/ 19;168' TVD with 70 k-lbs overpull to break free. Worked through spot with no issues once broken free. Performed flow check at 22" shoe and continued tripping out from 10;621' MD/TVD to 10;407' MD/TVD. Performed BOP function test from Driller's panel on Blue Pod with 6-5/8" DP. Performed diverter function test from Toolpusher's panel; good test. Tripped out of hole from 10;407' MD/TVD to 7;756' MD/TVD. Current mud weight is 11.8 ppg.

12/03/2015: Continued tripping out from 7;751' MD/TVD to 6;788' MD/TVD. Pulled Dril-Quip wear sleeve with 60 k-lbs overpull. Took check shots with directional equipment at at 7;318' MD/TVD and 7;465' MD/TVD. Pumped 40 bbl 13.8 ppg slug and tripped out of hole from 6;788' MD/TVD to surface. Held PJSM and rigged up OES 1250T 16" casing handling equipment. Held PJSM; function tested casing equipment; picked up 16" casing shoe and began running 16" casing from surface to 594' MD/TVD. Current mud weight is 11.8 ppg.

12/04/2015: Continue running 16" casing from 594' MD/TVD to 3;618' MD/TVD. Functioned CSR and BSR from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Thread representative consulted with town about erratic behavior in the torque graphs. Continued running in hole from 3;618' MD/TVD to 3;822' MD/TVD. Continued troubleshooting erratic torque charts; and decision was made to swap out casing tongs. R/U back up tongs and troubleshoot. Continue running in hole from 3;822' MD/TVD to 4;479' MD/TVD while continuing to troubleshoot casing tongs due to erratic torque. Current mud weight is 11.8 ppg.

12/05/2015: Continue running 16" casing from 4;479' MD/TVD to 4;895' MD/TVD. Rig down casing equipment due to continued erratic torque and rig up back up equipment. Continue running 16" casing from 4;895' MD/TVD to 4;976' MD/TVD. Lay out two doubles joints of casing from 4;976' MD/TVD to 4;815' MD/TVD due to bad connections. Continue running 16" casing from 4;815' MD/TVD to 5;553' MD/TVD. Current mud weight is 11.8 ppg.
"},{"   ":182,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-12-06","TEXT_REMARK":"12/06/2015: Picked up and RIH with 16" casing from 7;672' MD/TVD to 10;506' MD/TVD. Performed flow check prior to exiting the 22" casing shoe; well static. Continued running to 16;599' MD/ 16;573' TVD. Rigged down 1250T 16" casing elevators and rigged up 1250T 6.625" elevators. Made up and ran 16" casing hanger. Rigged down 1250T casing slips and rigged up 1250T drill pipe slips and Circulation Flowback Tool. Current mud weight is 11.8 ppg.

12/07/2015: RIH with 6-5/8" landing string from 16;650' MD/ 16;623' TVD to 18;064' MD/ 17;980' TVD. Rigged down Circulation Flowback Tool and dropped ball for surge reduction tool. Continued running in hole on landing string to 20;110' MD/ 19;877' TVD. RIH on 6-5/8" landing string to 23;782' MD/ 23;301' TVD. Activated surge reduction tool and established circulation. Continued running landing string to 23;940' MD/ 23;454' TVD. Landed out casing hanger in 16" supplemental adapter. Circulated bottoms up. Current mud weight is 11.8 ppg.

12/08/2015: Pumped 1233 bbls (6923 cu ft) of 13.0 ppg lead slurry and 256 bbls (1440 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg tail slurry. Displaced with 3;696 bbls of 11.8 ppg SBM and bumped plug with 500 psi over circulating pressure. Bled back 19 bbls and verified floats were holding. Set hanger and set and tested seal assembly to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes. Sheared out of casing hanger with running tool; pulled out to 7;030' MD/TVD and circulated 1.5x drill string volume. Began testing BOPs. Current mud weight is 11.8 ppg.

12/09/2015: Tested BOPs from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod; to 250 psi low for 5 min and 6700 psi high for 5 min; good test. Function tested BOP stack from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod; good test. POOH with 16" casing hanger running tool to 3;500' MD/TVD. POOH to 240' MD/TVD. Performed diverter function test from Driller's panel; good test. POOH to surface and laid down the casing running tool. Rigged down casing running equipment. Current mud weight is 11.8 ppg.

12/10/2015: Picked up 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA and wear sleeve running assembly. RIH on 6-5/8" drill pipe to 7;979' MD/TVD and set wear sleeve. POOH to 1;075' MD/TVD. Laid down the multi-purpose tool used to run the wear sleeve. TIH to 6;194' MD/TVD. Performed BSR pressure test from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod; to 250 psi low for 5 mins and 3;800 psi high for 5 mins; good test. Pressure tested 16" liner to 3;800 psi for 30 minutes. Performed BSR/CSR function from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod; good test. TIH to 10;143 MD/TVD.

12/11/2015: Continued RIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA to 20;562'. The drill line jumped a wrap on the line and became damaged. Set slips in rotary and suspended operations until all damaged drill line was slipped and cut. TIH to 23;344' MD/ 22;881' TVD. Wash down and tag top of cement at 23;661' MD/ 23;184' TVD. Drill cement to 23;670' MD/ 23;193' TVD. Began weighting up SBM to 12.2 ppg.

12/12/2015; Drilled cement with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA to 23;927' MD/ 23;441' TVD. Washed and reamed rathole to 24;072' MD/ 23;582' TVD. Drilled 10' of new formation to 24;082' MD/ 23;582' TVD. Completed weight up to 12.2 ppg. Pumped 50 bbl 14.2 ppg sweep and circulated bottoms up. Troubleshot "brown out" and monitored station keeping. Circulated out sweep. Resolved power management issues. Performed LOT to 13.7 ppg equivalent mud weight: Leak off at 1835 psi with 12.2 ppg MW. Current mud weight is 12.2 ppg.
"},{"   ":183,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-12-13","TEXT_REMARK":"12/13/2015: Weighted up SBM to 12.8 ppg. Washed and reamed rathole. Dropped reamer activation ball and confirmed reamer activation via a pull test. Drilled ahead with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 24;082' MD/ 23;592' TVD to 25;390' MD/ 24;876' TVD. Weighted up SBM to 13.2 ppg while drilling. 

Note: On 12/13/2015; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) approval to reduce drilling margin to 0.4 ppg.

12/14/2015: Continued weighting up SBM to 13.3 ppg while drilling. Drilled with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA to 25;614' MD/ 25;097' TVD. Circulated bottoms up. Pumped a 200 bbl weighted sweep. Circulated bottoms up. Spotted a weighted pill in the rathole and POOH to 23;927' MD/ 23;441' TVD. Flow checked well inside 16" casing shoe; well static. POOH to 16;680' MD/ 16;653' TVD. Current MW is 13.3 ppg.

12/15/2015: Continued to POOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA to 14;300' MD/ 14;299' TVD. Performed BOP function test on 6-5/8" DP from the Toolpusher's panel; Yellow pod. POOH to 7;972' MD/TD . Flow check well before pulling through BOP; well static. Finished pulling out of hole and laid down BHA. Functioned diverter from the Toolpusher's panel. Rigged up 1250 ton casing running equipment and ran in hole with 14" 115.53# Q125XHP liner to 3;235' MD/TVD. Current MW is 13.3 ppg.

12/16/2015: Continue running 14" 115.53# Q125XHP liner to 3;723' MD/TVD. Rigged down 1250 ton 14" casing elevators and rig up drill pipe elevators. Picked up and run 14" liner hanger. Rigged down 1250 ton casing slips and rigged up drill pipe slips. Function tested BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. RIH on landing string to 25;461' MD/ 25;946' TVD. Made up cement head. Flow check; well static. Current MW is 13.3 ppg.

12/17/2015: Cement 14" 115.53# Q125XHP liner with 104 bbls (584 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg cement. Displace with 1124 bbls of 13.3 SBM and bumped plug. Bled back 7 bbls and confirmed floats were holding. A total of 654 bbls were lost during the cement job. Set 14" liner hanger and POOH to 21;400' MD/ 21;072 TVD. Circulate 1.5x the tubing volume. Flow check; well static. Pump slug and POOH to surface. Current MW is 13.3 ppg.

12/18/2015: Tested BSR to 250 psi low for 5 mins and 2;900 psi high for 5 mins. Tested casing to 2;900 psi high for 30 mins. Performed BSR/CSR function test from Driller's panel; Blue Pod; good test. Pick up 12-1/4" BHA and RIH to 12;583' MD/TVD. Began testing BOPs. Current MW is 13.3 ppg.

12/19/2015: Tested BOPs from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod on 5-7/8" drillpipe with 13.3 ppg SBM to 250 psi low for 5 mins and 7;700 psi high for 5 mins; good test. RIH with 12-1/4" BHA to 12;786' MD/TVD. Tested BOPs from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod; on 6-5/8" drillpipe with 13.3 ppg SBM from 250 psi low for 5 mins and 7;700 psi high for 5 mins; good test. Performed diverter function test from Driller's panel; good test. RIH to 24;875' MD/ 24;369' TVD. Washed down to 25;721' MD/ 25;202' TVD and tagged cement. Drilled shoe track and cement below shoe to 25;519' MD/ 25;003' TVD. Weighted up to 13.6 ppg SBM while drilling shoe track.

Note: Mr. Matt Spear (Chevron) notified Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) that the Sharav was unable to inspect the riser and BOP on 12/18/2015 due to weather. We were able to complete the riser and BOP inspection on 12/19/2015.
"},{"   ":184,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-12-20","TEXT_REMARK":"12/20/2015: Washed and reamed rathole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 25;490' MD/ 24;975' TVD to 25;614' MD/2 5;097' TVD. Drilled 10' of new formation to 25;624' MD/ 25;107' TVD and circulate bottoms up (CBU). Pump up equivalent static density from the annular pressure while drilling tool and perform FIT. Good test; achieved FIT of 14.6 ppg EMW - test pressure of 1360 psi with 13.6 ppg MW in hole. Drill 12-1/4" hole section to 26;412' MD/ 25;884' TVD. Weighted up to 14.0 ppg while drilling.

12/21/2015: Continued drilling 12-1/4" hole from 26;412' MD/ 25;884' TVD to 26;793' MD/ 26;259' TVD. Decision was made to POOH and change out Telescope due to magnetometer failure. Circulate bottoms up. Flow check and POOH from 26;793' MD/ 26;259' TVD to 8;750' MD/TVD. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

12/22/2015: Continued to POOH with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 8;750' MD/TVD to surface. Picked up new Telescope and 12-1/4" drilling assembly. Function test BSR/CSR from Drillers panel; Blue Pod. Trip in hole (TIH) to 18;341' MD/ 18;238' TVD. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

12/23/2015: Continued TIH with 12-1/4" drilling assembly to 25;392' MD/ 24;878' TVD. Washed down to 26;490' MD/ 25;960' TVD. Attempted to establish communication with MWD tool with no success. Decision was made to POOH with drilling assembly and change out Telescope. POOH with 12-1/4" drilling assembly to 2;995' MD/TVD. Shallow tested MWD tool for failure investigation purposes at 2;995' MD/TVD and was not able to establish communication. Continue POOH with 12-1/4" drilling assembly to surface. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

12/24/2015: Picked up and TIH with new Telescope and 12-1/4" drilling assembly to 7;729' MD/TVD. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

12/25/2015: Continued TIH with 12-1/4" drilling assembly to 12;912' MD/TVD. Performed BOP function test from Drillers's panel; Blue Pod; good test. Performed diverter function test from Toolpusher's panel; good test. Continued TIH with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 12;912' MD/TVD to 25;500' MD/ 24;984' TVD. Washed down from 25;500' MD/ 24;984' TVD to 26;792' MD/ 26;258' TVD; taking surveys each stand. Drilled 12-1/4" hole from 26;792' MD/ 26;258' TVD to 27;400' MD/ 26;856' TVD. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

12/26/2015: Continued drilling 12-1/4" hole section from 27;400' MD/ 26;856' TVD to 28;883' MD/ 28;318' TVD. Pumped 200 bbls 16.0 ppg weighted sweep and circulated bottoms up. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.
"},{"   ":185,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-12-27","TEXT_REMARK":"12/27/2015: Completed circulating bottoms up with 14.0 ppg mud. Flow checked (well static) and pumped out of hole with the 12-1/4" drilling assembly to 14" liner shoe at 25;490' MD/ 24;975' TVD. Continued tripping out of hole to 6;323' MD/TVD. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

12/28/2015: Continued tripping out of hole with the 12-1/4" drilling assembly to surface. Function tested BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod; good test. Rigged up and ran in hole with wireline logging assembly #1 to 14" liner shoe at 25;490' MD/ 24;975' TVD. Logged down to TD at 28;883' MD/ 28;318' TVD. Logged up to 14" liner shoe at 25;490' MD/ 24;975' TVD. Pulled out of hole to 6;800' MD/TVD with run #1. Wireline run #1 tool configuration: ZAIT-HLDS-QCNT-HNGS. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

Note: On 12/28/2015 @ 17:07 hrs; Matthew Nelson (Chevron) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to proceed with the accumulator charge in block.

12/29/2015: Continued pulling out of hole with wireline logging assembly #1 from 6;800' MD/TVD to surface. Made up wireline logging assembly #2 and ran in hole to the 14" shoe at 25;490' MD/ 24;975' TVD. Logged down to TD at 28;883' MD/ 28;318' TVD. Logged up to 14" liner shoe at 25;490' MD/ 24;975' TVD. Ran in hole and correlated to obtain pressure points as per G&G plan. Completed 33 pressure sampling attempts. Wireline #2 tool configuration: XPT and MSIP. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

12/30/2015: Completed wireline run #2 as per G&G plan. Completed pressure measurement program. Rigged down wireline equipment and rigged up to run the 9-7/8" liner. Ran 9-7/8" liner to 177' MD/TVD. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

12/31/2015: Continued to trip in hole with 9-7/8" liner to 3;771' MD/TVD. Made up 9-7/8" liner hanger assembly and tripped in hole on 6-5/8" landing string to 25;553' MD/ 25;037' TVD. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

01/01/2016: Continued to trip in hole with the 9-7/8" liner on 6-5/8" landing string to 28;841' MD/ 28;276' TVD. Made up cement stand and performed pre-job circulation with 14.0 ppg mud. Cemented 9-7/8" liner with 921 cu ft/ 626 sacks of 16.2 ppg Class H cement. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

Note: On 01/01/2016 @ 15:22 hrs; Steven Scruggs (Chevron) received email approval from Bobby Nelson (BSSE) for a 12 hr BOP and Diverter function test extension.

01/02/2016: Set 9-7/8" liner hanger at 24;999' MD/ 24;490' TVD. Tripped out of hole to 24;720' MD/ 24;216' TVD. Function tested diverter on Driller's panel; good test. Function tested BOPs from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod; good test. Pressure tested BOP to 250/7;750 psi for 5 minutes on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod; good test. Circulated bottoms up with 14.0 ppg mud. Tripped out of hole with 9-7/8" liner running tool from 24;720' MD /24;216' TVD to 12;454' MD/ 12;454' TVD. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.
"},{"   ":186,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-01-03","TEXT_REMARK":"01/03/2016: Tripped out of hole with 9-7/8" liner running tool from 12;454' MD/12;454' TVD to surface. Slipped and cut 130' drill line. Pressure tested 9-7/8" liner and BSR to 250/1;900 psi from Toolpusher's panel; Blue Pod. Picked up and tripped in with EZSV and No-Go assembly to 10;093' MD/TVD. Spaced out to pressure test BOP on 5-7/8" drill pipe. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

01/04/2016: Pressure tested BOPs to 250/7;750 psi on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod. Good test. Function tested BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod. Good test. Tripped in with the EZSV to 28;371' MD/ 27;813' TVD. Set down on 9-7/8" liner with No-Go assembly for tieback spaceout purposes. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

01/05/2016: Tripped out of hole from 28;371' MD/ 27;813' TVD to 28;292' MD/ 27;735 TVD and set EZSV. Positive tested EZSV to 1;900 psi for 15 min. Tripped out of hole to 28;268' MD/ 27;711' TVD and negative tested EZSV to 2;723 psi for 30 min. Reverse out base fluid and tripped out of hole from 28;268' MD/ 27;711' TVD with EZSV running tool to 4;328' MD/TVD. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

01/06/2016: Tripped out of hole with EZSV running tool from 4;328' MD/TVD to surface. Tripped in hole with wear sleeve retrieval tool to 7;405' MD/TVD. Latched into wear sleeve and tripped out of hole from 7;405' MD/TVD to surface. Function tested diverter from Toolpusher's panel. Slip and cut 93' of drill line. Rigged up casing handling equipment and tripped in hole with 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" tieback to 1;802' MD/TVD. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

01/07/2016: Continued tripping in hole with 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" tieback from 1;802' MD/TVD to 13;818' MD/TVD. Current MW is 14.0 ppg. Function test BSR and CSR from Driller's panel; Blue Pod.

01/08/2016: Continue tripping in hole with 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" tieback from 13;818' MD/TVD to 18;166' MD/18;075' TVD. Made up 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" hanger and continued tripping in hole on landing string from 18;166' MD/ 18;075' TVD to 23;975' MD/ 23;488' TVD. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

01/09/2016: Continued tripping in hole with 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" tieback from 23;975' MD/ 23;488' TVD to 25;057' MD/ 24;548' TVD. Pressure tested seal stem to 1;200 psi for 5 min. Good test. Picked up from 25;057' MD/ 24;548' TVD to 25;005' MD/ 26;497' TVD; spacing out above TOL for cementing operations. Mixed and pumped 9;360 cu ft of Class H cement. Displaced cement with 14.0 ppg SBM at 12 bpm. Slack off to land 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" hanger. Pressure tested 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" hanger to 9;900 psi for 15 minutes. Good test. Rigged down cementing equipment. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.
"},{"   ":187,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-01-10","TEXT_REMARK":"01/10/2016: Pulled casing hanger running tool above BOP and performed flow check; well static. POOH to surface and rigged down casing handling equipment. Tripped in hole with Lead Impression Tool to 8;120' MD/TVD and tagged up on ID restriction in Dummy Hanger Retrieval Sub with 200k lbs. POOH to 7;886' MD/TVD and function tested BOP from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Function test diverter from Driller's panel. POOH to surface and laid down Lead Impression Tool. 

01/11/2016: Made up 8-1/2" rock bit cleanout assembly. Tripped in hole to 10;891' MD/TVD. Made up Lead Impression Tool and tripped in hole to 17;834' MD/17;766' TVD. Landed Lead Impression Tool on 10-3/4" casing hanger and activated lead impression blocks. POOH to 17;774' MD/ 17;709' TVD and performed flow check; well static. Current MW is 14.0 ppg. Pressure tested BSRs to 250/7;700 psi for 5 mins; good test. Pressure tested casing to 7;700 psi for 30 mins; good test. Functioned BSRs/CSRs from Driller's panel; Yellow Pod. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

01/12/2016: POOH to 10;981' MD/TVD and laid down Lead Impression Tool. Made up Lock Down Sleeve assembly and tripped in hole to 17;780' MD/ 17;715' TVD. Landed and set Lock Down Sleeve on 10-3/4" casing hanger. Tested seal assembly. Performed flow check; well static. POOH to 10;891' MD/TVD and laid down Lock Down Sleeve running tool. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

01/13/2016: POOH to surface with 8-1/2" rock bit cleanout assembly. Made up 9-7/8" EZSV and tripped in hole to 17;000' MD/ 16;966' MD. Set EZSV and performed positive test to 1;000 psi for 15 mins; good test. Current MW is 14.0 ppg.

01/14/2016: Circulated bottoms up and performed negative test. Pumped 213 bbls of 7.6 ppg NAF to stand pipe pressure of 2;460 psi; bled off in 2 bbl increments to 0 psi. Monitored well for 30 mins and observed no flow. Good test. Pumped a 300' cement plug (22 bbls of 16.2 ppg) from 17;000' MD/ 16;966' TVD to 16;700' MD/ 16;672' TVD. POOH to 7;800' MD/TVD. Displaced the well from 14.0 ppg SBM to seawater. Current MW is 8.6 ppg.

01/15/2016: Continued displacing the well from 14.0 ppg to seawater. Spotted a 13 ppg fresh water high-viscosity pill. POOH to 7;705' MD/TVD and CBU. Set a 300' 16.2 ppg balanced cement plug from 7;705' MD/TVD to 7;405' MD/TVD. POOH to surface. Made up jet sub and riser brush BHA. Ran in hole to 7;109' MD/TVD; then washed and jetted BOP. POOH to surface and laid down jet sub and riser brush. Current MW is 8.6 ppg.

01/16/2016; Rigged up riser handling equipment. Serviced and laid down diverter. Rigged up riser running tool and picked up BOP landing joint. Waited on weather. Current MW is 8.6 ppg.
"},{"   ":188,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-01-17","TEXT_REMARK":"01/17/2016: Wait on weather/current prior to unlatching BOP.

Note: Mr. Steven Scruggs (Chevron) notified Bobby Nelson (BSEE) that we currently have the diverter laid down and are ready to unlatch after successfully completing the Temporary Abandonment of St Malo PN007. Mr. Bobby Nelson granted approval for dispensation of all further testing requirements as the well has been successfully temporarily abandoned. 

01/18/2016; Wait on current to unlatch BOP. Current below 1.5 knots; orientate rig to proper alignment; lock telescopic joint. Unlatch BOP from HPWH and lift off of well head. Move 10 meters off location; install trash cap on wellhead; service telescopic joint. Pull BOP on riser from 6;882' to 5;053'. Move rig to Safe Handling Zone.

01/19/2016: Pulled BOP on riser from 5;053' to surface. Landed BOP on transporter at 00:00 hrs.

01/20/2016: Finished laying out remaining riser and pup joints. Moved vessel to PN007 well center and performed clear bottom surveys. Recovered transponders and pumped preservation fluid into wellhead. Secured BOP and equipment for transit to Anchor 3 (GC 762) location.
"},{"   ":189,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-06-08","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE***  The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation. 

06/08/2016: Transited from WR 678 #PN002 DOZ to WR 634 #PN007 DOZ. Installed IWOCS and mux cable jewelry.

06/09/2016: Finished installing IWOCS and mux cable jewelry. Positioned drillship over well center. Landed and latched BOP to Subsea Production Tree (XT). Rigged down riser equipment. Completed deadman and ROV intervention tests - good tests. Rigged up drilling equipment. P/U Boll Weevil Test Tool (BWTT) and Dual Cam assembly. Performed diverter function and flow test - good tests. TIH with BWTT and Dual Cam assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe in 8.6 ppg seawater from surface to 7;005'. Performed the subsea accumulator drawdown test - good test. Land BWTT; release Dual Cam and POOH above BOP. Began pressure testing UBSRs to 250/11;500 psi on Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; utilizing ROV to function rams closed.

06/10/2016: Finished pressure testing UBSRs to 250/11;500 psi - good tests. Completed BOP pressure tests on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 8.6 ppg seawater from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod per APM and function tested BOP from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod - good tests. Function tested diverter - good test. TOH from 7;005' to surface with Boll Weevil and Dual Cam test assembly. M/U 9" cleanout BHA. TIH with 9" cleanout assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from surface to 6;594'. Flow checked well - well static. Performed ROV function test on UBSRs - good test. TIH with 9" cleanout assembly from 6;594' to 7;131'. Washed down from 7;131' to 7;395'. 

06/11/2016: Displaced well from 8.6 ppg seawater to 14.0 ppg SBM. Washed and reamed cement from 7;395' to 7;723'. Flow checked well - well static. Washed and reamed from 7;723' to 8;072'. Washed down from 8;072' to 8;111' and tagged dummy hanger retrieval sub. Flow checked well - well static. TOH with 9" cleanout assembly from 8;111' to surface.
"},{"   ":190,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-06-12","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE***  The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation. 

06/12/2016: TIH with milling BHA in 14.0 ppg SBM from surface to 8;111' on 5-7/8" drill pipe. Milled out ID restriction to 8.785" from 8;111' to 8;114'. POOH with milling BHA from 8;114' to surface. R/U wireline equipment and RIH with caliper tool to 8;220'. Performed caliper log across ID restriction. POOH with caliper tool to surface. TIH with milling BHA to ID restriction at 8;111'.

06/13/2016: Milled out ID restriction to 9.00" from 8;111' to 8;114'. Activated jet sub and POOH from 8;114' to 7;028'. M/U MDDM and jetted XT and BOP. POOH with milling BHA from 7;028' to surface. TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from surface to 2;747'. Serviced rig. Continued TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 2;747' to 6;784'.  
Offline: function tested UBSR/LBSR from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod - good test.

06/14/2016: Continued TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 6;784' to 15;789' and tagged TOC. Performed casing test against MPRs to 7;500 psi - good test. Drilled out cement from 15;789' to 17;000'. Drilled out EZSV #1 from 17;000' to 17;003'. TIH with cleanout assembly from 17;003' to 18;439'.

06/15/2016: Continue TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 18;439' to 22;899'. Washed and reamed down from 22;899' to 24;454' and tagged TOC. Drilled out cement from 24;454' to 24;655'.

06/16/2016: Drilled out cement from 24;655' to 24;724'. Drilled out orifice collar from 24;724' to 24;727'. Drill out cement from 24;727' to 25;006'. Washed and reamed from 25;006' to 25;186'. Service rig. TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 25;186' to 27;615'.

06/17/2016: Continued TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 27;615' to 28;153'. Washed and reamed from 28;153' to 28;293' and tagged EZSV #2. Drilled out EZSV #2 from 28;293' to 28;296'. Washed and reamed from 28;296' to 28;652'. Drilled out cement and float collar from 28;652' to 28;661'. Drilled out cement from 28;661' to 28;742'. Drilled out lower float collar from 28;742' to 28;746'. Drilled out cement from 28;746' to 28;821'. POOH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 28;821' to 28;512'. Function tested diverter from Toolpusher's Panel - good test. Function tested BOPs from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod - good test. TIH from 28;512' to 28;821'.

06/18/2016: POOH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 28;821' to 25;054'. Circulated and conditioned wellbore. POOH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 25;009' to 5;169'.
"},{"   ":191,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-06-19","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE***  The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation. 

06/19/2016: TOH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly in 14.0 ppg SBM from 5;169' to surface. RIH with Gamma Ray/ Junk basket and gage ring on wireline from surface to 28;832' IES. POOH with wireline assembly from 28;832' IES to surface. RIH with Isolation Scanner/Sonic Scanner/Casing Collar Locator/Gamma Ray from surface to 28;805' IES. POOH with wireline assembly from 28;805' IES to 25;200' IES.

06/20/2016: POOH with Isolation Scanner/Sonic Scanner/Casing Collar Locator/Gamma Ray from 25;200' IES to surface. Function test UBSRs and LBSRs from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - good test. RIH with Plugged Packer/Running Tool/ReSOLVE tool/GR/CCL on wireline from surface to 28;832' IES. POOH with wireline assembly from 28;832' IES to 28;821' IES and set packer at 28;821' IES. POOH with Running Tool/ReSOLVE tool/GR/CCL from 28;821' IES to surface. Begin pressure test on LBSRs against 10-3/4" x 9-7/8" casing/ plugged packer from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod to 250/7;700 psi surface pressure with 14.0 ppg mud for 5 min.
Offline: Perform pressure test on 10-3/4" x 9-7/8" casing and UBSRs against plugged packer from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; to 250/7;700 psi surface pressure with 14.0 ppg mud for 30 min - good test.

Note: On 06/20/2016 at 08:08 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) notified Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) that Chevron may proceed with RTTS setting and displacement for BOP unlatch to replace slip joint.

06/21/2016: Complete pressure test on LBSRs against 10-3/4" x 9-7/8" casing/ plugged packer from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod to 250/7;700 psi surface pressure with 14.0 ppg mud for 5 min - good test. TIH with cleanout assembly from surface to 28;800' DPM. Performed inflow test to 2;375 psi using 6.6 ppg base oil. Monitored pressure at 0 psi for 30 minutes; no flow - good test.  

06/22/2016: Reapply original pressure differential and reverse out 6.6 ppg base oil. Flow check well; well static. Displace well from 14.0 ppg SBM to 14.0 ppg CaBr2. Flow check well; well static. TOH with cleanout assembly from 28;795' DPM to 13;560' DPM.

06/23/2016: TOH with cleanout assembly from 13;560' DPM to 7;799' DPM. Make up RTTS packer and TIH from 7;799' DPM to 15;332' DPM (7;510' RTTS depth). Set RTTS packer at 7;510' DPM. Pressure test RTTS packer to 1;000 psi for 15 min - good test. Displaced riser from 14.0 ppg CaBr2 to seawater. TOH with RTTS running tool from 7;515' DPM to surface. Begin online pit cleaning; flushing and lancing lines clean.

Note: On 06/23/2016 at 09:45 hrs; Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) provided a 72 hr notification to Mr. Bobby Nelson and Mr. Josh Ladner (BSEE) for re-latching the BOP and performing subsea testing on the St. Malo PN007 well.

06/24/2016: Continue online pit cleaning; flushing and lancing lines clean. 
Offline: Unlatch BOP. Change out slip joint.

Note: On 06/24/2016 at 07:36 hrs; Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) notified Mr. Bobby Nelson and Mr. Josh Ladner (BSEE) that operations have moved forward and the DCL should be in position to re-latch and pressure test BOPs on Sunday; June 26th.

06/25/2016: Continue online pit cleaning; flushing and lancing lines clean. 
Offline: Latch BOP. Perform connector pressure test against UBSRs/RTTS packer from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; to 1;000 psi surface pressure with seawater for 5 min- good test. Begin pressure test on surface well control equipment (choke manifold; lines; FOSV; IBOP) with seawater to 250/11;500 psi surface pressure.
"},{"   ":192,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-06-26","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE***  The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation. 

06/26/2016: TIH with Boll Weevil test tool and landed out at 6;873'. Pressure tested BOPs per APM: pipe rams to 250/11;500 psi and annular to 250/6;500 from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod and function tested BOP from both panels on Blue Pod - good tests. TOH with Boll Weevil test tool and L/D. TIH with RTTS overshot to 6;301'. 

06/27/2016: TIH with RTTS overshot from 6;301' to 7;485'. Displaced well to 14.0 ppg CaBr2. Latched on and unseated RTTS. Monitored well for 30 min. POOH from 15;330' to 7;798'. TIH from 7;798' to 28;779' with displacement assembly.

06/28/2016: TIH from 28;779' while jetting top of bridge plug at 28;800'. Weighted up active system to 14.0 ppg CaBr2. Activated jet tech and jetted BOP stack 3 times. Functioned BOPs while jetting. Circulated surface to surface volume. Flow checked well. POOH with displacement assembly from 28;792' to 15;982'.

06/29/2016: POOH from 15;982' to surface; laying out displacement assemblies. RIH with sump packer on wireline from surface to 28;550'. Correlated on depth and set packer at 28;550'. POOH with wireline. Tested 10-3/4" x 9-7/8" casing to 7;700 psi for 30 minutes. Test UBSR and LBSR independently from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod per APM and function tested BOP from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod - good tests. Function tested diverter - good test. 

06/30/2016: RIH with Tubing Conveyed Perforating (TCP) assembly to 1;261'. Continued to make up firing head and SLB TCP assembly to 2;049'. TIH with SLB TCP Gun assembly to 28;458' on 5-7/8" DP. Function tested UBSR and LBSR from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod - good test.

07/01/2016: Tagged sump packer at 28;537'. Snapped out of sump packer with 30 klb over P/U weight. Made up SES and re-tagged sump packer at 28;537' with 20 klbs down. Snapped out with 30 klbs over P/U weight. P/U to placed TCP guns on depth at 28;525' DPM. Performed TCP firing sequence. Guns successfully fired with pressure drop on drill pipe. Initial losses at 42 bph and steadied to 24 bph. Opened annular and monitored well on trip tank. Losses at 18 bph. Reverse circulated at 5 bpm. Losses at 38 bph. Reversed out total of 1;120 bbls. Total of 130 bbls lost during reversing out. TOH from 28;538' to 27;080'. Monitored loss rate of 14 bph. Continued to TOH from 27;080' to 9;268'. 

07/02/2016: Continued TOH from 9;268'. L/D spent TCP assembly (all shots fired). P/U Deburr assembly and TIH to 17;001'. Monitored well on trip tank with losses averaging 12 bph.

"},{"   ":193,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-07-03","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE***  The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation. 

07/03/2016: TIH with deburr assembly from 17;001' to 27;241' on 5-7/8" drill pipe in 14.0 ppg CaBr2. Washed and reamed from 27;241' to 28;700'. POOH from 28;700' to 25;748'. Made up BOP test assembly.

07/04/2016: Pressure tested annular BOP on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod to 250/4;500 psi for 5 min - good test. POOH with deburr assembly from 25;748'to 25;516'. Pressure tested BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod - good test. TIH with deburr assembly from 25;516' to 25;748'. Pressure tested BOPs on 6-5/8" DP from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod - test unsuccessful. POOH with deburr assembly from 25;748' to 22;118'.

07/05/2016: POOH with deburr assembly from 22;118' to 16;866'. TIH with Boll Weevil Test Tool (BWTT) and deburr from 16;866' to 23;895' and landed BWTT in Subsea Production Tree (XT). Pressure tested BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod. Tested annular and associated valves to 250/4;500 psi; and tested rams and associated valves to 250/8;000 psi - good tests. Function tested BOPs from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod - good test. Function tested diverter and all related valves from Toolpusher's Panel - good tests. POOH with BWTT and deburr assembly from 23;895' to 16;866'. Broke out BWTT stand. POOH with deburr assembly from 16;866' to 12;555'.

07/06/2016: POOH with deburr assembly from 12;555' to surface. Performed rig maintenance. R/U gravel pack assembly handling equipment. M/U and gravel pack assemblies for Zone 1 from surface to 1;983' and tested same to 250 psi for 5 min - good test.

07/07/2016: M/U and ran gravel pack assemblies for Zones 2; 3; and 4 from 1;983' to 2;957'; tested each zone to 250 psi for 5 min each - good tests. Function tested UBSR/LBSR from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod - good test. Rigged up/ tested Zones 1; 2; 3 & 4 to 250 psi for 5 mins - good test. TIH with 4" wash pipe inside of gravel pack assembly from surface to 1;374'. Retrieved service tool assembly string from 2;957' to 1;443' and laid down retrieval tool. Tested gravel pack service tool to 250 psi for 5 min - good test. Made up gravel pack packer and TIH with gravel pack assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 1;443' to 12;706'.

07/08/2016: Continue to TIH with single trip multi zone gravel pack assembly from 12;706' to 28;627' and landed out on sump packer at 28;550'. Set packer at 27;200' with 2;500 psi in 500 psi increments; confirmed packer set. Set isolation packers between perforated intervals with 4;500 psi in 500 psi increments. 

07/09/2016: Rigged up frac head and iron and tested lines. Spotted 70 bbs pickle down drill pipe. Reversed out pickle and circulated 14.0 ppg CaBr2 until 14.0 ppg in/out. Tested lines and performed acid job on Zone 1. Performed mini frac stimulation. Shut down and redesigned main frac pack stimulation. Perform main frac pack stimulation treatment on Zone 1. Began reversing out per schedule.
"},{"   ":194,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-07-10","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE***  The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation. 

07/10/2016: Reverse circulate following Zone 1 frac pack stimulation per schedule. TOH with service tool on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 28;628' DPM to 28;366' DPM in 14.0 ppg CaBr2 and space out for Zone 2 frac pack stimulation. Pressure test lines and perform acid job. Perform mini frac stimulation. Shut down and redesign main frac pack stimulation. Begin main frac pack stimulation treatment for Zone 2.

07/11/2016: Complete main frac pack stimulation treatment for Zone 2. Reverse circulated per schedule. TOH with service tool from 28;366' DPM to 27;962' DPM and spaced out for Zone 3 frac pack stimulation. Pressure test lines and perform acid job. Perform mini frac stimulation. Shut down and redesign main frac pack stimulation. Perform main frac pack stimulation treatment for Zone 3. Begin reverse circulating per schedule.

07/12/2016: Complete reverse circulating per schedule. TOH with service tool from 27;962' DPM to 27;554' DPM and space out for Zone 4 frac pack stimulation. Function test Diverter from Driller's Panel - good test. Function test BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel on Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod - good test. Pressure test lines and perform acid job. Perform mini frac stimulation. Shut down and redesign main frac pack stimulation. Perform main frac pack stimulation treatment for Zone 4. Reverse circulate per schedule. TOH with service tool from 27;554' DPM to 27;494' DPM.

07/13/2016: Continue to TOH with service tool from 27;494' DPM to surface. TIH with isolation assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from surface to 207' DPM.

07/14/2016: Continue to TIH with isolation assembly from 207' DPM to 28;628'. opening MJPS and FCS sleeves in Zones 1-4. Sting seals into gravel pack packer and begin pressure testing seals against FS-1 valve to 1;000 psi for 5 min.
Offline: Function tested UBSR and LBSR from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod - good tests.

07/15/2016: Complete pressure testing seals against FS-1 valve to 1;000 psi for 5 min - good test. Drop diverter ball and pressure up to 2;400 psi to release from isolation assembly. TOH with setting tool from 27;096' DPM to surface. TIH with production packer assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from surface to 7;222' DPM.
Offline: Pressure tested UBSR and LBSR against FS-1 valve to 250/1;000 psi for 5 min from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod - good tests. 

Note: On 07/15/2016 at 07:57 hrs; Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) provided a 72 hr notification to Mr. Bobby Nelson and Mr. Josh Ladner (BSEE) for stump testing the Jack PS001 Sidetrack BOP (testing planned to start on July 18th).

07/16/2016: Continue to TIH with production packer assembly from 7;222' DPM to 27;118' DPM. Set production packer and test same to 4;000 psi for 30 minutes - good test. Release packer from running tool and TOH with running tool from 27;118' DPM to 24;745' DPM.
"},{"   ":195,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-07-17","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE***  The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation. 

07/17/2016: Pressure test BOPs with 14.0 ppg CaBr2 on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. Pressure test annular to 250/4;500 psi surface - good test. Pressure test VBRs to 250/8;000 psi surface - good tests. Function test BOPs from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod - good test. Function test Diverter from Toolpusher's Panel - good test. Pressure test surface well control equipment (choke manifold; lines; FOSV; IBOP) to 250/10;000 psi surface - good tests. All test performed utilizing IPT SureTec software. TOH with production packer setting tool from 24;745' DPM to 324' DPM.

07/18/2016: TOH with production packer setting tool from 324' DPM to surface. TIH with bore protector retrieval tool (BPRRT) from surface to 7;768' DPM and land BPRRT in bore protector. Pressure test 9-5/8" fixed rams against BPRRT to 250/8;000 psi surface - good test. Unseat bore protector. TOH with BPRRT and bore protector from 7;768' DPM to surface.

07/19/2016: Function tested UBSR and LBSR from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - good tests. TIH with PBR seal assembly; chemical injection mandrels; DHPT gauge and 4-1/2" production tubing from surface to 7;155' DPM.

07/20/2016: TIH with PBR seal assembly; chemical injection mandrels; DHPT gauge; 4-1/2" production tubing; 15K SCSSV; and upper chemical injection mandrel from 7;155' DPM to 18;491' DPM.

07/21/2016: TIH with 4-1/2" x 6" production tubing and associated jewelry on 6" VIT from 18;491' DPM to 19;975' DPM. M/U tubing hanger and Land & Lock. TIH with 4-1/2" x 6" production tubing and associated jewelry from 19;975' DPM to 20;095' DPM. 

07/22/2016: TIH with 4-1/2" x 6" production tubing and associated jewelry on 7-5/8" landing string from 20;095' DPM to 26;866' DPM; soft landing the tubing hanger. TOH with 4-1/2" x 6" production tubing and associated jewelry from 26;866' DPM to 26;790' DPM. 

07/23/2016: TIH with 4-1/2" x 6" production tubing and associated jewelry on 7-5/8" landing string from 26;790' DPM to 26;866' DPM; landing and locking the tubing hanger. Pressure test in between the tubing hanger and 9-5/8" fixed rams to 8;000 psi surface - good test. Pressure test tubing x casing annulus to 5;000 psi - good test. 
"},{"   ":196,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-07-24","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE***  The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation. 

07/24/2016: Engaged and tested electrical penetrators on tubing hanger (good tests). Pressure tested surface flow tree; landing string; and tubing to 4;500 psi (good tests). Performed negative test on the SCSSV with 4;300 psi differential pressure (good test). Rigged up Halliburton slickline. Tested lubricator to 10;200 psi for 5 min (good test). Retrieved isolation sleeve. Displaced landing string and kill line to base oil. RIH with slickline and set lower crown plug. Displaced riser to 8.6 ppg seawater. 

07/25/2016: POOH with Lower Crown Plug Pulling Tool. Tested below lower crown plug to 7;300 psi for 15 min above (good test). Tested top side of lower crown plug to 10;400 psi surface (12;500 psi subsea) for 15 min (good test). Attempted to cycle FS-1 valve open with 25 cycles (unsuccessful). Re-established baseline pressure to DHPT Gauge - 17;020 psi. Attempted to cycle FS-1 valve open with an additional 25 cycles (50 total)(unsuccessful). Re-established baseline pressure to DHPTG - 17;900 psi. Attempted to cycle FS-1 valve open with an additional 20 cycles (70 total)(unsuccessful).

07/26/2016: Attempted to cycle FS-1 valve open with an additional 5 cycles (75 total) (unsuccessful). Re-established baseline pressure to DHPT Gauge - 17;030 psi. Attempted to cycle FS-1 valve open with an additional 25 cycles (100 total) (unsuccessful). R/D slickline equipment. Displaced Choke; Boost & Riser to 14.0 ppg CaBr2. Unlatched tubing hanger running tool (THRT). Displaced landing string to 14.0 ppg CaBr2. R/D Surface Flow Tree (SFT).

07/27/2016: R/D Compensated Coiled Tubing Lift Frame (CCTLF); handling equipment; nitrogen & hydraulic hoses. R/U 7-5/8" landing string handling equipment. POOH with 7-5/8" landing string from 6;800' to surface. Pressure tested UBSRs and LBSRs to 250/7;700 psi for 5 mins each from Driller's Panel on Yellow Pod (good test). Function tested UBSRs and LBSRs from Driller's Panel with Blue Pod (good test).

Note: On 07/27/2016 at 19:06 hrs; Mr. Joe Gordon (Chevron) received verbal approval  from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to proceed with operations regarding alternative compliance request for 30 CFR 250.198(h)(94)). API 17H 2nd Edition is necessary to address the high-flow hot stabs (2nd Edition; Section 6.9.10; "Type-D") utilized on the BOP to meet closing time requirements. The high flow hot stabs are "as good or better" than the requirement in the 1st edition of API 17H as required under the new rule."

07/28/2016: P/U subsea test tree (SSTT). Function test SSTT ESDs (good tests).

Note: On 07/28/2016 at 15:48 hrsm Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) a 7 day casing test extension due to the completed state of the well.

07/29/2016: Completed testing of ESDs for SSTT (good tests). Performed line function test on THRT (good test) and performed chemical injection test (good test). Transferred SSTT from center mousehole to FWD rotary. Rigged up 7-5/8" handling equipment. TIH with SSTT from 153' to 5;512' on 7-5/8" landing string.

07/30/2016: TIH with SSTT from 5;512' to 6;792' on 7-5/8" landing string. RIH with THRT on soft land stand from 6;792' to 6;840'. Landed ontTubing hanger at 6;874'. Rigged up CCTLF. Function tested CCTLF (good test). RIH with 7-5/8" landing string from 6;792' to 6;833'. Made up SFT. RIH and perform soft tag with THRT on TH at 6;874'. Latched up in TH and overpull 100k. R/U surface iron to SFT and flush/test lines. Tested THRT latch to 8;000 psi (good test). Tested lower ball valve (LBV) on SSTT to 8;000 psi (good test).

Note: On 07/30/2016 at 16:23 hrs; Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) provided Mr. Bobby Nelson and Mr. Josh Ladner (BSEE) with 72 hour notice of re-stump testing the BOP for Jack (WR 758) PS001 ST01 next Tuesday; August 2nd.
"},{"   ":197,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-07-31","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE***  The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.

07/31/2016: Test upper and lower master ball valves in Subsea Test Tree (SSTT) to 8;000 psi with 14.0 ppg CaBr2 (good tests). R/U slickline lubricator and test to 10;200 psi (good test). Test retainer valve and landing string to 8;000 psi (good test). RIH with 1-1/2" bailer and bail on top of Lower Crown Plug (LCP). POOH with slickline assembly. M/U slickline tools for pulling LCP and tested lubricator (good test). RIH and latched LCP; attempted to retrieve without success. POOH and changed slickline pulling tool assembly. M/U slickline tools for pulling LCP and tested lubricator (good test). RIH and latched LCP; attempted to retrieve without success. POOH and changed slickline pulling tool assembly. M/U new tool string and tested lubricator (good test). RIH and retrieve LCP. POOH and recovered LCP. M/U Tubing Hanger Wear Sleeve on toolstring and tested lubricator (good test). RIH and set TH Wear Sleeve. Begin POOH with running tool.

08/01/2016: POOH with TH WS running tool and R/D slickline lubricator. R/U e-line lubricator and M/U vacuum tool assembly. Test lubricator (good test). RIH and tagged FS-1 ball valve at 27;152'; vacuum and jet same. POOH with vacuum tool string. M/U FS-1 valve shifting assembly on e-line and tested lubricator  (good test). RIH with shifting tool to 11;600'.

08/02/2016: RIH with FS-1 valve shifting assembly on e-line from 11;600' to FS-1 at 27;152'. Shifted sleeve and opened FS-1 after second attempt. POOH to surface with shifting assembly on e-line and R/D e-line lubricator. Negative tested SCSSV to seawater gradient plus additional 500 psi (2;200 psi total) for 60 minutes per APM (good test). Bullheaded base oil down landing string and flushed methanol through XT. R/U slickline lubricator and wear sleeve pulling toolstring. Tested slickline lubricator to 10;200 psi (good test). RIH with wear sleeve retrieval tool on slickline to 6;750'; retrieve WS and POOH with WS to surface.

08/03/2016: R/U and tested slickline lubricator (good test). RIH with LCP and set same in TH. POOH with slickline and pressure tested LCP from above with cement unit to 10;200 psi for 15 min down landing string with 6.6 ppg base oil (good test). Picked up slickline tool string with upper crown plug (UCP) assembly; installed into lubricator and pressure tested lubricator (good test). RIH with UCP and set same in TH. POOH to surface and pressure tested top side of upper crown plug to 10;200 psi for 15 minutes with cement unit using 6.6 ppg base oil down the landing string (good test). Pressure tested between crown plugs with methanol to 12;500 psi subsea (good test). Displaced choke/killl/boost lines and marine riser to seawater. Disengaged CCTLF and unlatched THRT. Displaced landing string to seawater. R/D surface lines and control hoses from SFT.

08/04/2016: R/D SFT and CCTLF. TOH with SSTT on 7-5/8" landing string from 6;792' to 2;689'.

Note: On 08/04/2016 at 08:20 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) an additional 24 hour extension to casing testing requirement due to well isolation and upcoming unlatch.

08/05/2016: TOH with SSTT on 7-5/8" landing string from 2;689' to 117'. L/D SSTT assembly and transferred to Aft. R/U to riser handling equipment. Waited on current to subside to unlatch BOP.

08/06/2016: Waited on current to subside to unlatch BOP.

Note: On 08/06/2016 at 09:31 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) a 48 hour casing test extension.
"},{"   ":198,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-08-07","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE***  The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.

08/07/2016: Waited on current to subside to unlatch BOP. P/U diverter running tool. Performed rig maintenance.

08/08/2016: Waited on current to subside to unlatch BOP. Performed rig maintenance. 

Note: On 08/08/2016 at 10:11 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted approval to Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) to waive casing evaluation requirement due to the isolated state of the well.

08/09/2016: Waited on current to subside to unlatch BOP. Performed rig maintenance. 

08/10/2016: Waited on current to subside to unlatch BOP. Performed rig maintenance. 

08/11/2016: Waited on current to subside to unlatch BOP. Performed rig maintenance. 

08/12/2016: Waited on current to subside to unlatch BOP. Performed rig maintenance. 

08/13/2016: Waited on current to subside to unlatch BOP. Held Safety Stand Up meeting with TOI and business partners. Pulled and L/D diverter. P/U riser landing joint and M/U to slip joint and locked same. P/U and transferred weight from tensioners to MDDM. Changed vessel heading to 145°. Prepared to unlatch from PN007.
"},{"   ":199,"WELL_NAME":"PN007","API12":608124010701,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-08-14","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE***  The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.

08/14/2016: Unlatched from SM PN007 well at 00:10 hrs. P/U 25 ft above SM PN007 wellhead and moved rig 1;200 ft from PN007 well at a bearing of 58° into the DOZ. R/D riser jewelry and began pulling riser and subsea BOP stack."},{"   ":200,"WELL_NAME":"PS001","API12":608124005700,"WAR_START_DT":"2011-12-01","TEXT_REMARK":"12/01/2011: Ran 36" conductor from 76' to 308'. Ran jetting inner string and CADA. Lowered from 308' to 391'; placing LPH at moonpool. Installed LGC; bullseye target and ROV valves onto LPH. Ran compatts to bottom for ROV. Ran 36" conductor from 391' to 3808'.

12/02/2011: Reterminated tether on ROV. Helix Express ran compatts for PS001 and set location marker buoys. ROV performed test dive; then observed spaceout and shallow test on PS004 assy Aft rotary. ROV ran to Fwd rotary PS001 shoe and followed shoe joint down while moving rig. Awaiting e-mail plat from Helix Express to confirm PS001 marker buoy location set.

12/03/2011: Positioned rig. Jetted from seabed at 7127' to 7435'. Allowed to soak. Released CADA. TOH with jetting assy. Laid out motor and bit.
"},{"   ":201,"WELL_NAME":"PS001","API12":608124005700,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-01-29","TEXT_REMARK":"01/29/2013: Deploy & calibrate compatts. TIH with 26" sediment BHA. M/U and TIH with 26" salt BHA. P/U 18-3/4" MRLD tool. Slip & cut from primary AHD. Perform maintenance and drops inspection of Primary MDDM.

Note: Mr. Gabriel Barragan (CVX) received approval via email from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) on January 29; 2013; to proceed forward with program for open water work (steps 1-10) based upon the current RPD which is pending approval. 

01/30/2013:  Trip in hole from 976' to 7;116' with 26" salt BHA. Position Secondary rotary over well and stab into 36" LPWHH. Wash to 7;434' MD/TVD. Drill to top of salt with 26" Sediment BHA from 7;434' to 8;350' from Secondary rotary. Displace hole to 11.0 ppg SSPAD.

01/31/2013: POOH with 26" sediment BHA. Position Primary rotary over well and stab into 36" LPWH. TIH with 26" salt BHA to 8;172' MD/TVD. Wash and ream from 8;172' MD/TVD to 8;350' MD/TVD. Drill salt from 8;250' MD/TVD to 8;737' MD/TVD. 

02/01/2013: Drill salt from 8;737' MD/TVD to 9;850' MD/TVD.

Note: On February 1; 2013; RPD approval was received from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) for the Modification of Permit to Drill at Location Surface Lease: G18753; Surface Area: WR; Surface Block: 677; Bottom Lease: G21245; Bottom Area: WR; Bottom Block: 678; Well Name: PS001; Assigned API Number: 608124005700.

02/02/2013: Drill salt from 9;850' MD/TVD to 10;521' MD/TVD. Pump 200 bbl 12.5 ppg lignite pill; 250 bbl 13.0 ppg SSPAD spacer and displace with 12.5 ppg SSPAD. Spot 50 bbl 16 ppg SSPAD pill in rat hole with 12.5 ppg SSPAD. POOH from 10;521' to 8;841'.
 
Note: On February 02; 2013; Mr. Gabriel Barragan (CVX) notified Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma) via email that the BOP stump test planned for January 21st was postponed as instructed by safety notice provided by GE Oil and Gas and BSEE to investigate the H4 connector bolts of the LMRP and wellhead connector. The connector bolt issue has been resolved and an independent third-party certification that confirms proper inspection will be provided to BSEE in the near future. Stump testing may commence as early as Tuesday; February 5; 2013.
"},{"   ":202,"WELL_NAME":"PS001","API12":608124005700,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-02-03","TEXT_REMARK":"02/03/2013: POOH from 8;841' to 7;623' and wash LPWH with PBL circulating Sub. Continue POOH from 7;623' to 7;103'. Position Secondary rotary over well. TIH with 22" csg on 6-5/8" 50# landing string from 6;704' to 10;471' and land HPWH. Circulate 410 bbls 12.5 ppg SSPAD. SLB-Dowell cement unit test lines to 3;000 psi; pump 200 bbls of 13.5 ppg spacer dyed green followed by 100 bbls of un-dyed spacer. Pump 660 bbls of 2;300 bbls of lead cement. 

02/04/2013: Continue 22" cement job. Schlumberger mix and pump 1640 bbls of 2;300 bbls 14.0 ppg lead cement slurry; 154 bbls of 16.4 ppg tail cement slurry; displace 8 bbls of seawater; drop two nerf balls; displace with 226 bbls seawater with final lift pressure of 980 psi. Lock down HPWH. POOH and clear LPWH. Retrieved cement sample from ROV and confirm to be cement. Position rig 300' north of well center. POOH with MRLD tool and 4-1/2" stinger. Prep BOP/LMRP for running.

02/05/2013: Prep LMRP/BOP for running: stack BOP/LMRP; BOP electrical testing; solenoid integrity testing; MUX Hydraulic testing; Tensioner acceptance testing. Lay down drilling BHAs and pick up 6-5/8" 40 lb/ft S-135 drillpipe.

02/06/2013: Prep LMRP/BOP for running: Tensioner Acceptance testing; EDS testing.
Note: Mr. Gabriel Barragan informed Mr. Bobby Nelson with Houma BSEE that the 22" cement volume pumped was in excess of 25% of permitted volume. Mr. Nelson acknowledged the update and concurred it was not an issue provided cement was present up to ML. Email approval is attached.

02/07/2013: Prep LMRP/BOP for running: Function test BOPs; Accumulator drawdown; ROV function; Deadman testing; and begin Stump test. R/U riser equipment. 
Note: Jerry Campbell informed Mr. Bobby Nelson with Houma BSEE that the rig's ADCP current meter is currently not functioning correctly.

02/08/2013: Continue Stump Test BOPs. Perform derrick inspection.

02/09/2013: Continue Stump Test BOPs and repair UOK failsafe valve and stack HPHT sensor. Prepare LMRP/BOP for running. REEL Group performing Derrick inspection.
"},{"   ":203,"WELL_NAME":"PS001","API12":608124005700,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-02-10","TEXT_REMARK":"02/10/2013: Continue stump testing BOP and prepare LMRP/BOP for running. REEL Group performing Derrick inspection.
 
02/11/2013: Prepare LMRP/BOP for running; perform accumulator drill; function test BSR and CSR with ROV. R/U to splash BOP.

02/12/2013: Complete BOP pre-deployment checks. Prepare LMRP/BOP for running and skid BOP to well center. Repair leak on auto-shear manifold on BOP. Pressure test choke and kill lines.

02/13/2013: Install King posts on LMRP; splash BOP; R/U and test lines to 250/11;300 psi. Running Riser and BOP.

02/14/2013: Test choke; kill; boost; and rigid conduit lines on marine riser. Make repairs to hydraulic fitting on starboard crane turning device. Continue running marine riser and BOPs from 3;344' to 6;869' (91 jts run).

02/15/2013: Continue running marine riser to 6;879'. Pressure test choke; kill; boost; and rigid conduit lines. Make up termination and slip joints. Run riser to 7;001'. Install rigid conduit; kill; boost goosenecks and drape hoses to termination joint. Pressure test new choke line drape hose to 15;000 psi with blank installed. Remove blank; connect Choke line gooseneck and pressure test lines to 250/11;300 psi. P/U pup and install storm loop.

02/16/2013: P/U landing joint and connect SDC ring. Position rig over well; land and latch BOP stack. Perform ROV intervention test; Pressure test BSRs; 22" casing and wellhead connector to 250/2200; R/D riser equip. Perform Diverter Flow/Function test; RIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. 
Note: Mr. Josh Ladner; Mr. Ronald Washington; and Mr. Vikas Atmakuri from BSEE arrived on location for extended inspection and to witness BOP testing.
"},{"   ":204,"WELL_NAME":"PS001","API12":608124005700,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-02-17","TEXT_REMARK":"02/17/2013: RIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA and BOP test tool to 7;760'. Land out BOP test tool at 7;125' tool depth. Completed Deadman test prior to crossing stack with BHA; pressured up on BSR to verify closure after Deadman test. Rig up to pressure test BOPs. Perform Accumulator Draw Down Test. Perform BOP Function and begin testing BOP.

Note: Mr. Josh Ladner; Mr. Ronald Washington; and Mr. Vikas Atmakuri from BSEE witnessed the Deadman test and BOP Function.

02/18/2013: Finish BOP pressure testing to 250 psi/ 11;300 psi with 8.6 ppg. Pull out of hole with BOP test tool to surface while pressure testing choke manifold. Change out swivel packing. Replace middle and lower IBOP. Pressure test Kelly Hose and middle/lower IBOP. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assy.

Note: Verbal/written approval was granted by Bobby Nelson from BSEE to proceed with operations to drill out the 22" shoe track; perform FIT and drill the 21" hole section.

02/19/2013: Function BSRs. Slip and cut 149' drill line. Continue to RIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA to 10;100'. Wash down to 10;312' and tag top of cement. Pick up off bottom and begin displacement of seawater with 11.2 ppg SBM.

Note: RPD was approved with submitted certification of H4 LMRP connector bolts; BOP well specific compatibility verification; and DNV Survey report confirming BOP is fit for purpose and not damaged from previous service per 30 CFR 250.416.

02/20/2013: Drill out shoe track and 10' of new formation. Circulate and condition wellbore. Attempt to perform FIT on 22" casing shoe set at 10;475' with 11.2 ppg SBM. Achieved 12.39 ppg EMW with 650 psi max surface pressure applied. Pull out of hole with drilling BHA in order to prepare for cement squeeze.

Note: Verbal/written approval was granted by Bobby Nelson from BSEE to squeeze cement on the 22" casing shoe as a remedial action to the inadequate 22" cement job which caused a lower than expected FIT (email is attached).

02/21/2013: Finish POOH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA. Boost riser. TIH with 4-1/2" drill pipe cement stinger. Pump; displace and squeeze cement. Max squeeze pressure observed 130 psi with 9 bbls squeezed. Shut test rams and monitor wellhead pressure. WOC. Initial pressure: 4;164 psi; 24:00 hrs pressure: 4;108 psi.

02/22/2013: Continue to WOC; monitoring wellhead pressure for loss. Open test rams. Fill drill pipe and break circulation. TIH and tag top of cement at 10;394' with 20k down. Pump slug and pull out of hole with cement stinger. Boost slug out of riser. Conduct 4.5 hrs of planned rig maintenance.

02/23/2013: RIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA to 6;566'. Function BSRs. Pressure test casing to 250/1;200 psi for 5/30 mins with 11.2 ppg SBM (equivalent to 2200 psi with 8.6 ppg seawater; as permitted). Pressure test BSRs to 250/1;200 psi for 5/5 mins. Continue to RIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA from 6;566' to 10;169'. Wash down from 10;169'. Tag cement at 10;275'. Drill cement from 10;275' to 10;406'.

Note: Mr. Bobby Nelson from BSEE was updated on 22" shoe squeeze job and informed of our intentions to re-test 22" casing and BSR prior to drilling out shoe track and re-attempting FIT.
"},{"   ":205,"WELL_NAME":"PS001","API12":608124005700,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-02-24","TEXT_REMARK":"02/24/2013: Drill cement to 10;532'. Drill 10' of new formation. Circulate and condition wellbore. Pull out of hole to 10;436' (inside shoe). Perform FIT to 13.0 ppg EMW with 11.2 ppg SBM. Drill ahead to 10;632'. Drop 2.25" ball to activate Anderreamer.

NOTE: Mr Ronan Davey (CVX) informed Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) that on 02/23/13; the Discoverer Inspiration Subsea Engineers found two sensors not working on the BOP fluid mixing system; the low level Glycol tank and the water low level tanks. The BOP fluid mix tank and concentrate tank are fully functional. The maintenance team investigated sensor. They are; however; unable to resolve the issue with the parts they hold in inventory. Parts have been ordered. ETA is 03/17/13. We will keep you informed as when we have the sensors fully operational. As mitigation; daily inspections shall be increased to every 4 hours. In the event that BOP functions are made; inspections will be performed after each function.

02/25/2013: Open Anderreamer and confirm open with pull test. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 10;632' to 11;768'. Function BOPs from Toolpushers panel; Blue pod and Driller's panel; Yellow pod. Function diverter from Toolpusher's panel.

02/26/2013: Drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 11;768' to 13;278'. Obtain SCRs and CLFL pressures with mud weight changes. 

02/27/2013: Drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 13;278' to 15;248'. Obtain SCRs and CLFL pressures with mud weight changes. 

02/28/2013: Drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 15;248' to 15;915'. Downlink PowerDrive to steering command. Drill/Steer 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 15;915' to 16;581'. Unable to get sufficient inclination build to follow well plan line. Circulate hole clean for TOH.

03/01/2013: Continue circulating bottoms up to clear shakers. Flow check. TOH from 16;581' to 15;916'. Pump slug and continue TOH to 10;703'. M/U MDDM; pump at 1;122 GPM and perform pull test to 10 klbs with reamer at depth of 10;597'. Shut down pumps and pull into 22" shoe. No drag noted. Continue TOH from 10;703' to 1;098'. Pull BHA and rack back. Slip and cut 149' of drill line. Service Forward MDDM while making up reamer assy; collars and stabilizers in Aft mouse hole. Re-install 16" shaker isolation valve.

03/02/2013: Make up 18-1/8" bit and TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" reamer assembly to 7;588'. Functioned blind shear rams before crossing them. Make up MDDM and set wear sleeve per procedure. Continue TIH to 8;566'. Convert float and shallow test MWD. Continue TIH to 10;168'. Pick up side-entry stand and space out to test BOP. Test BOP on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow pod. Test rams and associated valves 250 psi/ 9;860 psi for 5/5 minutes each. Test using cement unit with 12.5 ppg SBM utilizing IPT system.
"},{"   ":206,"WELL_NAME":"PS001","API12":608124005700,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-03-03","TEXT_REMARK":"03/03/2013: Complete testing BOP on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow pod. Tested rams and associated valves to 250 psi low and 9;860 psi high with 12.5 ppg SBM. Tested Annular and associated valves 250 psi low and 4;860 psi high. Tested MDDM IBOP valves to 250 psi low and 11;300 psi high. Tested Kelly hose and standpipe to 250 psi low and 6;500 psi high. All tests with cement unit for 5/5 minutes; using 12.5 ppg SBM and utilizing IPT system. Function tested BOP from Driller's panel; Blue pod. Rig down chicksan lines and racked back double dutch stand. Function tested Diverter from Driller's panel. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" salt drilling BHA from 10;151' to 10;569'.

03/04/2013: Activate reamer and pull test to 10;000 lbs on 21" ledge below casing shoe. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 10;703' to 16;450'. Wash 16;450' to 16;567' with 14' fill. Wash and ream to bottom at 16;581'. Obtain SCRs with new BHA. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole; building 1 degree per 100' from 16;581' to 17;516'. Obtain new SCRs and CLFP. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole; building 1 degree per 100' from 17;516' to 17;615'.

03/05/2013: Drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 17;615' to 18;454'; building 1 degree per 100' to 23 degrees. Downlink PowerDrive to Inclination-Hold mode and continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 18;454' to 18;986'. Circulate at 18;986' while repair mud pumps. Continue to drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 18;986' to 19;100'.

03/06/2013: Drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;100' to 19;481' and cut mud weight back from 12.5 ppg to 12.3 ppg. Excessive torque and overpull on connections after 19;252'. Ream and wipe clean on connections. Ream and wipe clean every 34' (1/4 stand) from 19;388' to 19;481'. Pull back into 21" hole at 19;354'. Circulate and hold PJSM for displacing hole with 11.8 ppg SBM. Displace Choke; Kill and Boost lines with 11.8 ppg SBM. Start displacement downhole with 11.8 ppg SBM.

03/07/2013: Cut mud weight from 12.3 ppg to 11.8 ppg. Obtain new SCRs and CLFP at 19;355'. Ream from 19;331' to 19;481'. TOH from 19;481' to 19;355' with no excessive drag. Circulate and condition mud and work pipe from 19;335 to 19;252'. Pump 70 bbl 14.1 ppg slug and TOH to pick up dual cam tool for BSR/CSR function test.

03/08/2013: TIH with Dril-Quip Dual Cam Test Tool from 16;316' to 18;985' (bit depth). Make up MDDM and establish circulation through jet sub. Work BOP test tool through BOP with rig shift to minimize flex joint angle and annular function from 18;986' to 19;019' (bit depth). Pull back test tool above BOP and locate on annular to confirm depths. Work test tool back through BOP and land out in wellhead with 390k down. Release drill string at Dual Cam Tool and pull above BOP. Function test BSR and CSR from Driller's panel on Yellow pod. Lower retrieval sub and make up to Dual Cam Tool. Pull Dual Cam/ BOP Test Tool out of BOP. Slug pipe; TOH and transfer Dual Cam/ Test Tool stand to AFT. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 11;905' to 19;256'. Wash from 19;256' to 19;355'. Wash and ream 19;355' to bottom at 19;481'. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;481' to 19;493'.

03/09/2013: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;493' to 19;684'. Exit BOS at 19;670'. Circulate bottoms up cuttings to 1;000' above BHA while pulling back into salt. Flow check well for 10 minutes; well static. Continue circulate bottoms up and evaluate cuttings and gas from flow check. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;684' to 19;699'. Pull back into salt at 19;671' and perform flow check; no flow. Drill from 19;699' to 19;714' and perform flow check; no flow. Continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;714' to 20;193'."},{"   ":207,"WELL_NAME":"PS001","API12":608124005700,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-03-10","TEXT_REMARK":"03/10/2013: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 20;193' to 20;834'. Circulate 1/2 hour. Space out and function test BOP from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow pod. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 20;834' to 21;324'.

03/11/2013: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 21;324' to 21;719'. Pump Hi-Vis sweep and LCM sweep and circulate out. Flow check well - well static. TOH from 21;719' to 19;122'. Slip 149' of drill line. TIH from 19;122' to 21;592'. Wash and ream from 21;592' to 21;719'. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 21;719' to 21;855'.

03/12/2013: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 21;855' to 23;047'.

03/13/2013: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 23;047' to TD at 23;548'. Pump Hi-Vis/LCM sweeps. Perform static influx test. Flow check well - well static. Circulate and condition wellbore.

03/14/2013: Finish circulating and conditioning wellbore. Spot 17.0 ppg mud in rathole and LCM pill in open hole below BOS. POOH wet from 23;423' to 19;791'; to above LCM pill. Pump slug and continue pull out of hole from 19;791' to 10;168'. Locate annular and R/U to pressure test BOP.

03/15/2013: Displace Choke and Kill lines with 11.8 ppg WBM. Pressure test BOP from Toolpusher's panel; Blue pod (Rams: 250/ 10;125 psi; Annular: 250/ 5;125 psi).
