Performed flow check - observed 5.8 bph losses. Encountered MM85 at 24;242' MD/ 23;105' TVD. Encountered Flt_Mio_64_Drkbrn at 24;295' MD/ 23;158' TVD. Performed flow check - observed 6 bph losses.

01/11/2017: Performed flow check - observed 7 bph losses. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 24;599' MD to 10;015' MD in 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM while monitoring well for proper hole fill - observed losses of 5 bph. Began performing BOP pressure testing of upper and lower annular on 6-5/8" DP to 250 psi low/ 5;400 psi high from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good tests. All tests performed utilizing IPT SureTec software with 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. 

Note: Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received verbal approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) on 01/11/2017 to perform the 14-day BOP testing as follows:
  - The wellbore side of the UIC/UOC/UIK/UOK valves below the UVBR will be tested to the pipe ram test pressure.
  - The wellbore side of the UIC/UOC/UIK/UOK valves above the UVBR will be tested to the annular test pressure.
  - The non-wellbore side of all side outlet valves will be tested to ram test pressure.

01/12/2017: Continued performing BOP pressure testing. Performed pressure testing of Variable Pipe Rams (VBRs); associated valves; and surface equipment on 6-5/8" DP to 250 psi low/ 8;000 psi high from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good tests. Monitored well on trip tank - observed 1 bph losses. Performed pressure testing of Kelly hose and standpipe to 250 psi low/ 5;400 psi high - good tests. All tests performed utilizing IPT SureTec software with 11.8 ppg (surface)/12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. Performed function tests of BOP rams and annulars on 6-5/8" drill pipe from the Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod - good tests. Performed function test of Diverter on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's Panel - good test. Continued to TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 10;015' MD to 6;807' MD. Performed flow check - well static. TOH from 6;807' MD to 543' MD. Observed 10 bbls of losses for the day.

Note: On 01/12/2017 at 14:09 hrs; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received; via email from Mr. Adriano Garcia (BSEE); approval for Alternate Compliance #8 - Test BSR to casing test pressure in addition to requested Alternative Compliance #9.

01/13/2017: Continued to TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 543' MD to surface in 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. Continued pressure testing choke and kill manifold to 250 psi low/ 8;000 psi high - good tests. All tests performed utilizing IPT SureTec software with 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. Performed function tests of Upper Blind Shear Rams (UBSRs) and Lower Blind Shear Rams (LBSRs) from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - good tests. 

01/14/2017: Tripped in hole (TIH) with 16" casing from surface to 5;576' MD in 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - well static.

"},{"   ":239,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-01-15","TEXT_REMARK":"01/15/2017: Continued TIH with 16" casing in 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM from 5;576' MD to 11;484' MD while monitoring well for proper displacement - well static. TIH from 11;484' MD to 13;193' MD. 

01/16/2017: Continued to TIH with 16" casing in 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM from 13;193' MD to 16;956' MD. Made up (M/U) casing hanger and TIH with 16" casing on 6-5/8" landing string from 16;956' MD to 24;444' MD/ 23;308' TVD setting depth while monitoring well for proper displacement - well static. Land 16" casing hanger in supplemental adapter at 7;400' MD (top of liner at 7;397' MD/TVD). 

01/17/2017: Pumped 200 bbls of 12.5 ppg lead spacer; 1;396 bbls (7;838 cu ft) of 13.0 ppg Lafarge Class H lead cement slurry; 175 bbls (982 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg Lafarge Class H tail cement slurry (total of 8;820 cu ft); and 20 bbls of 12.5 ppg tail spacer. Displaced cement with 3;745 bbls of 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. Bumped plug with 500 psi over final circulating pressure (1;640 psi). Total losses during cement displacement were 36 bbls. Bled off 18.5 bbls to check floats - floats did not hold. Shut in well and monitored pressure. Waited on cement. Estimated Top of Cement (ETOC) at 16;000' MD/ 15;818' TVD by lift pressure of 451 psi.

01/18/2017: Continued to wait on cement. Set 16" seal assembly. Pressure tested 16" seal assembly to 5;000 psi for 5 min with 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM - good test. Performed flow check - well static. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 16" casing running tool on 6-5/8" landing string from 7;344' MD to 6;986' MD. Performed flow check - well static. Continued to TOH from 6;986' MD to 2;470' MD. 

01/19/2017: Continued to TOH from 2;470' MD to surface with 16" casing running tool in 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from surface to 1;075' MD. TIH with Multi-Purpose Tool (MPT) and wear sleeve from 1;075' MD to 8;491' MD. Set wear bushing at 7;131' MD. Performed BOP function tests of rams and annulars on 6-5/8" DP from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Subsea Panel; Blue Pod - good tests. Performed function test of Diverter from Driller's Panel - good test. Performed flow check - well static. TOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA and MPT from 8;340' MD to 4;673' MD. 

01/20/2017: Continued to TOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA and MPT from 4;673' MD to 1;330' MD in 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 1;330' MD to 6;556' MD. Performed pressure test of 16" casing against Upper Blind Shear Rams (UBSRs) to 4;400 psi for 30 minutes with 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM - good test. Performed pressure testing of UBSRs and Lower Blind Shear Rams (LBSRs) to 300 psi low/ 4;400 psi high for 5 minutes each - good test. Performed function test of UBSR and LBSR from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod - good test. All pressure tests were performed utilizing IPT SureTec software with 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 1;330' MD to 22;097' MD. 

01/21/2017: Continued to TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 22;097' MD to 23;571' MD in 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. Washed down from 23;571' MD to tag Top of Cement (TOC) at 24;124' MD with 20 kips down. Performed choke drill. Drilled cement and shoe track from 24;124' MD and continued to drill 10' of new formation to 24;609' MD/ 23;463 TVD. TOH from 24;609' MD to 24;392' MD. Circulated bottoms up. Performed flow check - well static. Performed FIT to an Equivalent Mud Weight (EMW) of 13.3 ppg with 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. Leak off observed at 1;980 psi.

Note: On 01/21/2017; Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval via email from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to proceed with permitted operations with one of two Driller's BOP control panels available."},{"   ":240,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-01-22","TEXT_REMARK":"01/22/2017: Performed flow check - observed 1 bph loss rate. Performed second FIT to a target pressure of 2;424 psi with 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. Leakoff observed at 1;980 psi; 13.4 ppg Equivalent Mud Weight (EMW). Drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 24;609' MD to 24;620' MD. Increased mud weight from 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.0 ppg (downhole) to 12.4 ppg (surface)/ 12.6 ppg (downhole). Drilled from 24;620' MD to 24;955' MD.

01/23/2017: Continued to drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 24;955' MD to 25;200' MD in 12.4 ppg (surface)/ 12.6 ppg (downhole) SBM. Increased mud weight from 12.4 ppg (surface)/ 12.6 ppg (downhole) to 12.9 ppg (surface)/ 13.1 ppg (downhole). Encountered Flt_Wx_15_Blu at 25;202' MD/ 24;066' TVD. Drilled from 25;200' MD to 25;444' MD/ 24;308 TVD. Performed flow check - observed 5 bph losses. Tripped out of hole (TOH) from 25;444' MD to 24;375' MD. 

01/24/2017: Continued TOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 24;375' MD to 1;075' MD in 12.9 ppg (surface)/ 13.1 ppg (downhole) SBM. Performed flow check - well static. TOH from 1;075' MD to surface to troubleshoot top drive. See significant well events section for further details. 

Note: Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval via email from Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) on 01/24/2017 at 17:16 hrs to delay BOP pressure/function tests 48 hrs in order to repair topdrive.

01/25/2017: Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

01/26/2017: Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

Note: Mr. Robert Naumann received approval via email from Mr. Justin Ledet on 01/26/2017 at 17:46 hrs for a 48 hour diverter test extension.

01/27/2017: Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

01/28/2017: Monitored well on trip tank - well static.

Note: Mr. Robert Naumann received approval via email from Mr. Justin Ledet on 01/28/2017 at 16:23 hrs for a 48 hour BOP and diverter function/pressure tests extension.
"},{"   ":241,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-01-29","TEXT_REMARK":"01/29/2017: Waiting on Weather (WOW) to remove and replace top drives. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

01/30/2017: Continued to WOW to remove and replace top drives . Monitored well on trip tank - well static.
	
Note: Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval via email from Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) on 01/30/2017 at 14:52 hrs for an additional 48 hour BOP and diverter function/pressure tests extension.

01/31/2017: Installed aux top drive on Main Rotary and performed recommissioning testing. Monitored well on trip tank - well static.

02/01/2017: Tripped in hole (TIH) with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from surface to 6;550' MD in 12.9 ppg (surface)/ 13.1 ppg (downhole) SBM while monitoring well for proper displacement - well static. Performed function test of Upper Blind Shear Rams (UBSRs) and Lower Blind Shear Rams (LBSRs) from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. Continued TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 6;550' MD to 8;309' MD. Performed offline pressure testing of surface equipment to 300 psi low/ 10;000 psi high. Performed BOP pressure testing of annulars and associated valves on 5-7/8" drill pipe to 300 psi low/ 5;100 psi high - good tests. Annular function tests performed from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod. All pressure tests and function tests were performed on 5-7/8" drill pipe utilizing IPT SureTec software with 12.9 ppg (surface)/ 13.1 ppg (downhole) SBM.

02/02/2017: Continued pressure testing of BOP annulars and associated valves to 300 psi low/ 5;100 psi high - good tests. Performed BOP pressure testing of Variable Pipe Rams (VBRs) and associated valves to 300 psi low/ 10;000 psi high - good tests. Performed BOP function tests from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. All pressure tests and function tests were performed on 5-7/8" drill pipe utilizing IPT SureTec software with 12.9 ppg (surface)/ 13.1 ppg (downhole) SBM. Performed diverter function test on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel. Continued TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 8;309' MD to 24;369' MD while monitoring the wellbore for proper displacement - well static.

Opened up the choke line to the strip tank - no flow observed. Total losses reported of 112 bbls for the day.

02/07/2017: Completed setting 14" liner hanger (top of liner at 22;400' MD/ 21;314' TVD). Repeated Diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel and Driller's Panel - good tests.

"},{"   ":243,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-02-12","TEXT_REMARK":"02/12/2017: Drilled 12-1/4" hole section from 28;303' MD to well Total Depth (TD) of 29;401' MD/ 28;265' TVD in 13.7 ppg (surface)/ 13.9 ppg (downhole) SBM. "},{"   ":244,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-02-19","TEXT_REMARK":"02/19/2017: Continued pumping out of hole with 12-1/4" BHA from 28;637' MD to 27;566' MD with 13.8 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. "},{"   ":247,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-03-12","TEXT_REMARK":"03/12/2017: Tripped in hole (TIH) with the displacement assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 13;355' MD to 28;891' MD in 13.8 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) SBM. Made up (M/U) to the Top Drive (TDX) and washed down from 28;891' MD to 29;222' MD. Tagged the Plugged Packer at 29;222' MD with 10 kips down. 

03/13/2017: Pumped 159 bbls of 6.6 ppg Base Oil down work string and conducted inflow test of the Plugged Packer at 29;222' MD. Bled down pressure in 500 psi increments to 0 psi and charted for 30 minutes (well static; good test). U-tubed and reversed Base Oil out of the drill string. Performed flow check and observed a 5 bbl gain (see Significant Events). Bled a total of 10.6 bbls of fluid to the stripping tank and well was static (gain determined to be caused by mud system imbalance). Opened the annular and monitored the well on the trip tank (well static). Displaced Choke/Kill/Boost lines and the wellbore from 13.8 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) SBM to 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2. Started on-line cleaning of surface lines while monitoring the well shut-in on the annular. Function tested BOP from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod - good test. Function tested diverter from Driller's Control Panel - good test.

Note: On 03/13/2017 at 13:43 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) notified Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) that approval was granted for delay of BOP pressure testing for a period of 4 days; or as soon as possible once latched back up; whichever occurs first.

03/14/2017: Continued to clean surface lines and fluid system. Annular shut in; monitoring wellbore on high pressure high temperature (HPHT) BOP gauge. Current mud weight 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2.

03/15/2017: Continued to clean surface lines and fluid system while monitoring well. Jetted the BOP stack at 15 bpm while continuing to filter active system. Functioned Variable Bore Rams (VBRs) and annulars on BOP to clear debris. Jetted the BOP again at 15 bpm. Current mud weight 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2.

03/16/2017: Continued jetting the BOP. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with displacement/ cleanout assembly from 29;126' MD to 3;169' MD in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2.

03/17/2017: Continued TOH with displacement/cleanout assembly from 3;126' MD to surface. P/U 9-7/8" packer and TIH from surface to 16;500' MD. Set top of packer at 16;483' MD/ 16;232' TVD. Performed pressure test below packer to 1;000 psi for 15 minutes utilizing IPT SureTec software with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 - good test. Began pressure testing above packer.

03/18/2017: Continued pressure testing the top side of packer against the lower annular to 1;000 psi for 15 mins utilizing IPT SureTec software with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 - good test. Spotted viscous pill on top of packer and TOH from to 16;141'MD. Circulated riser volume and flow checked well - well static. TOH from 16;141' MD to 7;264' MD. M/U wear bushing retrieval tool and TIH to 14;866' MD. Retrieved wear bushing (WB) and TOH. Racked back wear bushing and TIH with Lead Impression Tool (LIT) on 5-7/8" drill pipe to 11;499' MD. 

Note: On 03/18/2017 at 09:52 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) provided written approval via email to Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) that Chevron may delay BOP pressure/function tests until Monday; March 20; 2017.

"},{"   ":248,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-03-19","TEXT_REMARK":"03/19/2017: Continued to trip in hole (TIH) with Lead Impression Tool (LIT) assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 11;499' MD to 14;724' MD in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) brine while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - well static. Obtained wellhead profile marks on LIT at 7;129' MD. Tripped out of hole (TOH) from 14;724' MD to 7;666' MD. Replaced LIT with Lock Down Sleeve (LDS) assembly in work string. TIH with LDS assembly from 7;666' MD to 14;846' MD. Installed LDS in High Pressure Wellhead (HPWH) at 7;129' MD. Pressure tested LDS to 9;550 psi for 30 min utilizing IPT SureTec software with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) brine - good test. TOH with LDS running tool and work string from 14;846' MD to 7;250' MD and laid down LDS running tool. 

03/20/2017: Displaced marine riser from 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) brine to 8.6 ppg seawater. Performed 30 minute flow check - well static. TOH with 5-7/8" work string from 7;250' MD to 151' MD in 8.6 ppg seawater. Performed Diverter function test from Driller's Panel. Continued to TOH with 5-7/8" work string from 151' MD to surface. Unlatched BOP from wellhead connector from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; at 19:22 hrs.

Transited from PS002 well center to Dropped Object Zone (DOZ). Remote Operated Vehicle (ROV) performed Lock Down Sleeve (LDS) measurement in High Pressure Wellhead (HPWH). Christmas Tree (XT) was splashed with rig Subsea Compensated Crane #2 at 23:47.

Note: On 03/20/2017 at 21:03 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) provided written approval via email to Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) that Chevron may delay BOP and diverter function and pressure tests until Wednesday; March 22nd.

03/21/2017: Continued to deploy XT to 6;939' MD. Transited rig from DOZ to PS002 well center. Landed XT onto HPWH and ROV oriented XT to a 7.28 degree heading. Locked down XT to HPWH and performed pressure test of XT gasket to 14;700 psi for 30 minutes with ROV utilizing Transaqua HT fluid - good test. Landed and latched BOP to XT from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod. Performed 100 kips overpull test. Performed 600 kips slump test. Closed Lower Blind Shear Rams (LBSRs) from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod. Performed connector pressure test to 1;000 psi for 5 min against LBSRs - good test.

03/22/2017: Tripped in hole (TIH) with 5-7/8" drill pipe from surface to 134' MD in 8.6 ppg seawater. Performed Diverter function and flow tests from Driller's Panel and Toolpusher's Panel. Performed BOP Acoustics Controls test and functioned Upper Blind Shear Rams (UBSRs). Continued TIH with 5-7/8" drill pipe from 134' MD to 688' MD. Installed Boll Weevil Test Tool (BWTT) and BSR test tool assemblies into work string and continued to TIH from 753' MD to 7;383' MD. Performed pressure testing of choke and kill manifold and surface equipment to 300 psi low/ 9;400 psi high - good tests. All pressure tests were conducted utilizing IPT SureTec software with 8.6 ppg seawater. 

03/23/2017: TIH with BWTT and BSR test tool from 7;383' MD to 7;816' MD in 8.6 ppg seawater to land out BWTT at 7;118' MD. Closed upper annular using the Driller's remote well control button. Performed pressure tests of Variable Bore Rams (VBRs) and Fail-Safe Valves (FSVs) on 5-7/8" drill pipe to 300 psi low/ 9;400 psi high for 5 minutes each from the Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good test. Performed pressure tests of upper and lower annulars; Inner Blow Out Preventers (IBOPs); and Kelly Hose to 300 psi low/ 6;400 psi high for 5 minutes each from the Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good test. Separated from BSR test tool and picked up work string above BOP. Performed ROV Intervention test and closed UBSRs. Performed pressure tests of UBSRs and LBSRs against connector to 300 psi low/ 9;600 psi high for 5 minutes each - good test. Performed function tests of UBSRs and LBSRs from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. Continued testing choke and kill manifold and surface equipment to 300 psi low/ 9;400 psi high - good tests. All pressure tests were performed utilizing IPT SureTec software with 8.6 ppg seawater. Slacked off work string and connected to the BSR test tool. Performed function tests of VBRs and annulars on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. TOH with BWTT/BSR test tool assembly from 7;816' MD to surface while monitoring wellbore for proper fill - well static. TIH with temporary abandonment packer retrieval tool from surface to 7;251' MD. Closed lower annular and displaced Boost line from 8.6 ppg seawater to 13.9 ppg brine. 

03/24/2017: Displaced Riser from 8.6 ppg seawater to 13.9 ppg (Surface)/ 14.0 ppg (Downhole) brine. Closed upper annular and displaced choke and kill lines from 8.6 ppg seawater to 13.9 ppg (Surface)/ 14.0 ppg (Downhole) brine. Opened upper annular and continued to TIH with temporary abandonment packer retrieval tool from 7;251' MD to 16;447' MD in 13.9 ppg (Surface)/ 14.0 ppg (Downhole) brine. Latched into packer; unset; and performed flow check - well static. TOH with packer from 16;477' MD to 4;832' MD while monitoring wellbore for proper hole fill - well static. 

03/25/2017: Continued TOH with packer from 4;832' MD to surface in 13.9 ppg (Surface)/ 14.0 ppg (Downhole) brine while monitoring wellbore for proper hole fill - well static. TIH with cleanout assembly from surface to 28;896' MD while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - well static.
"},{"   ":249,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-03-26","TEXT_REMARK":"03/26/2017: Continued to trip in hole (TIH) from 28;896' MD to 29;217' MD with cleanout assembly in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) brine and tagged packer with 10 kips down while monitoring wellbore for proper hole fill - well static. Closed lower annular and performed stripping test with 5-7/8" slick-joint drill pipe (6-5/8" OD tool joints). Performed pressure test of lower annular to 250 psi low/ 4;500 psi high for 5 minutes each utilizing IPT SureTec software with 13.9 ppg brine - good test. Tripped out of hole (TOH) from 29;217' MD to 16;386' MD with cleanout assembly.

03/27/2017: Continued to TOH from 16;386' MD to 10;419' MD with cleanout assembly in 13.9 ppg (surface) / 14.0 ppg (downhole) brine while monitoring wellbore for proper hole fill - well static. Performed function test of diverter from Driller's Panel. Performed BOP function tests of lower/upper annulars and Variable Bore Rams (VBRs) on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Continued TOH from 10;419' MD to surface with cleanout assembly. Closed Lower Blind Shear Rams (LBSRs) from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and performed 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" tieback casing pressure test to 7;600 psi for 30 min against LBSRs - good test. Performed function test of Upper Blind Shear Rams (UBSRs) and LBSRs from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Run in hole (RIH) with sump packer on wireline from surface to 29;080' MD Wireline Measurement (IES). Set sump packer at 29;095' MD IES. Pull out of hole (POOH) with sump packer running tool on wireline from 29;095' MD IES to surface while monitoring wellbore for proper hole fill - well static.
 
03/28/2017: TIH with Tubing Conveyed Perforating (TCP) guns from surface to 24;495' MD Drill Pipe Measurement (DPM) in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) brine while monitoring wellbore for proper hole fill - well static.

Note: On 03/28/2017 at 15:55 hrs.; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) approval to proceed with permitted completion operations.

03/29/2017: Continued to TIH with Tubing Conveyed Perforating (TCP) guns from 24;495' MD to 29;106' MD DPM (29;095' MD IES) in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) brine and tagged sump packer with 20 kips down while monitoring wellbore for proper hole fill - well static. Picked up (P/U) from 29;106' MD to 29;095' MD DPM (29;084' IES) to place guns on depth. Closed lower annular; set isolation packer; applied 500 psi between; and fired guns perforating 5 zones. Initial loss rate of 60 barrels per hour (bph). Monitored the wellbore while reverse circulating for 5.5 hrs with a loss rate of 10 bph. Opened lower annular and monitored wellbore for 30 minutes with a loss rate of 6 bph. TOH with TCP guns from 29;080' MD to 29;054' MD DPM.

Zone 5 Perfs: 27;970' - 28;077' MD (107') / 26;834' - 26;941' TVD (107')
Zone 4 Perfs: 28;188' - 28;295' MD (107') / 27;052' - 27;159' TVD (107')
Zone 3 Perfs: 28;406' - 28;513' MD (107') / 27;270' - 27;377' TVD (107')
Zone 2 Perfs: 28;733' - 28;840' MD (107') / 27;597' - 27;704' TVD (107')
Zone 1 Perfs: 28;973' - 29;080' MD (107') / 27;837' - 27;944' TVD (107')

03/30/2017: Continued to TOH with TCP guns from 29;054' MD to 770' MD DPM in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) brine while monitoring wellbore for proper hole fill - observed losses of 5 bph.

03/31/2017: Continued to TOH with TCP guns from 770' MD DPM to surface in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) brine while monitoring wellbore for proper hole fill - observed losses of 5 bph. TIH with deburr assembly from surface to 12;620' MD DPM.

04/01/2017: Continued to TIH with deburr assembly from 12;620' MD to 27;647'MD DPM in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) brine while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - observed losses of 5 bph. Performed BOP function tests of lower/upper annulars and Variable Bore Rams (VBRs) on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. Performed function test of diverter from Toolpusher's Panel. TIH from 27;467' MD to 28;081' MD DPM. Deburred perforations while TIH from 28;081' MD to 29;220' MD DPM and tagged sump packer with 20 kips down. Performed flow check - observed losses of 5 bph. TOH from 29;220' MD to 27;791' MD DPM.
"},{"   ":250,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-04-02","TEXT_REMARK":"04/02/2017: Tripped out of hole (TOH) with the De-burr assembly from 26;717' Drill pipe measurement (DPM) to 127'; layed Deburr assemblies on riser skate. Rigged up (R/U) becket bails and elevators and tripped out of hole (TOH) with washpipe (WP). Rigged down (R/D) handling equipment. 

04/03/2017: Made up (M/U) and ran sump seal assembly and service tool assembly. Began running single trip multiple zone gravel pack equip for Zone 1 to 1;682'.

04/04/2017: M/U and ran single trip multiple zone gravel pack equip for Zones 1 - 5; tested each zone to 250 psi for 5 min each - good tests. Tested service tool in sump test and run in hole (RIH) position to 250 psi for 5 mins with IPT - good test. M/U VCH packer. Installed Protechnics tag in set screw. Began tripping in hole (TIH) with single trip multiple zone gravel pack assemblies on 5-7/8" drill pipe (DP).

04/05/2017: TIH with single trip multiple zone gravel pack assemblies on DP from 1;469' to 22;521'.

04/06/2017: TIH with single trip multiple zone gravel pack assemblies on DP from 22;253' to muleshoe depth of 29;196' DPM and landed out primary sump seal assembly on sump packer at 29;106' with 20 klbs wt down. Set VCH packer with 2;500 psi at a setting depth of 27;888.13' DPM/ 27;877' IES. Performed push/pull test on VCH packer with 65 klbs overpull and 25 klbs weight down. Released from the running tool. Closed annular and tested VCH packer to 1;500 psi - good test. Opened annular and moved string to "Run in hole" position. Closed annular and set all isolation packers. Tested weight down (WD) circulating position with 1;500 psi for 5 min test down the DP - good test. Tested backside WD circulating position with 500 psi for 5 mins - good test. Marked all positions on pipe in preparation for zone 1 Frac job.

04/07/2017: Picked up (P/U) Frac head and rigged up lines. Filled all lines and tested to 8;000 psi - good test. Pumped 70 bbls of pickle down pipe and displaced to 500' above heavy hand weight tool (HHWT). Reversed out 3 times line volume; catching pickle in processing tanks. Opened MCS/FCS sleeves; preparing to flush and test lines with frac boat. Closed MCS/FCS sleeve and began circulating bottoms up to clean wellbore fluid.

04/08/2017: Continued circulating and conditioning CaBr2 down the drill pipe. 
"},{"   ":251,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-04-09","TEXT_REMARK":"04/09/2017: Built clean 13.9 ppg CaBr2 (14.0 ppg downhole) and started displacing the well. 

04/10/2017: Continued displacing the well with clean 13.9 ppg CaBr2 (14.0 ppg downhole) at 19 bpm (3;690 psi); pumping down choke & kill and boosting riser. Tested gravel pack service tool to 1500 psi for 5 min - good test. Circulated clean 13.9 CaBr2 (14.0 ppg downhole).

04/11/2017: Tested service tool to 1500 psi for 5 mins - good test. Closed annular and tested down backside to 500 psi - good test. Pressure tested lines from Frac boat to rig floor Frac head to 14;000 psi - good test. Functioned annulus side pop-off at 7;200 psi. Pressure tested tubing side of iron to Frac head to 13;050 psi; functioned tubing side pop-off - good test. Lined up on work string and performed Acid job. Performed Mini-Frac. M/V Baker Blue Tarpon pumped Zone #1 Frac job as per pump procedure. Layed down (L/D) Frac head. P/U to Zone #2. Perform system test at 500 psi for 5 min - good test. Test service tool seals at 1;500 psi - good test. Mud weight in hole 13.9 ppg (14.0 ppg downhole).

04/12/2017: Picked up Frac head and rigged 4" chicksan to Frac head. Pressure tested treatment lines against Frac head to 13;500 psi and tested boat pop-offs - good test. Lined up on work string and performed Acid job. Performed Mini-Frac. M/V Blue Dolphin pumped Zone #2 Frac job as per pump procedure. L/D Frac head; prepare to pull service tool to surface. Mud weight in hole 13.9 ppg (14.0 ppg downhole).

04/13/2017: Tripped out of hole (TOH) with Frac assy from 28;839' to 27;849'. Test frac sleeve and circulating sleeve from cement unit to 1;624 psi for 15 mins - good test. TOH with Frac assy service tool from 27;849' to 6;245'. Mud weight in hole 13.9 ppg (14.0 ppg downhole).

04/14/2017: TOH with Frac assy from 6;245' to surface. P/U new service tool and tripped in hole (TIH) from surface to 21;551'. Fuction tested upper and lower blind shear rams (BSR) from Driller's Control Panel (DCP) on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel (TCP) on Blue Pod. Performed BOP acoustics control test with subsea control unit 1 and functioned the lower BSRs. Mud weight in hole 13.9 ppg (14.0 ppg downhole).

04/15/2017: TIH with service tool from 21;551' to 27;727'. Test BOP from Driller's Panel on Yellow Pod on 5-7/8" drillpipe to 300/7600 psi on pipe rams; 300/4400 psi on annulars; and 300/10;000 psi for surface equipment; all with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good tests. Perform function test on BOP from Driller's Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod. Perform function test on Diverter from Toolpusher's Panel. Continue TIH with service tool from 27;727' to 28;188'. Perform system test on zone 5 down the drillpipe to 1500 psi and on the back side to 500 psi good tests. TIH to Zone 4 and perform system test down DP to 1;500 psi and backside to 500 psi - good tests. TIH to zone 3 and perform system test down DP to 1;500 psi and backside to 500 psi - good tests. 
"},{"   ":252,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-04-16","TEXT_REMARK":"04/16/2017: Rigged up Frac lines and pressure tested against Frac head to 8;000 psi - good test. Reversed out pickle at 12 barrels per minunte (bpm); maintaining constant bottom hole pressure. Pressure tested treatment lines against Frac head to 13;500 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Tested pop-off on Frac boat to 13;500 psi - good test. Spotted Acid treatment as per program. Performed Mini-Frac at 35 bpm with 75 barrels (bbl) of 9.5 ppg NaCl cross-linked gel. M/V Baker Blue Dolphin pumped zone #3 Frac job per pump procedure. Total proppant pumped: 672;848 lbs. Performed reverse circulation per schedule. Mud weight in hole 13.9 ppg CaBr2 (14.0 ppg downhole).

04/17/2017: Continued performing reverse circulation following zone #3 Frac job per schedule. Opened annular and monitored well on trip tank - well static. Trip out of hole (TOH) with service tool on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 28;632' DPM to 28;406' DPM in 13.9 ppg CaBr2 (14.0 ppg downhole) and spaced out for zone #4 Frac job. Pressure tested Frac lines against Frac head to 8;000 psi - good test. Pressure tested the treatment lines against Frac head to 13;900 psi for 10 minutes - good test. Spotted acid treatment as per program. Performed Mini-Frac at 34.3 bpm with 75 bbl of 9.5 ppg NaCl cross-linked gel. M/V Baker Blue Dolphin pumped zone #4 Frac job per pump procedure. Total proppant pumped: 662;526 lbs. Performed reverse circulation per schedule. Performed flow check - well static. 

04/18/2017: Trip out of hole (TOH) with service tool on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 28;406' DPM to 28;187' DPM in 13.9 ppg CaBr2 (14.0 ppg downhole) and spaced out for zone #5 Frac job. Pressure tested Frac lines against Frac head to 8;000 psi - good test. Pressure tested the treatment lines to 13;900 psi for 10 minutes - good test. Spotted Acid treatment as per program. Performed Mini-Frac at 35 bpm with 75 bbl of 9.5 ppg NaCl ppg cross-linked gel. M/V Baker Blue Dolphin pumped zone #5 Frac job per pump procedure. Total proppant pumped: 606;680 lbs. Performed reverse circulation per schedule. Performed flow check - well static. 

04/19/2017: TOH with service tool on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 28;193' DPM to 28;077' DPM. Performed flow check - well static. TOH from 28;077' DPM to 27;719' DPM. Performed pressure test to confirm Frac sleeve and circulation sleeve are closed - good test. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Pumped 45 bbls of 14.6 ppg CaBr2 spike fluid and displaced with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 (14.0 ppg downhole). TOH from 27;719' DPM to surface. Boosted riser at 8 bpm with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. 

04/20/2017: Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Performed function test of upper and lower blind shear rams (BSR) from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Yellow Pod. TIH with Halliburton ESTMZ Cleanout Assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from surface to 28;970' DPM in 13.9 ppg CaBr2 (14.0 ppg downhole). 

04/21/2017: Continued TIH with Cleanout Asembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 28;970' DPM to 29;165' DPM in 13.9 ppg CaBr2 (14.0 ppg downhole). Tagged fill at 29;165' DPM with 10;000 lbs down. Washed down at 3 bpm clearing fill from 29;165' DPM to 29;180' DPM. Closed annular and reverse circulated from 29;175' DPM at 8 bpm with 2;730 psi. Performed flow check - well static. Washed down from 29;175' DPM to 29;195' DPM. Closed lower annular and reverse circulated from 29;195' DPM at 11 bpm with 4;300 psi. Opened annular and performed flow check - well static. Pressure tested Frac sleeve and circulation sleeve to 500 psi - good test. TOH from 29;195' DPM to 27;763' DPM. Pressure tested Frac sleeve and circulation sleeve to 1;500 psi for 5 minutes - good test. TOH with Cleanout Assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 27;763' DPM to 6;420' DPM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

04/22/2017: Continued TOH with Cleanout Asembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 6;420' DPM to 2;396' DPM in 13.9 ppg CaBr2 (14.0 ppg downhole). TIH with Boll Weevil Test Tool (BWTT) and Nu-Tec from surface to high pressure wellhead (HPWH) at 7;118' DPM on 5-7/8" drill pipe. Performed fuction test of upper and lower blind shear rams (BSR) from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod. Performed BOP function tests of lower/upper annulars and Variable Bore Rams (VBRs) on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. TOH with BWTT and Nu-Tec to surface. Performed function test of diverter from Driller's Panel. TOH with Cleanout Assembly from 2;396' DPM to surface. Boosted riser with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 at 8 bpm. TIH with Production Isolation Assembly for zone #1 from surface to 40' DPM.
"},{"   ":253,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-04-23","TEXT_REMARK":"04/23/2017: Tripped in hole (TIH) with Production Isolation Assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from surface to 27;674' MD DPM in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - well static. 

04/24/2017: Continued TIH with Production Isolation Assembly from 27;764' MD to 27;888' MD Drill Pipe Measurement (DPM) in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - well static. Stung into Versa-Treive (VCH) packer and continued TIH from 27;888' MD to 29;189' MD DPM; opening Mid-Joint Production Sleeves (MJPS) and Frac Circulation Sleeves (FCS). Observed losses of 420 bph - 840 bph until Isolation Assembly seals landed in VCH packer and losses ceased. Performed pressure test of Fluid Isolation (FS-2) valve and VCH packer seal bore against closed lower annular to 1;000 psi for 5 minutes utilizing IPT SureTec software with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 - good test. Released Production Isolation Assembly running tool and performed flow check - well static. Top of Isolation Packer Polished Bore Receptacle (PBR) at 27;733' MD Induction Electrical Survey (IES). Tripped out of hole (TOH) with Production Isolation Assembly running tool from 27;754' MD DPM to surface while monitoring wellbore for proper fill - well static. 

04/25/2017: TIH with TNT Permanent Packer Assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from surface to 18;323' MD to 27;683' MD DPM in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - well static.

04/26/2017: Continued TIH with TNT Permanent Packer Assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 18;323' MD to 27;683' MD DPM in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - well static. Stung into Production Isolation Assembly PBR at 27;733' MD IES and landed out locator with mule shoe at 27;748' MD IES. Performed pressure test of short seal assembly against closed lower annular to 1;000 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Set TNT Permanent Packer (top of packer at 27;546' MD IES). Released running tool from TNT Permanent Packer Assembly and performed pressure test of TNT Permanent Packer and 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" tieback against closed lower annular and closed FS-2 valve to 4;000 psi for 30 minutes from the Driller's Panel - good test. Top of Seal Bore at 27;423' MD IES. All pressure tests were performed utilizing IPT Suretec software with 13.9 ppg ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2. Performed flow check - well static. TOH with TNT Permanent Packer running tool from 21;950' MD to 21;950' MD DPM. Performed BOP function tests of rams and annulars on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good tests. Continued TOH from 21;950' MD to 12;151' MD DPM while monitoring wellbore for proper fill - well static.

04/27/2017: Continued TOH from 12;151' MD to 755' MD DPM in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 while monitoring wellbore for proper fill - well static. Performed function test of Diverter from Toolpusher's Panel - good test. Continued TOH from 755' MD DPM to surface. TIH with Bore Protector Retrieval Running Tool (BPRRT) and jetting assembly from surface to 7;727' MD DPM and latched the Bore Protector at 7;118' MD DPM. Performed pressure test of BPRRT against closed lower annular to 2;000 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Opened lower annular and closed 9-5/8" fixed rams on BRPRRT. Performed pressure test of 9-5/8" fixed rams against BPRRT to 250 psi low/ 8;200 psi high - good test. All pressure tests performed utilizing IPT SureTec software with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2. Performed function test of 9-5/8" fixed rams from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod - good test. TOH with Bore Protector and jetting assembly from 7;727' MD DPM to surface.

Note: 9-5/8" fixed rams are not well control rams as outlined in approved Alternate Compliances in the RPM.

04/28/2017: Performed function tests of Upper Blind Shear Rams (UBSRs) and Lower Blind Shear Rams (LBSRs) from the Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - good tests. TIH with 4-1/2" Production Tubing (Upper Completion) from surface to 310' MD DPM. Performed external pressure test of Asphaltine Chemical Injection Mandrel (CIM) to 10;000 psi for 15 minutes - good test. Positioned Down Hole Pressure Temperature Gauge (DHPTG) at rotary and performed external pressure test to 25;000 psi for 15 min - good test. Positioned Scale Inhibitor CIM at rotary and performed external pressure test to 15;000 psi for 15 minutes - good test. All pressure tests were performed utilizing IPT SureTec software and 8.9 ppg Transaqua NAS 6 fluid. Continued TIH with Upper Completion (4-1/2" tubing and control lines) from 310' MD to 1;560' MD DPM in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 while monitoring wellbore for proper fill - well static.

04/29/2017: Continued TIH from 1;560' MD to 14;290' MD DPM in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 while monitoring wellbore for proper fill - well static.
"},{"   ":254,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-04-30","TEXT_REMARK":"04/30/2017: Continued to trip in hole (TIH) with production tubing from 14;290' MD to 17;912' MD Drill Pipe Measurement (DPM) in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - well static. Waited on weather (WOW) before picking up Surface Controlled Subsurface Safety Valve (SCSSV) to the rig floor. Installed SCSSV; terminated control lines; and performed pressure testing of both ports to 10;000 psi for 15 minutes - good tests. Performed function tests of SCSSV from each port - good tests. Terminated control line to Methanol Chemical Injection Mandrel (CIM) and performed injection test and pressure testing of connector to 10;000 psi for 15 minutes - good tests. All pressure tests were performed utilizing IPT SureTec software with 8.9 ppg Transaqua NAS 6 fluid. Continued TIH from 17;964' MD to 18;997' MD DPM.

05/01/2017: Continued TIH with production tubing from 18;997' MD to 20;377' MD DPM in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - well static. Installed the tubing hanger and terminated control lines from SCSSV and 3 CIMs to the hanger. Performed final injection tests through CIMs - good tests. Performed function tests of SCSSV through both ports 4 times each - good tests. Performed external pressure tests of the 1/2" fittings to 10;000 psi for 15 minutes - good tests. Performed external pressure tests of Down Hole Pressure-Temperature (DHPT) gauge to 15;000 psi for 15 minutes - good test. Performed external pressure tests of 3/8" fittings and SCSSV control lines to 10;000 psi for 15 minutes - good tests. Performed internal pressure tests of SCSSV lines to 10;000 psi for 15 minutes - good tests. Performed function tests of SCSSV from each port - good tests. All pressure tests were performed utilizing IPT SureTec software with 8.9 ppg Transaqua NAS 6 fluid. Installed Subsea Test Tree (SSTT) on top of tubing hanger.

05/02/2017: Performed pressure test of SSTT; SCSSV control lines; and utility stab to 10;000 psi for 15 minutes utilizing IPT SureTec software with 8.9 ppg Transaqua fluid - good test. TIH with production string on 7-5/8" landing string from 20;512' MD - 27;431' MD DPM in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - well static. Slacked off to 27;503' MD DPM to engage seals into Polished Bore Receptacle (PBR). Confirmed 55' of seal engagement. Picked up string to 10' above PBR and displaced annulus to 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) inhibited packer fluid. 

05/03/2017: Installed Coiled Tubing Lift Frame (CTLF) and Surface Flow Tree (SFT) on top of 7-5/8" landing string. Landed and set tubing hanger in Christmas Tree (XT) profile at 7;122' MD DPM (top of hanger at 7;116' MD DPM). Closed 9-5/8" rams and performed pressure test of tubing hanger upper seals to 7;600 psi for 30 minutes utilizing IPT SureTec software with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 - good test. Performed pressure test of SCSSV control lines to 10;000 psi for 15 minutes with 8.9 ppg Transaqua NAS 6 fluid - good tests. Opened 9-5/8" rams and performed hanger lockdown pressure test with Installation and Workover Control System (IWOCS) to 7;600 psi (surface)/ 12;700 psi (subsea) for 30 minutes with Methanol - good test. Performed pressure test of gallery seals to 7;600 psi (surface) / 12;700 psi (subsea) for 30 minutes with Methanol - good test. Performed production bore test to 7;600 psi (surface)/ 12;700 psi (subsea) for 30 minutes with Methanol - good test. Performed casing x tubing pressure test to 5;000 psi (surface) for 30 minutes utilizing IPT SureTec software with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 - good test. Performed pressure test of gallery seals again to 7;600 psi (surface)/ 12;700 psi (subsea) for 30 minutes with Methanol - good test. 

05/04/2017: Performed pressure test of slick line lubricator to 10;100 psi for 5 min with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - failed test. Replaced seal on chiksan and repeated pressure test - good test. Performed pressure test of landing string; SFT; and production tubing against closed Fluid Isolation (FS-2) valve to 4;700 psi (surface) for 30 min utilizing IPT SureTec software with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2- good test. Performed negative test of SCSSV with FS-2 valve closed to 4;500 psi. Bled off pressure above SCSSV from 4;700 psi to 200 psi (surface) and monitored for 30 minutes - good test. WOW. Ran in hole (RIH) with Isolation Sleeve Retrieval Tool on slick line from surface to 7;112' MD DPM. Engaged isolation sleeve and pulled out of hole (POOH) from 7;112' MD DPM to surface. Displaced kill line and landing string from 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.0 ppg (downhole) CaBr2 to 6.6 ppg base oil. RIH with Lower Crown Plug (LCP) on slick line from surface to 7;125' MD IES and set LCP. POOH from 7;125' MD IES to surface with LCP running tool. Performed pressure test of LCP from above against SFT to 10;100 psi for 15 minutes utilizing IPT SureTec software with 6.6 ppg base oil - good test. Began pressure testing LCP from below.

05/05/2017: Continued to perform pressure test of LCP from below against closed FS-2 valve to 7;200 psi (surface) for 60 minutes utilizing IPT SureTec software with 6.6 ppg base oil - good test. Displaced choke line; boost line; and riser from 13.9 ppg CaBr2 to 8.6 ppg seawater. Opened FS-2 valve and bullheaded 131.7 bbls of 6.6 ppg base oil past the SCSSV. Closed SCSSV and performed negative test of SCSSV with FS-2 valve open to 3;736 psi by bleeding pressure down from 7;196 psi to 3;460 psi (subsea) and holding for 30 minutes - good test. RIH with Upper Crown Plug (UCP) from surface to 7;121' MD IES and set UCP. Performed pressure test from above the UCP against SFT to 10;260 psi (surface)/ 12;700 psi (subsea) for 15 min minutes utilizing IPT SureTec software with 6.6 ppg base oil - good test. Began pressure testing between the UCP and LCP. 

05/06/2017: Continued pressure testing between the UCP and LCP to 12;700 psi (subsea) from IWOCS for 30 minutes utilizing IPT SureTec software with Methanol - good test. Displaced surface lines and kill line from 6.6 ppg base oil to 8.6 ppg seawater. Unlatched SSTT from tubing hanger and reversed out 6.6 base oil from landing string using 8.6 ppg seawater. TOH with SSTT on 7-5/8" landing string from 7;082' MD to 1;193' MD DPM.
"},{"   ":255,"WELL_NAME":"PS002","API12":608124011400,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-05-07","TEXT_REMARK":"05/07/2017: Continued tripping out of hole (TOH) with Subsurface Test Tree (SSTT) on 7-5/8" landing string from 1;193' MD Drill Pipe Measurement (DPM) to surface. Removed diverter and made up landing joint.

05/08/2017: Lowered tertiary tree cap and installed on Christmas Tree (XT) with subsea crane. Unlatched BOP from XT at 01:22 hrs. Moved rig from well center to Dropped Object Zone (DOZ). Pulled riser from 6;884' MD to 5;759' MD.

05/09/2017: Continued to pull riser from 5;759' MD to surface. Set BOP onto transporter and moved into setback location.

"},{"   ":256,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2011-11-24","TEXT_REMARK":"11/24/2011: Transit to St. Malo PS003 while P/U 36" conductor on AFT rotary. Deploy and Calibrate Compatts. Perform Clear Bottom Survey on entire St. Malo South drill center. Make up and run 26" jet/drilling assy.

11/25/2011: M/U and RIH with 36" casing to mud line. Jet 36" casing from 7;131' to 7;439'. Soak 36" casing (10' stick up). Release CADA tool and drill ahead to 8;267'. Displace well to 11.0 ppg SSPAD.

11/26/2011: TOH with 26" jet/drilling BHA and release CADA tool from LPWH. Reposition rig; putting FWD rotary over well center. TIH with 26" PDC/powerdrive BHA. Drill 26" hole from 8;267' to 8;817'. TOS ecountered at 8;366';


"},{"   ":257,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2011-11-27","TEXT_REMARK":"11/27/2011: 
Online: FWD - Cont drill 26" salt section from 8;817' to 9;962'.
Offline: AFT - Begin running 22" casing.

11/28/2011: 
Online: FWD - Cont drill 26" salt section from 9;962' to 10;545'. Pump weighted HiVis pill; tracer bead pill; fluid caliper and displace hole with 12.5 SSPAD. TOH with 26" assy.

Offline: AFT - Run casing from 230' to 3;364'. PU HPWHH. R/D casing equipment and prepare to TIH with inner string.

11/29/2011:
Online: FWD - TOH with 26" drlg assy. Wash wellhead. 

Online: AFT - finish running inner string. TIH with casing on landing string. Circulated 1x pipe and casing volume to clear sediment from around LPH valves. Stopped circulating and excavated area around 4" valves with ROV prior to completing circulation.

11/30/2011: 
Online: AFT - Continue excavating with ROV. Prepared equipment to sample cement returns with ROV due to poor visibility. Cemented 22" casing. Total bbls pumped = 1;939 bbls. POOH with cement stinger. 

12/01/2011: 
Online: AFT - TOH with cement stinger to surface. PS003 suspended at 10:00 hrs.

12/02/2011:  Online at WR 677 PS001.

12/03/2011:  Online at WR 677 PS001.
"},{"   ":258,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2011-12-04","TEXT_REMARK":"12/04/2011: Online: FWD ¿ Start time 13:00 hrs ¿ Stabbed 12-1/4" bit into wellhead and TIH. Tagged cement plug at 10;246'. Displaced well to 12.5 ppg preservative. TOH; ROV installed TA cap. PS003 offline at 19:30 hrs.

NOTE: Mr. Gabriel Barragan (Chevron) received verbal approval from Mrs. Amy Wilson (Houma District BSEE) to not perform a clear bottom survey on the St. Malo south drill center upon completion of batch setting operations with the MODU Discoverer India as the MODU Discoverer Inspiration will be performing operations in the same drill center (SM PS003) shortly after. A clear bottom survey will be performed upon the completion of SM PS003 operations with the Discoverer Inspiration.

12/05/2011 - 12/10/2011: Well temporarily suspended while awaiting arrival of the Inspiration; which will drill the well to TD.

"},{"   ":259,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2011-12-11","TEXT_REMARK":"12/11/2011 - 12/15/2011: Awaiting arrival of the Inspiration (currently at WR 634 #PN001) to drill the well to TD.

12/16/2011: Transit from St. Malo PN001 to location. Perform pre-job technical services for St. Malo PS003. 

12/17/2011: Perform pre-job technical services for St. Malo PS003. Set out compatts/transponders on seafloor.



"},{"   ":260,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2011-12-18","TEXT_REMARK":"12/18/2011: Continue with setup and calibration array of the compatts/transponders. Perform Heavy Lift inspection and continued with BOP work scope. 

12/19/2011: Continue with calibration of compatt array. Continue Heavy Lift Inspection and preparation of the BOP for running. 

12/20/2011: Continue Heavy Lift Inspection and BOP work scope. Mr. Xianjie (CVX) received verbal approval via email (12/20/11) from Mr. Bobby Nelson of BSEE Houma District for a waiver on conducting full seafloor survey at this well site due to poor visibility. 

12/21/2011: Completed heavy lift inspection on MDDM. Preparing to run the BOP and Riser. 

12/22/2011: Splashed BOP and tested lines. Pull BOP due to ground fault and troubleshoot. 

12/23/2011: Continue troubleshooting and repair of ground fault on BOP. Re-splash BOP and began running BOP / Riser System. Mr. Matthew Spear (CVX) notified the BSEE that we would be latching the BOP stack at WR 677 in approximately 72 hrs and then proceed with Deadman testing. Mrs. Amy Wilson with the BSEE Houma District gave permission to proceed with the testing on 12/23/11 at 12:37 p.m. 

12/24/2011: Continue running BOP and Riser. Test rigid conduit and boost line with subsea test pump to 5;000 psi. Test choke and kill lines to 250 psi low and 10;500 psi high for 5 minutes each and continuing to run BOP and Riser. On 12/24/11 at 12:42 p.m.; Mr. Matthew Spear (CVX) received verbal confirmation from Mrs. Amy Wilson that TOI ROV Function Test - Surface revision #4 Procedures is an acceptable replacement to TOI ROV Function Test - Surface revision #2 Procedures that was submitted in the RPD. Differences noted from procedures noted during the conversation were: (1) The bonnet doors were not open during the testing. Function was verified by looking down BOP. (2) USR; MVBR; and LMRP disconnect were performed at 2.5 GPM; all other functions were not metered. 
"},{"   ":261,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2011-12-25","TEXT_REMARK":"12/25/2011: Test choke and kill lines to 250 psi low / 10;500 high for 5 minutes and test boost line to 250 psi low / 5;000 psi high; tests were good. Attempt to land BOP was unsuccessful due to poor visibility.

12/26/2011: Land and Latch the BOP at 14:30 hrs and obtained a successful test on the VGX-2 ring gasket seal by pumping down the kill line to 1;000 psi for 5 minutes. Test 22" casing to 2050 psi for 35 minutes and pressure test BSR to 250 psi low / 2;050 psi high for 5 minutes on each test from the Driller's panel on Blue Pod. Function BSRs/CSRs from Driller's panel on Blue Pod and Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Perform Deadman test with ROV as per TOI procedure.

12/27/2011: Began BOP test; BOP pressure test on the rams to 250 psi low / 8;000 psi high and on the annular to 250 psi low / 5;000 psi high for 5 minutes each test from the Driller's panel on Blue Pod; BOP function test from Driller's panel on Blue Pod and Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod; and Diverter function on the Driller's panel. 

12/28/2011: Continued BOP pressure testing from Driller's panel on Blue Pod. Rams and associated valves tested to 250/8;000 psi. Annular and associated valves tested to 250/5;000 psi. Function tested Diverter from Driller's panel. Functioned BSRs/CSRs from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod.   

12/29/2011: Washed and reamed rat hole and drilled 10' of new formation. Then tested lines to 2;000 psi and perform FIT with 11.2 ppg SBM at 1020 psi and achieved a 13.0 ppg EMW at the 22" casing shoe. Began drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section to planned TD. 

12/30/2011: Continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section to planned TD. 

12/31/2011: Continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section to planned TD. 
"},{"   ":262,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-01-01","TEXT_REMARK":"01/01/2012: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 14;550' to 16;541' with 12.3 ppg SBM to 12.5 ppg SBM; increasing mud weight as per schedule.

01/02/2012: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 16;541' to 17;710' with 12.5 ppg SBM. 

01/03/2012: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 17;710' to 19;090' with 12.5 ppg SBM. KOP at 17;900'. Performed flow check at 19;072'; well static. 

01/04/2012: Displaced well from 12.5 ppg SBM to 12.2 ppg SBM. POOH to 18;883'. Flow checked well at 18;883'; well static. Continued to POOH to 18;013'. Performed Diverter and BOP function tests. Continued POOH and performed flow check at 7;706'; well static. Performed Blind Shear ram and Casing Shear ram function tests. POOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA.

01/05/2012: RIH with BOP test assembly and performed BOP function test on drill pipe and pressure tested choke manifold; BOP stack and associated values to 250/6;500 psi with 12.2 ppg SBM. Annular and associated values tested to 250/5;000 psi with 12.2 ppg SBM. 

01/06/2012: Continued pressure testing BOP rams and associated valves to 250/6;500 psi with 12.2 ppg SBM. Tested Annular and associated valves to 250/5;000 psi with 12.2 ppg SBM. POOH with BOP test assembly and RIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA. Aft mousehole cable failure at 09:50 hrs.

01/07/2012: Performed Blind Shear ram and Casing Shear ram function tests. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Performed flow check at 4;481'; well static. TIH to 19;080'. Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;080' to 19;152' with 12.2 ppg SBM. Displaced well from 12.2 ppg SBM to 11.8 ppg SBM.
"},{"   ":263,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-01-08","TEXT_REMARK":"01/08/2012: Perform flow check at 19;152'; well static. Short trip to 18;763'. TIH and continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;152' to 19;516' with 11.8 ppg SBM.

01/09/2012: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;516' to 19;573' with 11.8 ppg SBM. Perform flow check at 19;569'; well static. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;573' to 19;783' with 11.8 ppg SBM. Perform flow check at 19;600'; well static.

01/10/2012: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;783' to 19;867' with 11.8 ppg SBM. 

01/11/2012: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 19;867' to 20;069' with 11.8 ppg SBM. Circulate bottoms up at 19;974. Perform well control kick drill while drilling; well secure in 4 minutes. Perform second well control kick drill while drilling; well secure in 2 minutes 50 seconds.

01/12/2012: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 20;069' to 20;160' with 11.8 ppg SBM. Perform well control kick drill while drilling; well secure in 3 minutes 40 seconds. Perform flow check at 20;128'; well static. POOH from 20;160' to 10;941'. Perform flow check at 10;941'; well static. POOH from 10;941' to 8;263'. Function test BOP at 8;263'. Function test Diverter at 8;263'. POOH from 8;263' to 7;000'. Perform well control kick drill while tripping; well secure in 2 minutes 48 seconds.  

01/13/2012: POOH from 7;000' to surface with a mud weight of 11.8 ppg SBM. Perform flow check at 996'; well static. Perform Blind Shear ram and Casing Shear ram function tests. TIH from surface to 1;067' with a mud weight of 11.8 ppg SBM. Perform flow check at 1;067'; well static. TIH from 1;067' to 10;664' and activate reamer.

01/14/2012: Continue to TIH with 18-1/8" BHA. Reamed hole from 19;100' to 19;402'. TIH from 19;402' to 20;057'. Reamed from 20;057'. Lost 584 psi on stand pipe pressure and lost communication with the power drive. Circulate bottoms up. Trip in slowly; washing down with maximum of 8k and rotate at 2 rpm. P/U off bottom and continue circulating bottoms up. Perform flow check at 20;142'; well static. POOH from 20;142' to 18;700'.
"},{"   ":264,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-01-15","TEXT_REMARK":"01/15/2012: Performed Well Control Kick drill while tripping. POOH for BOP testing and to change BHA.

01/16/2012: Continued to POOH and performed Well Control Kick drill. Function tested blind shear rams and casing shear rams from Driller's panel on the Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's panel on the Blue Pod and begin BOP Pressure test with 11.8 ppg SBM. 

01/17/2012: BOP pressure test on the rams to 250 psi low / 6;500 psi high and on the annular to 250 psi low / 5;000 psi high for 5 minutes each test from the Driller's panel on Blue Pod. BOP function test from Driller's panel on Blue Pod and Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod; and Diverter function on the Driller's panel. All tests were performed with 11.8 ppg SBM. Continue to TIH and test the choke manifold. 

01/18/2012: Complete the testing of the choke manifold valves to 250 psi low / 6;500 psi high and buffer valves to 250 psi low / 5;000 psi high. Tested two 6-5/8" FOSV's and two 6-5/8" IBOP's to 250 psi low / 6;500 psi high for 5 minutes each. Continued to TIH; record slow circulation rates at 20;150' MD with 11.8 ppg and begin drilling at 20;162' MD with new BHA to 20;285' MD.

01/19/2012: Continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 20;285' MD to 20;670' MD.

01/20/2012: Continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 20;670' MD to 21;622' MD. Performed Well Control Kick drill while drilling; well secure. 

01/21/2012: Continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 21;622' MD to 22;756' MD. Performed Well Control Pit drill and Well Control Kick drill while drilling; well secure.
"},{"   ":265,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-01-22","TEXT_REMARK":"01/22/2012: Continue drilling 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 22;756' MD to total depth of 23;362' MD / 23;294' TVD. 
Note: Verbal approval was granted by Amy Wilson (BSEE) at 4:23 p.m. on 1/22/12 to exceed the permitted section TVD by 100' in order to reach the planned casing setting depth. 

01/23/2012: Performed Well Control Kick Drill while tripping out to pick up Special BOP Test Tool and Dual Cam to test BOP. Pressure tested BSR with 250 psi low / 6500 psi high for 5 minutes each test from the Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod using 11.8 ppg mud. BSR/CSR function test from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod and Driller's panel on Blue Pod.

01/24/2012: Performed BOP function test from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod; and Diverter function from the Toolpusher's panel. POOH and racked back BHA and run in hole with Schlumberger USIT logging tools casing evaluation log from 9;595' to 10;475' MD and no indication of irregularities of the 22" casing were observed. 

01/25/2012: Continued to run Schlumberger USIT logging tools casing evaluation log from 7;650' to 9;595' MD and no indication of irregularities of the 22" casing were observed. POOH; rig down wireline equipment and trip in with wiper trip BHA. 

01/26/2012: Trip in hole and perform BOP pressure test on the rams to 250 psi low / 6;500 psi high and on the annular to 250 psi low / 5;000 psi high for 5 minutes each test from the Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod; BOP function test from Driller's panel on Blue Pod and Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod; and Diverter function on the Driller's panel. Continue to trip in hole while monitoring well on trip tank.

01/27/2012: Continue to TIH and CBU to above BOPs and perform well check at 15;690'; well static. TIH and ream from 18;902' to 19;540' and perform another flow check; well static; and then resume tripping in hole.

01/28/2012: Continue to TIH and ream open hole from 23;194' to 23;296'; open 18-1/8" rathole to 21" hole from 23;251' to 23;268'. Wash and ream 18-1/8" rathole from 23;313' to 23;347' with 11.8 ppg mud. Circulate Hi-Vis sweep and 100 bbls of 60 lbs/bbl LCM. Spot 16.0 ppg pill in rathole and shut down pumps and flow checked well; well took 6 bbls in 30 minutes. Circulated an additional 100 bbls of 60 lbs/bbl LCM followed by 100 bbls of 45 lbs/bbl Tiger bullet sweep and continued to POOH.
"},{"   ":266,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-01-29","TEXT_REMARK":"01/29/2012: POOH with 18-1/8" x 21" wiper trip assembly to the shoe while taking minor losses. Flow check well at shoe - well took 7 bbls in 15 minutes. Function test BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe. POOH to surface. Flow check well - well static. Rig up Frank's 16" casing handling equipment.

01/30/2012: Finish rigging up 16" casing handling equipment. Run 160 joints of 16.04" 109.6# HPQ-125 and 16" 97# HPQ-125 with minor losses.

01/31/2012: Run 171 joints of 16.04" 109.6# HPQ-125 and 16" 97# HPQ-125 casing with minor losses. Flow check well - well flowing at ~0.5 bpm. Shut in well - no pressure build-up observed. Pump 15.7 ppg riser cap. Flow check well - well took 15 bbls in 20 min. Run 171 joints of 16.04" 109.6# HPQ-125 and 16" 97# HPQ-125 casing with minor losses. 

02/01/2012: Finish running in hole with 19 joints of 16" casing with minor losses. Pick up hanger and run 16" casing on landing string with minor losses. While running on landing string; well began flowing back three(3) times at a low rate (0.2 - 1 bpm) - pump 15.7 ppg riser cap to return well to static. Pick up cement head and land 16" hanger; shoe depth of 23;227'.

02/02/2012: Mix; pump; and displace 16" cement job with 9;355 ft3 of cement with partial losses. Flow check well - well flowing at 1 bpm. Shut in annular on landing string after cement job and wait on cement. Wellhead pressure increase by 137 psi.

02/03/2012: Wait on cement with annular closed. Open choke to bleed pressure off backside - pressure not bleeding off. Pump 15.7 ppg riser cap. Open annular; flow check - well taking 0.8 bpm. Set and release 16" casing hanger seal assembly. Flow check - well static. Condition mud in riser. Function test BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe. POOH with 6-5/8" landing string.

02/04/2012: Finish POOH with 6-5/8" landing string and hanger running tool. Test casing and BSR to 4;600 psi. RIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA to 7;442'. Bit taking weight and could not pass. POOH to change BHA.
"},{"   ":267,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-02-05","TEXT_REMARK":"02/05/2012: POOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA. TIH with 14-1/2" cleanout assembly. Wash and ream from 7;425' to 7;620'. Flow check - static. POOH cleanout assembly. Perform Well Control Kick Drill while tripping.

02/06/2012: TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" drilling BHA to 6;463'. Perform Well Control Kick Drill while tripping. Slip and cut drill line. Continue to TIH with drilling BHA to 10;466'. Flow check - static. Continue to TIH with drilling BHA to 13;136'. M/U double dutch stand for BOP test.

02/07/2012: Pressure test BOPs utilizing test rams on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod; rams and associated valves to 250/6500 psi; annular and associated valves to 250/5000 psi. Pressure test BOPs utilizing test rams on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod; rams and associated valves to 250/6500 psi. All test performed from Schlumberger unit monitoring with IPT system using 11.8 ppg for 5/5 minutes. Function test BOPs from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod. Function diverter from Toolpusher's Panel. Continue to TIH with drilling assembly. Perform choke drill. Tag top of cement inside 16" casing at 22;556'. Drill out cement from 22;556' to 22;610'.

02/08/2012: Continue drilling cement from 22;610' to 23;036' while raising mud weight to 13.0 ppg. Circulate and condition mud. Close annular and perform 16" casing test to 3200 psi for 15 minutes. Continue to drill cement from 23;036' to 23;337'. Last observed cement at 23;274'

02/09/2012: Drill out rat hole from 22;337' to 22;262' and drill 10' new formation. Circulate and condition mud. Perform Leak Off Test. Leak off at 950 psi; 13.7 ppg EMW. Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 23;372' to 23;810'. Perform Well Control Kick Drill while drilling.

02/10/2012: Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 23;810' to 24;811'. Perform Well Control Kick Drill while drilling.

02/11/2012: Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" from 24;811' to 25;252' while circulating 13.3 ppg SBM. Circulate bottoms up from 25;252' to check for indications of Pore Pressure being close to balance after resistivity-derived pore pressure exceeded surface mud weight. Gas on bottoms up 2 units and no other indications of high pore pressure were found. Perform bag test on gas detection system to check for proper functioning - ok. Drill from 25;252' to 25;655'.
"},{"   ":268,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-02-12","TEXT_REMARK":"No Wireline Logs Run 02/12/2012: Continue drilling 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section to TD. Preparing well to POOH. Began POOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" drilling assembly to 16;887'.

02/13/2012: Continue POOH with assembly. Function test BOPs from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod. Also function tested Diverter from Driller's panel. Continue with POOH to surface to pick up and trip in with Nominal Bore Protector. 

02/14/2012: Trip in hole with dedicated string to set Nominal Bore Protector in HPWH. Wash and set the same. POOH to surface and rig up and begin running 14" liner string.  

02/15/2012: Continue tripping in on landing string to 14" liner setting depth at 25;560'. Circulate and condition mud; prepare to cement 14" liner in place. 

02/16/2012: Continue to circulate and condition mud. Observed 7 bbl gain in the pits while circulating. Performed a flow check and observed a 20.7 bbl gain. Staged rig pumped and incurred 90 bbls of losses. Shut-in well and circulated influx out on choke; incurring 90% losses; which were calculated to be occurring at the 16" shoe. Proceed with cement job on 14" liner with the annular and C/K lines closed.  

02/17/2012: Completed WOC. Circulated well on choke and monitored for flow. Well static. Flushed C/K lines. Began POOH with hanger RT / LS to 15;674'. 

02/18/2012: Continue POOH with hanger RT / LS to surface. Function tested BSRs/CSRs from Driller's panel Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's panel Blue Pod. Test 14" liner and BSRs to 250 psi for 5 mins / 2800 psi for 30 mins from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. 
"},{"   ":269,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-02-19","TEXT_REMARK":"02/19/2012: Tripped in hole with Weatherford second trip PBR to 17;712'. 

02/20/2012: Continue tripping in with PBR to set on depth. Set PBR; tripped out with running tool to BOP testing depth. Function test BOPs from Driller's panel on Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Function test Diverter from Toolpusher's panel. Perform negative test. Pressure test lines to 4;000 psi; pumped 118 bbls of base oil down drill pipe to final pressure 1;780 psi. Monitored well for 1 hour. Well static. Test BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe using test rams and associated valves to 250/6500 psi from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow ppd. Test annular and associated valves to 250/5000 psi. 

02/21/2012: Continue totTest BOPs using test rams from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod; rams and associated valves to 250/6500 psi. Function tested BOP from the Driller's panel on Blue Pod and Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Functioned Diverter from Driller's panel. Continue to TOH with PBR set tool to surface. Rigged-up wireline to log 16" casing using CBL/USIT assembly. Completed testing on Choke manifold; 250/6500 psi on front side valves; 250/5000 psi on buffer valves. POOH with CBL/USIT logging assembly to surface.

02/22/2012: Tripped in hole to retrieve Nominal Bore Protector. Perform partial function on CSRs; BSRs; and VBRs. Wash BOP stack and continue to trip in and latched NBP. POOH with recovered NBP to surface. 

02/23/2012: Tripped in with 13-3/4" tieback string to above the BOP stack. Suspended operations; monitoring weather conditions.  

02/24/2012: Continue to suspend operations due to impending weather conditions. 

02/25/2012: Continue to suspend operations due to impending weather conditions.    
"},{"   ":270,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-02-26","TEXT_REMARK":"02/26/2012: Run 13-3/4" tieback liner from 6;650' to 10;973'. Monitor well on one pit system; well static. Convert float equipment at 8.5 bpm and 480 psi pressure drop. Run 13-3/4" tieback liner from 10;973' to 15;304'; filling pipe every 1000'. Monitor well on one pit system; well static.

02/27/2012: Run 13-3/4" tieback liner from 15;304' to 22;432' and landed same (14.5' inside PBR). M/U Blackhawk cement stand and monitored well on trip tank. Well was static.

02/28/2012: Cement 13-3/4" tieback with 202 bbls/ 1136 ft3/ 806 sx lead cement and 74 bbls/415 ft3/364 sx tail cement. Displaced cement with 13.3 ppg SBM and upper plug bumped float collar. Held 500 psi over circulating pressure which was 1953 psi. Bled pressure off at cement unit and floats held. Volume bled back was 18 bbls. Set Dril-Quip 13-3/4" hanger seal assembly. Function test BOPs from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod. Function test diverter from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod. Pressure test Dril-Quip hanger seal assembly using 13.3 ppg SBM to 250 psi low pressure / 5000 psi high; hold both for 5 minutes. Flow check well and well was static. POOH with hanger RT assembly to 6;933' and monitor well on trip tank. Well was static.

02/29/2012: TOH to 4;267' with Dril-Quip casing hanger seal assembly running tool (CHSART) and monitor well on trip tank. Well was static. L/D CHASART; TIH with lead impression tool. POOH to 7;037'; sheared test sub with 3875 psi and monitored well for 5 min. Well was static. TOH to 2529' and monitored well on trip tank. Well was static.  

03/01/2012: TIH to 9;647' and flow checked well for 5 min. Well was static. RIH with Lockdown Sleeve and set Lockdown ring. POOH with Lockdown sleeve. RIH with Nominal Bore Protector to 7;121'.

03/02/2012: Pressure test 13-3/4" casing and BSRs to 250/2700 psi. Bled back 18.75 bbls. MW 13.3 ppg. Pressure tested BSR from Driller's panel on Blue Pod; function tested BSR/CSR from Driller's panel on Blue Pod and Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. TIH to 915' and monitored well on trip tank. Well was static. Tested choke manifold valves (front side); FOSV's & IBOP's to 250/6500 psi; choke manifold buffer valves 250/5000 psi 5 minutes each. Utilized IPT for all tests. TIH to 6;071' and monitored well on trip tank. Well was static. Pressure tested BOPs to 250/6500 psi and annular 250/5000 psi. All tests using 13.3 ppg SBM for 5/5 min. Utilized IPT system for all tests. Monitoring wellhead pressure and trip tank throughout BOP test; well static.

03/03/2012: Pressure test BOPs from Driller's panel on Blue Pod - rams and associated valves to 250/6500 psi; annular and associated valves to 250/5000 psi. All tests performed with Schlumberger unit using 13.3 ppg SBM. Utilized IPT system for all tests. Monitored wellhead pressure and trip tank throughout BOP test; well static. Function test diverter from Driller's panel. Function test BOPs from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. TIH wtih 12-1/4" BHA to 21;706' and monitored well on trip tank. Well was static. MW = 13.3 ppg. Wash to 22;270'; tag float collar @ 22;270'. Decided to re-test BOPs due to wrong benchmark test being used to validate the BOP tests. Flow check well at 22;270'. Well was static. TOH to 12;971' and monitored well on trip tank. Well was static.
"},{"   ":271,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-03-04","TEXT_REMARK":"03/04/2012: Complete pressure test on BOP stack; utilizing IPT Suretec system for all tests - rams and associated valves to 250 / 6;500 psi and annular and associated valves to 250 / 5;000 psi with 13.3 ppg SBM. Monitored wellhead pressure and trip tank throughout BOP test; well static. Function test diverter and BOPs. Trip in hole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly to 14;609' MD. Pressure test choke manifold to 250 / 6;500 psi offline; utilizing IPT Suretec system for all tests.

03/05/2012: Trip in hole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly to top float collar in 13-3/4" tieback casing at 22;270' MD. Drill out tieback shoe track; from 22;270' MD to 22;403' MD. Wash/ream down to top of cement in 14" liner at 25;200' MD.

03/06/2012: Pressure test 14" liner and 13-3/4" tieback with 13.3 ppg SBM to 2;800 psi for 30 min. Drill cement and 14" shoe track from 22;520' MD to 25;606' MD; while displacing from 13.3 ppg mud to 14.1 ppg mud. Drill 10' of new formation from 25;683' MD to 25;693' MD. Circulate cuttings into riser.

03/07/2012: Continue to circulate cuttings into riser in preparation for FIT. Perform flow check; well static. Perform FIT with 13.8 ppg SBM to 14.8 ppg EMW at 14" shoe. Drill 12-1/4" hole section from 25;693' MD to 25;975' MD while displacing mud system from 13.8 ppg to 14.1 ppg SBM. Continue drilling 12-1/4" hole section from 25;975' MD to 26;269' MD.

03/08/2012: Drill 12-1/4" hole section from 26;269' MD to core point at 26;752' MD with 14.1 ppg SBM. Simulate a connection and circulate hole clean. No increase in connection gas observed at bottoms up.

03/09/2012: Continue circulating at core point (26;752' MD). Flow check well; well static. Pull out of hole to 4;747' MD. Flow checks performed at 14;341' MD; 13;672' MD; and 8;604' MD - well static. Function test BSRs/CSRs; while monitoring well on trip tank (well static). Continue pulling out of hole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly.

03/10/2012: Pull out of hole and rack back 12-1/4" drilling assembly. Pick up and run in hole with 12-1/4" coring assembly. Function test BSRs/CSRs before crossing BOP stack with bit; while monitoring well on trip tank - well static.
"},{"   ":272,"WELL_NAME":"PS003","API12":608124005600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-03-11","TEXT_REMARK":"03/11/2012: Continue to TIH with 12-1/4" Coring Assembly from 16;744' MD to 25;485' MD. Flow check performed at 24;855' MD; well static. Function test BOPs from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod. Function test Diverter from Toolpusher's panel. Continue to trip in hole with 12-1/4" Coring Assembly from 25;485' MD to 26;752' MD. Drill core from 26;752' MD to 26;781' MD.

03/12/2012: Drill core from 26;781' MD to 26;974' MD. Flow check performed; well static. Pump out of hole from 26;974' MD to 25;485' MD. Circulated bottoms up. Flow check performed; well static. POOH with 12-1/4" Coring Assembly from 25;485' MD to 16;744' MD.

03/13/2012: Continue to POOH with 12-1/4" Coring Assembly from 16;744' MD to surface. Slip and cut drill line.

03/14/2012: Continue slip and cut of drill line. TIH with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from surface to 496' MD. Function BSRs/CSRs from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod. Continue tripping in the hole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 1;406' to BOP test stands located at +/- 13;272' MD. Pressure test BOPs on 5-7/8" and 6-5/8" drill pipe utilizing from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Tested rams and associated valves to 250/6;500 psi. Tested annular and associated valves to 250/4;800 psi. All tests performed from SLB using 14.1 ppg SBM. Utilizing IPT system for all tests.

03/15/2012: Continue BOP pressure test. Function test BOPs from Driller's panel on Blue Pod. Function test Diverter from Driller's panel. Continue tripping in the hole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 13;272' MD to 26;532' MD. Wash; ream; and log from 26;532' to 26;974'. Drill 12-1/4" hole from 26;974' MD to 27;036' MD.

03/16/2012: Continue to drill 12-1/4" hole from 27;036' MD to 28;276' MD. Flow checked performed; well static. Performed a static influx test. Circulate B/U.

03/17/2012: Continue to circulate B/U with no indications from the static influx test. Flow check performed; well static. POOH from 28;276' MD to 10;000' MD. Flow check performed at 25;254'; well static. Perform function test of BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod. Function test diverter from Toolpusher's panel. Continue to POOH from 10;000' MD to 6;961' MD.
