Note: On 02/10/2016 at 19:16 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson provided 24 hour extension of BOP testing to Mr. Chris Gerlitz via email.

02/11/2016: Tested Lock Down Sleeve to 8;000 psi. Tested SSTV rams against MVBR rams to 250/8;000 psi for 5 min; good test. Pulled out of hole from 11;403' to 1;739'. Made up 10-3/4" storm packer and storm valve with diverter sub. Tripped in hole with storm packer to 10;292' (8;515' packer depth.) Located tool joint and set packer at 8;515'. Positive pressure tested packer to 1;000 psi for 15 min; good test. Negative tested packer to 2;550 psi for 30 min with no flow; good test.

02/12/2016: Displaced well and riser to seawater at 8;500'. Pulled out of hole with packer setting tool. Rigged up riser equipment. Laid out diverter. Made up landing joint. Scoped in slip joint. Unlatch BOP (22:04 hrs). Remove SDC ring and storm loops.

Note: On 02/12/2016 at 18:15 hrs; Mr. Chris Gerlitz received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson for a 6 hour BOP test extension.

02/13/2016: Laid out landing joint; 16' heavy walled pup joint. Rigged down choke; kill; boost and rigid conduit drape hoses. Removed IWOCS umbilical saddle and vertebrae. Lay out termination joint and 10' pup joint. Pick-up joint #91 above rotary and land #90 in the gimble. Split weight between gimble and MDDM. BOP stack at 6;798'. Transit 1;500' south of SM PS004 to DOZ. Split AFT rotary sock 6' from the top. Installed in the rotary in place of outer ring. Installed adapter plate and master bushings. PJSM. Installed rigging in the crown and pulled mouse hole. Removed rigging in the crown. Prepped lifting assembly for running SSPT. Made up pad eye sub on 6-5/8" 50# drill pipe to tree lifting assembly. Skidded tree to well center and made up lifting assembly. Ran SSPT to 1;210' on 6-5/8" 50# drill pipe. Repaired leak on AFT MDDM hydraulic block. TIH with SSPT to 6;500'. Transit rig to 200' south of PS004 wellhead; removed TA cap w/ROV and TIH with SSPT to 7;032'. Positioned rig over SM PS004 wellhead. Note: Unlatched from SM PS004 to install SSPT.
"},{"   ":315,"WELL_NAME":"PS004","API12":608124005800,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-02-14","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.

02/14/2016: Landed out SSPT on wellhead at 7;117'. M/V Juan C ROV locked SSPT into place and the DCL ROV confirmed post lock heading. DCL ROV performed gasket pressure test with Transaqua HT to 12;500 psi (subsea) for 15 minutes - good test. POOH with landing string. Made up termination joint and slip joint. Pressure tested choke and kill lines to 250/11;500 psi for 5 minutes - good tests. Pressure tested boost and rigid conduit lines to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes - good test. 

Note: On 02/14/2016 at 13:18 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) provided Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) written approval to proceed with latch up and BOP testing.

02/15/2016: Positioned rig over SM PS004 well center. Landed and latched BOP on SSPT. Confirmed connector lock pressure to 3;000 psi with 11.9 gal on Blue Pod; SEM B. Performed pull and slump tests - good tests. Closed BSRs and performed BOP connector test to 1;000 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Installed and locked diverter. TIH with 5-7/8" workstring and storm packer retrieving tool. Performed diverter flow test - good test. Continued TIH with Boll Weevil Test Tool (BWTT) and Dual Cam tool to 1;429'. 

02/16/2016: TIH with storm packer retrieving tool; BWTT; and Dual Cam from 1;429' to 7;790'. Pressure tested BOPs on 5-7/8" workstring from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; for 5 minutes each with 8.6 ppg seawater as per IPT plan: Tested VBRs and IBOP valves to 250/11;300 psi - good test; annular and associated valves to 250/6;300 psi - good test; Kelly hose to 250/7;000 psi - good test. Function tested BOPs from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod. Function tested Diverter from Driller's Panel. Landed BWTT and released Dual Cam tool. Began pressure testing BSRs to 250/11;300 psi for 5 minutes from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; per IPT test plan - good test. 

Note: On 02/16/2016 at 20:32 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) notified Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) that Chevron may proceed with TIH above RTTS & displacing well from 8.6 ppg seawater to 14.0 ppg SBM; retrieve RTTS and POOH; TIH with 8.5" cleanout BHA and tag cement above orifice collar.

02/17/2016: Completed BOP pressure testing. Function tested UBSR/LBSR from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow pod. Performed Diverter function test from Driller's Panel. Engaged Dual Cam and POOH one stand. POOH with Dual Cam and BWTT to surface and TIH with storm packer retrieving tool to 8;452'. Displaced riser to 14.0 ppg SBM above storm packer. TIH and latched onto 10-3/4" storm packer (RTTS) at 8;501'. Released RTTS and monitored well on mini strip tank - well static. 

Note: On 02/17/2016 at 10:05 hrs; Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) notified Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) that the DCL has detected a BOP control fluid leak on the upper inner kill (UIK). The flying lead is stabbed in the UIK port; in open position with no leaks and all panels working. Chevron is requesting permission to resume operations with the flying lead installed and control the UIK function in this manner. 

Note: On 2/17/2016 at 18:58 hrs; Mr. Chris Gerlitz notified Mr. Bobby Nelson that  3rd party certification for the flying lead function of UIK was submitted and received the approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson via email at 19:27 hrs to proceed with permitted operations.

02/18/2016: TOH with RTTS to surface. TIH with cleanout assembly to 23;852'. Washed down from 23;852' to 24;118'.
 
02/19/2016: Washed down and tagged 10-3/4" x 9-7/8" tieback cement at 24;249'. Drilled out orifice collar and shoe track from 24;249' to 24;529'. Washed and reamed to 24;570'. 

02/20/2016: Continued to wash and ream from 24;570' down to bridge plug at 28;143'. Drilled bridge plug from 28;143' to 28;146'.
"},{"   ":316,"WELL_NAME":"PS004","API12":608124005800,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-02-21","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.

02/21/2016: Drilled out bridge plug from 28;143' to 28;147'. Washed and reamed from 28;147' to top float collar at 28;520'. Drilled out float collar and cement from 28;520' to 28;581'. 

02/22/2016: Continued drilling out cement from 28;581' MD to 28;655' MD. Drilled out bottom float collar from 28;655' MD to 28;658' MD. Pumped a Hi-Vis sweep and circulated two bottoms up. Flow checked - well static. TOH from 28;658' MD to 24;521' MD. Pumped a Hi-Vis sweep and circulated surface to surface while washing the tieback gap between bottom of seal stem and bottom of PBR.

02/23/2016: Function tested BOP from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good tests. Function tested diverter from Toolpusher's Panel. TOH with cleanout BHA from 24;521' MD to 8;055' MD. Flow checked well prior to pulling non-shearable BHA through the BOP - well static. Continued TOH from 8;055' MD to surface. Function tested UBSR/LBSR from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod. RIH with GR/Junk Basket with 8.375" gauge ring on wireline to 28;660' IES (Induction Electrical Survey). POOH with wireline assembly; logging up to 27;330' IES. 

02/24/2016: Continue to POOH with wireline assembly to surface. Changed out the 8.375" gauge ring to an 8.30" gauge ring. TIH with GR/Junk Basket with 8.30" gauge ring assembly on E-line to 28;674' IES. POOH with GR/Junk Basket with 8.30" gauge ring assembly from 28;674' IES to surface. RIH with cement bond log assembly on E-line from surface to 28;652' IES (22 ft above PBTD) to verify TOC in production liner. Logged up to 25;700' and continued to log from 24;600' to 24;430'. Located tieback gap from 24;520' to 24;534' IES. POOH to 20;500'. 

02/25/2016; Continued POOH with cement bond log assembly from 20;500' IES to surface. RIH on E-Line with ReSOLVE setting tool to set high differential bridge plug in 9-7/8" shoe track at ~28;645' IES. POOH with ReSOLVE setting tool to surface. TIH with 8.5" bit and MI-Swaco displacement assemblies to 2;650' MD. Functioned tested UBSR/LBSR on Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - good tests. Continued TIH with MI-Swaco displacement assemblies to 12;586' MD. Note: TOC in 9-7/8" liner is 25;844'.
Offline: Pressure tested casing against UBSRs and high differential bridge plug to 8;000 psi for 30 minutes using 14.0 ppg SBM - good test.

02/26/2016; Continued TIH with MI-Swaco displacement assemblies and tagged high differential bridge plug at 28;644' MD. Function tested diverter from Driller's Panel. Performed a direct displacement with spacers from 14.0 ppg SBM to 14.0 ppg CaBr2 completion brine (730 bbls pumped). 

02/27/2016: Continued displacing well from 14.0 ppg SBM to 14.0 ppg CaBr2 completion brine (5;060 bbls total). Began cleaning mud system lines and equipment. 
"},{"   ":317,"WELL_NAME":"PS004","API12":608124005800,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-02-28","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.

02/28/2016: Continued cleaning mud system surface lines. 

02/29/2016: Continued cleaning mud system surface lines. POOH to 28;442' MD. Pressure tested BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; with 14.0 ppg CaBr2 brine. Tested annular and associated valves to 250/4;300 psi for 5 minutes each - test good. Tested Kelly hose to 250/7;000 psi for 5 minutes each - good test. Tested VBRs and associated valves to 250/8;000 psi for 5 minutes each - good test. Tested MDDM and associated valves to 250/10;000 psi for 5 minutes each - good test. Performed BOP function test from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. Performed diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel.

03/01/2016: Continued cleaning mud system surface lines. Washed down and tagged plugged packer at 28;642' MD. Reversed circulated the wellbore. Activated SABS tool (diverter) and washed BOP. Circulated 1.5x bottoms up from the wellhead. 

03/02/2016: Deactivated SABS tool (diverter) and washed down and tagged plugged packer at 28;642' MD. Circulate and filtered 14.0 ppg CaBr2 to spec. POOH with cleanout assembly to 9;469' MD.

03/03/2016: Continued POOH with cleanout assembly from 9;469' to surface. Rigged up wireline. RIH with sump packer/RESOLVE tool/GR/CCL wireline assembly and set sump packer at 28;398' IES. POOH with wireline assembly to surface. Rigged down wireline and began slipping 4;000' of new drill line from deadman to FWD drawworks.

Offline: Pressure tested casing against UBSRs and high differential bridge plug to 8;000 psi for 30 minutes using 14.0 ppg CaBr2 from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good test. Pressure tested UBSRs and LBSRs against high differential bridge plug to 250/8;000 psi for 5 minutes each from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good test. Function tested UBSRs and LBSRs from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod - good test.

03/04/2016; Continued slipping 4;000' of new drill line from deadman to FWD drawworks. Changed out swivel packing on FWD MDDM and pressure tested to 250/7;000 psi - good test. TIH with Tubing Conveyed Perforating (TCP) assembly to 16;519' MD. 

03/05/2016: Continued to TIH with TCP assembly and tagged sump packer at 28;381' MD DPM. Picked up to place TCP guns on depth at 28;363' MD DPM. Successfully fired TCP guns and established an initial loss rate of 22 bph. Opened annular and monitored well on trip tank; losses at 22 bph. Reversed circulating at 5 bpm with 40 bph losses. Monitored well on trip tank and established loss rate of 11 bph. POOH with TCP assembly from 28;363' to 25;028' MD DPM. 
"},{"   ":318,"WELL_NAME":"PS004","API12":608124005800,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-03-06","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.

03/06/2016: POOH with Tubing Conveyed Perforating (TCP) gun assembly from 25;028' to 9;633'. Closed annular and staged pumps up; pumping down the drill pipe and up the choke and kill lines. Flow checked well for 15 min. Loss rate = 9 bbl/hr. Opened annular. Flow checked well for 15 min. Loss rate = 9 bbl/hr. Function tested BOPs from Driller's Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod - Ggood test. Function tested diverter from Driller's Panel - good test. Continued to POOH with TCP gun assembly from 9;633' to 2;208'. Laid down TCP gun assembly from 2;208' to 370'; verified all shots.  

03/07/2016: Continued to POOH; laying down TCP gun assembly from 370' to surface. Verified all shots were fired in the loaded guns. Made up de-burr assembly as per tally and TIH on 5-7/8" DP to 26;956'. Washed and reamed from 26;956' to 27;087'. 

03/08/2016: Washed and reamed de-burring perfs from 27;087' to 28;330'. Stung in 4" mule shoe and wash pipe on de-burr assembly into sump packer at 28;381' and TIH to 28;544'. Landed out no-go on sump packer at 28;381' DPM. Circulate 120 bbls at 6 bbl/min and 660 psi. POOH above top perfs from 28;544' to 26;955'. Monitored well on trip tank; loss rate = 7.5 bbl/hr. TIH to 28;544' and re-landed no-go on sump packer at 28;381' DPM. POOH from 28;544' to 25;876'. Pressure tested BOPs on 6-5/8" pipe from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod using 14.0 ppg CaBr2. Tested annular and valves to 250 psi low/ 4;300 psi high (good). Tested kelly hose to 250 psi low/ 7;000 psi high (good). Tested VBRs and valves to 250 psi low/ 8;000 psi high (good). Tested upper and middle MDDM and valves to 250 psi low/ 10;000 psi high (good). 

03/09/2016: Tested top drive and associated valves to 250 psi low/ 10;000 psi (good). Tested BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod using 14.0 ppg CaBr2. Tested annular and valves to 250 psi low/ 4;300 psi high (good). Tested VBRs and valves to 250 psi low/ 8;000 psi high (good). POOH with de-burr assembly from 25;876' to 8;876'. Flow checked well on trip tank; loss rate = 7 bbl/hr. Continued to POOH with de-burr assembly from 8;876' to surface. 

03/10/2016: Monitored well on trip tank; loss rate = 7 bbl/hr. Waited on weather. TIH with gravel pack assembly equipment (Zone 1) from surface to 1;826'.

03/11/2016: TIH with gravel pack assembly equipment (Zone 1) from 1;826' to 1;936'. Tested Zone 1 to 250 psi for 5 mins (good test). Picked up and TIH with gravel pack assembly equipment (Zone 2) from 1;936' to 2;193'. Tested to 250 psi for 5 min (good test). Picked up and TIH with gravel pack assembly equipment (Zone 3) from 2;193' to 2;751'. Tested to 250 psi for 5 min (good test). Picked up and TIH with gravel pack assembly equipment (Zone 4) from 2;751' to 3;075'. M/U service tool fishing assembly and TIH with 4" wash pipe fishing string.

03/12/2016: TIH with 4" wash pipe and retrieved service tool. Functioned BSRs from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod - good test. Tested service tool in "Sump Test" and "RIH" position to 250 psi for 5 min (good tests). Made up VCH packer. Flow checked well on trip tank; loss rate = 6 bbl/hr. TIH with VCH packer from surface to 6;901'. Flow checked well on trip tank; loss rate = 5 bbl/hr. Continued TIH with VCH packer from 6;901' to 17;843'; loss rate = 5 bbl/hr.
"},{"   ":319,"WELL_NAME":"PS004","API12":608124005800,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-03-13","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.

03/13/2016: Tripped in hole with single trip multiple zone gravel pack assembly from 17;843' to 27;073'. Monitored well on trip tank for proper displacement; loss rate = 5 bbl/hr. Continued to trip in the hole with gravel pack assembly and seal assembly on to sump packer at 28;381'; mule shoe depth 28;472'. Tested seal assembly down drill pipe to 500 psi - good test. Set packer gravel pack packer at 26;986' DPM with 2;500 psi in 500 psi increments - confirmed packer set; well static. Tested packer with 1;500 psi on the back side - good test. Set isolation packers between perforated intervals and activated shear joint with 4;300 psi in 500 psi increments. Test lines and spotted pickle down the drill pipe. 

03/14/2016: Circulated 14.0 ppg CaBr2 until 14.0 ppg in/out. Monitored volume on active system - well static. Flushed and tested surface frac lines from frac boat. Performed acid job. Performed mini-fracpack stimulation. Shut down and re-designed main fracpack injection test. Performed fracpack stimulation treatment on Zone 1: Wilcox 2B per procedure. Reverse circulated per schedule.

03/15/2016: Tripped out of hole with gravel pack assembly service tool from 28;424' to 18;923'. Function tested BOPs from Driller's Panel on Yellow pPod and from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod. Function tested diverter from Driller's Panel. Continued to trip out of hole with gravel pack assembly service tool from 18;923' to surface.
 
03/16/2016: Function tested BSRs from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod. Tripped in hole with new gravel pack assembly service tool from surface to 25;942'.

03/17/2016: Functioned; closed frac and tested all sleeves in gravel pack assembly for Zones 4; 3; and 2. Opened sleeves; loss rate of 4.8 bbl/hr in Zone 2. Flushed and tested surface frac lines from frac boat. Performed acid job. Performed mini-fracpack injection test. Performed main fracpack stimulation treatment on Zone 2: Wilcox 2A. Reverse circulated per schedule

03/18/2016: Finished reversing out Zone 2. Opened choke and monitored well on mini strip tank through kill line - well static. Opened annular and monitored well on trip tank - well static. Closed annular and tested to 500 psi to confirm sleeves closed - good test. Pulled up to Zone 3. Performed acid job and main fracpack stimulation treatment on Zone 3: Wilcox 1B. Reverse circulated per schedule. Tripped out of hole to 27;312'.

03/19/2016: Pressure tested frac lines with cement unit - good test. Opened sleeves. Flushed and tested surface lines with frac boat - good test. Performed acid job. Performed main fracpack stimulation treatment for Zone 4: Wilcox1A. Reverse circulated per schedule. Closed frac and monitoring sleeves. Pressure tested to 500 psi - good test. Reversed out two drillstring volumes. Monitored well on mini-strip tank - well static. Pressure tested annulus to 500 psi for 5 minutes - confirmed sleeves closed. 
"},{"   ":320,"WELL_NAME":"PS004","API12":608124005800,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-03-20","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.

03/20/2016: Rigged down frac head and associated iron/control hoses. TOH with service tool assembly from 27;334' to surface and laid down service tool assembly. Began slipping and cutting drill line.

03/21/2016: Finished slipping and cutting drill line. Function tested UBSR and LBSR from Driller's Panel - good tests. Rigged up tubing handling equipment. P/U and TIH with isolation assemblies from surface to 1;608'. Rigged down tubing handling equipment and TIH with isolation assemblies on 5-7/8" DP from 1;608' to 26;229'.

03/22/2016: TIH with isolation assemblies on 5-7/8" DP from 26;229' to 26;883'. Pressure tested FS-1 valve and seals in VCH packer seal bore to 1;000 psi for 5 mins - good test. Dropped diverter ball and pressured up to 2;480 psi to release from isolation assembly once ball was on seat. TOH from 26;883' to 26;200'. Flow checked well - well static. TOH with running tool from 26;200' to 13;121'. Function tested BOP - good test. Function tested diverter - good test. Held diverter drill with "C" crew. Rigged up BOP test assembly. Started testing BOP as per IPT plan. During test #1; approval was granted from BSEE to postpone BOP test. Bled off pressure. Rigged down BOP test assembly. TOH with 13;121' to surface. Rigged up tubing handling equipment. 

Note: On 3/22/2016 at 14:31 hrs; Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) received the approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) via email that Chevron may delay BOP testing for 48 hrs while running isolation string provided the well remains static.

03/23/2016: P/U permanent packer assembly and lower PBR. TIH with inner string sliding sleeve shifter assembly. P/U upper PBR and M/U to inner string; slacked off and made up upper PBR to lower PBR section. R/D tubing handling equipment. TIH with permanent packer assembly from 340' to 26;898'. Closed annular; pressured up on annulus to 1;000 psi and tested short seal assembly for 5 minutes - good test. Bled off pressure and opened annular. Staged up pressure down string in 500 psi increments to 2;000 psi and held for 5 minutes. Permanent packer set at 26;699'.

03/24/2016: Closed annular and tested permanent packer and casing to 4;000 psi for 30 minutes - good test. TOH from 26;699' to 10;314' to place test stands across BOP. Rigged up BOP test assembly and lines. Performed BOP pressure tests from Driller's Panel on 5-7/8" DP against test rams using 14.0 ppg CaBr2 as per the IPT test plan - good tests. Annular and associated valves tested to 250/4;300 psi for 5 mins each. VBRs and associated valves tested to 250/8;000 psi for 5 mins each. Function tested BOPs from toolpusher's panel - good test. Function tested diverter from Driller's Panel - good test. TOH with setting tool assembly from 10;314' to 1;691'.

03/25/2016: TOH with setting tool assembly from 10;314' to surface. Slip and cut drill line. Picked up BPRRT assembly from surface to 583' and tripped in with BPRRT assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 583' to 7;518'. Jetted BOPs and SSPT. TIH from 7;518' to 7;995'. Landed the BPRRT in the SSPT bore protector at 7;109' (BPRRT depth). Closed the annular and pressure tested the BPRRT to 2;000 psi for 5 min to ensure the BPRRT set - good test. Functioned the 9-5/8" fixed pipe rams - good test. Pressure tested against the BPRRT and 9-5/8" fixed rams to 250/ 8;000 psi for 5 min each - good test. Pulled the SSPT bore protector free and positioned jet sub in SSPT. Jetted SSPT and circulated bottoms up. TOH with BPRRT assembly from 7;995' to 1;305'. 

03/26/2016: TOH with BPRRT assembly from 7;995' to surface. Rigged down drilling handling equipment and rigged up production tubing handling and running equipment. P/U seal assembly and production tubing assembly from surface to 311'. Ran control lines through sheave and hung sheave in derrick. Terminated control lines and tested same - good tests. TIH from 311' to 1;009' with 4-1/2"; 17 ppf; 13CRS-110 VAM TOP tubing with cross coupling clamps at each connection.
"},{"   ":321,"WELL_NAME":"PS004","API12":608124005800,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-03-27","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.

03/27/2016: Tripped in hole from 1;090' to 14;044' with 4-1/2" tubing stands. Installed cross coupling clamps at each connection.

03/28/2016: Tripped in hole from 14;044' to 17;211' with 4-1/2" tubing stands. Terminated control lines to SCSSV; function tested both ports 3 times; pressure tested port "A" and "B" to 13;000 psi for 15 mins each on chart (good tests). Terminated LDHI-CIM and pressure tested to 14;000 psi (good test). Tripped in hole from 17;211' to 17;998' with 4-1/2" tubing and 4-1/2" x 6" crossover assembly. Tripped in hole from 17;998' to 18;798' with 6" tubing.

03/29/2016: Tripped in hole from 18;798' to 19;525' with 6" VIT singles from aft. M/U tubing hanger assy. Terminated and externally tested SCSSV control lines (good test). Tested CIMs and TEC gauge line fitting (good test). Conducted Tronic test on DHPTGs. Function tested SCSSV on both ports 3 times each (good test). Internally pressure tested both ports on SCSSV to 10;000 psi/ 10 min (good tests). Recorded downhole gauge pressures and temperatures. Re-installed the helix and secured all control lines. Transferred land and lock assembly to forward rotary. Latched land and lock to tubing hanger from 19;525' to 19;727'. Tested assembly (good test).

03/30/2016: Finished pressure testing land and lock assembly (good test). Tripped in hole from 19;727' to 26;530' with the 4-1/2" x 6" production tubing and associated jewelry on 7-5/8" landing string. Made up land out stand. Soft land hanger with 61' of seals in PBR and confirmed. Picked up to 26;553' (25' above PBR). Began circulating 14.0 ppg inhibited packer fluid.

Note: On 03/30/2016 at 10:50 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) notified Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) via email that Chevron has approval for a 4 day casing & BSR pressure test extension due to the approaching end of completion operations and current state of well isolation.

03/31/2016: Pumped 1;130 bbls of 14.0 ppg inhibited packer fluid down the tubing string. Laid out top 5-7/8" DP single and 7-5/8" crossover. Rigged up Compensated Coiled Tubing Lift Frame (CCTLF) and Flowhead assembly. Installed torpedo packers and soft landed tubing hanger at 7;112'.

04/01/2016: Landed tubing hanger. Pressure tested tubing hanger to 7;400 psi (good test). Stroked out CCTLF; adjusted pressures and position. Engage and test electrical penetrators. Pressure tested the Flowhead; landing string; and tubing (good tests). Begin to perform differential test on the SCSSV with 5;000 psi differential pressure.

04/02/2016: Finish differential test of SCSSV (good test). Rig-up slickline. Make-up tool string. Test lubricator to 10;000 psi for 15 min (good test). Retrieve tubing hanger isolation sleeve. Displaced landing string and kill line to base oil. Bled off landing string. Wait on seas to calm prior to running lower crown plug.
"},{"   ":322,"WELL_NAME":"PS004","API12":608124005800,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-04-03","TEXT_REMARK":"***NOTE*** The depths in the operational narratives for all of the completion WARs for this well reference the 92' RKB of the Clear Leader; the rig which performed the completion operation; rather than the 82' RKB of the Pacific Sharav; the rig which performed the drilling operation.

04/03/2016: Run in hole with slickline and set lower crown plug in tubing hanger @ 7;112'. Lined up and tested top side of lower crown plug. Finished pressure testing lower crown plug to 10;100 psi surface pressure (12;500 psi subsea) for 15 min from above with 14.0 ppg CaBr2 (good test). Pressure tested lower crown from below to 8;300 psi surface pressure (good test). Cycled FS-1 valve. Bullheaded 59 bbls of base oil. Run in hole with upper crown plug to 7;000'.

04/04/2016: Landed upper crown plug in tubing hanger @ 7;111'. Tested upper crown plug from above and below to 12;500 psi subsea pressure (good test). Pressure tested between LCP and UCP to 12;500 psi subsea pressure for 15 min using 6.6 ppg base oil(good test). Rigged down slickline. Displaced choke; boost and riser to seawater. Bled tubing; casing annulus and kill line to seawater hydrostatic. Negative test SCSSV to seawater hydrostatic for 1 hour (good test). Displaced base oil out of kill line. Unlatch tubing hanger running tool. Began to u-tube base oil out of landing string.

04/05/2016: U-tubed base oil up landing string and then reversed out. Pulled out of hole from 7;030' to 3;936' with landing string. 

04/06/2016: Pulled out of hole with landing string from 3;936' to 129'. Pulled out of hole with land and lock from 129' to surface. Pulled and laid down diverter. Made up landing joint and stroked in slip joint. Unlatched BOP at 23:35 hrs. Moved 200' off location.

Note: On 04/06/16 at 10:54 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) notified Mr. Chris Gerlitz (Chevron) via email that Chevron has approval to delay casing & BSR pressure testing for 12 hrs due to upcoming unlatch and current well condition.

"},{"   ":323,"WELL_NAME":"PS004","API12":608124005800,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-10-31","TEXT_REMARK":"10/31/18   Transitioned temporary filters and pump spread to PS004 well. Pressure tested temporary equipment to 11;300 PSI. Shut-in well. Opened downhole chemical injection valve. Pumped Xylene pre-soak. Pumped Methanol buffer. Pumped umbilical volume of organic acid

11/1/18    Stopped pumping and secured well for xylene soak period. Began pumping acid package into well.

11/2/18    Pumped remainder of acid package into well. While pumping; cycled well open and closed to lift acid up well-bore. Pumped umbilical volume of preservation fluid to displace acid. Stopped for acid soak period.

11/3/18    Completed acid soak period. Cleaned-up well to production facility.


"},{"   ":324,"WELL_NAME":"PS004","API12":608124005800,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-11-04","TEXT_REMARK":"11/04/18   Rigged down and demob temporary pumping equipment. FINAL REPORT"},{"   ":325,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011800,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-05-14","TEXT_REMARK":"NOTE: Conducted pre-spud meetings with drill crews on 05/09/2017 and on 05/10/2017.

05/14/2017: Run in hole (RIH) with 26" jetting assembly inside of 36" conductor casing from surface to 370' MD on 6-5/8" drill pipe.  Make up (M/U) Cam Actuated Drill Ahead (CADA) tool to BHA and lowered/locked into the Low Pressure Wellhead housing (LPWH).  

Note: On 05/14/2017; Mr. Xianjie Yi (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) to proceed through Step #9 (testing BOPs) of the APD procedure.

05/15/2017: Tripped in hole (TIH) with 36" conductor casing with 26" jetting assembly and CADA tool from 370' MD to 6;070' MD. Moved vessel from DOZ to 300' away from WR 678 PS005 well center. Continued TIH from 6;070' MD/TVD to 6;338' MD/TVD in 8.6 ppg seawater.  
                                            
05/16/2017: Continued to TIH with 36" conductor casing from 6;338' MD to the mudline at 7;132' MD. Jetted the 36" casing from 7;132' MD to 7;451' MD/TVD. Soaked 36" conductor for 2.5 hour. Released from CADA tool. Drilled 26" hole section from 7;447' MD to 8;300' MD with 8.6 ppg seawater Drilled from 8;300' MD to 8;409' MD with 10.1 ppg PAD mud. Spotted 1;250 bbls of 11.0 ppg Pump and Dump (PAD) mud at 8;170' MD/TVD. 

05/17/2017: Continued spotting 1;250 bbls of 11.0 ppg PAD mud in the wellbore at 8;409' MD/TVD. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 26" jetting BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 8;409' MD/TVD to 6;560' MD/TVD in 11.0 ppg PAD mud.  Retrieved CADA tool. Moved rig from well center to DOZ. Continued to TOH with 26" jetting BHA from 6;560' MD/TVD to surface. TIH with 26" BHA from surface to 6;430' MD/TVD. Moved rig from DOZ to well center; Stabbed 26" bit into LPWH at 7;125' MD/TVD. Continued to TIH from 7;125' MD/TVD to 7;447' MD/TVD. Displaced drill string volume from 8.6 ppg seawater to 10.1 ppg PAD mud at 7;420' MD/TVD. Washed down from 7;420' MD/TVD to 7;636' MD/TVD. TIH with 26" directional BHA from 7;636' MD/TVD to 8;300' MD/TVD. Washed and reamed from 8;300' MD/TVD to 8;409' MD/TVD. Drilled 26" hole section from 8;409' MD/TVD to 8;697' MD/TVD.

05/18/2017: Continued drilling 26" hole section from 8;697' MD/TVD to 9;137' MD/TVD with 10.1 ppg PAD mud on 6-5/8" drill pipe. Displaced wellbore from 10.1 ppg PAD mud to 12.5 ppg PAD mud. TOH from 9;137' MD/TVD to 6;420' MD/TVD. Moved vessel from  well center to DOZ. Continued TOH with 26" BHA from 6;420' MD/TVD to surface. 

05/19/2017: TIH with 26" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from surface to 6;430' MD/TVD. Moved vessel from DOZ to well center. Stabbed 26" bit into LPWH at 7;125' MD/TVD. TIH from 7;125' MD/TVD to 7;447' MD/TVD. Displaced drill string volume from 12.5 ppg PAD mud to 10.1 ppg PAD mud. TIH from 7;447' MD/TVD to 9;100' MD/TVD.  Washed down from 9;100' MD/TVD to 9;137' MD/TVD. Drilled 26" hole section from 9;137' MD/TVD to 9;657' MD/TVD with 10.1 ppg PAD mud.

05/20/2017: Continued drilling 26" hole section from 9;657' MD/TVD to section Total Depth (TD) of 10;550' MD/TVD with 10.1 ppg PAD mud. Spotted 33 bbls of 16.0 ppg pill in rathole and chased with 12.5 ppg PAD mud. Circulated 3;600 bbls of 12.5 ppg PAD mud down drill string. TOH with 26" BHA from 10;361' MD/TVD to 6;613' MD/TVD. Moved vessel from well center to DOZ. 
"},{"   ":326,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011800,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-05-21","TEXT_REMARK":"05/21/2017: Trip in hole (TIH) with 22" x 23" casing from surface to 3;373' MD. Run in hole (RIH) with 6-5/8" inner string from surface to 3;153' MD. M/U Mechanical Rigid Lockdown (MRLD) tool to inner string. Installed MRLD tool to HPWH. 

05/22/2017: Slacked off (S/O) MRLD and closed snorkel valves after purging air from 22" casing. TIH with 22" x 23" casing on 6-5/8" landing string from 3;379' MD to 6;547' MD. Moved vessel from DOZ to well center. Stab 22" casing shoe into LPWH. Displaced landing string; inner string; and casing from 8.6 ppg seawater to 12.5 ppg PAD mud. Continued TIH with 22" x 23" casing on 6-5/8" landing string from 7;155' MD to 10;427' MD. Landed and locked HPWH into LPWH. Circulated 1.5x landing string; inner string; and casing volume to condition mud prior to cement job. Pumped 100 bbls of 13.2 ppg spacer; 1;235 bbls (6;935 cu ft) of 13.8 ppg Lafarge Class H lead cement slurry; and 179 bbls (1;005 cu ft) of 16.4 ppg Lafarge Class H tail cement slurry. Displaced cement with 319 bbls of 8.6 ppg seawater. Cement in place at the mudline confirmed by 931 psi lift pressure and ROV pH meter reading increase at mudline. Confirmed float holding. Preloaded HPWH to 2MM ft/lbs. TOH 2 stands and pumped nerf ball down landing string with seawater at 5 barrels per minute. 
 
05/23/2017: Continued TOH with landing string; MRLD; and inner string from 10;159' MD to 7;127' MD. Circulate 1.5x landing string and inner string volume while washing the HPWH with 12.5 ppg PAD mud. Continue TOH from 7;127' MD to 6;859' MD (200' above HPWH). Moved rig to DOZ. Made up (M/U) riser double and splashed BOP. Performed pressure testing of choke and kill (C&K) lines to 300 psi low/ 11;500 psi high for 5 minutes each; good tests. Performed pressure testing of boost line and rigid conduit lines to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes; good tests. All pressure tests conducted utilizing IPT SureTec software with 8.6 ppg seawater. Run in hole (RIH) with BOP on riser from 209' MD to 2;234' MD.

05/24/2017: Pressure test C&K lines to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Continue RIH with BOP from 2;234' to 4;785'. M/U test cap and pressure test C&K lines with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit with 8.6 ppg seawater to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Continue RIH to 5;314'. Troubleshoot riser torque wrenches due to improper function. Replaced hydraulic supply manifold. Continue RIH to 6;959'. Install 20' riser pup and BLAT pup. Slack off to 6;985'. M/U test cap and pressure test C&K lines to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes; good test. 

05/25/2017: Move vessel over wellhead and perform dummy land out to confirm space out. P/U to safe working height and installed drape hose. Pressure test C&K lines with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit with 8.6 ppg seawater to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes; good test. Install storm loops. Move over well center and land out BOP at 16:45 hrs. Latched connector with 1;500 psi and 20.7 gallons. Performed slump test with 600k down and 100k overpull test. Performed soft EDS from Driller's chair; good test. Performed 1;000 psi test with 8.6 ppg seawater between BSR and 22" casing; good test. Transfer weight to the tensioners. Performed 22" casing/ LBSR test with 8.6 ppg seawater to 2;700 psi for 30 minutes from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; good test. P/U and installed Diverter and performed function and flow line test; good test.

Note: On 05/25/2017; Mr. Josh Ladner (BSEE) granted approval that after initial latch up testing of the 2x acatuated IBOPs and 1x manual IBOP top drive valves that subsequent tests could only require testing of the selected actuated IBOP and manual IBOP.

05/26/2017: Layout riser running tools. P/U and TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Unable to establish communication with the Sperry M5 gamma ray tool. Pressure test C&K manifold with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi; good test. Tested 6-5/8" FH FOSV and IBOP to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi; good test. TOH and rack back (R/B) bit stand. M/U and TIH with NuTec/ DrilQuip BOP test tool assembly and land in wellhead. Unlatch from NuTec tool and perform BOP acoustic function test to close the UBSR and test with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi; good test. Perform BOP ROV function test to close the UBSR and test with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300 psi/ 11;500psi; good test. ROV encounted an issue with its motor and tripped to surface to troubleshoot. Pressure tested the BOPs from the TCP on Blue Pod with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300/ 11;500 psi on UBSR; LBSR; Top drive IBOP'(x3); 300/ 6;500 psi on Kelly hose and choke manifold buffer valves; good test. Attempted to perform subsea deadman test; test failed. 

05/27/2017: Continued troubleshooting BOP deadman test. Opened Deadman Auto-shear flood valve. Successfully fired deadman sequence. Pressure tested UBSR against BOP TT to 300/ 11;500 psi for 5 min with seawater; good test. Pressure tested UBSR; functioned from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod; against BOP TT to 300/ 11;500 psi for 5 min; good test. Pressure tested LBSR; functioned from TCP on Blue Pod; against BOP TT to 300/ 11;500 psi for 5 min; good test. TIH from 6;727' to 7;126' with NuTec running tool. M/U NuTec tool. Space out and performed accumulator drawdown test. Pressure tested the BOPs from the Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod on 6-5/8" drill pipe across the BOP with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300/ 11;500 psi on pipe rams and 300/ 6;500 psi on the annular; good test. Spaced out to perform diverter test. While performing diverter function; EDS was inadvertently pressed and LMRP lifted off BOP. Performed inspection of riser tensioners and ROV performed inspection of LMRP and BOP. Continued TOH to 767'.

Note: On 05/27/2017; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Shane Young (Chevron) approval to proceed with operations with the BOP flood valve in open position.

Note: On 05/27/2017; Mr. Justin Ledet granted Mr. Shane Young approval to proceed with operations utilizing the primary choke panel on the main assistant driller's chair and the remote panel on the choke manifold; while the secondary choke panel inside the driller's cabin is not operational."},{"   ":327,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011800,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-05-28","TEXT_REMARK":"05/28/2017: Moved vessel to PS005 well center. Latched up the Lower Marine Riser Package (LMRP) to the Blow out Preventer (BOP). Opened the Blind Shear Rams (BSRs) and monitored the well on the trip tank - well static. Function test diverter and BSRs - good tests. Pressure test Choke/Kill stabs to 300/ 11;500 psi for 5 min - good test. Observed leak on the BOP Yellow Pod select valve. Decision made to unlatch BOP and recover to surface to make repairs to the Yellow Pod select valve. Rigged up to pull BOP/LMRP.

Note: On 05/28/2017 at 07:11 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Shane Young (Chevron) approval to latch-up LMRP to BOP and perform connector test.

05/29/2017: Pulled and laid out Diverter. Picked up landing joint; made up to riser. Scoped in slip joint and locked in same. Unlatched from well at 03:27 hrs. Picked up to 50' and move vessel to 165 ft off location. Moved vessel ~830 ft South to DOZ. Pulled BOP/LMRP on marine riser from 6;959' to 3;360'. 
  
05/30/2017: Continued pulling BOP/LMRP on marine riser from 3;360' to moonpool. Landed BOP/LMRP on the beams at 09:15 hrs. Moved BOP to set back area and began making repairs on BOP/LMRP.

05/31/2017: Pressure tested Annular and LMRP connector and performed soak test on all associated functions on Yellow & Blue Pods - good test. Monitored leak rates on new Sub-plate mounted (SPM)/ metal seals. Performed pilot hose inspections. Replaced 3x pilot signal hoses as a result of inspection. Note: Decision made to perform 2nd soak test after hose replacement. Finished soak testing on pipe. Pulled test joint. Soft fired Deadman Auto Shear (DMAS) - good test.

Note: On 05/31/2017 at 08:20 hrs; Mr. Howard Smith (Chevron) provided Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) with a 72 hour notification for testing BOPs.

06/01/2017: Continue soak testing; deadman test and pressure testing BOP/LMRP on surface. Transferred BOP to center line. Skid BOP to well center and made up double to BOP/LMRP. Picked up (P/U) BOP; installed MUX control lines. Acquired bulls-eye readings and reset ERAs. Splashed BOPs at 15:30 hrs. Ran in hole (RIH) with BOP/LMRP on marine riser to 209'. Installed test cap assy. Performed pressure testing of choke and kill (C&K) lines to 300 psi low/ 11;500 psi high for 5 minutes each - good tests. Performed pressure testing of boost line and rigid conduit lines to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes - good tests. All pressure tests conducted utilizing IPT SureTec software with 8.6 ppg seawater. Continue running riser from 209' to 1;409'.

06/02/2017: Pressure test C&K line to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Continue running BOP/LMRP on marine riser from 1;409' to 6;959'. 92 of 92 joints run. Made up and ran 20' pup and 6' (BOP landing assist tool) BLAT pup. Installed test cap and begin pressure testing on choke/kill lines; boost and rigid conduit lines. 

06/03/2017: Continued pressure testing C&K line to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes - good test. P/U termination joint; 10' spacer pup and landing joint. Moved from DOZ to 200 ft from PS005 well center. Installed drape hoses. Pressure test C&K line with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300 psi/ 11;500 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Pressure test boost line and conduit with 8.6 ppg seawater to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Installed storm loops. Moved to PS005 well center; landed and latched BOP wellhead (WH) connector at 15:38 hrs. Pressure tested WH connector with seawater to 2;700 psi for 5 minutes. Performed diverter function test - good test. Pressure tested 22" casing with seawater to 2;700 psi for 30 minutes; verified with IPT software - good test."},{"   ":328,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011800,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-06-04","TEXT_REMARK":"06/04/2017: TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA and BOP test tool/ blind shear ram tool (BOPTT/BSR) on 6-5/8" drillpipe from surface to 7;908'. Landed the BOPTT in the high pressure wellhead (HPWH) at 7;130'; land out depth confirming the top of HPWH at 7;124'. Released from the BSR tool and P/U above the BOP. Pressure tested the BSRs against the BOPTT from Yellow Pod; Driller's Panel to 300/ 11;500 psi; good tests. Performed acoustic function test; functioned UBSR with the acoustic controls and tested to 300/ 11;500 psi; good test. Performed ROV intervention test; unable to close within allotted 45 seconds. Recovered ROV; increased the pressure on pump and refilled bladder. Re-deployed ROV and performed ROV intervention test; functioned MPR and closed in 26 seconds. Pressure tested to 300/ 11;500 psi; good test. Performed Deadman test with BOPTT; good test. TIH and made up BSR tool. TOH with BOPTT from 7;920' to 7;804' and completed BOP testing. Pressure tested BOP on 6-5/8" 50# drill pipe; functioned from the Yellow Pod; Driller's Panel; using IPT Suretec software. Pressure tested rams to 300/ 11;500 psi for 5 min and annulars to 300/ 6;500 psi for 5 min using seawater; all good tests. Performed Accumulator Drawdown test and BOP function test; good tests. TOH from 7;804' to 6;512' with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA.

06/05/2017: TOH with BSR/BOPTT from 6;512' to 518'. P/U remaining 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly to 6;565'. Slip and cut drill line. Set 18-1/8" x 14.5" wear sleeve at 7;130'. Continue TIH to 10;040'. Wash from 10;040' to 10;378'. Tag TOC at 10;378' with 15k down (firm). Displace Choke; Kill; and Boost lines to 11.5 ppg SBM. Displace drill string with 11.5 ppg SBM and commence drilling firm cement from 10;378' to 10;396'. 

06/06/2017: Drill firm cement from 10;396' to 10;480'. Troubleshoot TDX motor issue. Circulate BU at 900 gpm. Well fully displaced with 11.5 ppg SBM. Pump slug and TOH from 10;464' to 10;223'. Continue troubleshooting/inspecting TDX. Install wiper rubber and TOH from 10;223 to 525'.

06/07/2017: TOH with 18-1/8 x 21" BHA to surface. Commence removing Main TDX Motor B. Remove Motor B and install new motor onto Main TDX. Perform eHawk software upgrade while installing motor. Commission Main TDX.

06/08/2017: Complete TDX repairs/commissioning procedure. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly from surface to 10;305'. Function BOP and Diverter; good tests. Wash from 10;305' to 10;480'. Drill shoe track and 22" shoe; wash and ream rathole from 10;486' to 10;550'. Drill 10' new formation to 10;560' and perform FIT. Closed lower annular and performed FIT with 11.5 ppg (11.78 ppg downhole) at shoe depth of 10;493' MD/ 10;492' TVD to 850 psi. FIT of 13.0 ppg (13.28 ppg downhole) obtained. Attemped to pump up PWD data; not succesfull. Decision made to re-test to obtain PWD max data. 

06/09/2017: Perform 2nd FIT to 13.0 ppg EMW. Closed lower annular and performed FIT with 11.5 ppg (11.78 ppg downhole) at shoe depth of 10;493' MD/ 10;492' TVD to 850 psi. FIT of 13.0 ppg obtained (13.28 ppg downhole). PWD max of 13.38 ppg data obtained. Wash down from 10;454' to 10;560'. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 10;560' to 12;447'. 

06/10/2017: Evaluate separation factor and directional plan with regards to St. Malo PS002. Control drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 12;477' to 12;793' taking check shot survey every 30' drilled."},{"   ":329,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011800,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-06-11","TEXT_REMARK":"06/11/2017: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" from 12;793' MD/ 12;792' TVD to 12;847' MD/ 12;846' TVD. Suspend drilling operations due to proximity of PS002. Circulate and condition well in preparation for TOH. TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly from 12;847' MD/ 12;846' TVD to surface. 

Note: On 06/11/2017 at 18:44 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Xianjie Yi approval to set the bypass plug.

06/12/2017: TIH with cement stinger from surface to 12;840' MD/ 12;839' TVD. Circulate and condition mud in preparation for setting cement plugs. Set KOP #1 at 12;847' MD/ 12;846' TVD to 11;647' MD/ 11;646' TVD. Pumped 150 bbls of 12.5 ppg spacer; 500 bbls (2;808 cu ft) of 17.0 ppg Class H cement; 20 bbls of 12.5 ppg spacer. Displaced cement with 380 bbls of 11.5 SBM. TOH above cement plug #1 from 12;842' MD /12;841 TVD to 11;600' MD/ 11;599' TVD. 

06/13/2017: R/U the cement SES stand. Set KOP #2 from 12;842 to 10;447'. Pumped 150 bbls of 12.5 ppg spacer; 510 bbls (2;864 cu ft)  of 17.0 ppg Class H cement; 20 bbls of 12.5 ppg spacer. Displaced cement with 345 bbls of 11.5 SBM. TOH from 11;600' MD/ 11;599' TVD to 10;000' MD/ 9;999' TVD to spot stinger above the TOC. Circulated and conditioned the wellbore. TOH to 7;130' MD/TVD and jet BOP/HPWH. TOH from 7;130' MD/TVD to surface with the cement stinger assembly. TIH with the 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA from surface to 7;657' MD/TVD. Function test on BSRs using Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; and Driller's Panel; Blue Pod.

Note: On 06/13/2017 at 21:34 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Xianjie Yi approval for Step 1 of the ABP (kick off and drill the 18-1/8" x 21" hole section).

06/14/2017: TIH with the 18-1/8" x 21" BHA to 7;657' MD/TVD. Wash down and tag cement at 10;447' MD/ 10;446' TVD in the 22" casing. Drill cement from 10;447' MD/ 10;446' TVD to 10;615' MD/ 10;614' TVD to 10;708' MD/ 10;707' TVD using 11.5 ppg SMW (Surface Mud Weight)/ 11.76 ppg DHMW (Downhole Mud Weight). Performed BOP pressure test on 6-5/8" DP on Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Pressure tested the Annulars and associated valves with 11.5 ppg SBM to 300 psi low/ 5;600 psi high (5 minutes each). Pressure tested Rams and associated valves to 300 psi low/ 7;300 psi high (5 minutes each). 
Performed BOP function test on Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Performed Diverter function test on Driller's Panel (32 seconds).

06/15/2017: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 10;708' MD/ 10;707' TVD to 10;755' MD/ 10;754' TVD. Backream from 10;755' MD/ 10;754' TVD to 10;641' MD/ 10;640' TVD. Drop reamer activation ball and activate reamer. Ream down from 10;641' MD/ 10;640' TVD to 10;755' MD/ 10;754' TVD. Kicked off at 14:00 hrs at 10;536' MD/TVD from original wellbore and begin drilling the bypass wellbore. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section to 11;432' MD/ 11;430' TVD.
 
06/16/2017: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 11;432' MD/ 11;430' TVD to to 12;928' MD/ 12;924' TVD. 

06/17/2017: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 12;928' MD/ 12;924' TVD to 15;213' MD/ 15;204' TVD; raising mud weight to 12.1 ppg SMW surface/12.37 DHMW. Begin build at 14;197' MD/ 14;192' TVD at 1°/100' to 39.93° at 93.73° azimuth.
"},{"   ":330,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-06-11","TEXT_REMARK":"06/11/2017: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" from 12;793' MD/ 12;792' TVD to 12;847' MD/ 12;846' TVD. Suspend drilling operations due to proximity of PS002. Circulate and condition well in preparation for TOH. TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly from 12;847' MD/ 12;846' TVD to surface. 

Note: On 06/11/2017 at 18:44 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Xianjie Yi approval to set the bypass plug.

06/12/2017: TIH with cement stinger from surface to 12;840' MD/ 12;839' TVD. Circulate and condition mud in preparation for setting cement plugs. Set KOP #1 at 12;847' MD/ 12;846' TVD to 11;647' MD/ 11;646' TVD. Pumped 150 bbls of 12.5 ppg spacer; 500 bbls (2;808 cu ft) of 17.0 ppg Class H cement; 20 bbls of 12.5 ppg spacer. Displaced cement with 380 bbls of 11.5 SBM. TOH above cement plug #1 from 12;842' MD /12;841 TVD to 11;600' MD/ 11;599' TVD. 

06/13/2017: R/U the cement SES stand. Set KOP #2 from 12;842 to 10;447'. Pumped 150 bbls of 12.5 ppg spacer; 510 bbls (2;864 cu ft)  of 17.0 ppg Class H cement; 20 bbls of 12.5 ppg spacer. Displaced cement with 345 bbls of 11.5 SBM. TOH from 11;600' MD/ 11;599' TVD to 10;000' MD/ 9;999' TVD to spot stinger above the TOC. Circulated and conditioned the wellbore. TOH to 7;130' MD/TVD and jet BOP/HPWH. TOH from 7;130' MD/TVD to surface with the cement stinger assembly. TIH with the 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA from surface to 7;657' MD/TVD. Function test on BSRs using Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; and Driller's Panel; Blue Pod.

Note: On 06/13/2017 at 21:34 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Xianjie Yi approval for Step 1 of the ABP (kick off and drill the 18-1/8" x 21" hole section).

06/14/2017: TIH with the 18-1/8" x 21" BHA to 7;657' MD/TVD. Wash down and tag cement at 10;447' MD/ 10;446' TVD in the 22" casing. Drill cement from 10;447' MD/ 10;446' TVD to 10;615' MD/ 10;614' TVD to 10;708' MD/ 10;707' TVD using 11.5 ppg SMW (Surface Mud Weight)/ 11.76 ppg DHMW (Downhole Mud Weight). Performed BOP pressure test on 6-5/8" DP on Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Pressure tested the Annulars and associated valves with 11.5 ppg SBM to 300 psi low/ 5;600 psi high (5 minutes each). Pressure tested Rams and associated valves to 300 psi low/ 7;300 psi high (5 minutes each). 
Performed BOP function test on Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Performed Diverter function test on Driller's Panel (32 seconds).

06/15/2017: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 10;708' MD/ 10;707' TVD to 10;755' MD/ 10;754' TVD. Backream from 10;755' MD/ 10;754' TVD to 10;641' MD/ 10;640' TVD. Drop reamer activation ball and activate reamer. Ream down from 10;641' MD/ 10;640' TVD to 10;755' MD/ 10;754' TVD. Kicked off at 14:00 hrs at 10;536' MD/TVD from original wellbore and begin drilling the bypass wellbore. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section to 11;432' MD/ 11;430' TVD.
 
06/16/2017: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 11;432' MD/ 11;430' TVD to to 12;928' MD/ 12;924' TVD. 

06/17/2017: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 12;928' MD/ 12;924' TVD to 15;213' MD/ 15;204' TVD; raising mud weight to 12.1 ppg SMW surface/12.37 DHMW. Begin build at 14;197' MD/ 14;192' TVD at 1°/100' to 39.93° at 93.73° azimuth.
"},{"   ":331,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-06-18","TEXT_REMARK":"06/18/2017: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 15;213' MD/ 15;204' TVD to 17;856' MD/ 17;651' TVD. 

06/19/2017: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 17;856' MD/ 17;651' TVD to 18;531' MD/ 18;170' TVD. TOH with the 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" DP from 18;531' to 727' to secure well in preparation for the storm.

Note: On 06/19/2017 at 21:18 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) approval to proceed with suspension operations for approaching storm. 

06/20/2017: TOH with the 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 727' to surface. Suspended operations while waiting on weather from Tropical Storm Cindy to pass.

Note: On 06/20/2017 at 05:42 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) approval to proceed with the modified storm suspension procedure (without EDPHOT).

06/21/2017: Continued waiting for weather to improve.

06/22/2017: TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from surface to to 18;474'. Washed down from 18;474' to 18;531'. Drilled the 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 18;531' MD/ 18;170' TVD to 18;961' MD/ 18;506' TVD. Increased MW to 12.5 ppg surface mud weight/ 12.67 ppg downhole mud weight. Performed diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel. Performed BOP function test from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod. Performed BSR function test from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod.

06/23/2017: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 18;961' MD/ 18;506' TVD to 19;601' MD/ 19;022' TVD. Observed pressure drop from 6;050 psi to 5;700 psi and increasing torque. Lost communication with Logging While Drilling and Measurement While Drilling Tools. TOH with the 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" DP from 18;926' to 387'. 

06/24/2017: TOH with the 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 387' to surface. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" from surface to 7;758'.
"},{"   ":332,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-06-25","TEXT_REMARK":"06/25/2017: Trip in hole (TIH) with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe to 19;599'. Lost communication to lower bus in Measuring While Drilling (MWD) tools. Downlinked and cycled pumps several times with no success. Drill ahead 30' to 19;631' MD. At 19;615'; became temporarily detained. Jarred down and up 1x and worked pipe free. Lost communications with upper bus in HCIM (MWD tools). Circulated bottoms up and trip out of hole to 15;258'.

06/26/2017: Finished trip out hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 15;258'. Began slip and cut operation; and while performing slip/cut procedure; traveling block continued to slack off inadvertently coming to rest on the rig floor. Shut down operations and performed inspection/evaluation of main TDX 1250 (top drive). Performed post jarring inspection. Made up backup BHA for next run. 

06/27/2017: Complete inspection and repairs on main TDX 1250. Trip in hole (TIH) with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from surface to 173'

06/28/2017: Continue trip in hole to 7664' and set Dril-Quip wear sleeve at 7;124'. Continue trip in hole to 9;787'; space out and perform BOP pressure and function test on 6-5/8" DP and diverter function test. Continue trip in hole from 9;787' to 15;270'.
Performed BOP pressure test on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel on Yellow Pod using 12.5 ppg mud weight. Pressure tested pipe rams to 300/6900 psi; surface equipment to 300/6900 psi and annular to 300/5200 psi. Good Test. Performed BOP function test from Driller's Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod. Performed Diverter function test from Driller's Panel.

Note: On 06/28/2017 at 18:16 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted Mr. John Rankin (Chevron) approval to continue with permitted operations while the lower HIM screen on the Driller's Panel is out of service.

06/29/2017: TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 15;270' to 18;629'. Continued cutting mud weight back to 12.1 ppg surface/ 12.33 ppg downhole SBM. Recorded slow circulating rates and choke line friction. Washed down from 19;400' to 19;631'. Drill ahead 18 ft with reamer closed from 19;631' to 19;649'. Experienced MWD tool failure; trip out of from 19;649' to 829'.

06/30/2017: Trip out of hole from 829' to surface. Pick up 18-1/8" x 21" BHA and trip in hole to 14;608'. Performed upper and lower blind shear ram function test from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod.

Note: On 06/30/2017 at 14:54 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) a 10 day extension of the 22" casing test.

07/01/2017: TIH with the 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 14;608' to 19;201'. Washed and reamed down from 19;201' to 19;559'. Unable to receive a valid survey from the Halliburton tools. Pulled out of hole with BHA from 19;559' to surface. 
"},{"   ":333,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-07-02","TEXT_REMARK":"07/02/2017: TIH with BOP Test Tool (BOPTT) and drill pipe hang off tool from surface to 7;645'. Slacked off with 75 klbs down on BOPTT. Closed annular and pressured up to 2;500 psi to verify BOPTT set. Good test. Opened annular and released from BSR test tool. Pulled tool above stack; performed pressure test on the Upper/Lower BSRs to 300 psi/ 800 psi with 12.1 ppg SBM from Toolpusher's Control Panel (TCP); Blue Pod; using IPT. Good test. Functioned Upper/Lower BSRs from TCP Blue Pod and from Driller's Control Panel (DCP); Yellow Pod. Good tests. RIH to BSR tool and made back up into drill pipe hang off tool. Tripped out of hole (TOH) from 7;645' to surface. Tripped in hole (TIH) with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from surface to 130'. MW = 12.1 ppg surface/ 12.33 ppg (downhole) SBM.

07/03/2017: Continue TIH to 5;201' and slip and cut drill line. TIH to 9;908'. Funtion test upper pipe ram (UPR); middle pipe ram (MPR); and lower pipe ram (LPR) on 6-5/8" drill pipe and function fail safe valves from TCP Yellow Pod and from DCP Blue Pod. Function tested diverter from TCP. Good test. TIH to 17;155'; taking check shot surveys every 1000'. MW = 12.1 ppg SBM (surface)

07/04/2017: TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 17;155' to 19;439'. Wash down from 19;439' to 19;649' at 1100 gpm with no fill observed. Drill 8 ft of new formation from 19;649' to 19;657'. Open reamer and drill ahead from 19;657' to 20;036'. Control drill ahead from 20;042' to 20;098'; searching drilling break to indicate Base of Salt. MW = 11.8 ppg surface/ 12.0 ppg downhole SBM.

07/05/2017: Drill through Base of Salt at 20;034' MD/ 19;433' TVD following the BOS exit strategy. Drill ahead from 20;112' to 20;754'; increasing rate of penetration (ROP) once the reamer exited the BOS. After stacking weight on bit (WOB) and not observing torque and making no progress for ~1 hr; decided to pump weighted sweep and TOH to evaluate BHA. TOH to 17;386'. MW = 11.8 ppg SBM (surface).

07/06/2017: TOH from 17;386' to 1;230'; pulling wear sleeve with 40k overpull (O/P). TOH with BHA from 1;230' to surface. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from surface to 534'. MW = 11.8 ppg SBM (surface).

07/07/2017: TIH with 18-1/8" x 21 BHA from 534' to 9;805' MD. Perform BOP function test with UPR; MPR; and LPR on 6-5/8" pipe and function fail safes from TCP Blue Pod and from DCP Yellow Pod. Good tests. Function diverter from DCP. Good test. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21 BHA from 9;805' MD to 20;490'. Activate reamer and drill ahead from 10;754' to 20;874'. MW = 11.8 ppg SBM (surface).

07/08/2017: Drill ahead from 20;874' to 21;860'. Control drill from 21;860' to 22;131'; while monitoring torque and drag. MW = 11.8 ppg surface/ 12.0 ppg downhole SBM."},{"   ":334,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-07-09","TEXT_REMARK":"07/09/2017: Drilled ahead with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 22;131' MD to 23;131' MD in 11.8 ppg surface/ 12.0 ppg downhole SBM. 

07/10/2017: Continued drilling ahead with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 23;131' MD to 23;990' MD in 11.8 ppg (SBM). 

07/11/2017: Continued drilling ahead with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 23;990' MD to 24;195' MD in 11.8 ppg (SBM). Tripped out of hole (TOH) from 24;195' MD to 24;007' MD. Circulated bottoms up. Pumped out of the hole from 24;007' MD to 22;265' MD. TOH from 22;265' MD to 21;595' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. TOH from 21;595' MD to 21;289' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

Note: On 7/11/2017 at 09:28 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) a 10 day extension of the 22" casing test.

07/12/2017: Continued TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 21;289' MD to 19;721' MD in 11.8 ppg SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Pumped 80 bbls of 13.8 slug. Performed flow check - well static. TOH from 19;721' MD to surface. Monitored the well on trip tank - well static. Tripped in hole (TIH) with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from surface to 414' MD.

07/13/2017: Continued TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 414' MD to 6;467' MD in 11.8 ppg SBM. Performed function tests of Upper Blind Shear Rams (UBSRs) and Lower Blind Shear Rams (LBSRs) from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - good tests. TIH from 6;467' MD to 8;471' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Performed BOP pressure testing of upper and lower annular on 6-5/8" DP to 250 psi low/ 5;500 psi high from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good tests. Performed pressure test of Variable Pipe Rams (VBRs); associated valves; and surface equipment on 6-5/8" DP to 250 psi low/ 8;800 psi high from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good tests. All tests performed utilizing IPT SureTec software with 11.8 ppg SBM. Performed function test of Diverter on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's Panel - good test. Performed function tests of BOP rams and annulars on 6-5/8" drill pipe from the Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod - good test. TIH from 8;471' MD to 18;645' MD. 

07/14/2017: Continued TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 18;654' MD to 23;870' MD in 11.8 ppg SBM. Washed down while logging from 23;780' MD to 24;007' MD. Performed flow check - observed 2 bbl/hr losses. Pumped out of the hole from 24;010' MD to 23;473' MD. TOH from 23;473' MD to 22;531' MD. Pumped 80 bbl 13.8 ppg slug. TOH from 22;531' MD to 1;253' MD. Monitored the well on trip tank - well static. TOH from 1;253' MD to 109' MD. 

07/15/2017: Continued TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 109' MD to surface in 11.8 ppg SBM. TIH from surface to 16;000' MD. Performed pulse test of MWD/LWD tools. TIH from 16;000' MD to 23;725' MD. Washed and reamed from 23;725' MD to 24;195' MD. Drilled with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 24;195' MD to 24;492' MD. 
"},{"   ":335,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-07-16","TEXT_REMARK":"07/16/2017: Continued to drill with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 24;492' MD to 25;033' MD in 11.8 ppg surface/ 12.0 ppg downhole SBM. Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 25;033' MD to 25;289' MD/ 23;368' TVD. 

07/17/2017: Circulated two times bottoms up with 11.8 ppg SBM while reciprocating from 25;198' MD to 25;280' MD. Pumped and spotted 150 bbls of 16.2 ppg pill in the rathole from 25;289' MD to 25;143' MD. Circulated 106 bbls of heavy mud pill to surface one time bottoms up while reciprocating from 25;134' MD to 25;001' MD. Performed a flow check - observed 2 bbls lost. Pumped out of hole from with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 25;063' MD to 20;776' MD in 11.8 ppg SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. 

07/18/2017: Continued to pump of out of hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 20;776' MD to 19;929' MD in 11.8 ppg SBM. Performed flow check - observed 2 bbls lost. Tripped out of hole (TOH) from 19;929' MD to 19;257' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - observed 2 bbls lost. Pumped 80 bbls of 13.8 ppg slug. TOH from 19;257' MD to 10;435' MD. Performed function tests of BOP rams and annulars on 6-5/8" drill pipe from the Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - good tests. Performed function test of Diverter on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel - good test. Performed flow check - observed 1.5 bbls lost. TOH from 10;435' MD to 7;394' MD. Monitor well on trip tank - well static. Pumped 65 bbls of 13.8 ppg slug. Monitored well on trip tank - 2 bbls lost. TOH from 7;394' MD to surface. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Boosted riser with 176 bbls of 11.8 ppg SBM. 

07/19/2017: TIH with 16" casing from surface to 3;972' MD in 11.8 ppg SBM while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - well static.

07/20/2017: Continued TIH with 16" casing from 3;972' MD to 11;815' MD in 11.8 ppg SBM while monitoring wellbore for proper displacement - well static.

07/21/2017: Continued to TIH with 16" casing in 11.8 ppg SBM from 11;815' MD to 17;734' MD. Made up (M/U) casing hanger and TIH with 16" casing on 6-5/8" landing string from 17;734' MD to 18;049' MD while monitoring well for proper displacement - well static.

07/22/2017: Continued TIH with 16" casing on 6-5/8" landing string from 18;049' MD to 25;140' MD/ 23;256' TVD setting depth in 11.8 ppg SBM while monitoring well for proper displacement - well static. Landed 16" casing hanger in supplemental adapter at 7;385' MD/TVD. Pumped 1;900 bbls of 11.8 ppg SBM to circulate and condition for 16" cement job. Pumped 200 bbls of 12.5 ppg lead spacer; 1;238 bbls (6;951 cu ft) of 13.0 ppg Lafarge Class H lead cement slurry; 445 bbls (2;499 cu ft) of 16.4 ppg Lafarge Class H tail cement slurry (total of 9;450 cu ft); and 25 bbls of 12.5 ppg tail spacer. Began displacing cement with 20;156 strokes of 11.8 ppg SBM.
"},{"   ":336,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-07-23","TEXT_REMARK":"07/23/2017: Continued displacing cement; pumping a total of 3;898 bbls of 11.8 ppg SBM for displacement. Bumped plug with ~500 psi over final circulating pressure (FCP) of 1;152 psi at 4 bpm (1;713 psi). Final lift pressure was 585 psi. Bled off 17.5 bbls to cement unit to check floats; floats held. Cement in place at 03:45 hrs. Set hanger seal assembly. Set and pressure test 16" hanger seal assembly to 5;000 psi for 5 min. Good test. Released running tool and tripped out of hole (TOH) with running tool from 7;338' to surface. Inspected tattle tale on running tool; good indication hanger set. Trip in hole (TIH) with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA; shallow test BHA; continue to TIH with wear bushing and set 15.125" ID (Inside Diameter) selectable wear bushing in wellhead at 7;129'with a bit depth of 7;579'. MW = 11.8 ppg surface/ 12.0 ppg downhole SBM.

Note: On 07/23/2017 at 03:49 pm; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) a 1 day extension of the 16" casing pressure test.

07/24/2017: TOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA with wear bushing running tool from 7;579' to 159'. Tripped in hole (TIH) with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 159' to 6;534'. Pressure tested Upper Blind Shear Ram (UBSR) from Yellow Pod; Driller's Control Panel (DCP); against 16" x 22" casing to 300/4;400 psi for 5 min. Good tests. Pressure tested LBSR from DCP Yellow Pod against 16" x 22" casing to 300/4;400 psi for 5 min. Performed test using 11.8 ppg SBM and IPT Suretec software. Functioned Upper/Lower BSRs from DCP Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel (TCP) Blue Pod. Good tests. TIH to 8;004'. Pressure tested BOPs on 6-5/8" 50# drill pipe to 250/8800 psi against rams and 250/5400 psi against annulars from DCP Yellow Pod. Good tests. Function tested BOP control panel from DCP Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel (TCP) Blue Pod. Good tests. Performed diverter function test from TCP. Good test. TIH from 8;004' to 13;897'. MW = 11.8 ppg surface/ 12.0 ppg downhole.

07/25/2017: TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 13;897' to 24;434'. Washed down to 24;834'; tagging upper float collar at 24;824'. Drilled wiper plug and upper float collar from 24;824' to 24;828'. Drilled hard cement from 24;900' to 28;913'. Tagged lower float collar at 24;913'. Drilled through lower float collar and hard cement to 25;134'; tagging the 16" guide shoe. Drilled through shoe and washed/reamed down to bottom at 25;289'. Drilled 11' of new formation from 25;289' to 25;300'. MW = 11.8 ppg surface/ 12.0 ppg downhole.

07/26/2017: Pulled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA into the shoe at bit depth of 25;075' to conduct formation integrity test (FIT). Performed FIT to 13.7 ppg (13.91 ppg downhole); 2;387 psi with 11.8 ppg SBM. TIH from 25;075' to 25;260'. Washed and reamed down from 25;260' to 25;300'. Drilled ahead from 25;300' to 25;821' and weighted up to 13.0 ppg surface/ 13.2 ppg downhole mud weight while drilling.

07/27/2017: Drilled ahead with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 25;864' to 26;756'. Decision made to pull out of the hole to the shoe for drill pipe torque issues. MW = 13.0 ppg surface/ 13.2 ppg downhole.

07/28/2017: Pumped out of hole from 26;626' to 25;018'; inspecting connections for signs of over torque. TIH from 24;840 to 25;509'. Pumped 65 bbl weighted sweep and circulate hole clean. TOH from 25;509' to 24;252'. MW = 13.0 ppg surface/ 13.2 ppg downhole.

07/29/2017: Continued TOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA on 6-5/8" DP from 24;253' to 22;205'. TIH from 22;205' to 23;655'. MW = 13.0 ppg surface/ 13.2 ppg downhole. Performed BOP Function test from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Yellow Pod.
"},{"   ":337,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-07-30","TEXT_REMARK":"07/30/2017: Tripped in hole (TIH) with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 23;655' to 26;756'. Drilled ahead from 26;756' to hole section TD at 27;158' MD (24;934' TVD). Note: At 27;094' MD; weighted up active system from 13.0 ppg to 13.1 ppg surface SBM (13.3 ppg DHMW) due to connection gas increasing 15 units over background gas and increase in pore pressure to 13.0 ppg. Pumped out of hole from 26;934' to 25;733'. 

07/31/2017: Continue pumping out of the hole with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA on 6-5/8" from 25;733' to 24;668'. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA on 6-5/8" DP from 24;668' to surface. MW = 13.1 ppg surface; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

08/01/2017: Rigged up (R/U) 14" casing equipment. Ran 14" liner in stands from surface to 3;208'. Rigged down (R/D) casing equipment and R/U DP handling equipment. Made up (M/U) 14" liner hanger. M/U Diverter subs. TIH with 14" casing on landing string from 3;208' to 20;156'. MW = 13.1 ppg surface; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

08/02/2017: TIH with 14" liner on 6-5/8" landing string to 26;939'. M/U TDX; TIH to 26;957' with 30-85k drag. Convert diverter sub and yield ball through diverter and test sub. Washed down to liner setting depth 27;037' MD/ 24;827' TVD. R/U cement head and cement lines. Pumped 100 bbls of 14.6 ppg spacer (14.6 ppg DHMW). Mixed and pumped 528 cu ft (94 bbls) of 16.4 ppg cement. Pumped 20 bbls of 14.6 ppg spacer (14.6 ppg DHMW). Displaced cement and spacer with 1;150 bbls of 13.1 ppg (13.3 ppg DHMW) SBM.  Set 14" liner hanger at 23;600' MD/ 22;073 TVD and confirmed with 100k overpull. TOH with 6-5/8" landing string from 23;600' to 21;589'. MW = 13.1 ppg surface; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

08/03/2017: TOH with running tool from 21;589' to surface. Function test lower blind shear rams (LBSRs) from Driller's Control Panel (DCP); Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel (TCP); Yellow Pod. Good tests. Function tested upper blind shear rams (UBSR) with HiPap Acoustics from Bridge. Good test. Attempted to pressure test casing to 3030 psi with 13.1 ppg SBM - failed test. TIH to 7;221' with BOP test assembly. Pressure test BOP on 5-7/8" DP from TCP Blue Pod to 250 psi low/ 8;200 psi high with MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW. Pressure test annular elements to 250 psi low/ 4;900 psi high. All pressure tests performed using IPT SureTec Software.

08/04/2017: Pressure test BOP on 5-7/8" DP from TCP Blue POD to 250 psi low/ 8;200 psi high with MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW. Perform BOP Function test from DCP Yellow Pod and from TCP Blue Pod. Performed diverter function from TCP. Good tests. TOH with BOP test assembly from 7;221' to surface. TIH with 13.375" RTTS packer from surface to packer setting depth of 23;751'. Attempt to pressure test annulus above RTTS with 13.1 ppg SMB to 2;000 psi - failed test. Pressure test 14" liner and shoe track below RTTS; good test. MW = 13.1 ppg surface; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

08/05/2017: Pressure test 14" liner and shoe track below RTTS. Good test. Release 13-3/8" RTTS with no overpull and TOH from 23;719' to 146'. M/U 16" RTTS and bypass valve; TIH from 146' to 20;421. MW = 13.1 ppg surface; 13.3 ppg DHMW. Function test BOP from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Yellow Pod.
"},{"   ":338,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-08-06","TEXT_REMARK":"08/06/2017: Tripped in hole (TIH) with 16" RTTS packer from 20;421' to setting depth of 23;676'. Attempt to pressure test 16" casing down choke line to 1;000 psi - failed test. Pressure test down drill pipe to 2;000 psi - good test. Trip out of hole (TOH) and set RTTS at 12;200'. Attempt to pressure down drill pipe to 2;000 psi - good test. Set RTTS at 10;500'. Attempt to pressure down drill pipe to 2;000 psi - test failed. Pressure test 16" casing down choke line to 1;000 psi - good test. Leak in 16" casing isolated to interval between 10;550' and 12;200'. TOH with 16" RTTS packer from 10;500' to 10;095'. MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

08/07/2017: TOH with 16" RTTS packer from 10;095' to surface. Rig up (R/U) wireline equipment and run in hole (RIH) with 60-arm caliper to 13;000'. Activate caliper and log up to 10;400' at 2;400 ft/hr. No definitive anomalies observed. Log up from 10;400' to 7;310'. MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

08/08/2017: Performed 60-arm caliper log run for 14" and 16" from 23;00' to 7;310' WLM. Pull out of hole (POOH) with 60-arm caliper tool. Change out wireline spool and P/U Gyro tool. RIH with Gyro tool from surface to 7;080' WLM. Tool string became stuck at 7;080' WLM. Attempt to work tool string free with no success. While working string; max overpull of the wireline was unintentionally exceed and parted the wireline at the toolstring. POOH with wireline. Observed the 0.3125" wire had separated from the cable head leaving 18.18' of fish in the hole. Estimated top of fish at 7;061.8' WLM. MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

08/09/2017: R/U wireline equipment and make up (M/U) wireline fishing BHA. RIH with wireline fishing BHA from surface to 7;000'. Slack off at 30 fpm from 7;000' WLM to 7;060' WLM and began losing wireline tension. Pick up (P/U) 3;100 lbs of tension - confirmed good latch onto fish. Worked fish free by slacking off (S/O) 2;700 lbs and P/U to 10;000 lbs tension (7;200 lbs overpull). POOH with fish on fishing BHA from 7;080' WLM to 92' WLM. At 92' WLM observed increase in wireline tension from 600 lbs to 1;600 lbs; indicating fish hung in slip joint shoe. Discussed plan forward with office team. MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

08/10/2017: Pulled approximately 7;500 lbs overpull (8;000 lbs of wireline tension) to free fish. Retrieved fish to surface. Upon inspection; determined full recovery of fish with no junk left in hole. Rigged down wireline and wireline equipment. MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

08/11/2017: Performed maintenance on Drill Floor. P/U 12.25" dumb iron assembly and trip in hole (TIH) from surface to 7;356'. Perform BOP function test from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod. Performed diverter function from Driller's Control Panel. Continue TIH with 12.25" BHA from 7;356' to 20;634'. 

08/12/2017: TIH with 12.25" BHA from 20;634' to 23;600'. Circulated bottoms up (B/U) until MW in and MW out equal 13.1 ppg. TOH from 23;600' to 6;297'. Observed loss rate of approximately 18 barrels per hour. Stopped TOH to monitor losses. Shut the well in on the lower blind shear rams (LBSRs) and lined the well up to the choke line on the stripping tank. Monitored wellbore on the stripping tank with 6.5 ppg base oil; total of 37 bbls of base oil in the choke line. Decision made to displace 13.1 ppg mud in the riser to 12.1 ppg in order to reduce loss rate. Displaced choke; kill; and boost lines from 13.1 ppg to 12.6 ppg. Below LBSR; MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.
"},{"   ":339,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-08-13","TEXT_REMARK":"08/13/2017: Displace riser from 13.1 ppg to 12.1 ppg SBM due to losses of approximately 17 bbls per hour. Displaced surface lines; trip tanks; and choke; kill; and boost lines to 12.1 ppg. Opened the lower blind shear rams (LBSRs) and monitored the well on the trip tank with 12.1 ppg. Initial loss rate was 17 bbls per hour and trended down to 11 bph after 5 minutes. Trip in hole with the 12-1/4" wiper trip BHA from 6;289' to 10;500'. Pumped 360 bbls 13.1 ppg of 60 pounds per barrel lost circulation material. Trip of the hole with the 12-1/4" wiper trip BHA from 10;500' to 238'. MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

Note: On 08/13/2017 at 11:03 hours; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Robert Naumann permission to run the 13-3/4" casing tieback at 23;500' MD/ 21;995' TVD with 12.1 ppg mud in the riser to mitigate losses from the wellhead to surface.

08/14/2017: Trip out of hole from 238' to surface with wiper assembly BHA. Trip in hole with the Dril-Quip multi-purpose tool and retrieved the wear sleeve from the high pressure wellhead. MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

08/15/2017: Trip in hole with 13.75" x 14" casing tieback from surface to 5;939'. Upper Blind Shear Ram and Lower Blind Shear Ram Function test performed from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod - successful test. MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.
