08/16/2017: Trip in hole with 13.75" x 14" casing tieback from 5;939' to 13;330'. MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

08/17/2017: Trip in hole with 13.75" x 14" casing tieback from 13;330' to 16;384'. Trip in hole with 5-7/8" cement stinger from surface to 12;332'. MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

08/18/2017: Trip in hole with 5-7/8" inner string from 12;332' to 16;042'. Made up 18.75" x 14" casing hanger seal assembly running tool to casing string. Trip in hole with 13.75" x 14" casing tieback on 6-5/8" landing string from 16;385' to 23;492'. Land the 13.75" x 14" casing hanger in the wellhead at 7;129'. Pumped 321 bbls of 13.1 ppg SBM prior to cement job. Observed 129 bbls lost during pre-job circulation. Pumped 75 bbls of lead spacer at 3 bbls per minute. Cement unit pumped 955 cu ft of 15.5 ppg Class H cement at 3 bbls per minute. Displaced cement with 20 bbls of tail spacer; followed by 585 bbls of SBM at 3 bbls per minute. 385 bbls of total losses throughout cement job; including losses from pre-job circulation. Shut down pumps and bled back 12.8 bbls to the cement unit. Floats held. MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

Note: On 08/18/2017 at 21:41 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) approval to delay BOP pressure testing 24 hours.

08/19/2017: Attempted to set the Seal Assembly as per Seal Assembly Representative with no success. Decided to wait on cement with upper pipe rams closed. Line up to the kill line on the stripping tank with 12.1 ppg to monitor the well. Continued to wait on cement until 14:00 hrs; boosted riser with 12.1 ppg SBM until MW in equals MW out. Picked up to release the Casing Hanger Seal Assembly Running Tool from the 14" casing hanger. Trip out of hole on 6-5/8" landing string with 5-7/8" inner string and Casing Hanger Seal Assembly Running Tool from 23;169' to 10;554'. MW = 13.1 ppg; 13.3 ppg DHMW.

Note: On 08/19/2017 at 11:58 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) granted Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) approval to delay BOP pressure testing an additional 24 hours.
"},{"   ":340,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-08-20","TEXT_REMARK":"08/20/2017: Tripped out of hole with 5-7/8" inner string from 10;554' to 1;485' MD. Tripped in hole with mill and flush assembly and 1;485' tailpipe. Landed tool on the 14" tieback hanger at 7;129'. Milled seal assembly profile for 25 minutes with no footage made at 5-10k WOB; 10 RPM; 0.5-2k ft.lbs Torque. Circulated cuttings above BOP; picked up mill and flush assembly above BOP and circulated riser volume bottoms up at 220 gpm down drill pipe and 750 gpm down boost line. Performed flow check on trip tank - well static. Trip out of hole with mill and flush assembly to 1;271'. Performed flow check on trip tank - well static. Picked up 14" Seal Assembly Running Tool (SART); tripped in hole to 6;395'. Monitored well on trip tank. 12.1 ppg (surface)/ 12.3 ppg (downhole) SBM. Pressure tested choke and kill manifold to 300 psi low; 7;200 psi with 12.1 ppg (surface)/ 12.3 ppg (downhole) SBM using IPT SureTec software - successful test.

08/21/2017: Continued trip in hole with 14" SART from 6;395' to 7;066'. Set and tested 14" seal assembly to 7;200 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Pick up off seal assembly and tripped in hole to 8;421'. Pressure tested BOP. Function tested BOP and Diverter. Trip out of hole to 1;745' to redress Multi-Purpose Tool (MPT) with wear sleeve. Tripped in hole with MPT dressed with wear sleeve; from 1;745' to high pressure wellhead at 8;701' while weighting up active system from 12.1 ppg to 13.1 ppg. Boosted riser with 13.1 ppg beginning at 4;581'. Displace drill string with 13.1 ppg (surface)/ 13.3 ppg (downhole) SBM at 18 bpm. Continued trip in hole from 8;701' to 8;872'. Set wear sleeve at 7;127'; confirmed with 15klb overpull and trip out to surface. Boosted riser from 8;701' to 1;924' with 750 gpm. 

BOP Pressure Test on 5-7/8" drill pipe on Yellow Pod from Driller's Control Panel. Annulars tested to 300 psi/ 5;000 psi; rams to 300 psi/ 7;200 psi; surface equipment to 300 psi/ 7;200 psi for 5 minutes with 12.1 ppg (surface)/ 12.3 ppg (downhole) SBM - successful test.
BOP Function Test on Blue Pod from Toolpusher's Control Panel and on Yellow Pod from Driller's Control Panel - successful test.
Diverter Function Test from Toolpusher's Control Panel - successful test.

Note: BSEE Inspection by Mr. Cedric Bernard; Chris Treland and Trouy Boudreaux. No Incidences of Non-compliance. 

08/22/2017: Trip in hole with 12-1/4" BHA to 3;320'. Installed non-rotating protectors to 13;003'. 13.1 ppg (surface)/ 13.3 ppg (downhole) SBM.

Pressure tested Upper Blind Shear Ram and Lower Blind Shear Ram to 300 psi/ 3;000 psi for 5 minutes with 13.1 ppg (surface)/ 13.3 ppg (downhole) SBM on Blue Pod from Toolpusher's Control Panel using IPT SureTec software - successful test.
Pressure tested 13-3/4" x 14" tieback casing to 3;000 psi against USBRs for 30 mins with 13.1 ppg (surface)/ 13.3 ppg (downhole) SBM.
Function tested Upper and Lower Blind Shear Rams on Yellow Pod from Driller's Control Panel. 

08/23/2017: Continued trip in hole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe to 23;103'; installing non-rotating protectors. Washed down 450 gpm; tagged 14" tieback Upper Float Collar at 23;377'. Drilled upper float collar; wash/ream to lower float collar 23;463'; drilled lower float collar; wash/ream through tieback shoe. Slacked off from 23;546'; tagged cement at 23;563'; drilled to 23;580'. Drilled 30 rpm; 17-24k ft-lb torque; 533 gpm. Flow check - static. Tripped 5 stands 6-5/8" drill pipe out to 23;102'. Trip 5-7/8" drill pipe in hole to 23;833'; tagged cement; racked back 5-7/8" stand; made up 6-5/8" drill pipe and drilled to 24;014' at 550 gpm; 3;100 psi; 30 rpm; 18-20k torque; 15-20 WOB; average 50 ft/hr ROP. 13.1 ppg (surface)/ 13.3 ppg (downhole) SBM.

08/24/2017: Drilled out hard cement from 24;014' to 24;035' at 550 gpm; 3;150 psi; 30 rpm; 24-28k ft-lb torque; 15-20 WOB; 90-95 fph; ream through ratty cement to 24;160'; wash/ream to 24;232'. Tripped in hole with 6-5/8" drill pipe to 26;790'; wash down to 26;810' tag hard cement. Drilled to 26;844'; 550 gpm; 3;840 psi; 30 rpm; 24-28k ft-lb torque; 15k lb WOB; 95 fph. Installed Fully Open Safety Valve (FOSV); pumped 1 bpm down drill string and choke; observed 375 psi of friction pressure; pressure tested surface lines; pressure tested liner. Suspended drilling to monitor Hurricane Harvey. Monitored well on trip tank - static. Drilled cement from 26;844' to 26;875'; drilled wiper plug set and upper float collar from 26;875' to 26;879'; lower float collar at 26;928' to 26;930' and hard cement 26;930' from 26;962'. Suspended drilling to monitor Hurricane Harvey. Circulated 13.6 ppg (surface)/ 13.8 ppg (downhole) SBM at 550 gpm; 2;950 psi. Continued drilling to 27;018' at 550 gpm; 3;300 - 3;600 psi; 30 rpm; 22-26k ft-lb; 20-40k lb WOB while weighting up. Washed and reamed rathole 27;158'. Drilled 10 ft new formation. 13.6 ppg (surface)/ 13.8 pp (downhole) SBM in/out. Racked back 1 stand to pull into 14" liner; installed TIW; made up top drive and conducted Formation Integrity Test to 14.6 ppg surface EMW (14.95 ppg downhole); 1;350 psi; with 13.6 ppg SBM. Reamed down to 27;168' while weight up to 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.1 ppg (downhole).

Pressure tested 13-3/4" x 14" liner against Lower Annular to 3;000 psi for 30 minutes; pumped and bled back 31.75 bbls; 13.1 ppg (surface)/ 13.3 ppg (downhole) SBM using IPT SureTec software - successful test.
Pressure test surface lines to 4;000 psi for 5 minutes - successful test.

08/25/2017: Drilled 12-1/4" hole section from 27;170' to 27;275' while continuing weight up from 13.6 ppg to 13.9 ppg. Lightning strike to rig 03:30 hrs resulted in loss of "Auto-Drill" function; reducing drawworks speed; continued drilling in manual drill mode. Drilled at 750 gpm; 6;350-6;500 psi; 50 rpm; 26-28k ft-lb torque; 20-25 WOB; 350 gpm. Pumped out of hole to 26;923' at 300 gpm; 30 rpm and pulled into 14" shoe. Suspended drilling to assess Crown Mounted Compensator (CMC) lighting strike. Circulated bottoms up with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.1 ppg (downhole) at 785 gpm with 6;500 psi; 25 rpm; 23-25k ft-lb torque. Flow checked well - static. Tripped out of hole to 27;095'; made up top drive and pumped out of hole to 26;932 at 300 gpm; 1;550 psi; 30 rpm; 20-25k lb-ft torque. Pulled into 14" shoe. Monitored well on trip tank - 1.8 bph losses. Tripped in hole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly to 27;191'. Staged pumps to 700 gpm; 5;350 psi; 30-50 rpm to wash to bottom. Tagged bottom at 27;295' and drilled to 27;418' at 750 gpm; 6;450-6;650 psi; 50 rpm; 26-28k ft-lb torque; 20-25 WOB. 

08/26/2017: Drilled 12-1/4" hole section from 27;519' to 27;857'. 750 gpm; 6;200-6;550 psi; 50 - 60 rpm with 21-34k ft/lbs torque; 9-26 lb WOB. Boosted riser at 377 gpm with 740 psi. Average ROP with connection 20 ft/hr; 13.9 ppg SBM. Pumped out of hole from 27;857' to 25;593' at 700 gpm; to install non-rotating protectors.
"},{"   ":341,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-08-27","TEXT_REMARK":"08/27/2017: Pumped out of hole from 27;593' to 27;013' at 700 gpm; boosted riser at 377 gpm. Performed BOP Function Test from Driller's Control Panel with Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel with Yellow Pod - tests successful. Preformed Diverter Function Test from Driller's Control Panel - test successful. Tripped out of hole to 19;699' to install non-rotating drill pipe protectors. Tripped in hole to 27;727'; installing protectors. Washed to bottom at 27;857'; drilled 12-1/4" hole to 27;965'. 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.1 ppg (downhole) SBM.  

08/28/2017: Drilled 12-1/4" hole section from 27;965' to 28;712'. Flow checked well on trip tank - static. 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.1 ppg (downhole) SBM. 

08/29/2017: Drilled 12-1/4" hole section from 28;712' to 28;882'. Communication with steering head lost. Circulated well clean and made decision to pull out of hole. Flow checked well - static. Pumped out of hole untill 12-1/4" drilling assembly was inside 14" shoe at 26;923'. Flow checked well - static. Tripped out of hole to 19;951'. 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.1 ppg (downhole) SBM.

08/30/2017: Continued tripping out of hole with 12-1/4" BHA from 19;951' to surface. Performed Upper Blind Shear Ram and Lower Blind Shear Ram Function Test from Driller's Control Pannel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Pannel on Blue Pod - test successful. Made up 12-1/4" BHA with rotary steerable and tripped in hole to 1;425'. 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.1 ppg (downhole) SBM.

08/31/2017: Continued to trip in hole with 12-1/4" BHA on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 1;425' to 18;142' MD. Preformed BOP Pressure Tests to 300 psi low and 9;600 psi high and tested annulars to 300 psi low and 4;850 psi high from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod with 13;9 ppg SBM; using IPT SureTec software - test successful. Preformed BOP Function Test from the Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod - test successful. Preformed Diverter Function Test from the Toolpusher's Control Panel - test successful. Continued trip in hole with 12-1/4" BHA to 20;660'. 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.1 ppg (downhole) SBM.

09/01/2017: Continued to trip in hole with 12-1/4" BHA from 20;660' to 28;882' MD and drilled 12-1/4" hole section to 29;216' MD. 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.1 ppg (downhole) SBM.  

09/02/2017: Continued to drill 12-1/4" hole section from 29;216' to 29;956' MD with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.1 ppg (downhole) SBM.

"},{"   ":342,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-09-03","TEXT_REMARK":"09/03/2017: Drilled 12-1/4" hole section from 29;956' MD to 30;751' MD in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM. Performed flow check - well static.

09/04/2017: Continued drilling 12-1/4" hole section from 30;751' MD to well Total Depth (TD) of 31;071' MD/ 28;547' TVD in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM. Performed flow check - well static. Pumped 40 bbl 15.9 ppg sweep and circulated. Performed log up from 31;071' MD/ 28;547' TVD to 30;300' MD while circulating. Tripped in hole (TIH) to TD. Performed log up from 31;071' MD/ 28;547' TVD to 30;300' MD. Pumped out of the hole with 12-1/4" BHA from 30;300' MD to 29;288' MD.

09/05/2017: Continued pumping out of the hole with 12-1/4" BHA from 29;288' MD to 27;011' MD in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM. Perfomed flow check - well static. TOH from 27;011' MD to 26;321' MD. Pumped 80 bbl 15.9 ppg slug. Continued TOH from 26;321' MD to 24;064' MD. Performed flow check - well static. Continued TOH from 24;064' MD to 9;721' MD. Performed function test of BOP rams and annulars on 5-7/8" drill pipe from the Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod - good tests. Performed function test of Diverter from Driller's Panel. Continued TOH from 9;721' MD to 7;064' MD. Performed flow check - well static. 

09/06/2017: Continued TOH from 7;064' MD to surface in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. Ran in hole (RIH) with wireline descent #1: RDT from surface to 29;655' Wireline Measurement (WLM) in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM. Pulled out of hole (POOH) with wireline descent #1: RDT from 29;655' WLM to 19;000' WLM due to failed wireline toolstring. Monitored the well on trip tank - well static. 

09/07/2017: Continued POOH with wireline descent #1: RDT from 19;000' WLM to surface in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM. RIH with wireline descent #1: RDT from surface to 400' WLM. Performed shallow test on wireline BHA - good test. Decision made to wait on weather. POOH with wireline descent #1: RDT from 400' WLM to surface. TIH with 12-1/4" BHA from surface to 6;950' MD. Monitored well on trip tank - well static.

Note: On 09/07/2017 at 17:54 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) provided Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) approval to proceed with storm suspension operations.

09/08/2017: Continued waiting on weather. Continued TIH with 12-1/4" BHA from 6;950' MD to 25;693' MD in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM. Set RTTS at 7;853' MD. Pressure tested RTTS down choke line with cement unit between lower annular and RTTS to 1;000 psi - good test. Pumped a 50 bbl 14.1 ppg high viscous pill and displaced with 165 bbls of 13.9 ppg SBM. Closed lower annular. Performed pressure test to 1;000 psi against top of RTTS and SSCIII for 5 minutes - good test. Bled off pressure and opened lower annular. Monitored riser on trip tank - riser static. POOH from 7;853' MD to 7;270' MD. Pumped 50 bbls of 15.9 ppg slug and displaced with 10 bbl of 13.9 SBM. Monitored well on trip tank - well static. TOH with RTTS running tool from 7;270' MD to surface. Closed lower blind shear ram (LBSR). Performed test down choke line between LBSR and RTTS to 1;000 psi for 15 minutes - good test. All tests performed utilizing IPT SureTec software with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM.

09/09/2017: Continued waiting on weather. Displaced choke and kill lines from 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM to 8.6 ppg seawater. Pumped 175 bbls of 15.9 ppg spacer down boost line. Continued displacing choke; kill; and boost lines with seawater to displace riser to 8.6 ppg seawater. Conducted static sheet test - good test. Monitored well head pressure - pressure static. 
"},{"   ":343,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-09-10","TEXT_REMARK":"09/10/2017: Continued waiting on weather. Laid down (L/D) landing joint and picked up (P/U) and installed diverter. Rigged down (R/D) riser running tools and equipment. Performed diverter flow through test with seawater - good test. Performed function tests on Lower BSR and Upper BSR with Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and with Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod - good tests. Tripped in hole (TIH) with Halliburton RTTS overshot from surface to 7;000'. Continued waiting on weather. 

09/11/2017: Continued waiting on weather. TIH from 7;000' to 7;772' with Halliburton RTTS overshot. Set down 20 klbs down; P/U 100 klbs over initial drill string weight; closed upper annular and pulled RTTS with 30klbs over drillstring weight to pull RTTS packer free. Opened upper annular and performed flow check - no flow observed. Tripped out of hole (TOH) with Halliburton RTTS from 7;772' to surface. 

09/12/2017: TOH with 12-1/4" wiper BHA from 17;819' to 6;480'. Function tested Upper BSR from acoustic panel - good test. TIH with 12-1/4" wiper BHA from 6;480' to 26;672'. Performed BOP function test on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod - good test. Performed diverter function test from Toolpusher's Control Panel - good test. Began circulating and conditioning 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM at 26;672'.

09/13/2017: Continued circulating and conditioning 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM at 26;672'. TIH with 12-1/4" wiper BHA to 30;865'. Washed down from 30;865' to 31;053'; tagging with 5 klbs down. Continued washing down to bottom at 31;071' while rotating at 60 rpm. Circulated bottoms up. Continued circulating until 13.9 ppg (surface) SBM in/out. TOH from 31;071' to 25;066'. Pressure tested BOPs on 5-7/8" drillpipe from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod - rams and surface equipment to 300 psi/ 9;550 psi with 13.9 ppg (surface) SBM; annulars to 300 psi/ 4;650 psi with 13.9 ppg (surface) SBM - good tests. 

09/14/2017: R/D BOP test stand and cement hose. TOH with 12-1/4" wiper BHA from 25;066' to surface. RIH with Halliburton Reservoir Description Tool (RDT) run #1 (descent #2) in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM to acquire pressure samples. 

09/15/2017: RIH on wireline with RDT run #1 (descent #2) from 20;400' to 31;020' in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM to acquire pressure samples. 

09/16/2017: Continued performing Halliburton Reservoir Description Tool (RDT) run #1 (descent #2) formation evaluation in 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM to acquire pressure samples. Pulled out of hole (POOH) with Halliburton RDT tool string to surface. Picked up (P/U) Schlumberger 120 Arm Caliper Platform Multifinger Imaging Tool (PMIT) and Ultrasonic Imager Tool (USIT) and ran in hole (RIH) on wireline to 8;400'.
"},{"   ":344,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-09-17","TEXT_REMARK":"09/17/2017: Ran in hole (RIH) with Schlumberger 120 Point Caliper/ USIT on wireline from 8;400' MD/TVD to 18;000' MD/ 17;762' TVD. Activated Caliper and up-logged from 18;000' MD/ 17;762' TVD to 7;129' MD/TVD. Schlumberger Subject Matter Expert preliminary report indicated almost zero wear on casing. Pulled out of hole (POOH) from 7;129' MD/TVD to surface. Laid down Caliper/USIT tool. 

09/18/2017: RIH with Wireline run #3 (OMRI/CAL-SDL-DSN) assembly from surface to 27;290' MD/ 25;059' TVD. Made several attempts to work assembly down with no success. Observed several overpulls; pulling assemby free and firing jars three times. POOH with Wireline run #3 (OMRI/CAL-SDL-DSN) tools from 27;300' MD/ 25;068' TVD to surface. Removed centralizers from tool and RIH with Wireline run #3 Descent #2 (OMRI/CAL-SDL-DSN) assembly from surface to 18;500' MD/ 18;154' TVD.

09/19/2017: RIH with Wireline Run #3 Descent #2 (OMRI/CAL-SDL-DSN) assembly from 18;500' MD/ 18;154' TVD to 27;613' MD/ 25;356' TVD. Observed several overpulls increasing each attempt to work past 27;613' MD/ 25;356' TVD; fired jars four times. POOH with Wireline Run #3 Descent #2 (OMRI/CAL-SDL-DSN) assembly from 27;037' M / 24;827' TVD to surface. 

09/20/2017: Made up (M/U) 12-1/4" LithoTrak logging BHA and TIH to 28;966' MD/ 26;600' TVD. Performed Diverter function test from Driller's Control Panel (32 seconds to close). Performed BOP Function Test on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod.

09/21/2017: Logged down with 12-1/4" LithoTrak BHA from 29;000' MD/ 26;631' TVD to 31;000' MD/ 28;471' TVD. Washed down from 31;000' MD/ 28;471' TVD to 31;071' MD/ 28;536' TVD. Circulated bottoms up. Tripped out of hole (TOH) to 30;170' MD/ 27;707' TVD.

09/22/2017: TOH with 12-1/4" LithoTraker BHA from 30;170' MD/ 27;707' TVD to surface. R/U Weatherford casing equipment and TIH with 9-7/8" liner (doubles) to 1;270' MD/TVD. Performed BSR/CSR function tests from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod.

09/23/2017: Tripped in holed (TIH) with 9-7/8" liner from surface to 4;446' MD/TVD. TIH with 9-7/8" liner on 5-7/8" DP from 4;532' to 30;497' MD.

"},{"   ":345,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-09-24","TEXT_REMARK":"09/24/2017: Continue to trip in hole (TIH) with 9-7/8" liner from 30;497' MD to 31;035' MD. Washed down from 31;047' MD to 31;057' MD/ 28;527' TVD. Circulated 1 landing string volume at 2 barrels per minute (bpm) - no losses observed. Pumped 6 bbls of 14.6 ppg lead spacer; closed lo-torque and pressure tested lines to 7;000 psi. Pumped remaining 94 bbls of 14.6 ppg lead spacer. Mixed and pumped 6 bbls of 16.4 ppg Class H cement; launched top wiper dart. Continued pumping 16.4 ppg cement (189 bbls total = 1;061 cu ft total). Lined up on spacer and launched top wiper dart. Pumped 20 bbls of tail spacer and displaced cement with 13.9 ppg SBM at 2-3 bpm. Full returns throughout cement job with 405 psi of lift pressure. Set and release from liner hanger; top of liner at 26;557' MD/ 24;392' TVD. Trip out of hole (TOH) to 26;360' MD. Circulated wiper balls down string and pumped bottoms up while stripping out LCM from active system.

09/25/2017: Trip out of hole (TOH) with liner running tool from 26;360' MD to 3;137' MD. Performed Casing/UBSR test on 9-7/8" x 13-3/4" x 14" casing to 300/2;000 psi for 30 minutes with 13.9 ppg SBM; successful test. Continued TOH from 3;137' MD to surface. Laid out liner running tool and inspected (emergency pins did not release). Pressure tested LBSRs to 300/2;000 psi for 5 minutes; successful test. Function tested UBSR/LBSR from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod.

09/26/2017: TIH with multi-purpose tool (MPT) to test BOPs and retrieve wear sleeve. Pressure tested and function tested BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue pod; successful tests. Pressure tested rams to 300/9;550 psi for 5 min and annulars to 300/4;650 psi for 5 minutes with 13.9 ppg (surface) SBM; successful tests. Retrieved wear sleeve with MPT and jetted wellhead profile. Function tested the Diverter from Toolpusher's Control panel. TOH to surface with wear sleeve and MPT assembly.

09/27/2017: Pick up 9-7/8" seal stem. Run 9-7/8" tieback in doubles to 2;763' MD. Make up 9-7/8" x 10.175" crossover. Run 10.175" TB in stands from derrick to 10;315' MD. While TIH; observed OES packer wedged on top of stand. Secured packer rubber and removed stand from pipe stump. Moved stand to auxillary mousehole and inspected elevators and flowback tool. OES flowback tool lock nut backed off which allowed 4 pieces to fall down casing string. TOH and lay down 10.175" doubles to forward pipe deck.

09/28/2017: TOH with 10.175" production tieback in doubles from 10;315' MD to 4;931' MD. 

Note: BSEE conducted monthly inspection. No INCs issued.

09/29/2017: Continued TOH from 4;931' MD to 299' MD; laying out 10.175" and 9-7/8" TB in doubles to forward pipe deck. Recovered all 4 missing components of the OES flowback tool above the Orifice collar. Continued TOH from 299' MD to surface. Lay out seal stem assembly to pipe skate. Lay out out 6-5/8" 34# drill pipe. 

09/30/2017: Lay down 6-5/8" 34# drill pipe to forward pipe deck. Pick up 9-7/8" seal stem assembly. Run 9-7/8" casing doubles to 381' MD as per tally. Pick up 5-7/8" 23# TFM drill pipe on auxillary rotary and rack back in the derrick. Offloaded 9-7/8" tieback doubles from supply vessel.
"},{"   ":346,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-10-01","TEXT_REMARK":"10/01/2017: Continued unloading 9-7/8" TB liner doubles from supply vessel. Trip in hole (TIH) from 381' to 2;818' MD. Ran 32 stands of 10.175" liner out of the derrick to 6;863'. TIH with 10.175" casing from 6;863' to 9;393' MD. Mud weight 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) EMW. 

10/02/2017: TIH with 10.175" doubles from 9;393' to 14;555' MD; replacing damaged joints as necessary. Made up (M/U) crossover to 10.75" and TIH from derrick in stands from 14;688' to 16;922'. Mud weight 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) EMW. 

10/03/2017: TIH with stands of 10.75" from the derrick from 16;922' to 19;426' MD. Make up 3 casing pups to string and then 10-3/4" hanger. Run hanger below rotary and install slips. TIH with 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" tieback on landing string from 19;518' to 25;235' MD. Mud weight 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) EMW. 
 
Note: On 10/03/2017 at 23:13 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) a 48 hour extension for BOP and Diverter function tests.

10/04/2017: TIH with 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" tieback on landing string from 24;648' to 26;434' MD. Break circulation; washed down at 2 bpm to 26;555' bit depth. At 26;555'; observed SPP pressure increase from 1;350 psi to 2;000 psi. Shut down pumps and pressure stabilized at ~1;800 psi; indicating the seals on the Seal Stem assembly were engaged in the lower PBR. Picked up 10 ft from 26;555' to 26;545' and broke circulation at 2 bpm (1;400 psi); indicating the Seal Stem had been removed from the PBR. Picked up and made up the Blackhawk cement stand. Discuss space out on landing tieback casing and no-go on Seal Stem in lower PBR with office. Confirmed that 10-3/4" tieback hanger was 9.7' high when Seal Stem no-go landed out. Mud weight 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) EMW.

10/05/2017: Break out 10-3/4" hanger; removed 19.6' casing pup and made up DQ hanger back to string. TIH with 10-3/4" hanger on 6-5/8" landing string from 19;489' to 23;059'. Rigged up OES flowback tool and continued RIH from 23;059' to 26;431'. Circulate and conditioned at 26;431'; acquiring baseline parameters. Picked up and made up cement stand to 26;549'. Slack off from 26;549' to 26;555' while pumping at 2 bpm (1;480 psi). Observed pressure increase to 1;960 psi at 26;555' bit depth (6 ft in on cement stand) indicating the Seal Stem assembly seals were engaged in the lower PBR. Slack off to land the hanger at 26;570' bit depth (7;129' hanger depth) and slacked off 100 klbs of casing weight. Pressure tested the Seal Stem assembly against the PBR by applying 1;000 psi. Picked up to 26;514'. Circulated 900 bbls total. Pressure tested the cement lines to 10;000 psi. Pumped 14.4 ppg lead spacer; total 200 bbls. Mix and pumped 15.5 ppg cement slurry @ 5 bpm. 151 bbls pumped at midnight.

Note: On 10/05/2017 at 17:37 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) a 48 hour extension for BOP and Diverter function tests.

Note: On 10/05/2017 at 21:37 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) provided Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) approval to proceed with storm suspension operations.

10/06/2017: Continued pumping the tieback cement job; launched top dart; pumping 9 bbls of cement on top of dart and then followed with 20 bbls of 14.4 ppg spacer. Total cement pumped for job 5;008 cu ft. Displaced the tieback cement job with 13.9 ppg SBM using rig pumps. Observed bottom plug bump 82 bbls later than calculated. Staged pumps down from 10 bpm to 2 bpm/ 2;500 psi; and then increased rate to 3.5 bpm/ 3;200 psi. Decreased displacement rate 30 bbls before expected plug bump. Shut down pumps at 1;631 bbls without bumping plugs. Cement in place at 07:30 hrs; lift pressure 1;786 psi. Slacked off and stabbed tieback casing into PBR and landed out 10-3/4" casing hanger on load shoulder. Bled off pressure to cement unit while slacking off - 15 bbls bled off. Slacked off 70 klbs down on hanger and turned string 6 rounds to the right to engage seal assy. Break circulation from cement unit down kill line; then close MVBR. Pressure up quickly to 4;000 psi and hold for 30 seconds. Ramp pressure from 4;000 psi to 9;550 psi and hold for 5 minutes. Bled off pressure - 3.9 bbls. Pressure back up to 9;550 psi and test per IPT for 5 mins - good test. Picked up casing hanger seal assembly running tool (CHSART) above hanger and breakout cement stand. Install two 7" nerf balls and pump down drill string until BU at surface. Performed flow check and pump 65 bbls 15.9 ppg slug. Trip out of hole with DQ CHSART and L/D same. WOC. Test LBSRs to 1;000 psi for 5 mins. Displace riser to SW from 13.9 ppg SBM. Pump SW overboard.

10/07/2017: Wait on weather from 00:00 hrs to 13:30 hrs. Perform housecleaning; maintenance and secured equipment while waiting on weather. Held PJSM for displacing. Commenced displacing riser from SW to 13.9 ppg SBM. TIH with MPT from surface to 7;273'. Function BOP/Diverter prior to setting wear sleeve on 5-7/8" drill pipe. Set wear sleeve with 30k. Picked up and shear off at 30k.
"},{"   ":347,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-10-08","TEXT_REMARK":"10/08/2017: Trip out of hole with multi-purpose tool from 7;845' to surface. Pressure tested 10-3/4" x 10.175" x 9.875" tieback casing with upper blind shear rams with 13.9 ppg (surface) SBM/ 14.2 (downhole) SBM to 8;150 psi for 30 minutes with IPT - successful test. Function test UBSR/LBSR from Driller' Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Trip in hole with 8.5" cleanout assembly from surface to 25;281'. 

10/09/2017: Washed down from 25;281' to top of cement at 25;613' with cleanout assembly. Drilled cement from 25;613' to 26;333'. Drilled orifice collar from 26;333' to 26;335'. Drilled cement from 26;335' to 26;686'. Circulated bottoms up while reciprocating stand from 26;680' to 26;560'. Trip out hole from 26;680' to 25;577'; checking for overpull and excessive drag through the tieback shoe track. Trip in hole from 25;577' to 30;355' while checking for excessive drag through the tieback shoe track. Tagged cement stringers at 30;355'. Reamed down from 30;355' to 30;384' through cement stringers with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.2 ppg (downhole) SBM.

10/10/2017: Reamed down from 30;384' to 30;786' through cement stringers. Drilled out upper float collar from 30;786' to 30;790'. Drilled out 9-7/8" liner shoe track from 30;790' to 30;960' plugged back total depth (PBTD). Pumped 100 bbl hi-viscous sweep and circulated 1.5 times bottoms up. Trip out of hole with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 30;950' to 30;368'. Performed BOP pressure test from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; to 300 psi/ 9;550 psi on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 13.9 ppg SBM - successful test. Tested annular to 300 psi/ 4;650 psi on Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; to 300 psi/ 9;550 psi on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 13.9 ppg SBM - successful test.

10/11/2017: Pressure tested BOP from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; to 300 psi/ 9;550 psi on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 13.9 ppg SBM - successful test. Tested annular to 300 psi/ 4;650 psi on Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; to 300 psi/ 9;550 psi on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 13.9 ppg SBM - successful test. Performed BOP function test from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod - successful test. Performed Diverter function test from Toolpusher's Control Panel - successful test. Trip out of hole from 30;368' to 26;571'. Washed tieback gap and circulate back to surface. TOH from 26;571' to surface. Run in hole with plugged packer assembly from surface to 2;000' IES.

10/12/2017: Run in hole with plugged packer assembly from 2;000' to 30;940' IES. Set plugged packer at 30;940' IES (top of packer at 30;940' MD/ 28;507' TVD). Pull out of hole with plugged packer running tool; logging up from 30;940' to 28;800' IES; and then log up from 26;800' to 26;000' IES. Pull out of hole to surface and laid out wireline tools. Pressure tested the 10-3/4" x 10.175" x 9-7/8" casing against UBSRs from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod to 300 psi/ 8;200 psi with 13.9 ppg SBM - successful tests. Pressure tested the UBSRs/LBSRs/Failsafes to 300 psi/ 8;200 psi with 13.9 ppg SBM - successful tests.

10/13/2017: Completed pressure testing BSRs and failsafe valves to 300 psi/ 8;200 psi with 13.9 ppg SBM - successful tests. Function tested UBSR/LBSR from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Trip in hole with Halliburton Cleanwell Displacement Assemblies from surface to 30;789' DPM. Scrape packer setting depths; and wash down from 30;789' to tag the plugged packer at 30;949' DPM (30;940' IES). Circulate and conditioned prior to performing Inflow Test. 

10/14/2017: Circulate and conditioned mud prior to inflow test at 30;949' DPM. Pump 195 bbls of base oil down drill string to surface pressure of 2;765 psi to inflow test the Plugged Packer at 30;949' DPM. Bled down pressure in 3 bbl increments to 200 psi and hold for 15 minutes; observed pressure flat line. Bled pressure to 0 psi and chart for 30 minutes - well static; successful test. U-tube and reversed base oil out of the drill string. Performed pit management prior to displacing from 13.9 ppg SBM to 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Displace well from 13.9 ppg SBM to 13.9 CaBr2. Performed pit and line cleaning to RP41 specs in preparation for completion operations.
"},{"   ":348,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-10-15","TEXT_REMARK":"10/15/2017: Perform surface pit and surface line cleaning in preparation for completion operations. 13.9 ppg CaBr2 in hole.

10/16/2017: Perform surface pit and surface line cleaning in preparation for completion operations. Trip out of hole (TOH) with displacement assembly from 30;924' MD to 27;205' MD in 13.9 ppg CaBr2 to evaluate riser brush. Trip in hole (TIH) from 27;205' MD to 30;950' MD and tag permanent packer with 10k down. Reverse circulate 1;690 bbls of CaBr2. TOH from 30;924' MD to 30;700' MD. Function test BOP from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Yellow Pod. TIH from 30;700' MD to 30;944' MD. Circulate 13.9 ppg CaBr2 to spec while rotating and reciprocating drill string.

10/17/2017: Circulate 13.9 ppg CaBr2 to spec. TOH from 30;949' MD to surface. Function test diverter from Driller's Control Panel.

10/18/2017: TIH with 9-7/8" packer from surface to 16;880' MD and set packer at 16;880' MD/ 16;797' TVD. Pressure test below and above packer to 1000 psi for 15 mins using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. All tests performed using IPT SureTec software. TOH from 16;871' MD to 7;531' MD. Make up wellhead/riser cleaning tools and jet sub and TIH from 7;531' MD to 8;000' MD. Make up wear bushing retrieval tool and TIH from 8;000' MD to 14;964' MD. Remove wear bushing from wellhead. TOH from 14;964' MD to 9;600' MD. 

Note: BSEE Inspectors Joshua Naquin; Troy Boudreaux; and Paul Reeves performed inspection. No INCs issued.

Note: On 10/18/2017 at 14:04 hrs; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) provided Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) with 72 hour notification that Chevron plans to unlatch the BOP from this well on Saturday; October 21st.

10/19/2017: TOH from 9;600' MD to 7;531' MD. Make up Lead Impression Tool (LIT). TIH from 7;531' MD to 14;672' MD. Function LIT to take measurements of wellhead. TOH with LIT from 14;672' MD to 7;643' MD. Make up Lock Down Sleeve (LDS). TIH from 7;643' MD to 14;670' MD. Land LDS on casing hanger and set LDS in wellhead. Pressure test LDS down drill pipe to 9;550 psi for 10 minutes with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. All tests performed using IPT SureTec software. TOH from 14;512' MD to 11;409' MD.

10/20/2017: TOH from 11;409' MD to 7;536' MD. Displace wellbore above 7;536' MD and riser from 13.9 ppg CaBr2 to 8.6 ppg SW. Perform 30 min flowcheck - well static. TOH from 7;536' MD to surface. Unlatch BOP at 18:40 hrs. Pick up BOP 59 ft above HPWH. Move rig 606 ft to safe handling zone at 152-degree vessel heading. Make up subsea crane to Subsea Production Tree (XT) and run XT to 1;000' water depth (WD) using subsea crane. Change rig heading to 027-degrees. Run XT from 1;000' WD to 500' above mud line.

10/21/2017: Run XT from 500' above mud line to 100' above mud line. Position XT over HPWH. Dock ROV to XT and position XT to 304.2-degree heading. Land XT on HPWH and remove running tool from XT. Lock XT connector and pressure test XT gasket to 14;700 psi for 30 mins with ROV utilizing Transaqua HT fluid - good test. Perform secondary connector lockdown procedure with ROV. Retrieve XT running tool to surface using subsea crane. Move rig from safe handling zone to place BOP over HPWH. Latch BOP with a 250-degree vessel heading. Perform 100 k-lbs overpull test; then perform 625 k-lbs slump test and confirm BOP bulls-eye readings. Perform subsea accumulator bottles drawdown test by closing Upper Blind Shear Ram (UBSR) and Lower Blind Shear Ram (LBSR) via the acoustics system with ROV monitoring subsea accumulator bottle pressures. Subsea accumulator bottle pressure reduced from 7;200 psi to 6;100 psi for UBSR close; and from 6;100 psi to 5;250 psi for LBSR close - good tests. Pressure test BOP connector to 1;000 psi with 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. TIH with packer retrieval tool/ tree test tool/ Blind Shear Ram test tool from surface to 7;818' MD. Close Upper Annular and pressure test against tree test tool to 2;000 psi with 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. Connect Intelligent Work Over Completions System (IWOCS) to XT. Pressure test choke and kill manifold to 300 psi low/ 9;400 psi high using 8.6 ppg seawater - good tests. Test performed using IPT SureTec software.
"},{"   ":349,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-10-22","TEXT_REMARK":"10/22/2017: Release from packer retrieval tool/ tree test tool/ Blind Shear Ram (BSR) test tool at 7;114' MD. Trip out of hole (TOH) from 7;114' MD to 6;842' MD. Attempt to test BOP connector to 300 psi low/ 11;550 psi high with 8.6 ppg seawater - unsuccessful test. Visually confirm leak at BOP connector with ROV. Trip in hle (TIH) from 6;842' MD to 7;114' MD and connect to BSR test tool. TOH from 7;818' MD to surface. 

10/23/2017: Unlatch BOP from Subsea Production Tree (XT). Inspect XT gasket with ROV - gasket damage observed. Inspect XT mandrel and BOP connector - no damage observed. Replace XT gasket. Latch BOP to XT. Pressure test BOP connector to 1;000 psi with 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. TIH from surface to 7;822' MD with packer retrieval tool/ tree test tool/ BSR test tool. Close Lower Annular and pressure test against tree test tool to 2;000 psi with 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. Release from BSR test tool and TOH from 7;117' MD to 6;819'. Attempt to test BOP connector to 300 psi low/ 11;550 psi high with 8.6 ppg seawater - unsuccessful test. Troubleshoot to locate leak. Pump 20 bbls of 8.6 ppg seawater mixed with 5 gallons dye down kill line. Displace dye with 139 bbls of seawater. Attempt to pressure test BOP connector to 11;550 psi - unsuccessful test. Visually observe leak at BOP connector with ROV. TIH from 6;819' MD to 7;117' MD and connect to BSR test tool. TOH from 7;822' MD to surface. Unlatch BOP from XT.

10/24/2017: Replace XT gasket. Latch BOP to XT. Pressure test BOP connector to 1;000 psi with 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. TIH with packer retrieval tool/ tree test tool  BSR test tool from surface to 7;822' MD. Close Lower Annular and pressure test against tree test tool to 2;000 psi with 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. Release from BSR test tool and TOH from 7;117' MD to 6;819'. Close Lower Blind Shear Rams (LBSR) from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and pressure test BOP connector to 300 psi low/ 11;550 psi high with 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. Pressure test Upper Blind Shear Rams (UBSR) from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; to 300 psi low/ 11;550 psi high with 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. Function test LBSR & UBSR from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. TIH from 6;819' MD to 7;117' MD and connect to BSR test tool. TOH from 7;822' MD to 7;525' MD. Pressure test BOPs from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod to 300 psi low/ 9;500 psi high with 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. Pressure test Upper and Lower Annular from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod to 300 psi low/ 6;500 psi high with 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. Function test BOP from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. In conjunction with BOP function test; conduct Surface Accumulator Drawdown test - good test. Function diverter from Toolpusher's Control Panel. TIH from 7;525' MD to 7;818' MD. Release from BSR test tool and TOH from 7;117' MD to 6;817' MD. Pressure test Upper Inner Kill valve to 300 psi low/ 9;500 psi high with 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. TIH from 6;817' MD to 7;117' MD and connect to BSR test tool. TOH from 7;818' MD to 2;431' MD.

10/25/2017: TIH with packer retrieval tool from 2;431' MD to 7;653' MD. Displace choke line; kill line; boost line; and riser from 8.6 ppg seawater to 13.9 ppg CaBr2. TIH from 7;653' MD to 16;871' MD. Connect to packer with retrieval tool and unseat packer. Perform flow check - well static. Perform Choke Drill with Crews C & D. TOH from 16;871' MD to 16;830' MD.

10/26/2017: TOH from 16;830' MD to 11;546' MD in 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Close lower annular and perform annular stripping test. TOH from 11;546' MD to surface. TIH with 8.43" gauge ring and junk basket on wireline from surface to 17;050' MD. TOH from 17;050' MD to surface on wireline. TIH with sump packer from surface to 8;000' MD on wireline.

10/27/2017: TIH with sump packer from 8;000' MD to 11;450' MD on wireline in 13.9 ppg CaBr2. TOH with sump packer from 11;450' MD to surface to replace cable head. TIH with sump packer from surface to 30;760' MD. Attempt to set sump packer with no success. TOH from 30;760' MD to surface. TIH with back up sump packer and backup setting tool from surface to 26;300' MD on wireline.

10/28/2017: TIH from 26;300' MD to 30;760' MD on wireline. Set sump packer at 30;760' MD. TOH from 30;760' MD to surface. Pressure test casing to 7;600 psi from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. TIH from surface to 7;611' MD with Tubing Conveyed Perforating assembly.
"},{"   ":350,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-10-29","TEXT_REMARK":"10/29/2017: Trip in hole (TIH) with Tubing Conveyed Perforating (TCP) BHA from 7;611' to 30;730'. Tag sump packer with 20;000 lbs down at 30;762' (30;760' IES). Set TCP guns on depth and perforate well. Set the TCP packer with bottom shot depth at 30;745' IES. Trap 500 psi in the annulus and execute electronic fire sequence to perforate well.

Zone 6: 29;405' - 29;512' MD / 27;004' - 27;103' TVD
Zone 5: 29;623' - 29;730' MD / 27;204' - 27;303' TVD
Zone 4: 29;841' - 29;948' MD / 27;405' - 27;504' TVD
Zone 3: 30;202' - 30;309' MD / 27;737' - 27;836' TVD
Zone 2: 30;420' - 30;527' MD / 27;937' - 28;036' TVD
Zone 1: 30;638' - 30;745' MD / 28;138' - 28;237' TVD

Break circulation across side entry sub (SES) at 4 barrels per minute (bpm) down drill pipe; initial loss rate 120 barrels per hour (bph); decreasing to 7 BPH. Pick up string and open bypass on packer to reverse out 1;000 bbls at 5-7 bpm. Open annular and monitor loss rate of 16 bph. Trip out of hole (TOH) with TCP gun assembly from 30;751' to 30;048'. Total losses 97 bbls for the day. 

10/30/2017: TOH with TCP assembly from 30;048' to 9;620'. Observe losses of 7 bph. Close annular and circulate up Choke and Kill lines at 8 bpm. Loss rate of 10 bph with total losses of 30 bbls for the circulation. Flow check well; 8 bph loss rate. TOH with TCP assembly from 9;620' to 2;010'; observed 7 bph losses. Lay down (L/D) TCP BHA from 2;010' to 445' to main skate. Total losses 105 bbls for the day.

10/31/2017: Lay down TCP BHA from 445' to surface. Pick up (P/U) and TIH with HES Cleanwell Deburr assembly on 5-7/8" DP from surface to 10;577'. Perform BOP function test on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod - successful test. Perform diverter function test on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Control Panel - successful test. TIH with HES Cleanwell Deburr assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 10;577' to 29;361'. Monitor well on active system and establish loss rate of 4 BPH. Wash and ream down from 29;361' to 30;749' with HES Cleanwell Deburr assembly on 5-7/8". Stop rotation; activate Vali Tech and wash down to sump packer while pumping at 9 bpm. Total losses 73 bbls for the day.

11/01/2017: Circulate bottoms up with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 and perform flow check; well losing at 6 bph. TOH with deburr assy from 30;574' to 29;350'; well losing at 2 bph. TIH and tag sump packer; no fill encounterd. TOH from 30;929' to 29;330 and circulate B/U. Total losses 125 bbls for the day.
 
11/02/2017: TOH from 13;580' to surface. Monitor well on trip tank with 2 bph. RIH with ESTMZ zone 1 from surface to 1;771'. Function test UBSR and LBSR from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod; prior to crossing the stack with Halliburton ESTMZ - successful test. Total Losses 42 bbls for the day.

11/03/2017: Run in hole (RIH) with Enhanced Single Trip Multi-Zone (ESTMZ) Zones # 2-6 from 1;771' to 3;112'. Pressure tested all zones to 250 psi for 5 minutes - good test. TIH from surface to 1;459' with fishing string to latch into suspension tool. TOH with HES suspension tool and L/D same. Test sump seals to 250 psi for 5 minutes - good test. P/U VCH packer and M/U to 4" washpipe to Service Tool assembly. M/U VCH packer to gravel pack assemblyy. RIH with gravel pack assembly from 6;768' to 7;483'. Total losses 33 bbls for the day.

11/04/2017: TIH with ESTMZ assemblies on 5-7/8" drillpipe from 7;483' to 30;670' above top of perforations at 29;405'. Sting into sump packer at 30;765' with 20;000 lbs down on. P/U and snap seal collet out with 50;000 lbs overpull. Snap into sump packer with 20;000 lbs down. Set VCH packer with 2;500 ps at 29;301' MD/ 26;908' TVD depth. Confirmed VCH Packer set with push/pull test 70;000 lbs over pull and 25;000 lbs weight down. Release Heavy Hange Weight Tool (HHWT) from VCH packer with 5;000 psi. Pressure test packer to 1;500 psi with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 for 5 min with no more than 3 psi/min drop as per IPT - good test. Set isolation packers down drill pipe with 4;500 psi with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Total Losses 41 bbls for the day.
"},{"   ":351,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-11-05","TEXT_REMARK":"11/05/2017: Continue to set isolation packers pressuring up via cement unit with 4;500 psi in 500 psi increments. Rig up frac head and surface lines and test same to 5;000 psi low/ 10;000 psi high using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Pump 25 bbls of 6.9 ppg solvent pickle down drill pipe. Displace pickle with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 down drill pipe; then reverse circulate pickle out of drill pipe. Open Zone #1 Frac Circulation Sleeve (FCS) and Mechanical Closing Sleeve (MCS). Flush and fill surface lines from frac boat with 8.6 ppg seawater. Pressure test surface lines from frac boat to 14;500 psi using 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. Displace surface lines from 8.6 ppg seawater to 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel. Pump 178 bbls of acid; 100 bbls of 10 ppg linear flush; and 75 bbls of mini-frac fluid down drill pipe. Displace same with 331 bbls of 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel. Bullhead acid into perforations and perform mini frac by pumping 100 bbls of 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel down drill pipe to bullhead mini frac fluid into formation.

11/06/2017: Perform Zone #1 frac job by pumping proppant and linear gel slurry from frac boat. Strip pipe up through lower annular to reverse out remaining slurry. Reverse circulate fluid out of drill pipe; pumping 13.9 ppg CaBr2 down kill line until 13.9 ppg CaBr2 observed at surface. Open lower annular and lay down frac head. Trip out of Hole (TOH) with frac service tool from 30;805' MD to 30;740' MD. Close lower annular and pressure test down drill pipe to 500 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Rig up frac head and surface lines and test same to 10;000 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Open Zone #2 FCS and MCS. Flush and fill surface lines from frac boat with 8.6 ppg seawater. Attempt to pressure test same. Troubleshoot hydraulic valve control line for frac head. Pressure test surface lines from frac boat to 13;500 psi using 8.6 ppg seawater - good test. Displace surface lines from 8.6 ppg seawater to 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel. Pump 178 bbls of acid; 100 bbls of 10 ppg linear flush; and 75 bbls of mini-frac fluid down drill pipe. Displace same with 318 bbls of 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel. Bullhead acid into perforations and perform mini frac by pumping 100 bbls of 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel down drill pipe to bullhead mini frac fluid into formation.

11/07/2017: Perform Zone #2 frac job by pumping proppant and linear gel slurry from frac boat. Strip pipe up through lower annular to reverse out remaining slurry. Reverse circulate fluid out of drill pipe; pumping 13.9 ppg CaBr2 down kill line. Observe 400 klbs overpull while attempting to position service tool for reverse circulation. Close upper pipe ram and open lower annular. Continue reverse circulating fluid out of drill pipe. Close lower annular and open upper pipe ram. Establish pipe movement and close upper pipe movement and open lower annular. Continue reverse circulating fluid out of drill pipe. Attempt to work pipe free with no success. Continue reverse circulating fluid out of drill pipe; pumping two drill pipe volumes down kill line. Open lower annular and observe losses of 38 bph. Attempt to work pipe free with no success. Pump 180 bbls of 14.0 ppg lost circulation pill and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Observe losses slow to 15 bph. Attempt to work pipe free with no success. Function test BOP from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Function diverter from Toolpusher's Control Panel.

11/08/2017: Monitor fluid losses while waiting on wireline equipment with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 in hole - observe losses of 30-40 bph. Pump 160 bbls of 14.0 ppg lost circulation pill and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Observe losses of 16-40 bph. Pump another 160 bbls of 14.0 ppg lost circulation pill and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Continue to observe 16-40 bph losses. Pump 150 bbls of 14.0 ppg lost circulation pill and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. 

11/09/2017: Monitor fluid losses while waiting on wireline equipment with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 in hole - observe losses of 16-44 bph. Pump 24 bbls of CaBr2/ lost circulation polymer mixture down drill string and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Observe losses reduce from 60 bph to 25-30 bph while rigging up wireline equipment.

11/10/2017: Pump 150 bbls of 14.0 ppg lost circulation pill and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Observe losses slow from 30 bph to 15 bph. Run in hole (RIH) with 2.7" gauge ring on wireline from surface to 28;927' MD. Pull out of hole (POOH) from 28;927' MD to surface. Pump 158 bbls of 14.0 ppg lost circulation pill and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2.

11/11/2017: RIH with 1.75" plasma cutter from surface to 30;330' MD on wireline. Activate plasma cutter and hold 1;300 klbs hookload. Observe weight decrease to 860 klbs; giving a good indication that the cut was successful. POOH with plasma cutter from 30;300' MD to surface on wireline. TOH with frac service tool from 30;352' to 29;274' MD. Perform BOP acoustic function test on Middle Pipe Ram from SCU-1.

"},{"   ":352,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-11-12","TEXT_REMARK":"11/12/2017: Pump 25 bbls of CaBr2/ Lost Circulation Polymer mixture down drill string and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Trip out of Hole (TOH) from 29;274' MD to 29;049' MD with cut 4" washpipe. Pressure test BOP from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; to 300 psi low/ 7;600 psi high with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Pressure test Upper and Lower Annular from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; to 300 psi low/ 4;600 psi high with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. All pressure tests performed using IPT SureTec software. Function test BOP from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Function diverter from Driller's Control Panel. Pump 50 bbls of CaBr2/ Lost Circulation Polymer mixture down drill string and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. TOH with 4" cut washpipe from 29;049' MD to 22;120' MD.

11/13/2017: TOH from 22;120' MD to surface in 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Estimate top of fish at 30;335' MD; leaving 266' of service tool in the hole. Trip in hole (TIH) from surface to 6;545' MD with cleanout assembly. 

11/14/2017: TIH from 6;554' MD to 30;212' MD. Wash down from 30;212' MD to 30;332' MD. TOH from 30;332' MD to 30;320' MD and reverse circulate 1;050 bbls of 13.9 ppg CaBr2 through drill string. Pump 24 bbls of CaBr2/ Lost Circulation Polymer mixture down drill string and displace same with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. TOH from 30;320' MD to 16;594' MD.

11/15/2017: TOH from 16;594' MD to surface in 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Trip in hole (TIH) with retrievable bridge plug from surface to 4;600' MD on wireline. TOH from 4;600' MD to surface on wireline to troubleshoot plug running tool. TIH with retrievable bridge plug from surface to 30;335' MD on wireline. Set plug at 30;319' MD. Observe losses stop initially; increase to 12 bph and then slow to 8-9 bph. TOH with plug running tool from 30;319' MD to surface on wireline.

Note: BSEE Inspectors Joshua Naquin; Gabe Orellana; and Paul Reeves performed inspection. No INCs issued.

11/16/2017: TIH with backup retrievable bridge plug from surface to 30;320' MD on wireline. Set plug at 30;303' MD. Observe losses stop. TOH with plug running tool from 30;303' MD to surface on wireline. Pressure test retrievable bridge plug against upper blind shear rams (UBSR) to 5;000 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Pressure test performed using IPT SureTec software. Function test lower blind shear rams (LBSR) and upper blind shear rams (UBSR) from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod.

11/17/2017: TIH with frac service tool from surface to 14;062' MD in 13.9 ppg CaBr2.

11/18/2017: TIH from 14;062' MD to 29;348 MD'. Open and close Zone #6 Mechanical Closing Sleeve (MCS). Pressure test same to 1;500 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. TIH from 29;348' MD to 29;627' MD. Open and close Zone #5 MCS. Pressure test same to 1;500 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. TIH from 29;627' MD to 29;846' MD. Open and close Zone #4 MCS. Pressure test same to 1;500 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. TIH from 29;846' MD to 30;203' MD. Open and close Zone #3 MCS. Pressure test same to 1;500 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Close lower annular and perform pressure test down backside to 500 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Perform stripping test on lower annular. Open lower annular and make up frac head. Rig up frac head and surface lines and test same to 10;000 psi using 13.9 ppg CaBr2 - good test. Pump 25 bbls of 6.9 ppg solvent pickle down drill pipe. Displace pickle with 13.9 ppg CaBr2 down drill pipe; then reverse circulate pickle out of drill pipe.
"},{"   ":353,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-11-19","TEXT_REMARK":"11/19/2017: Wait on weather. Bring frac boat alongside and connect hose. Position service tool to weight down squeeze position. Apply 2;000 psi on backside with rig pumps and inject into formation @ 2 bpm with cement unit. Suspend operations due to all thrusters on the Blue Dolphin being online @ 90% load (high seas & winds). Bleed off pressure on backside and open annular. Disconnect FRAC boat hose. Perform rig maintenance while waiting on weather. Called Blue Dolphin in to hook up hoses at 23:30 hrs.

Function tested BOP from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod. Function tested Diverter on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's Control Panel.

11/20/2017: Closed Annular and reverse circulated at 2 bpm to fill surface lines while M/V Blue Dolphin connected hoses to rig for frac job. M/V Blue Dolphin flushed frac hoses and surface lines with seawater. Pressure tested lines from the frac boat to the supreme frac head and flushed with 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel. Perform acid treatment; bullheading into formation with 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel. Performed Zone #3 frac. Stripped up to reverse out positon and reversed out until 13.9 ppg CaBr2 at surface. Stripped up to close MCS. Reversed out 2x work string volumes. MCS to 500 psi. TOH with ESTMZ service tool to 11;785'. 

11/21/2017: TOH with ESTMZ service tool from 11;785' to surface. P/U and TIH with ESTMZ from surface to 29;301'. Sting into VCH packer. Open/close MJPS; open/close MCS and FCS for Zones 6; 5 and 4. Pressure test 6 & 5 each to 1500 psi on DP and 500 psi on annulus to confirm closed. M/U to TDX and prepare to disconnect. WOW.

Note: On 11/21/2017 at 11:10 hrs; Bobby Nelson (BSEE) notified Bobby Naumann (Chevron) that "Chevron may delay Casing/BSR pressure testing until November 27th or as soon as possible; whichever comes first."

11/22/2017: WOW. P/U and close MCS; FCS; MJPS. Test to confirm sleeves closed. Spaceout and P/U frac head. S/O 100k and mark pipe; close lower annular; strip to reverse position. Flush/test frac lines and spot pickle. Reverse pickle out of DP. S/O to weight down circulate position on ESTMZ tools. P/U to reverse out and reverse another 1.5x DP volume (1;000 bbls). Continue to wait on weather.

11/23/2017: WOW. MU frac hose; flush and test lines. Perform acid treatment; bullheading into formation with 9.5 ppg NaCl linear gel. Performed Zone #4 frac. Overpull observed when stripping up to reverse position; continue to strip up to contingency reverse out positon. Attempted to reverse out; maintaining calculated pressure; due to losses unable to maintain DP pressure. Increase pump rate to 15 bpm with 5800 psi casing pressure. Returns at 5 bpm. At end of reporting time; reversed out 248 bbls and lost 623 bbls to formation.

11/24/2017: Continue attempts to reverse circulate with 13.9 ppg CaBr; clear out surface plugging with cement pump. Achieved partial returns and continue to reverse out 2 drill string volumes. Shut down and monitor pressures; observed ballooning. Continue to reverse out an adiditional drill string volume. Observed gas at 2;618 units and 1.5 bbls of crude oil. Captured oil and interface in separate containment. Total 3;948 bbl losses downhole during rerverse circulations. Shut down and monitor pressures; observed pressures decline from 560 psi Cp to 0 psi. Open well and flow check; observe 3.6 bph losses. Move service tool to weight down position and pressure test MCS to 1500 psi. Losses increased to 10 bph. Rigged down frac head and treatment lines. Monitor well while transferring TEK plug to cement unit. Loss rate at 9 bph average.

11/25/2017: Displaced and spotted 42 bbls of TEK plug at 30;015'. Flow check and TOH with ESTMZ service tool from 30;015' to surface. Cut and slipped drill line. P/U and TIH with 3-1/2" washpipe from surface to 1;063'. Note: Offline pressure test choke manifold to 250 psi/ 7600 psi.
"},{"   ":354,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-11-26","TEXT_REMARK":"11/26/2017: TIH with HES CleanWell VacTech assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 1;340' to 24;513'. P/U double dutch and SES. Perform BOP pressure test on 5-7/8" drill pipe to 300 psi/ 7;600 psi rams; and annular to 300 psi/ 4;600 psi; from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Perform BOP function test from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Perform Diverter function test from Driller's Panel. TIH with HES CleanWell VacTech assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 24;513' to 28;950'. Wash down to 29;700'. Close annular and staged up pressure to 4500 psi in attempt to bullhead TekPlug - no success. TIH and tag at 30;312'.

11/27/2017: Flushed grease out of choke manifold. Rigged up Side Entry Sub and surface lines. Reverse circulate 1400 bbls at 12 bpm/ 3900 psi to clean up Tek-Plug from wellbore. Attempt to pressure test Baker RBP to 5;000 psi; pressure broke over at 5;000 psi. Monitor 47 bph losses on T/T while mixing Tek-Plug. Re-tag top of packer at 30;316' with 10k down. Drop VacTech activation ball and circulate 100 bbls back to surface after tool activated. S/O 40k on packer. Drop Churchill SDD activation dart; and spot 38 bbl Tek-Plug. Monitor; losses decreased from 50 bph to 15 bph. TOH with Cleanout assembly from 30;248' to 16;093'.

Note: On 11/27/2017 at 18:21 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) provided Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) approval to delay Casing/BSR pressure testing until 12/04/2017.

11/28/2017: TOH from 16;093' to surface; recovering 31 lbs of debris from CleanWell assembly. R/U wireline and P/U 3.75" lead impression block. RIH with LIB from surface to 29;304' (top of VCH). Attempt to work through VCH with no success. POOH with 3.75" LIB. Make up Baker 4.25" bridge plug assembly and function test; test good.

Note: Ed Lacy; Robert Mosely and Dixon Whitley with the USCG arrived at 09:31 hrs on 11/28/2017 to perform annual COI of the DCQ.

11/29/2017: RIH with 4.25" PBP #1 and set on top of previous plug from 30;302.8' to 30;311'. Pull out of hole with wireline. Tested PBP #1 against UBSRs to 2;000 psi. Function LBSRs with ROV and function tested UBSRs and LBSRs from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panl; Blue Pod. RIH with 3.375" PBP #2 and set on top of previous plug from 30;295' to 30;302.8'.

11/30/2017: TOH with wireline setting tool to surface. Test upper permanent bridge plug to 5;000 psi with LBSR. R/D wireline equipment. RIH with ESTMZ BHA to 6;500'. Perform acoustic BSR function. Continue RIH with ESTMZ service tool on 5-7/8" DP to 26;615'; cycling zone 6 and 5 MCS open/closed on the way. Pressure test against zone 5 MCS to 1;500 psi; good test. Spaced out; picked up supreme frac head and rig up frac iron. Mark 100k wt down position and reverse positions on zone 5. Pressure test surface lines and frac head to 10;000 psi; good test. Prepare to reverse out drillstring volume. 

11/01/2017: Reverse out 13.9 ppg CaBr. Diverted 199 bbls of dirty fluid to slop tank in moonpool and 105 bbls to sandtrap. Continue reversing fluid while filtering fluid on surface. Spot pickle in drill pipe and reverse out same. Open MCS sleeve and inject 7 bbls into formation with cement unit. Flush/Fill frac iron and test same. Spot acid down DP.

11/02/2017: Continue to reverse out proppant due to leak on frac boat. Reposition tool and perform seal test on MCS zone #5. Perform frac on zone #5. P/U to contingency reverse and reverse out proppant + 2 additional drillstring volumes. Rigged down frac head. Performed 500 psi test on sleeves; good test. Position service tool in weight down on zone #6 and test service tool seals against MCS. Test failed. TOH with ESTMZ service tool to 9;530'.
"},{"   ":355,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-12-03","TEXT_REMARK":"12/03/2017: TOH with ESTMZ service tool and observed missing top seals. Function test BOP on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function test diverter from Toolpusher's Control Panel. TIH with new service tool to zone 6. R/U frac head and surface iron; test same. Reverse out 1 DP volume. Locate tool positions and mark same. Pickle pipe.

12/04/2017: Test lines from frac boat. P/U to reverse position; spot acid down pipe; follow with frac job in weight down position. Reverse out proppant. Lay out frac head and test to verify sleeves closed. TOH from 29;251' to 17;817'.

Note: On 12/04/2017 at 15:44 hrs; Mr. Justin Ledet (BSEE) provided Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) approval to delay Casing/BSR pressure testing until 12/09/2017.

12/05/2017: TOH with service tool from 17;817' to 7;235'. Repair iron roughneck. Continue to TOH from 7;235' to surface. Slip and cut drill line. P/U cleanout assembly and TIH from surface to 5;325'.

12/06/2017: TIH with the ESTMZ cleanout assembly from 5;325' to 29;305' (tagged VCH packer at 29;305' DPM and worked through by P/U and S/O 2x). TIH with the ESTMZ cleanout assembly from 29;305' to 30;299' DPM (tagged the top of the permanent Baker packer  with 10 klbs. Dropped 1.75" Vac-Tech activation ball and activated Vac-Tech. Circulated at 10 bpm (5;350 psi) through the Vac-Tech to remove any debris from below the VCH packer (pumped 100 bbls total). P/U 45 ft off bottom and monitor the well for 30 minutes. Re-tag the permanent Baker packer. TOH with the ESTMZ cleanout assembly from 29;305' to 1;384'. L/D ESTMZ cleanout assembly from 1;384' to 1;136'. Recovered 4.5 lbs of wet metal shavings from Mag Tech and 2 lbs of debris from Vac-Tech.

12/07/2017: TOH from 1;136' to surface with cleanout assembly washpipe. Clean/clear rig floor. R/U handling equipment for isolation assembly. P/U and TIH with the isolation assembly (Zones 3 - 6) from surface to 1;142'. TIH with isolation assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 1;142' to 21;945'.

12/08/2017: TIH with Halliburton isolation assembly from 21;945' to 29;228'. Continued TIH; opening MJPS and FCS production sleeves across zones 6 through 3. Monitored losses on a 2 pit system while boosting to keep up with CaBr2 loss rate. Made up TDX; slacked off and stung isolation assembly seals into VCH seal bore with a mule shoe depth of 30;292'; losses stopped. Lost a total of 173 bbls. Confirmed latch with 30 klbs overpull; slacked back off to neutral weight. Closed annular and pressure tested the FS-2 and seals in VCH packer seal bore to 1;000 psi for 5 minutes on IPT; good test. Dropped 1-7/8" diverter ball and pumped down workstring. Staged pressure up to 2;500 psi; P/U and released from the isolation assembly. Tagged the PBR with 10 klbs; closed the MVBRs to mark the painted stand across the stack. TOH with the isolation assembly running tool from 27;754' to 1;400'. Tested casing to 5;000 psi; good test. Repair racker and iron roughneck. TOH from 1;400' to 956'.

12/09/2017: TOH with Halliburton isolation assembly from 956' to surface. Rigged up Weatherford handling equipment for TNT packer assembly. TIH with TNT packer assembly to 26;360'.
"},{"   ":356,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-12-10","TEXT_REMARK":"12/10/2017: TIH with Halliburton TNT packer assembly on 5-7/8" TFM DP to 29;054'. S/O from 29;099' and stung into the isolation assembly PBR at 29;170' DPM; continued to 29;182' bit depth (DPM) to land out in isolation assembly. Lined up HAL cementer. Pressured up on annulus to 1;000 psi and tested short seal assembly. Lined up HAL cementer and began setting TNT permanent packer as per Halliburton: TNT permanent packer at 28;976' DPM (top of TNT PBR = 28;868' DPM). Pressure tested TNT permanent packer/casing to 5;000 psi for 30 mins with 13.9 ppg CaBr2. Test performed from the Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Function tested BOP on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function tested diverter from Driller's Control Panel. Closed MVBRs on painted white stand 2 times. TOH with Hydraulic Setting Tool assembly from 29;170' to surface.

12/11/2017: Performed rig maintenance. Trip in hole with jetting/BPRRT assembly from surface to 7;522'. M/U test stand and tested BOP on 5-7/8" DP to 250-350 psi/ 7;600 psi rams; and 250-350 psi/ 4;600 psi annular; from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod via IPT Suretec. Hung well dynamic control line sheave in derrick. Jet SSPT bore protector from 7;423' to 7;433' DPM. Continue to TOH. 

12/12/2017: TIH with BPRRT and jetting assembly from 7;433' to 7;725'. Landed the BPRRT in the SSPT bore protector at 7;118'. Pulled the SSPT bore protector free with 33 klbs overpull. TOH and positioned jet sub in SSPT. Jetted SSPT. TOH with BPRRT and jetting assembly to surface. Hung Expro umbilical in derrick sheave. Slipped and cut 155' of drill line. R/U Weatherford tubing handling equipment. Spotted ELSA (lower portion of SSTT) in center mousehole. P/U and RIH with HES seal assemblies and 1 joint of 4-1/2" tubing to 141'.

12/13/2017: Terminate injection line on Asphaltene CIM; pressure tested line. Terminate TEC line onto flat-pack and pressure tested line. Terminate injection line on Scale Inhibitor CIM and pressure tested line. Confirm injection through control lines. R/U WTFD control line mgmt system/ handling eqpt. RIH with 4-1/2" 17# Vam Top tubing to 7;445'. Functioned BSRs from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod.

Note: BSEE Regulatory Inspection Visit (09:20 - 12:55 hrs): BSEE Inspectors Joshua Naquin; Troy Boudreaux; and Chris Treland onboard. No INC's issued.

12/14/2017: TIH with 4-1/2" 17# Vam Top tubing from 7;445' to 19;346'. Barrette tubing coupling and indexed for timing pup selection. P/U 180 deg timing pup. P/U SCSSV/CIM. Attempted to terminate control lines on SCSSV. Unable to get proper ferrule set and left lower wedge ferrule inside of both ports A and B on SCSSV. Attempted to recover ferrules from ports with no success. L/D SCSSV/CIM. P/U backup SCSSV/CIM. Attempted to terminate control lines on backup SCSSV with the same results. Recovered lower wedge ferrules from both ports. Troubleshot IDFC connections. Used ferrules from different batch to terminate control lines A and B on backup SCSSV and observed indication of good ferrule set.

12/15/2017: TIH with 4-1/2" Vam tubing to 20;255'. R/U 6" handling equipment. M/U 4-1/2" Vam x 6" VIT crossover. Attempt to M/U 6" 50 ppf; 13CR-115 VAM TOP VIT tubing; troubleshoot damaged connections from WTFD tong slippage. TIH with 6" 50 ppf; 13CR-115 VAM TOP VIT tubing from 20;253' to 21;797'. M/U 6" VIT Pin x 5-1/2" box crossover. R/U tubing hanger handling equipment. M/U timing pup. M/U tubing hanger.

12/16/2017: Terminated and tested control lines on TH. R/D tubing handling eqpt. R/U for SSTT. Transferred SSTT from center mousehole to main well center with crown tugger and main TDX (elevators). M/U SSTT-THRT to tubing hanger. Functioned THRT. Slacked off SSTT below the rotary. Began changing out equipment to handle landing string.
"},{"   ":357,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-12-17","TEXT_REMARK":"12/17/2017: R/D Weatherford 30' 500 ton bails. R/U 11' 750 ton bails and BX-5 elevators. M/U junk basket stand. TIH with SSTT on 7-5/8" MaXit landing string from 22;054' to 28;859'. Stung into PBR at 28;859'. Performed soft landout and confirmed 60 ft of seal engagement into PBR; with seal assembly at 28;919' and tubing hanger at 7;119'. Picked up 6 ft above PBR. Pumped and spotted 1;160 bbls of 13.9 ppg CaBr2 inhibited packer fluid in tubing x casing annulus. Slacked off to 28;875'. Broke out double from soft land stand. P/U CTLF.

12/18/2017: R/U CTLF and Surface Flow Tree. Install torpedo packers. Land out and lock tubing hanger in XT at 7;119'. Pressure tested tubing hanger; SCSSV1 & SCSSV2; gallery seal; production bore; casing x tubing annulus with cement unit to 5;000 psi for 30 mins. Engage and test electrical penetrators. Repeated gallery seal test. R/U slick line lubricator.

12/19/2017: Pressure test surface flow tree and slick line lubricator to 10;500 psi for 5 min. Pressure test landing string; SFT body; and production tubing against FS-2 HI valve to 4;500 psi for 30 min. Negative test SCSSV to 2;200 psi; 62 psi build in 30 mins - good test. Rig up slickline and test lubricator to 10;500 psi. Attempt to retrieve isolation sleeve; sheared pin on running tool. Retrieve to surface and re-pin. Installed centralizer to assist in running tool alignment. Unable to pass centralizer past 43' RKB. Pull centralizer to surface and observe mark on paint with similar dimensions 5.25" ID to a Teflon O-ring that is part of the test cap for the PXF landing joint. Rig down lubricator; surface control lines and Chiksans. Boost riser volume at 18 bpm. Unlatch THRT and pick up to remove Torpedo packers. Remove Teflon O ring from connection. Install Torpedo packers. Land and lock tubing hanger running tool. Pressure test THRT seals to 9;000 psig for 15 mins. R/U surface equipment control lines and slickline lubricator.

12/20/2017: Completed rig up surface pressure control equipment; test with 10;500 psi. Pressure test landing string against SSTT retainer valve to 7;650 psi. RIH with slickline; recover isolation assembly with all seals intact. Displace 13.9 ppg brine in landing string and kill line to 6.6 ppg base oil. RIH with slickline and set LCP in TH profile. Pressure test above Lower Crown Plug (LCP) using 6;6 ppg base oil to 10;400 psi surface pressure for 15 mins. Test below LCP using 6.6 ppg base oil to 8;100 psi surface pressure for 60 mins. Displace Choke; Boost line and riser from brine to seawater.

12/21/2017: Displace Riser from brine to seawater. Attempt to cycle FS-2HI valve 25 additional times for a total of 34 times. No success. Reduce baseline pressure by 500 psi to 2100 psi. Held for 85 minutes and restart cycling sequence for 6 cycles; total of 40 cycles; FS-2HI valve open. Bullhead total of 101 bbls of base oil to achieve 3900 psi surface pressure. Function SCSSV three times and close. Bleed off to 800 psi and Inflow test SCSSV to 3;100 psi for 30 mins - good test. RIH with slickline and set UCP in TH profile. Pressure test Upper Crown Plug (UCP) from above using 6.6 ppg base oil to 10;350 psi for 15 mins. Pressure test between UCP and LCP via IWOCS to 12;800 psi for 30 mins with methanol.

12/22/2017: Displaced base oil from surface lines and flow head with seawater. R/D slickline equipment. Unlatch THRT and displace landing string to seawater. Rig down surface control lines; Chiksans; and Torpedo packers. P/U to 7;069' and close UBSRs. Displace Kill line to SW while rigging down SFT and CTLF. Clear rig floor of equipment. Rig up Weatherford LS handling equipment. POOH with 7-5/8" LS from 7;069' to 129'. R/U and L/D SSTT.

12/23/2017: L/D SSTT on main rotary while continue to L/D 7-5/8" landing string on aux. R/D Expro umbilical. R/U riser handling equipment. R/U diverter running tool.
"},{"   ":358,"WELL_NAME":"PS005","API12":608124011801,"WAR_START_DT":"2017-12-24","TEXT_REMARK":"12/24/2017: Pull and lay out diverter. P/U landing joint and stroke in slip joint. Repair hoses on RRT. Unlatch from well at 06:00 hrs. Install Tertiary cap on wellhead while locking tensioner load ring. Remove storm loops and drape hoses. L/D landing joint. Repair hoses on RRT. L/D slip joint and pups. Replace auto slew proximity switch on riser yoke. Orient riser joints laid out on riser skate incorrectly to facilitate transfer to riser hold.

12/25/2017: Pull BOP on Marine Riser from 6;840' to surface. Secure BOP in transporter and remove IWOCS Guillotine. R/D riser running equipment. Calibrate Main TDX load pins.
"},{"   ":359,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-01-03","TEXT_REMARK":"01/03/2018: P/U and RIH with 6-5/8" drill pipe in doubles. TOH and R/B stands of 6-5/8" drill pipe. Waited on weather. 
 
01/04/2018: R/U Weatherford casing handling equipment. P/U and TIH with 36" conductor housing from surface to 322'. Installed false rotary and TIH with 26" jetting BHA from surface to 322'. Changed out encoder wire on Aux TDX-1250. Decision made to adjust spaceout placing Bit Nozzles 4" inside the 36" shoe. 

01/05/2018: ROV verified bit spaceout and verified bit/motor function. Engaged CADA tool to LPWH. Installed bull-eyes and ball valves in moonpool. RIH with 36" conductor casing and 26" jet in BHA to 6;693'. Moved ship from DOZ to well center. Continued TIH to 7;095'; positioned ship for PS007 spud in. Tagged mudline at 7;132' and began jetting 36". Jetted 36" from 7;132' to 7;444'. Soaked 36" casing for 1.5 hours - no subsidence observed. Recorded RKB to top of LPWH at 7;122' and RKB to 36" shoe at 7;444'. Released from CADA tool and drilled 26" hole section from 7;444' to 7;671'.

01/06/2018: Drilled 26" hole section from 7;444' to 8;249'. Displaced the wellbore to 11.0 ppg PAD mud. TOH to 200 ft above the LPWH. Moved rig to DOZ. TOH to surface with 26" jetting BHA. P/U and TIH with the 26" drill ahead BHA #2 from surface to 6;633'. Move rig from DOZ to PS007 well center. TIH with 26" BHA #2 to 7;112' (10 ft above wellhead). ROV assisted with lining up 26" BHA #2; stabbed bit into 36" LPWH at 7;122'. Slacked off from 7;122' to 7;135' (marked pipe at the rotary for visual indication when TOH).
"},{"   ":360,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-01-07","TEXT_REMARK":"01/07/2017: TIH to 36" shoe at 7;444'. Displaced the drill string to 10.1 ppg WBM. TIH from 7;444' to 8;028'. Tagged tight spot at 8;028' with 30 klbs down. Reamed spot clean and worked through spot 2 times with no drag. Washed down to 8;249' with no fill observed. Drilled 26" hole from 8;249' to TOS at 8;347'. Adjusted drilling parameters and continued drilling 26" hole from 8;347' to 10;390'.

01/08/2018: Drilled 26" hole from 10;390' to section TD of 10;601'. Pumped 90 bbls of 16.0 ppg hi-vis pill followed by 12.5 ppg PAD mud; spotting 40 bbls of 16.0 ppg hi-vis pill in rathole. Displaced well to 12.5 ppg PAD mud. TOH with 26" BHA to 7;122'. Washed LPWH. TOH to 6;922'. Moved rig from PS007 to DOZ. TOH with 26" BHA from 6;922 to surface. P/U and M/U SES. R/U and ran 598 ft of 22" casing.

01/09/2018: P/U and RIH with 22" x 23" casing from 598' to 3;366'. R/U up and RIH with 6-5/8" 27# inner string to 3;266'. P/U and M/U MRLD to inner string and casing. Lowered MRLD to water line and purged air from 22" casing and inner string close snorkel valves. TIH with 22" x 23" casing on landing string from 3;582' to 5;721'.

01/10/2018: TIH with 22" x 23" casing on landing string to 6;595'. Moved rig from DOZ to PS007 well center. TIH to 7;122' and stabbed 22" casing shoe in LPWH. Displaced landing string and inner string from seawater to 12.5 ppg PAD mud. TIH to 10;495'. Made up cement SES and landed out 18-3/4" HPWH in LPWH (top of HPWH at 7;119' and 22" casing shoe at 10;542'). Circulated 1.5x landing string and inner string volumes with 12.5 ppg PAD mud. Pumped 1;268 bbls (7;113 cu ft); 28% excess; of 13.8 ppg lead cement and confirmed cement returns at mud line with ROV pH meter. Pumped 179 bbls (1;005 cuft) of 16.4 ppg tail cement. Displaced cement with 317 bbls of seawater. Bled back 4.75 bbls and confirmed floats were holding. Total cement returns 496 bbls. Set and pre-loaded HPHW to 2;000 klbs with MRLD. Released MRLD. R/B cement stand and TOH 2 stands. Circulated string clean. TOH to 7;127' and washed HPHW. TOH to 6;918'. Moved rig to DOZ. TOH to surface. P/U and RIH with 6-5/8" drill pipe in doubles. TOH and R/B stands of 6-5/8" drill pipe.  

01/11/2018: L/D 26" BHA #1 and #2. L/D cement SES. Lowered gooseneck hoses and performed maintenance on gooseneck swivels. L/D CADA stand. P/U 6-5/8" 34 ppf drill pipe. Continued with BOP work scope. 

01/12/2018: P/U 6-5/8" 34 ppf and 27 ppf DP. Continue with BOP work scope.
