Note: Bobby Naumann (Chevron) provided Bobby Nelson (BSEE) with 72 hr notification of initial BOP latch up to WR 678 #PS007. 

01/13/2018: P/U and racked back 6-5/8" 50 ppf; 27 ppf and UD-165 DP. Continue with BOP work scope. R/U and function test riser running equipment.

Note: Mr Howard Smith (Chevron) informed Mr Bobby Nelson (BSEE) that the ADCP current meter was recovered for maintenance and repairs. 
"},{"   ":361,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-01-14","TEXT_REMARK":"01/14/2017: Continue with BOP work scope. P/U and racked back 6-5/8" UD-165 DP. M/U and racked back NuTec BSR test tool x Dril-Quip BOPTT assembly. Begin P/U and R/B 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA. R/U and function test riser running equipment.

Note: On 1/14/2018; Mr. John Rankin (Chevron) received approval via email from Mr. Fred Brink (BSEE) to run the BOP stack and test the acoustic pod on the initial latch up. If the test fails for any reason; Chevron must either pull the stack to fix the issue or take the acoustic pod out of service for the remainder of the well.

01/15/2018: Continue with BOP work scope. P/U and R/B 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA. Continued offloading boat. Make repairs to the power mousehole and calibrate same. R/U WTFD casing equipment and function test same.

01/16/2018: Continue with BOP work scope. Install aux rotary sock. Change out Hydra-racker heads. Pick up and rack back 16" casing (6 total stands R/B).

Note: On 01/16/2018 at 13:59 hours; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) notified Mr. Robert Nelson (BSEE) via email that preparation of the BOP is still in progress and the initial latch up could be on Friday; January 19th; with BOP testing to begin on Saturday; January 20th.

01/17/2018: Continue with BOP work scope. General maintenance and PMs. P/U 16" casing.

01/18/2018: Drift BOP stack; raise riser catwalk bridge; skid BOP to well center; install guillotine; make up riser to BOP. Run BOP on riser.

01/19/2018: Drifted BOP stack; installed guillotine and skid BOP to well center. Make up BOP to double of riser. Splash stack at 15:30 hrs. Continue to run BOP on riser to 1;334'.

01/20/2018: Continue to run BOP on riser from 1;334' to 6;959'.
"},{"   ":362,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-01-21","TEXT_REMARK":"01/21/2017: Move from DOZ to SM PS007 well center while pressure testing Choke/Kill/Boost/RC lines. M/U BLAT pup and TJ. M/U spacer pup. Install drape hoses. Pressure test Choke/Kill/Boost/RC lines. Land and latched BOP welhead connector at 20:30 hours. Perform 100k pull test on BOP connector. Perform BOP slump test. Confirm bulls-eye readings. Perform Deadman UBSR and connector test to 300/ 3;000 psi for 5 min each. Unlock and stroke out TJ.

01/22/2018: Pressure test casing to 3;000 psi with seawater - good test. Install/function diverter. RIH with BOPTT/ 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Land at 7;118'. Perform BOP initial latch-up testing. Perform diverter function test; Pressure test UBSR/LBSR per IPT test summary from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; with 8.6 SW to 300/11;800 psi. Offline attempt to close BSR with ROV - failed.

01/23/2018: Function casing shear rams from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod. TIH and retrieve Nu-Tec test tool. Locate annular with tool joint. Pressure test BOPs; rams to 250-350/ 11;800 psi and Annulars to 250-350/ 6;800 psi on Yellow Pod from Toolpusher's Panel with 8.6 ppg seawater. Function tested BOPs from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod. Performed accumulator drawdown test. Functioned diverter from Driller's Panel. TOH with BOP test assembly to 558'. Performed ROV intervention test on LBSRs. ROV plugged in flying lead to LBSRs stab and functioned closed. Validated closed with pressure test to 250-350 psi/ 3;000 psi for 5 min each. Function UBSRs; LBSRs and CSRs. TIH with Dril-Quip wearbushing and running tool. Make up jars. Shallow test MWD. TIH from 971' to 7;615' (set Dril-Quip wearbushing at 7;118' LS depth). Continue TIH to 10;323'. Wash down from 10;323' and tag TOC at 10;453'. Displaced Choke/ Kill/ Boost lines from 8.6 ppg SW to 11.5 ppg SBM. 

01/24/2018: Displaced Choke line and Boost line to 11.5 ppg SBM. Pumped 100 bbls Hi-vis spacer followed by 11.5 ppg SBM. Started drilling cement once SBM exited bit from 10;543' to 10;516'. Circulate and condition mud to 11.5 ppg in/out. Flush choke manifold and MGS with 11.5 ppg SBM. Take SCRs and CLFs. Performed choke drill. Drilled cement and shoe from 10;516' to 10;542'. Drilled cement from 10;542' to 10;567'. Clean out rathole from 10;567' to 10;586'. Washed and reamed from 10;586' to 10;465' due to stalling and packing off. Clean out rathole from 10;586' to 10;601'; 5 ft fill on bottom. Drill 10 ft new formation from 10;601' to 10;611'. Circulate and condition mud for FIT. Perform FIT with 11.5 ppg SBM at 10;542' TVD. Achieved successful FIT to 13.0 ppg EMW (856 psi surface pressure). Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 10;611' to 10;634' MD.

01/25/2018: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section (reamer closed) from 10;634' to 10;746' MD. Drop 2-1/8" reamer activation ball and pump down the string at 300 gpm (450 psi). Performed ledge test (set down) at 10;736' bit depth with 15k.lbs - good test. Ream down with the 18-1/8" x 21" BHA (reamer open) from 10;736' to 10;746'. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 10;746' to 10;987' MD. Circulate and condition mud; waiting on BSEE approval to drill ahead. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 10;987' to 12;197' MD.

Note: Mr. Naquin; Mr. Orellana and Mr. Vial with BSEE Houma District arrived on rig at 09:15 hrs for routine rig visit. 1 INC issued. Departed rig at 13:30 hrs.

Note: On 01/25/2018 at 08:56 hours; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to resume drilling operations now that the 3rd Party Verification for the BOP has been reviewed.

01/26/2018: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 12;197' to 13;046'. Unable to maintain build rate. Circulate and condition mud at 13;046'. TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 13;046' to surface.

01/27/2018: Completed function testing the BHGE AutoTrak tool. Passed the 18-1/8" x 21" bit stand (#1) to the aux. Slip and cut drill line on the main drawworks and serviced the rig. M/U the 18-1/8" Kymera Bit. P/U and TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA #2 from surface to 971'. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 971' to 13;046'. Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 13;046' to 13;894' MD. Weighting up from 11.5 ppg to 11.8 ppg SBM.
"},{"   ":363,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-01-28","TEXT_REMARK":"01/28/2018: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 13;894' to 16;575' MD (2;681'). Raised mud weight from 11.8 ppg to 12.1 ppg (surface)/ 12.3 (downhole) SBM  at 14;330' and from 12.1 ppg to 12.5 ppg (surface)/ 12.8 (downhole) SBM at 15;547'.

01/29/2018: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 16;575' MD to 19;027' MD (2;452').

01/30/2018: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 19;027' MD (18;273' TVD) to 19;296' MD (18;535' TVD). Function tested BOPs on 6-5/8" DP from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Function tested Diverter from Toolpusher's Panel (35 secs to close) and from Driller's Chair (33 secs to close). Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 19;296' MD to 20;623' MD (19;528 TVD'). Began cutting mud weight to 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.2 ppg (downhole) at 19;296'. Note: Encountered Base of Salt at 19;939' MD (18;990' TVD).

01/31/2018: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 20;623' MD to 22;732' MD with 11.8 ppg (surface/ 12.2 ppg (downhole) SBM.

Note: On 01/31/2018 at 19:14 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) notified Mr. Adam Ersepke (Chevron) that Chevron may proceed with operations utilizing surface flowmeter for accurate gallon counts while the Blue Pod flowmeter is not currently functional.

02/01/2018: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 22;732' to 23;047'. Made repairs to mud pump #5. Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 23;047' to 24;145'.

02/02/2018: Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 24;145' to 25;370'. Drilled an additional 5 ft from 25;170' to 25;375' with reamer closed to perform ledge test. Performed positive ledge test on reamer with 10 klbs down. Dropped 2-5/8" reamer deactivation ball and confirmed reamer locked closed. Hole section TD at 25;375' MD/ 23;396' TVD. Pumped weighted hi-vis sweep and began circulating 3x bottom's up.

02/03/2018: Circulated hole clean. Spotted 60 bbls of 16.5 ppg hi-vis pill in rathole. TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA to 24;074'. 
"},{"   ":364,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-02-04","TEXT_REMARK":"02/04/2018: TOH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 24;074" to 8;315". Pressure tested BOP on 6-5/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod; using IPT Suretec software. Pressure tested rams to 250-350/ 6;000 psi and annulars to 250-350/ 5;600 psi using 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.2 (downhole) SBM. Function tested BOP from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. TOH from 8;315' to 7;424'; washed 16" SA. Pumped 100 bbls of 13.8 ppg slug and TOH to 6;852'. Function tested Diverter from Driller's Control Panel (34 secs to close). TOH to surface. 

02/05/2018: R/U Weatherford casing running equipment and OES CFT. RIH with 16" casing doubles from forward pipe skate using the Weatherford ILT device from surface to 4;745'. While slacking off from 4;707' to 4;745'; the metal bow spring (1-5/8" wide x 22" long) on the centralizer contacted the pipe guide on the Weatherford slips and broke off into two pieces. Recovered 10.25" of the band but did not find the remaining 11.75". RIH with 16" to 5;382'. Damaged the box end of DCQ #81 while attempting to make a connection. Backed out DCQ #81 and replaced it with DCQ #1002.

02/06/2018: RIH with 16" casing doubles from the forward and stands out of the derrick from 5;382' to 17;799'. R/D 16" casing handling equipment and R/U Landing String handling equipment. P/U and M/U Dril-Quip Hanger to casing string (Casing weight = 1;578 klbs). R/D Weatherford casing slips and R/U Weatherford 1;250T LSS DP slips. Continued RIH with 16" casing string on 6-5/8" landing string from 17;805' to 18;867'.

02/07/2018: RIH with 16" casing on landing string. Shift diverter sub closed and converted float. Landed 16" casing on SA at 7;424' (TOL @ 7;421'); placing shoe depth at 25;220' MD. Circulate and condition mud. Pumped 1;541 bbls (8;652 cu ft) of 13.0 ppg Lead and 182 bbls (1;022 cu ft) of 16.4 ppg Tail cement slurry. Displaced with 3;945 bbls of 11.8 ppg mud. Bumped plug 500 psi over FCP of 1;067 psi. Recorded 488 psi for lift pressure. Bled back 19 bbls; floats held. CIP at 23:10 hrs.

02/08/2018: Set and tested 16" seal assembly with 11.8 ppg (surface)/ 12.2 ppg (downhole) SBM. Pressured up above seals to 4;000 psi (good test). Increased pressure to 5;000 psi for 5 mins) good test; verified by IPT Suretec software. Released CHSART from 16" hanger. Rack cement stand; pull 2 stands. Circulated landing string clean. TOH to surface. TIH with 14-1/2" bit stand; tail pipe and MPT stand with wear sleeve. Set wear sleeve and short tripped to MPT stand. B/O and R/B MPT stand. M/U remaining 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA. TIH to 500 ft above the BOP. Slip and cut drill line.

Note: Mr. Joshua Naquin and Chris Treland of BSEE (Houma District) performed a general inspection. No INCs issued.

02/09/2018: Functioned UBSRs/LBSRs from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Yellow Pod. Pressure tested UBSRs/LBSRs x 16" casing to 300/ 4;500 psi with 11.8 ppg mud (5 mins for USBR/LSBR test; 30 mins for casing test) from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Completed planned maintenance and slip/cut drill line. TIH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" Baker BHA from 6;526' to 24;598'. Washed down to 24;898'; tagging upper float collar. Performed choke drill with drill crew. Drilled wiper plug; upper float collar from 24;898' to 24;904'. Drilled shoe track while displacing well from 11.8 ppg surface SBM to 12.5 ppg (surface)/ 12.8 ppg (downhole) SBM. Washed and reamed soft cement from 24;904' to 24;986'. Tagged lower float collar at 24;986'. Drilled through lower float collar to 24;994'. Continued washing and reaming soft cement to 16" guide shoe at 25;206'. Drilled through shoe and washed/reamed to 25;262'.

02/10/2018: Washed down through rathole. Drilled 10' of new formation from 25;375' to 25;385' and pumped cuttings to 1;000 ft above BHA. Began weighting up from 12.5 ppg SBM to 13.1 ppg (surface)/ 13.35 ppg (downhole) SBM. Pulled into 16" casing and pumped up initial static ESD (12.81 ppge). Performed FIT to 13.7 ppg EMW (1508 psi with 12.5 ppg SBM). Pumped up max ESD (14.08 ppge). Acquired SCRs and activated reamer. Downlinked "ribs on" and drilled ahead in new formation from 25;385' to 26;042'; downlinking as needed for directional control. Note: Became temporarily detained at bit depth of 25;920' (reamer depth 25;822'). Worked pipe free pulling with 159 klbs over - wiped area 3x.
"},{"   ":365,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-02-11","TEXT_REMARK":"02/11/2018: Drilled from 26;042' to 26;975' with 13.1 ppg (surface)/ 13.35 ppg (downhole) SBM; downlinking as needed for directional control. Function tested BOPs and all fails safes from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Functioned diverter from Toolpusher's Control Panel.

02/12/2018: Circulated hole clean with 13.1 ppg SBM. Static ESD = 13.34 ppge. Displaced well to 13.2 ppg. Spot 25 bbls 16.4 ppg pill in rathole. Flow checked while R/U OES flowback tool. Static ESD = 13.41 ppge. Recorded baseline pump pressures @ 600 gpm. Pumped out of hole from 26;918' to 21;522' at 600 gpm; 2 min/stand.

NOTE: On 02/12/2018 at 14:55 hrs; Mr. JP Yearwood (Chevron) received permission from Adriano Garcia (BSEE) to proceed with PS007 operations with 13.2 ppg SBM based on conditions as stated; "Chevron may proceed with PS007; but as we discussed on the phone earlier today; please submit a RPD with the updated WCST; PE Certificate; updated WBS and Prognosis to document the mud changes." (RPD was submitted on 02/14/2018 and approved by Mr. Justin Ledet on 02/15/2018.)

02/13/2018: Pump out of hole with 600 gpm @ 2 min/std from 21;522' to 18;270. Pump out of hole with 600 gpm @ 165 ft/min from 18;720' to 13;950'. Pull 10 stands wet from 13;950' to 12;615' with proper displacement. Pump slug and TOH at 70 ft/min from 12;615' to 12;500'. TOH at 80 ft/min from 12;500' to 7;400'. TOH at 300 ft/min from 7;400' to 780'. R/B BHA. R/D DP handling equipment. R/U Weatherford 14" liner running equipment. Run 14" liner to 2;492'. 

02/14/2018: Continue TIH with 14" liner in stands from 2;492' to 3;222'. R/D 14" casing elevators. P/U Versaflex 14" liner hanger. TIH with 14" liner on landing string from 3;235' to 26;892' MD (24;869' TVD); adjusting tripping speeds to minimize losses. M/U cement head and convert diverter sub and yield ball through diverter and DTD sub. Stage pumps up to 8 bpm and circulate landing string volume + 100 bbls with 90% returns. Cement 14" liner. Pumped 122 bbls; 684 cu ft; of 16.4 ppg cement slurry. Displaced with 1;121 bbls of 13.2 ppg SBM.

02/15/2018: Drop 2.75" Versaflex setting ball. Yield ball through Diverter sub & DTD. Set Versaflex liner hanger (TOL = 23;647' MD/ 21;914' TVD). Performed 100k overpull. Released Versaflex RT and pulled out of hanger (70k overpull observed). B/O cement head and pulled 2 stands above TOL. Circulated 1.5x landing string volume. TOH with LS from 23;460' to surface. Slip and cut 155' of drill line. Perform planned rig maintenance. TIH with 12-1/4" BHA to 1;302'. Changed out faulty BX-5 elevators.

Pressure test 14" liner against UBSRs to 2;900 psi for 30 minutes. Pumped 36.7 bbls; bled back 34.25 bbls (good test). Pressure test UBSRs/LBSRs from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Yellow Pod to 300/ 2;900 psi with 13.2 ppg SBM mud for 5/5 min (good test); utilizing IPT SurTec software for pressure conformation. Function tested UBSRs/LBSRs from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod:

02/16/2018: Function test BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. Pressure test BOPs on 5-78" drill pipe from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; using IPT Suretec software. Pressure tested UPR and MPR to 250-350/ 6600 psi for 5 min and Upper/Lower Annulars to 250-350/ 5;100 psi for 5 min using 13.2 ppg SBM - good tests. Function tested diverter from Driller's Well Control button (34 seconds). Functioned diverter form Driller's Panel (33 seconds). R/D double-dutch assy. TIH with 12-1/4" BHA on DP to 26;450'. Perform Choke Drill & Abandon Ship Drill. Drilled 14" shoe track as per Drilling Roadmap Rev04 from 26;756' (top plug + upper float collar) to 26;872' (~20' from 14" shoe) while weighting up to 13.8 ppg SBM. Continued displacing well 13.8 ppg SBM.

02/17/2018: Complete weighting up 13.2 to 13.8 ppg (surface)/ 14.18 ppg (downhole) SBM prior to drilling shoe. Drilled 14" shoe track and shoe from 26;872' to 26;905'. Wash and ream rathole from 26;905' to 27;010'. Drill 10' of new formation from 27;010' to 27;020'. Perform FIT test to 14.5 ppg EMW with 13.8 ppg SBM (916 psi). ESD pumped up after FIT = 14.91 EMW. Drill 12-1/4" hole section from 27;020' to 27;245' MD. Decision made to TOH due to low ROP; 21 fph IROP . Circ bottoms up & TOH wet to 25;781'. Pumped slug & TOH to 22;832'.
"},{"   ":366,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-02-18","TEXT_REMARK":"02/18/2018: TOH from 22;832' to surface. B/O Halliburton MMD 95 PDC bit and replace with NOV 12-1/4" Hycalog SK813S-E1C PDC bit. TIH with 12-1/4" BHA to 26;905'. Troubleshoot Baker's OnTrak (unable to turn tools on). While washing down to bottom at 27;245'; established communication with OnTrak tools.

02/19/2018: Drilled 12-1/4" hole section from 27;245' to 28;560' with 13.8 ppg (surface)/ 14.18 ppg (downhole) SBM.

02/20/2018: Drilled 12-1/4" hole section from 28;560' to 29;581'.

02/21/2018: Drilled 12-1/4" hole section from 29;581' to well TD of 30;612' MD (28;532' TVD). Perform Downlink to close the Auto-Track Steering assembly ribs. Performed flow check on the trip tank; well losing ~2 bph. Pump up ESD 2x as per Baker DD (Max 14.28 ppg EMW; Min 14.11 ppg EMW). Pumped 60 bbls of Hi-vis weighted sweep and circulated BU.

02/22/2018: Circulate and conditioned. Perform SIT by working entire stand 3 times without pumps. Performed flow check - well static. Pumped 60 bbls of weighted (16.4 ppg) hi-vis sweep. Continued to circulate and condition SBM. Pumped up 2x ESD = 1st/14.13 ppg EMW; 2nd/14.11 ppg EMW. Flow check; losing ~3 bph. TOH wet from 30;612' to 26;892' (14" shoe). Flow checked well - static. Pumped slug and TOH with 12-1/4" BHA.

02/23/2018: Performed BOP remote function test. Spaced out and performed BOP function test on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Performed Diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel (33 secs to close) and performed flow check. TOH with the 12-1/4" BHA on 5-7/8" DP from 8;784' to 105'. Removed RA sources; break off bit and passed BHA to Aux rotary. Cleaned and cleared main rotary while boosting slug from riser. R/U Halliburton wireline equipment. RIH with Run #1: MCI - OMRI (Centralized resistivity - caliper). Perform repeat pass. Performed main pass from 30;550' MD to 29;000' MD.

02/24/2018; Perform main log on descent #1 from 29;000' to 14" shoe (26;892' MD). TOH from 26;892' to surface with descent #1. L/D logging tools. P/U logging tools run #2 and RIH to 700'. Head tension not reading correctly. POOH with wireline to troubleshoot cable head tension. Changed out cable head and RIH to 26;892'. Perform down log to 30;510' and then uplog to 29;360'. RIH from 29;360' to 30;530'. Log main pass from 30;530' to 26;830'. TOH to 20;900' with descent #2.
"},{"   ":367,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-02-25","TEXT_REMARK":"02/25/2018: POOH with descent #2 (OH GTETE-CSNG-DSNT-SDLT) from 20;900' MD to surface. Conducted PJSM and P/U wireline descent #3 RDT toolstring. Reviewed TOI's Prompt Card and RIH on wireline with run #3 RDT from surface to 26;700'. Test RDT tool sealing capability. RIH on wireline with run #3 RDT from 26;700' to ~29;056'. Performed downward creep correction. Performed RDT pressure tests from 28;991' to 29;293' MD as per plan. 

02/26/2018: Performed RDT formation evaluation obtaining pressure points from 29;293' WLM to 29;485'. At 29;485' WLM; communication was lost to downhole tools. Troubleshoot and established communication to tools. Continued with RDT formation evaluations from 29;485' to 30;260'.

02/27/2018: Performed wireline run #1 decent #3 RDT formation evaluation; obtaining pressure points per G&G test plan. POOH to surface. P/U and RIH with wireline run #1 decent #4 HRSCT-B (SWC). Began taking sidewall cores in Wx1A.

02/28/2018: Attempted open hole sidewall core (SWC) sample at 29;105' MD with Halliburton's Xaminer Rotary Coring Tool (HRSCT-B); SWC #1 run. Troubleshoot bit box on coring tool. Halliburton wireline operators unable to move bit box back to vertical position inside the tool body. Decision made to pull out of hole and change out tool. POOH with HRSCT-B assy on wireline from 29;105' to 300'. L/D HAL Xaminer Rotary Coring Tool (HRSCT-B); SWC #1 run. Slip and cut drill line. P/U and M/U HAL Xaminer Rotary Coring Tool (HRSCT-B); SWC #2 run. RIH from surface to 26;000' WLM. Function tested UBSRs/LBSRs from the Driller's Panel; Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod.

03/01/2018: RIH with HRSCT-B (rotary sidewall coring run #2) from 26;000' to 29;684'. Perform SWC operations from 29;684' WLM to 30;196' WLM.

Note: On 03/01/2018 at 18:47 hrs; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay BOP testing for 48 hours; or as soon as possible after running and cementing the 9-7/8" liner.

03/02/2018: POOH with HRSCT-B (R1D5 / SWC #2) assy on wireline from 28;270' to surface. R/D wireline equipment. R/U 9-7/8" casing handling equipment. Held OAB for casing running operations. TIH with 9-7/8" casing from surface to 3;966'. R/D casing handling equipment and install BX5 elevators. M/U VersaFlex 9-7/8" liner hanger.

Note: Paul Reeves; Joshua Naquin and Troy Boudreaux with BSEE Houma District arrived on rig at 09:00 hrs for routine rig visit. 1 INC issued. Departed rig at 13:45 hrs. 

03/03/2018: TIH with 9-7/8" liner on landing string from 4;036' to 30;480'; losing 25-550 bph. Converted diverter and floats. Made up Blackhawk cement stand; washed down and tagged bottom at 30;611'. P/U and placed 9-7/8" liner shoe at 30;607'. Adjusted pump rate and boost rate to establish circulation between 9-7/8" x open hole annulus; while spotting LCM in the pipe for the cement job. Determined insufficient mud volume on board to cement liner at loss rate with well open. Shut in well. Monitored riser on the trip tank - static. Monitored well on wellhead gauge - holding constant at 880 psi. Built mud in preparation to cement liner with annular closed.
"},{"   ":368,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-03-04","TEXT_REMARK":"03/04/2018: Built mud in preparation to cement liner with annular closed. With upper and lower annular closed; performed cement job. Pumped 50 bbls of 14.6 ppg lead spacer; 194 bbls (1;089 cu ft) of 16.2 ppg cement; 20 bbls of 14.6 ppg tail spacer. Displaced with 1;028 bbls of 13.9 ppg SBM. Final circulating pressure was 2;154 psi with 453 psi of lift pressure. Did not bump floats. While waiting on cement; dropped 2.75" Versaflex liner hanger activation ball. Set and released from liner hanger. Observed well still losing while circulating bottoms up through the choke line. TOL @ 26;587' MD/ 24;570' TVD. Established loss rate of 460 bph. Closed lower annular and waited on cement.

Note: On 03/04/2018 at 17:57 hours; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay BOP testing by an additional 24 hours; in addition to the 48 hours granted on 03/01/2018.

03/05/2018: Waited on mud; base oil; wireline equipment and 14" FasDrill to arrive onboard. Took on 2;913 bbls of 13.9 ppg SBM and 1;118 bbls of 11.9 ppg SBM from M/V C Endurance. Established -1;300 psi required to balance well; with 2 bph losses; by gravity feeding base oil down the choke line. Shut-in well and monitored well on the wellhead pressure gauge - 741 psi to 770 psi. Continued waiting on base oil; wireline equipment and 14" FasDrill to arrive onboard.

Note: On 03/05/2018 at 19:22 hours; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay BOP testing an additional 24 hours; in addition to the 24 hours granted on 03/04/2018.

03/06/2018: Waited on base oil; wireline equipment and 14" composite bridge plug prior to spotting reverse riser cap and TOH. Monitored well on the wellhead pressure gauge - 750 psi stable (10 hrs). Spotted 1;000 bbls (3;154 ft) of base oil 100 ft below the flowline. Established loss rate of 55 bph. Boosted riser cap to flowline. Top filled riser cap with 12 bbls of base oil (total of 1;012 bbls base oil/ -1;211 psi reverse riser cap). Allowed riser cap to fall 56 ft and top filled riser with 13.9 ppg SBM. TOH with 9-7/8" liner running tool from 26;559' to 24;124'. Top of riser cap at 336' and bottom of riser cap at 3;525'. HPHT gauge = 935 psi.

Note: On 03/06/2018 at 17:20 hours; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay BOP and Diverter testing an additional 48 hours.

03/07/2018: Trip out of hole from 24;124' to 23;507'. Suspended tripping and waited on wireline equipment and 14" FasDrill to leave port. Trip out of hole from 23;507' to 3;327'. Adjust reverse riser cap due to loss rate greater than 50 bph.

03/08/2018: Adjust riser cap to maintain loss rate below 50 bph. BOP pressure = 875 - 900 psi. TOH with liner hanger RT. Inspect and L/D RT (shear pins not sheared; no abnormalities). RIH with 14" composite bridge plug (7-10 bph losses); correlate and set at 26;504' WLM. POOH with BP setting tool on wireline to surface. R/D wireline. Adjust riser cap to maintain loss rate below 50 bph.

Note: On 03/08/2018 at 18:25 hours; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay BOP and Diverter testing an additional 24 hours.

03/09/2018: TIH with 16" RTTS to 2;742'. Displaced drill string with 13.9 ppg SBM due to DP u-tubing. Continued TIH to 6;754'. Displaced used riser cap out and spotted new riser cap (Lower HPHT gauge = 950 psi.). TOH from 6;754' to 5;421'; placed BOP test stand in drill string. TIH with 16" RTTS from 5;421' to 12;594'. Set and tested back side (casing; 16" and 22" pack off to 1;000 psi). Displaced riser cap out of riser in preparation for BOP testing.

03/10/2018: Displaced riser to 13.9 ppg SBM via boost line. Pressure test BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; to 250-350 psi/ 9700 psi for 5 mins and test annulars to 250-350 psi/ 4;800 psi for 5 mins; using 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.3 ppg (downhole) SBM. Good tests. Function tested BOP on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. Re-establish base oil riser cap. Function tested diverter from Driller's Well Control button (34 secs) and from Driller's Panel (33 secs). Unset RTTS; RIH and set 16" RTTS in tangent section at 17;000'. Pressure up down DP. Test 16" casing below RTTS to 14" bridge plug with 1;000 psi for 30 min - good test. Troubleshot casing leak using 16" RTTS. TOH to 14;843' and set RTTS. Pressure tested below RTTS to 1;000 psi (good test) and observed losses from above RTTS on the trip tank. Unset RTTS; TOH to 14;223' and set RTTS. Observed losses from above RTTS on the trip tank. TOH to 12;710' and set RTTS. Observed losses stop on the trip tank. Pressure tested from above RTTS to 1;000 psi for 5 min - good test. Leak is between 12;710' and 14;843'.

"},{"   ":369,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-03-11","TEXT_REMARK":"03/11/2018: Locate 16" casing leak with RTTS (confirm leak interval between 13;247 - 13;410' with leak starting at top of build section). Adjust riser cap to minimize losses below 50 bph. TOH with 16" RTTS. R/U wireline. RIH with 120-arm caliper run + ultrasonic tool.

03/12/2018: Completed 120-arm caliper run. R/D wireline. Slip/cut drill line. Performed agreed planned maintenance. TIH with tail pipe below RTTS (100l). P/U 16" RTTS packer assembly with storm valve.

Note: On 03/12/2018 at 17:46 hrs; Bobby Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to proceed forward with plan to reduce mud weight density from 13.9 to 12.1 ppg from surface to leak point at 13;247' MD.

03/13/2018: P/U and RIH with 16" RTTS and storm valve. Set RTTS at 12;316'. Test storm valve and RTTS to 1;000 psi. Attempted to release from RTTS (no success). Unseated RTTS and flow checked well. TOH with RTTS to 3;950'. Flow checked well with ~60 bph loss rate. Closed LBSRs and adjusted riser cap as needed.

03/14/2018: TOH with 16" RTTS packer and SSC-3 storm valve assy. Inspect RTTS and storm valve; hydraulic chamber packed with barite/grit. L/O SV assy. P/U new SSC-3 SV asembly. TIH with 16" RTTS/ storm valve assy. Set RTTS at 12;278'. Closed annular and tested the top of RTTS to 1;000 psi. Attempted to release from RTTS (no success). Adjusted weights and attempted to release from RTTS (unsuccessful). Unseated RTTS and flow checked well (loss rate at ~34 BPH). TOH with RTTS to 12;571'. Function tested UBSRs and LBSRs from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from and Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod.

03/15/2018: TOH with 16" RTTS packer and SSC-3 storm valve assy. Inspect RTTS and storm valve; hydraulic chamber packed with barite/grit. L/O SSC-3 assy. P/U mechanical SSC-2 SV assembly. TIH with 16" RTTS/SV assembly to 10;702'.

03/16/2018: Displaced 13.9 ppg SBM/ riser cap with 12.1 ppg SBM from above RTTS (12;280') to below BOPs. Transfer/treat additional 12.1 ppg SBM and function test BOPs on 6-5/8" DP from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Completed 12.1 ppg SBM displacement to surface. Function tested the Diverter from Driller's Well Control button (33 secs). Function tested Diverter from Toolpusher's Control Panel (33 secs). Latched onto RTTS/SV and opened SV. Monitored losses below the RTTS - loss rate reduced to 30 bph. Unseated the RTTS and monitored the well via trip tank - initial loss rate at 90 bph reducing to 75 bph.

Note: On 03/16/2018 at 13:44 hrs; Bobby Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Adriano Garcia (BSEE) to delay BSR and Casing test until March 21st 2018 to allow for 16" casing leak to be isolated with 14" tie-back.

03/17/2018: TOH to 12;700'. Flow check (68 bph losses). Displace riser to 12.1 ppg in/out; monitor well (losses 85-62 bph). Displace riser to 12.0 ppg in/out; monitor well (losses 80-52 bph). Displace riser to 11.8 ppg in/out; monitor well (losses 40-32 bph). TOH to 6;680' (50-62 bph losses). Closed the LBSRs and cut back MW in pits to 11.6 ppg. Displaced the riser to 11.6 ppg SBM via Choke & Kill lines.
"},{"   ":370,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-03-18","TEXT_REMARK":"03/18/2018: With LBSR closed; TIH with MPT placing tailpipe above BOP stack; open LBSR (31 bph losses observed). RIH and jet top of wear sleeve; retrieve wear sleeve with 60k overpull; jet WH profile. TOH placing tailpipe above BOPs. Loss rate 46 bph. Close LBSR. TOH and R/B MPT/wear sleeve. Slip and cut drill line. R/U for 14" tieback run. Picked up 14" 115.53# Q125XHP SLSF TL Mule Shoe.

03/19/2018: Run 14" tieback casing doubles from pipe deck from 643' to 6;558'. Jump the LBSR (10 bph losses). Open LBSR; TIH with 14" tieback from 6;558' to 6;719'; filling hole with 11.6 ppg SBM from trip tank. P/U 14" x 13-7/8" crossover to 6;842'. TIH with 13-7/8" tieback casing doubles from pipe deck from 6;842' to 10;462' with ~18 bph losses; filling hole with 11.6 ppg SBM from trip tank. P/U 13-7/8" x 13-3/4" crossover to 10;502'. TIH with 13-3/4" tieback casing doubles from pipe deck from 10;502' to 15;842' with 18-24 bph losses; filling hole with 11.6 ppg SBM from trip tank. 

03/20/2018: Pick up and TIH with 13-3/4" 95.58# SLSF tieback casing doubles from pipe deck from 15;482' to 16;369'. Picked up CHSART/Hanger and made up to casing string. Removed casing spider slips and installed DQ bushings. Landed out hanger in rotary. Rig up inner string C-plate and change out elevators. Run 5-7/8" inner string to 15;366'.

03/21/2018: TIH with 5-7/8" inner string and diverter from 15;366' to 15;914'. M/U CHSART with seal assembly to inner string per Dril-Quip procedure. TIH from 15;914' to 20;011' with 14" tieback on 6-5/8" landing string. TIH from 20;011' to 23;459' with 14" tieback on 6-5/8" landing string. R/D OES tool. M/U Blackhawk cement head. Slack off weight 2;050k lbs; landing out on load shoulder 24 ft in on cement stand. Convert Blackhawk Diverters/DTD. Hold PJSM. Perform pre-job circulation with 12.1 ppg SBM prior to 14" tieback cement job. Adjusted pump rate from 1.0 - 2.5 bpm (3;870 - 5;000 psi). Observed 0% - 50% returns while circulating. Cement unit pumped 6 bbls of 14.4 ppg spacer. Rig pumps pumped 75 bbls of 14.4 ppg spacer. Pressure tested surface lines to 6;000 psi. Closed the TIW above cement head and trapped 500 psi from above through the TDX. Opened low torque valves on cement head and line up to pump down hole from the cement unit.  

Note: On 03/21/2018 at 15:57 hrs; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay the BSR and Casing Test in order to allow for the 16" casing leak to be isolated with the 14" drilling tieback.

03/22/2018: Mixed and pumped 15.5 ppg cement slurry at 2.5 bpm (total 126 bbls/ 708 cu ft/ 442 sxs cement pumped). Displaced cement with 12.1 ppg SBM at 2.5 bpm with 2;200 - 4;332 psi. Reduced pump rate to 1.5 bpm at ~513 bbls and to 1 bpm at 563 bbls. (Minimal returns fluctuating between ~1% and zero returns). Total displacement 601 bbls. CIP at 05:15 hrs. FCP - 2;370 psi @ 1 bpm. WOC to achieve 500 psi compressive strength (~20 hrs estimated wait time).

03/23/2018: WOC to achieve 500 psi compressive strength. Bleed back stand pipe pressure 460 psi (7.25 bbls) to the HAL cement unit. Well static. Opened upper annular and observed 20 bph losses on the trip tank on the backside of the 14" tieback. Set the seal assembly as per DQ rep. Pressured up to 4;000 psi to actuate the seal assembly lock ring. Increase pressure to 7;200 psi to completely set the hanger. Pressure tested the SA to 7;200 psi. P/U and released the CHSART from the hanger with 40k.lbs overpull. Displace the wellbore to 12.6 ppg (surface)/ 12.9 ppg (downhole) SBM. L/D Blackhawk cement head. Perform BOP function test on 5-7/8" drillpipe from the Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from the Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function tested the upper annular from Driller's chair well control shut in button. Function tested the diverter from the Driller's Control Panel.

Note: On 03/23/2018 at 15:57 hrs; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay the BSR and Casing Test until March 25; 2018.

03/24/2018: TOH with the 14" CHSART/ inner string on 6-5/8" LS from 22;965' to 15;966'. L/D 14" CHSART. TOH with 5-7/8" inner string from 15;966' to surface. Clear rig floor. P/U and TIH with the 14" cleanout BHA with wear sleeve from surface to 8;354'. Set the wear sleeve in the HPWH. Perform BOP pressure test on 5-7/8" drillpipe using 12.6 ppg SBM to 250/ 10;200 psi on rams and surface equipment; and 250/ 5;300 psi on annulars.
"},{"   ":371,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-03-25","TEXT_REMARK":"03/25/2018: Pressure test BOPs on 5-7/8" DP using 12.6 ppg (surface)/ 12.9 ppg (downhole) SBM to 250 psi/ 10;200 psi on rams and surface equipment; and 250 psi/ 5;300 psi on annulars from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. Perform BOP function test on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod and Blue Pod; and from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod and Yellow Pod. Performed Diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel and from Driller's Panel. TOH from 8;125' to 1;073' and R/B Drill-Quip (DQ) MPT. TIH with the 14" tieback cleanout BHA from 1;073' to 6;299'. Slip and cut drill line. TIH with the DQ BOPTT/ Nu-Tec from 6;299' to 13;367' (bit depth). Land the DQ BOPTT in the HPWH at 7;113' and set down BHA weight (195k.lbs). Closed the annular; and performed 2;500 psi backside test to ensure the BOPTT was on seat. Made 8 left hand turns and released from the Nu-Tec tool. TOH 5 stands. Perform BSRs x BOPTT pressure test. Pressure test UBSRs/LBSRs from Driller's Panel on Blue POD to 250 psi/ 10;200 psi with 12.6 ppg SBM mud; using IPT SureTec software. 

Note: On 03/25/2018 at 16:41 hrs; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay the casing test for 48 hours.

03/26/2018: Performed UBSR/LBSR x BOPTT pressure test to 250 psi/ 10;200 psi with 12.6 ppg SBM from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod. Performed UBSR/LBSR function test from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. TIH with NuTec retrieval tool from 6;399' to 7;113'. Retrieved NuTec/BOPTT. TOH with NuTec/BOPTT from 7;113' to surface. TIH with 12.25" cleanout BHA from 6;299' to 23;101'. Wash down from 23;101' to 23;516'. No cement observed while washing through the 14" tieback shoe track at 23;496'. Performed "Feel Good" pressure test at 23;516' against the 14" Tieback x FasDrill. Pressured up to 3;900 psi from the cement unit with 12.6 ppg - good test. TIH from 23;516' to 26;429'. Wash down from 26;429' to 26;522' with 12.6 ppg (surface)/ 12.9 ppg (downhole) SBM.

03/27/2018: Washed down and tagged 14" FasDrill at 26;535'. Displaced well to 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.3 ppg (downhole) SBM. Observed well losing at 4-6 bph. While waiting on approval from BSEE to perform cement squeeze; circulated and conditioned well. Spotted 462 bbls of Hi-Vis 17.0 ppg Pad Mud (120 Vis / 43 YP) in preparation for cement squeeze job. TOH with 12-1/4" cleanout BHA from 26;535' to 23;645'. Began circulating bottoms up.

Note: On 03/27/2018 at 17:41 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) granted approval to proceed with the 14" squeeze job with an additional 48 hour casing test extension.

03/28/2018: Circulated and conditioned mud. Round tripped to planned top of cement plug; changing out 5-7/8" drill pipe with 6-5/8" drill pipe; to prevent C/O handling gear while pulling out of plug. Pumped and spotted balance plug across tieback gap and tieback shoe. POOH to above cement plug. Circulated string clean. Squeezed cement. Waited on cement.

03/29/2018: Wait on cement with annular closed while shut in at the cement unit. Performed BOP Acoustic function test on MVBRs. Rigged down SES. Washed down and tagged TOC at 22;915'. Drilled cement from 22;915' to 23;256'. Circulated 1x bottom's up. Made up side entry stand in preparation for operational casing test. Monitored well to establish loss rate; well losing at 2.5 bph.

Note: On 03/29/2018 at 17:29 hrs; Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay the casing test an additional 24 hours.

03/30/2018: Pressure tested casing with 13.9 ppg mud to 2;400 psi for 30 min. Initial test pressure was 2;443 psi and final test pressure was 2;310 psi (5.4% drop). Pressure did not have a decreasing rate of change. Observed discrepancy in trip tank readings - troubleshot trip tanks. Drilled cement plug inside of tieback gap from 23;526' to 23;556'. Circulated cuttings above BHA. TOH with 12-1/4" cleanout BHA from 23;556' to surface. Serviced drilling equipment. TIH with 4-1/2" cement stinger to 2;827'.

Note: On 03/30/2018 at 13:58 hrs; Mr. Robert Naumman (Chevron) received approval from Mr. William Sanders (BSEE) to repeat the squeeze on the drilling tieback shoe utilizing 4-1/2" stinger as BHA and granted an extension to test casing before April 3; 2018.

03/31/2018: TIH with 4-1/2" squeeze assy from 2;827' to 22;161'. Performed BOP function test on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Performed Diverter function test from Toolpusher's Panel (34 seconds to close). Washed down and tagged TOC at 23;559'. Circulated 2x cement plug volume. Pumped and spotted 113 bbls balanced cement plug. POOH above cement plug and circulated 1x DP volume. Squeezed cement; performing 6 pressure squeeze cycles. Began waiting on cement at 19:17 hrs.
"},{"   ":372,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-04-01","TEXT_REMARK":"04/01/2018: Waited on cement until 08:00 hrs. Opened up well and monitored on the trip tank - well was static. TOH with 4-1/2" cement diverter from 22;497' to surface. Slipped and cut drill line. Perform operational casing test to 2;500 psi - good test. TIH with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly to 10;301'.

04/02/2018: TIH with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly from 10;310' to 22;815'. Washed down to 22;865'; tagged firm cement with 10 klbs. Drilled cement from 22;865' to 23;526'. Performed operational casing test to 2;500 psi; good test. Drilled cement from 23;526' to 23;695'. TIH from 23;695' to 26;517'; tagging 15' of fill on top of 14" FasDrill. Circulated BU.

Note: On 04/02/2018 at 15:15 hrs; Mr. John Paul Yearwood (Chevron) received approval from Mr. William Sanders (BSEE) to delay the casing test an additional 24 hours.

04/03/2018: Circulated bottoms up. Washed/reamed through fill from 26;517' to 26;532'. Drilled 14" FasDrill. Washed down and tagged the top of the 9-7/8" liner top. P/U and circulated 1x bottoms up. Troubleshot trip tank. Pumped slug and TOH from 26;595' to surface. Performed casing test against the UBSR to 300 psi for 5 min/ 2;400 psi for 30-min. Pressure test LBSR x casing to 300/ 2;400 psi for 5 min. Function test UBSR and LBSR. TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout BHA to 278'.

Utilizing TCP/Yellow Pod; close UBSR and pressure test UBSR & LBSR with 13.9 ppg SBM down choke line to 300 / 2;400 psi (5-min)--Good tests.
Pressure tested casing with 13.9 ppg SBM to 2;400 psi (30-min)--good test. 
Conduct UBSR & LBSR function test on TCP/Blue Pod & DCP/Yellow Pod.

04/04/2018: TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout BHA to 26;595'. Tagged up on remnants of 14" FasDrill with 10 klbs at 26;595'. Push and ream 14" FasDrill as needed to 30;389'; top of upper float collar. Drilled out 9-7/8" liner shoe track to 30;557' (PBTD); leaving 50 ft of cement in the shoe track. Pumped 100 bbl Hi-Vis sweep and circulate above tieback gap. Trip out of hole from 30;550' to 24;977'.

04/05/2018: TOH with 8-1/2" cleanout asembly from 24;977' to 23;495'. Circulated 1-1/2x bottoms up while washing tieback gap. Flow check - static. Pump slug and TOH to surface with 8-1/2" cleanout assy. R/U wireline for plugged packer run. RIH with plugged packer and tag up at 28;600'. Worked wireline down to 28;725' in ~30 ft intervals; staying within the 80% minimum static line tension. Received permission from HES in town to RIH with plugged packer with line tension at 67% of static line tension. 

04/06/2018: Unable to RIH with Halliburton plugged packer past 28;725'. POOH to surface and L/D tool. Observed damage to metal cone below packer elements. RIH with Halliburton cement evaluation assembly on wireline to 30;530' WLM. Correlated depth at 30;323'. POOH to surface logging. Rig down wireline. Slip and cut drill line.

Note: BSEE Inspectors Paul Reeves and Joshua Naquin arrived at 09:00 hrs. No INCs issued. Departed at 13:00 hrs.

Note: On 04/06/2018 at 15:04; Mr. Matthew Spear (Chevron) received approval from Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to change the order of operation without updating the RPD:
. POOH with CBL/CAST tool.
. Run the polish Mill to the top of the 9-7/8 liner and polish the PBR.
. Run and cement our production tieback string.
. Trip in and drill out the Production Tie back; clean out all the way to PBTD and clean the well.
. Run the plugged packer on wireline.

04/07/2018: Slip and cut 155 ft of drill line. P/U and TIH with Halliburton polish mill assy. Pressure tested BOP to 300 psi/ 9;700 psi on 5-7/8" drill pipe; using 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.3 ppg (downhole) SBM. Pressure tested annulars to 300 psi/ 4;800 psi. All tests performed from the Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; utilizing IPT Suretec software. Function tested BOP from Driller's Panel on Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod. Functioned diverter from Driller's Panel (32 sec to close). TIH with polish mill; working through tight spots as needed. Polish PBR and dress off TOL. Pump 100 bbl weighted sweep and circulate hole clean.
"},{"   ":373,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-04-08","TEXT_REMARK":"04/08/2018: Continued circulating bottoms up. Slacked off to TOL and made mark on painted stand with MPR. Short tripped with Halliburton polish mill assy. P/U and RIH with jet sub and MPT. Washed wear bushing profile. Retrieved wear bushing with 110k overpull; picked up and jetted wellhead. Circulated 1x riser volume. TOH to surface with MPT; R/B MPT and wear sleeve.

04/09/2018: Trip out of the hole with Polish Mill Assembly; good indication of liner top on no-go. Rigged up casing running equipment. RIH with seal assembly and 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" production tieback from surface to 11;366'.

04/10/2018: RIH with production tieback to 19;508'. Rig down casing elevators and R/U drill pipe elevators. Make up Dril-Quip casing hanger. Trip in hole with tieback on landing string to 23;273'. C/O inserts to 6-5/8" 45 degree UD-165 and SLTs from 6- 5/8" to UD-165. Troubleshoot BX7 elevators not closing on 6-5/8" UD-165. TIH with tieback on landing string (LS) from 23;273' to 25;109'.

04/11/2018: TIH with tieback on LS to 26;451'. R/D OES flowback tool. Washed down to 26;586'. P/U and M/U Blackhawk cement std. Performed soft landout landing at 26;630'; with seal engagement observed at 26;613'. Pressure test seals to 1;030 psi. P/U and  place mule shoe 20 ft above PBR. Circulate and condition mud prior to cement job. Perform cement job. Pump 759 bbls (4;261 cu ft) of 15.5 ppg; Class H Lead Slurry and 137 bbls (769 cu ft) of 16.4 ppg; Class H Tail Slurry. Rig pumps displaced cement with a total of 1;633 bbls of 13.9 ppg SBM. Cement in place at 18:15 hrs - lift pressure 2;514' psi. Slacked off and stabbed tieback into PBR and landed out DQ casing hanger on load shoulder. Engaged seal assembly. Closed MVBR and staged pressure up to 4;000 psi then to 9;550 psi. Bled pressure. Pressure back up to 9;550 psi and test seal assembly for 5 mins - good test. P/U CHSART above hanger and break out cement std. Circ surface to surface volume. R/D 1250 ton bails/ BX-7 elevators.

04/12/2018: Rig down BX-7/ 1;250 ton bails. Install 1;000 ton bails and BX-5. TOH with Dril-Quip CHSART on 6-5/8" landing string from 6;934' to surface and R/B CHSART. M/U tieback 8-1/2" cleanout assembly to 1;252'; M/U MPT with wear bushing to 1;650'. TIH from 1;650' to 8;670 and set wear bushing in WH profile with 30k down. Verify with 15k overpull. Shear out with 30k overpull. Trip MPT to surface and R/B same. Slip and cut 155 ft of drill line and service hydra-rackers.  

04/13/2018: TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout BHA to 25;555' and tag with 15k down (539 ft higher than theoretical TOC). Drill cement from 25;555' to 26;289'.

04/14/2018: Drill cement from 26;289' to 26;625'. TIH to 28;725'. Scrape interval 28;725' to 28;600' (interval where W/L plugged packer previously could not pass). TIH to 29;464'; wash/ream spots (28;755' and 29;411'). Washed down from 29;411' and tagged PBTD @ 30;557'. Pumped 100 bbl 13.9 ppg hi-vis sweep and circulated B/U. TOH with HES cleanout assembly from 30;557' to 25;526'. Function tested BOPs from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Function tested Diverter from Toolpusher's Panel (36 sec to close). TIH with HES cleanout assembly from 25;526' to 26;737'. Jetted/dressed tieback seal stem/PBR from 26;624' to 26;650'. TIH with HES cleanout assembly to 29;563'.
"},{"   ":374,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-04-15","TEXT_REMARK":"04/15/2018: TIH with 8-1/2" cleanout assembly from 29;563' to 30;557'. Circulated 100 bbls of 15.9 ppg weighted sweep from surface to surface with 760 gpm; 6;800 psi; 20-90 rpm; 15-20k ft-lbs; boosting with 356 gpm; 700 psi. Flow check - well static. Pumped 100-bbl 15.9 ppg slug. TOH from 30;557' to surface with cleanout BHA. R/U and RIH with plugged packer and GR/CCL assembly on wireline (W/L) from surface to 14;450'.

04/16/2018P: RIH with plugged packer on W/L from 14;450' to 30;514'. Attempt to correlate up; taking 300-lb overpull. Correlate down referencing open hole log; set plugged packer @ 30;511' MD/ 28;434' TVD. POOH with W/L. M/U HES Cleanwell BHA and TIH to above BOPs. Slip & cut drill line - C/O swivel packing seals. Offline: Performed casing pressue test to 7;500 psi. Pressure trend did not drop below 15 psi/min during 36 min test (umped 36.5 bbls - bled back 30.25 bbls). Pressure tested choke line; surface equipment to 8500 psi to verify no surface leaks (good test). Performed second casing test online to 7;500 psi. Pressure trend did not drop below 22 psi/min during 36 minute test (pumped 36.5 bbls - bled back 30.25 bbls).  

04/17/2018: Function tested the UBSRs/LBSRs from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Yellow Pod. Pressure tested casing against the UBSRs to 7;500 psi for 30 mins (good test) Pressure tested the UBSRs/LBSRs from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; to 300/7;500 psi for 5/5 mins (good test. All tests performed with 13.9 ppg (surface)/ 14.3 (downhole) SBM; utilizing IPT Suretec software. TIH with HES Cleanwell displacement BHA on 5-7/8" TFM DP from surface to 27;043'.

04/18/2018: TIH with HES displacement BHA to 27;043'. Establish base line parameters. Washed across sump packer setting depth @ 30;315'. Washed down and tagged plugged packer at 30;518' DPM. Spaced out and functioned BOPs to clear any trapped debris. C&C mud; total of 4;455 bbls pumped. Pumped 173 bbls of base oil and performed 2;700 psi inflow test. Good test. U-Tube base oil to cement unit. Reversed out remaining base oil with rig pumps until clean. R/D SES. M/U land out stand for displacement. Performed displacement from 13.9 SBM to 14.0 CaBr2.

04/19/2018: Continue with displacement; getting spacer train back to surface. Final NTU 269; with 1% Solids. Total interface ~109 bbls. Performed Online Line Cleaning Phase 2b and 3; cleaning surface equipment and lines to RP41 specs in preparation for completion operations as per POA (Tri-State lancing 16" flow line). 

04/20/2018: Perform Online Pit/ Line Cleaning Phase 2b-3 to RP41 spec. Short trip with displacement assembly from 30;453' to 27;988'. Evaluate assembly #12 riser brush. No anomolies observed. TIH with displacement assembly to 30;518' DPM; tagged permanent packer with 10k down. Reversed out at 12 bpm.

04/21/2018: Reversed out 2;560 bbls at 13.5 bpm (4;075 psi). R/D SES. Spaced out across BOPs and activated the jet-tech. Functioned tested the Diverter from Driller's Control Panel (32 seconds to close). Jetted the BOP/HPWH 3x up and down. Functioned BOP VBRs and Annulars. Jetted the BOP/HPWH 3x up and down. Boosted riser and circulated riser volume. De-activated the jet-tech. S/O to bottom. Circulated CaBr2 to Spec at 18 bpm (4;950 psi). Pressure tested BOP on 5-7/8" drill pipe; with 14.0 CaBr2; from the Toolpusher's Control Panel on Yellow Pod. Pressure tested annulars to 300/4;800 psi and rams/choke manifold to 300/9;700 psi for 5 min. 
"},{"   ":375,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-04-22","TEXT_REMARK":"04/22/2018: Pressure tested BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 14.0 CaBr2 from the Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Pressure tested annulars to 300 psi/ 4;800 psi and pressure tested rams/ choke manifold to 300 psi/ 9;700 psi for 5 mins. Function tested BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod. TOH with HES CleanWell displacement BHA from 26;781' to surface. P/U Archer 9-7/8" TimeLock packer. TIH with Archer packer from surface to 6;456'. Slip and cut Drill line. RIH with Archer packer from 6;456' to 16;020. Set packer at 16;020'.

04/23/2018: Pressure test below/above the Archer packer to 1;000 psi - good test. Spot 50 bbl HEC pill on top of the Archer packer. TOH with the Archer packer RT from 16;019' to 8;046'. Transfer RT to the Aux. P/U and TIH with the HES CleanWell assembly and tail pipe from 8;046' to 14;959'. Obtain baseline parameters. Dropped activation ball. Jet the HPWH wear bushing (WB) profile. Latch into the WB and unseat from the HPWH with 67k.lbs overpull. Wash the LIT/LDS landing profile. TOH with the WB to surface. P/U and TIH with the LIT from 8;046' to 14;977'. 

04/24/2018: TIH with LIT and land out in wellhead profile. Performed DQ procedure with lead impression blocks. P/U LIT one stand above BOP; pressured up and sheared test sub per plan. Made short trip to surface with LIT. Removed lead impression blocks and made comparison against drawings; no change required. M/U and TIH with LDS; landing out on casing hanger. Locked LDS per procedure; performed pressure test to 9;550 psi with cement unit - good test. Released from LDS and short tripped to 8;002' with running tool. Displaced riser to seawater. Performed flow check and began TOH with Archer packer RT from 8;002' to 6;842'.

04/25/2018 12:00: TOH with Archer TimeLock packer RT from 6;842' to surface. R/D BX-5 elevators and R/U BX-7 elevators. Spot riser/gimbal on rig floor. R/U riser running wrenches. M/U to diverter running tool and L/D diverter. Troubleshoot BX-7 elevators. P/U landing joint and stroke slip joint closed. Transfer weight to 50/50 to tensioners/block with 100k down. Unlatch BOP. At 12:00 hrs; move the DCQ 150 ft off location. ROV install tertiary cap on PS007 HPWH. Lift the XT off of M/V Russell Bouziga with Crane #2; and splashed the tree at 13:42 hrs. Lowered the XT to 1;000'. ROV verified the ring gasket was in place in the XT. Lowered tree to 5;500' (~500' AML). ROV removed tertiary cap and ring gasket from PS007 HPWH and cleaned the same. ROV verified the LDS/ actuator ring measurements were in Spec - both measurements were in acceptable range. Moved the rig to 20 ft from well center. Made final rig position adjustments. Lowered the XT with Crane #2 until 1 ft of the HPWH engaged in the XT funnel. Docked the ROV to the SFL ports and oriented the XT to 139.5 degrees. Locked the XT connector as per OSS. XT locked on wellhead at 22:38 hrs. Confirmed XT heading at 139.5 degrees. DCQ ROV pressure tested XT connector as per OSS procedure to 14;700 psi for 30 minutes - good test. Begin closing secondary lockdowns.

Note: On 04/25/2018 at 07:13 hrs; Kevin Corbin (Chevron) provided Bobby Nelson and Josh Ladner (BSEE) with 72 hour notification for initial BOP latch-up to WR 678 PS007 for completion operations.

04/26/2018: Completed XT connector secondary lockdown. Installed trash cap on XT mandrel. Moved rig to DOZ. Secured tensioner ring onto diverter housing and released from tensioner ring. Removed storm loops and drape hoses from slip joint. L/D landing joint; slip joint; BLAT pup and 15' pup. P/U 5' pup; BLAT pup and slip joint. Performed rope test to survey for coil tubing. Repaired top drive thread compensator. P/U landing joint. Installed drape hoses onto slip joint. 

04/27/2018: Installed drape hoses on slip joint. Pressure tested choke/kill/boost and rigid conduit lines. Installed storm loops and mux cables. Locked in tensioner ring to slip joint. Performed agreed planned maintenance while waiting on M/V Harvey to complete installation of subsea boost pump.

04/28/2018: Continued waiting on M/V Harvey to complete installation of subsea boost pump. Performed general maintenance. Picked up and racked back 4-1/2" chrome tubing.
"},{"   ":376,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-04-29","TEXT_REMARK":"04/29/2018: Continued waiting on M/V Harvey to complete installation of subsea boost pump. Performed general maintenance. Picked up and racked back 4-1/2" chrome tubing. Transit from DOZ to PS007 well center. S/O and latch BOP to the PS007 XT at 10:30 hrs. Performed 100 klbs overpull test to confirm a good latch - good test. Performed slump test. ROV performed RIPS test (closed LBSRs). Performed 1;000 psi XT x BOP x WH connector test against the LBSRs. L/D landing joint and installed the diverter. R/D riser handling equipment. Replaced sheared bolts on rotary adapter ring lugs. Function tested diverter from Driller's Control Panel (34 secs to close) and from Toolpusher's Control Panel (35 secs to close) - flowed through both port and starboard diverter lines with seawater. P/U and RIH with Archer packer RT and BWTT to 6;744' BWTT depth/ 7;462' Archer packer RT depth.

04/30/2018: TIH and landed out BWTT on XT bore protector at 7;110'. Released from NuTec BSR test tool and picked up above BOP. Pressure tested wellhead connector to 300/11;550 psi for 5 min - good test. Pressure tested UBSR/LBSR and FSVs from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; to 300/9;400 psi for 5 min. Function tested UBSR/LBSR from Toolpusher's Control Panel on both Pods and from Driller's Control Panel on both Pods. Slacked off and reconnected NuTec BSR test tool. TOH from 7;828' to 7;545' packer RT depth. Pressure tested BOPs on 5-7/8" DP with 8.6 ppg seawater from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod. Pressure tested rams/choke manifold to 300/9;400 psi. Pressure tested annulars to 300/6;600 psi. Function tested BOP on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Yellow Pod. TOH from 7;552' to 700' packer RT depth. L/O BWTT. TIH to 8;134'. Displaced riser and surface equipment from seawater to 14.0 ppg CaBr2. TIH to 9;120' with Archer packer RT.

05/01/2018: TIH from 9;120' to 15;917' with Archer Timelock packer RT. Space out; close annular; reverse out HEC pill with 1.5x string volume. Wash down and tag Archer packer at 16;019' with 20k down; engage/retrieve packer. Flow check - static. TOH to surface. R/U wireline sump packer assy. RIH with sump packer on wireline to 30;400'. Correlated and set sump packer at 30;315' MD/ 28;240' TVD (top of packer). POOH with DPU setting tool from 30;315' to 24;000'.  

Note: BSEE Inspectors Mr. Ladner; Mr. Treland; Mr. Boudreaux; and Mr. Davis arrived at 08:42 hrs. One INC issued (Description: BOP stack does not meet the yearly chamber test requirements stated in API 53 Section 7.6.5.3.4). BSEE inspectors departed at 14:00 hrs.

05/02/2018: POOH with sump packer setting tool on wireline from 24;000' to surface. R/D wireline. Pressure tested 9-7/8" x 10-3/4" casing against LBSRs from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; to 7;400 psi with 14.0 ppg CaBr2 (27.7 bbls pumped/bled back); good test. Slip and cut drill line. Continued troubleshooting SCM on SSPT. TIH with Archer TimeLock packer to 16;025' MD/ 15;887' TVD and set packer. Pressure tested below packer to 6;000 psi (good test). Closed packer ball valve per Archer rep. Released Archer running tool from packer. Pressure tested top side of packer with annular closed to 1;000 psi; good test. Spotted 50 bbls of HEC pill on top of packer. TOH with Archer packer RT from 16;025' to 12;041'.

Note: On 05/02/2018 at 13:47 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave approval to Mr. Kevin Corbin (Chevron) to delay performance of chamber testing as requested until June 10th or as soon as the BOP is recovered to surface; whichever comes first.

Note: On 05/02/2018 at 17:55 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave approval to Mr. Bobby Naumann (Chevron) to temporarily suspend PS007 and unlatch BOP from production tree to change out SCM on production tree.

05/03/2018: TOH with Archer packer RT from 12;041' to 8;000'. Displaced riser from CaBr2 to seawater. TOH with Archer packer RT to surface. Picked up 4" wash pipe and performed derrick management; while waiting on new SCM for XT.

05/04/2018: Locked BLAT tool into BLAT riser pup profile. Recovered ROV to bleed air out of hydraulic lines. Offloaded new SCM and MRT from M/V Fast Deliverer. Unlatched BOP from XT at 04:45 hrs. Recovered faulty SCM from XT and installed new SCM on XT; using active heave crane. Latched BOP onto XT at 23:39 hrs. Confirmed BOP properly latched by pressure testing against LBSRs to 1;000 psi for 5 min.

05/05/2018: Laid out BLAT tool. TIH with Archer packer RT and NuTec/BWTT assy; landing BWTT at 7;110' in XT. Confirmed BWTT seals set with 2;000 psi test. Released NuTec BSR Test Tool from BWTT. P/U two stands to clear stack. Pressure tested WH Connector/ UBSR from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; with 8.6 ppg SW to 300/11;550 psi; good test. Unable to achieve low pressure test on LBSRs due to BWTT leaking. Function tested UBSR/LBSR from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod. Unseat BWTT; P/U; spaced out and pressure tested BOPs on 5-7/8" DP with 8.6 ppg seawater to 300/9;400 psi. Pressure tested annulars to 300/6;600 psi. Tests performed from the Toolpusher's Control Panel on Yellow Pod. Function tested BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. TOH with BWTT/NuTech BSR tool from 7;500' to 3;107'. Note: Uninstalled a new software update on the MCP and reset the JSM MCP & SEM software to the last known working version; which resolved the communication/power-up issues on the XT.

Note: On 05/05/2018 at 18:40 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave approval to Mr. Kevin Corbin (Chevron) to delay pressure testing of the lower blind shear rams for 48 hrs.
"},{"   ":377,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-05-06","TEXT_REMARK":"05/06/2018: Short tripped NuTec BSR and BWTT. Observed damage to top seal (primary) on BWTT. TIH with Archer Packer RT to 8;100'. Observed a leak while pressure testing choke manifold. Changed stem pack; greased valves and completed choke manifold test. Displaced riser; choke; kill and boost line with 14.0 ppg CaBr2. TIH with Archer Packer RT to 16;010'. Reversed out HEC pill. Latched onto Archer TimeLock packer mandrel at 16;016' and unset packer. TOH with Archer packer to 8;451'.

05/07/2018: TOH with Archer packer from 8;451' to surface and L/D packer assy. Pressure test LBSR x Casing to 300/7;400 psi from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod with 14.0 ppg CaBr2 (27.5 bbls pumped/bled back)- good test. R/U TCP handling equipment. M/U TCP guns/BHA to 1;978'. RIH with TCP assembly from 1;978' to 21;643'.

05/08/2018: TIH with TCP assy from 21;643' to 30;216'. Tag sump packer at 30;315'. R/U flow head. Verify guns on depth. Initiate TCP firing sequence. With guns fired 24 bph; initial losses observed; decreased to 12 bph. Reverse out 1.5x DP volumes (avg. 15 bph losses). Open annular and monitor 30 minutes; 2.8 bph losses observed. Unseat TCP packer and R/D surface iron. TOH with spent TCP guns from 30;306' to 29;051' to place TCP guns above perfs. Flow check for 30 minutes; 4.5 bph losses. TOH from 29;051' to 9;265'. Close annular and circulate down DP ad up Choke/Kill lines.

Perforated zone depths; IES; as follows:
Zone 5: 29;134' - 29;242' MD
Zone 4: 29;374' - 29;481' MD
Zone 3: 29;614' - 29;721' MD
Zone 2: 29;909' - 30;016' MD
Zone 1: 30;193' - 30;300' MD

05/09/2018: Circulate below BOPs prior to pulling spent TCP guns above BOP. TOH from 9;265' to 1;669'. R/U TCP handling equipment. L/D TCP BHA/ spent guns with no miss fire shots. Make up Deburr BHA. TIH with Deburr assembly to 24;452'.

05/10/2018: Establish baseline parameters and activate Vac-tech. Wash and ream down across perforation interval. Wash rathole with 4" washpipe to 30;479' and tag sump packer with no-go on depth at 30;315' (30;317 DPM)'. Pick up to place mule shoe above sump packer and circulate 1.5x bottoms up until clean brine returns observed. Flow checked (3-4 bph losses). TIH and verify "no fill"; tagging no-go onto sump packer at 30;315' (30;317 DPM). TOH from 30;479' to 29;969'. Pump slug and TOH from 29;969' to 3;527' (losses at 2-3 bph while TOH).

05/11/2018: TOH with Deburr BHA from 3;527' to 1;655'. L/O Deburr BHA and weigh debris captured from Power Mag and Mod Chambers. Slip and cut drill line. Rig maintenance. R/U for ESTMZ. P/U Sump Seal assembly extensions. Run service tool. Run GP equipment for Zone 1 and pressure test. Run GP equipment for Zone 2. Run GP equipment for Zone 3.

05/12/2018: M/U and RIH with Gravel Pack assemblies #3 - #5 to 2;987'. Pressure tested on top of Zone #5 Gravel Pack assembly. R/U WFT false rotary and R/D WFT tripmaster. M/U ratch-latch retrieval assembly; RIH on washpipe (fishing string). Latch into ratch-latch; pick up to spaceout service tool. R/B washpipe. PT lower zone assemblies and sleeve integrity. Spaceout ShurMAC and RIH to place intermediate seals in the MCS. Attempt to PT the "run in hole" position of lower service tool (C/O test tool and re-test; no success). Adjusted seal space out by -3.5 ft and pressure tested "RIH" position of lower service tool to 250 psi/5 mins - good test. M/U VCH packer.

Note: On 05/12/2018 at 16:33 hrs; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave approval to Mr. Robert Naumann (Chevron) to extend BOP and Diverter Function testing by 24 hrs.

"},{"   ":378,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-05-13","TEXT_REMARK":"05/13/2018: RIH with gravel pack assembly with bundle carrier below from 1;566' to 1;589'. M/U to drill string and broke circulation @ 1 bbl/min; monitor well on trip tank for returns. Continue RIH with ESTMZ assembly on 5-7/8" drill pipe from 1;589' to 6;538'. Function test BSR's (DCP/Yellow; TCP/Blue). TIH form 6;538' to 20;888'. Functioned the UBSRs/LBSRs from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod. Performed BOP function tests on 5-7/8" DP from Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod and from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod. Perform diverter function test from Toolpusher's Control Panel (35 secs to close). Function tested diverter from Driller's Chair in auto sequence (35 secs to close). Functioned Driller's Well Control button at Driller's Chair. TIH from 20;888' to 28;941'. 

05/14/2018: Set VCH Packer at 29;013' MD/ 26;958' TVD and test packer. Set Isolation Packers as follows: Zone 1 - 30;033'; Zone 2 - 29;734'; Zone 3 - 29;494'; Zone 4 - 29;255'. Performed service tool test. P/U Frac Head and M/U Lines to Frac Head; flush lines and pressure test lines/head. R/U Baker's electronic box. Pickle workstring and reverse out. Calibrate flow meters. Circulate and condition to spec. R/U Frac hose from boat. Conducted [re-job safety meeting. Fill and flush Frac hose/lines and pressure test.
 
05/15/2018: Line up to pump down DP with MPs. P/U ~70 ft and slacked off to open Zone #1 FCS/ MCS. Slacked off to "WDC" position. Confirmed tool position and sleeves open. P/U to "Full Reverse" position. Lined up and flushed/filled lines with seawater from Frac boat. Flushed lines from boat with SW. Pressure tested lines from Frac boat. Functioned boat pop-off and annulus side pop-off. Frac boat pumped 2x surface line volumes of 10.5 ppg NaBr linear gel to displace SW from lines to overboard. Pump acid and mini-frac fluid and displace with 315 bbls of 10.5 ppg NaBr to put acid 15 bbls from HES shifting tool. S/O and put tool in weight down circulating position with 90k down. Bullhead acid into perfs; following with Mini-Frac. Pump Frac job from Blue Dolphin; screened out at 517 bbls in flush. Stripped up to reverse position and established returns. Increased pump speed to 11 bpm/ 6;600 psi. Reverse fluid out of drill pipe until 14.0 ppg CaBr observed at surface. Strip up to contingency reverse; dump seals and close MCS/FCS. Performed test against system to 500 psi over trapped pressure. Continue reversing out 2x drill pipe volumes until fluid clean. Flow check; open annular and L/D Frac head. TOH 2 stands; spaceout and R/U Frac head and Frac lines. Confirm tool position for reverse position. 

05/16/2018: Pumped down KL and fill surface lines. Closed choke on Supreme manifold once returns observed at shakers and trapped fluid in treatment lines. Attempted to take reverse-out rate parameters through choke with rig pumps - Stbd turbine flowmeter not functioning properly. Re-dressed stbd turbine flowmeter with new kit and record reverse-out rate parameters. Opened the LA and monitored well. Tested lines to 8;000 psi. P/U ~70 ft from P/U mark and slacked off to open Zone #2 FCS and MCS; monitoring well on trip tank (no losses). Slacked off to "WDC" position with 90 klbs down. Broke circulation and confirmed tool position/sleeves are open. P/U to "Reverse" position. Flushed lines from boat with SW. Pressure tested lines from Frac boat to Frac head to 13;500 psi. Functioned boat and annulus side pop-offs. Lined up and pumped acid job. Shut down and slacked off to "WDC". Performed Mini-frac. Pumped Zone #2 Frac job and shut down 670 bbls in the flush at 10.0 bpm with 6;918 psi on the drillpipe - 2;421 psi on the annulus. Stripped up to reverse position and established returns. Increased pump rate to 12 bpm / 6;000 psi. Reverse fluid out of drillpipe holding constant BHP until 14.0 ppg CaBr2 was observed at surface. Strip up to Contingency Reverse; dumped seals and closed MCS/FCS. Performed test against system to 500 psi over 3;000 psi. Continued reversing out 2x drillpipe volumes until fluid clean. Flow check well and R/D Frac iron. L/O Frac head. TOH to Zone #3; spaceout and R/U Frac head and Frac lines. Confirm tool position for reverse position.

05/17/2018: Pumped down KL and fill surface lines. Closed choke on Supreme manifold once returns observed at shakers and trapped fluid in treatment lines. Recorded reverse-out rate parameters through flowmeters. Opened the LA and monitored well. Tested lines to 8;000 psi. P/U ~70 ft from P/U mark and slacked off to open Zone #3 FCS and MCS; monitoring well on trip tank (no losses). Slacked off to "WDC" position with 90 klbs down. Broke circulation and confirmed tool position/sleeves are open. P/U to "Reverse" position. Flushed lines from boat with SW. Pressure tested lines from Frac boat to Frac head to 13;500 psi. Functioned boat and annulus side pop-offs. Lined up and pumped acid job. Shut down and slacked off to "WDC". Performed Mini-frac. Pumped Zone #3 Frac job and shut down 591 bbls in the flush at 10.0 bpm with 5318 psi on the drillpipe - 1824 psi on the annulus. Stripped up to reverse position & established returns. Increased pump rate to 12 bpm/ psi. Reverse fluid out of drillpipe holding constant BHP until 14.0 ppg CaBr2 was observed at surface. Strip up to Contingency Reverse; dumped seals and attempted to close. MCS/FCS - sleeves not closed. Slacked off to WDC and strip up to Contingency Reverse; dumping seals and closing MCS/FCS. Performed test against system to 500 psi over 2;400 psi. Continued reversing out 1x drillpipe volumes while holding 1;000 psi back pressure on DP. Flow check well and R/D Frac iron. L/O Frac-head. TOH to Zone #4; test seals; spaceout and R/U Frac head and Frac lines.

05/18/2018: Verified HES service tool positions and made reference marks on pipe for Zone #4 Frac job. Cycled tool; opened FCS and MCS and slacked off to WDC; observed 66 bph losses. P/U to reverse position; losses slowed to 30 bph. Closed FCS and MCS and slacked off reverse postion; well static. Discussed plan forward with town. Decision made to perform Zone #4 in Weight Down Squeeze position. Flushed and tested surface lines. Performed Acid Job and Main Frac for Zone #4. Reversed out per schedule. Rigged down Frac head and TOH to Zone #5. R/U Frac head and open MCS/FCS - well static.

05/19/2018: Slacked off to "WDC" and P/U to Reverse position. Losses at 20 bph. Stand by waiting on Blue Tarpon to test lines. Transfer personnel from Blue Tarpon to DCQ. Decision made to pump job in Weight Down Squeeze position. P/U to close FCS & MCS on Zone #5 (losses at 30 bph after dumping seals; until MCS/FCS were closed). S/O to WDC and P/U to Reverse position. Pressure tested lines from Frac boat to rig floor Frac head to 13;500 psi - failed attempt. Blue Tarpon repair leak. Function MCS open and monitor losses - 30 bph. Cycle tool to Reverse position to confirm FCS closed/ MCS open. Pressure tested lines from Frac boat to rig floor Frac head. Performed Acid Job and Main Frac for Zone #5. Reversed out per schedule. Rigged down Frac head and TOH to 23;770' and R/U double dutch. Pressure test BOPs on 5-7/8" drillpipe to 250 psi/ 7400 psi from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; with 14.0 ppg CaBr2; and pressure test annulars to 250 psi/ 4;600 psi."},{"   ":379,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-05-20","TEXT_REMARK":"05/20/2018: Pressure test BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe (DP) from Driller's Control Panel on Blue Pod to 250 psi/ 7;400 psi and pressure test Annular to 250 psi/ 4;600 psi with 14.0 ppg CaBr. Function BOPs on 5-7/8" DP from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function test diverter from Driller's Control Panel. Trip out of hole (TOH) with Halliburton enhanced single trip multi-zone (ESTMZ) assy from 23;770' to surface. Function BSRs from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Driller's Control Panel; Blue Pod; while boosting riser. Rig up (R/U) and run in hole (RIH) with Isolation assembly from surface to 747'.

05/21/2018: Trip in hole (TIH) with Isolation assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 747' to 1;535'. Total assembly weight: 21k. Rig down (R/D) Weatherford tripmaster; 3-1/2" elevators; becket and bails. Installed wiper rubber and SLT 1000T slips. TIH with the HES Isolation assembly on 5-7/8" DP from 1;535' to 28;909'. Conducted pre-job safety meeting (PJSM) and established circ on 2 pit system via boost. Continue TIH opening MJPS and frac closing production sleeves (FCS) across Zones 5 - 1. Monitored losses on a 2 pit system while boosting to keep up with CaBr2 loss rate. Made up TDX; slacked off and stung Isolation assembly seals into VCH seal bore with a mule shoe depth of 30;388'; losses stopped. Lost a total of 388 bbls. Confirmed latch with 30 klbs overpull; slacked back off to neutral weight. Closed annular and pressure tested the FS-2 and seals in VCH packer seal bore to 1;000 psi for 5 minutes on IPT; good test. Dropped 1-7/8" diverter ball and pumped down work string. Set Isolation packer at 28;872' MD/ 26;819' TVD and tagged polished bore receptacle (PBR); closing middle variable bore rams (MVBR) to mark pipe. Pump slug and TOH to 9;365'.

05/22/2018: TOH with Isolation assembly running tool (RT). Lay down (L/D) same. Slipped and cut drill line. Perform planned maintenance. R/U and TIH with TNT Packer.
 
05/23/2018: TIH with TNT packer assembly at 3 mins/std. Set TNT packer at 28;687' MD/ 26;636' TVD and tested packer to 5;000 psi. TOH to 9;000'. Changed out leaking swivel packing. Reversed out spike from drill pipe. Pumped and spotted 50 bbls of hydroxyethyl cellulose (HEC) pill. TOH to 8;236'

05/24/2018: TOH with TNT RT to surface. L/D same. TIH with CleanWell tools and boll weevil test tool (BWTT) from surface to 8;155' bit depth. Perform test to 2;000 psi to ensure BWTT seated. Back off NuTec tool and POOH 2 stands. Pressure tested lower blind shear ram (LBSR)/ upper blind shear ram (UBSR) to 250/7;400 psi for 5 mins each from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; with 14.0 ppg CaBr.. Make up (M/U) NuTec BSR TT. Pick up (P/U) 2 stands. Pressure tested BOPs to 250/ 7;400 psi and Annular to 250/ 4;600 psi with 14.0 ppg CaBr from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Yellow Pod. Function tested BOP from Driller's Control Panel; Yellow Pod; and from Toolpusher's Control Panel; Blue Pod. TOH from 7;899' to 6;900'. Function tested diverter from Toolpusher's Control Panel. TOH to 1;014'. B/O BWTT.

05/25/2018: Function tested UBSR/LBSR from Driller's Control Panel on Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's Control Panel on Blue Pod. M/U and RIH with Bore Protector Running/Retrieval Tool. Jet BOP/ subsea production tree (XT) with jet sub. Land bore protector running retrieval tool (BPRRT) and pull bore protector with 30k overpull (O/P). P/U and jet XT. Pump 40 bbl HEC pill and circulate out same. Pump slug and TOH. Rack back (R/B) BRPRRT and inspect CleanWell Vali Tech and magnet. Boost riser. RIH with mule shoe and 10 stds of drillpipe. Grease/service block. M/U and RIH with Vali Tech/ Mag Tech from 1;356' to 9;474'. Reversed out HEC pill. TOH to 4;491'.

05/26/2018: TOH with Mag Tech; Vali Tech and mule shoe from 4;491' to surface. R/U Weatherford handling equipment. P/U and RIH with HES seal assemblies; 1 joint of tubing; HES R-Nipple assembly; 1 joint of tubing; and Well Dynamics tandem DCIN/DHPTG assembly. Terminated and pressure tested injection line on Asphaltene chemical injected mandrel (CIM). Terminated and pressure tested tubing encapsulated cable (TEC) line onto flat-pack. Terminated and pressure tested injection line on Scale Inhibitor CIM. Confirmed injection through control lines. RIH with stands of 4-1/2" tubing to 1;087'. Jumped pin out of box while backing out stand of tubing. Pin end of stand landed on the rotary; with the stand still retained in the elevator. Recovered stand and repaired top drive stand compensator (TDSC). RIH with stands of 4-1/2" tubing from 1;087' to 2;116'.
"},{"   ":380,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-05-27","TEXT_REMARK":"05/27/2018: TIH with 4-1/2" production tubing from 2;116' to 4;376'. High current causing tubing to rub spider pipe guide; ballasted rig to compensate. TIH with 4-1/2" tubing to 7;677'. Added rollers to control line sheaves due to control line sheath splitting. TIH with 4-1/2" tubing to 8;064'. Made adjustment to Weatherford control line management equipment and increased Well Dynamics spooler tension. TIH with 4-1/2" tubing to 13;961'. High current causing tubing to rub spider pipe guide; ballasted rig to compensate. TIH with 4-1/2" to 14;550'.

05/28/2018: TIH with production tubing from 14;550' to 19;085'. M/U pups; timed pup; and SCSSV to string. Terminated SCSSV. Ran remaining 4-1/2" tubing and 6" VIT. M/U tubing hanger. Began terminating control lines on tubing hanger.

05/29/2018: Terminated and tested control lines on tubing hanger. R/D 22' 500 ton bails and TDSC. R/U 15' 1000 ton bails and BX-5 elevators. M/U Land and Lock THRT to tubing hanger and tested same. TIH with upper completion on 7-5/8" MaXit landing string from 21;654' to 28;547'. 

05/30/2018: Perform soft land out of tubing hanger into XT profile; confirm 59' of seal engagement into PBR. Spot inhibited packer fluid. R/U and test CTLF. Transfer SFT from CMH to main rotary. R/D WTFD equipment and install torpedo packers. Land and lock tubing hanger. R/U HPDU and surface iron. R/U SFT hydraulic lines and function valves. Flush surface lines prior to PT lines and tubing hanger.

05/31/2018: Pressure tested tubing hanger upper seals; SCSSV1 & SCSSV2 control lines; gallery seal; production bore; casing x tubing annulus to 5;000 psi. Engage and test electrical penetrators. Repeated gallery seal test. R/U slick line lubricator. Pressure tested SFT and lubricator. Pressure tested landing string; SFT body and production tubing. Performed operational SCSSV negative test. Retrieved isolation sleeve on slickline. Displaced kill line and land string from 14.0 ppg CaBr2 to base oil. M/U slickline LCP tool string and installed in lubricator. Pressure tested lubricator quick test sub.

06/01/2018: Set lower crown plug in TH. Pressure test LCP above/below (good tests). Displace choke; boost and riser to seawater. Open FS-2 HI valve with 19 cycles. Bullhead base oil below SCSSV and inflow test SCSSV - good test. R/U and RIH with upper crown plug on slickline to 7;000' (100 ft above tubing hanger).

Note: BSEE Inspectors Joshua Naquin; Chris Treland; Daniel Ballard; and Adriano Garcia arrived at 09:10 hrs. No INCs issued. Departed at 14:00 hrs.

06/02/2018: RIH with slickline and set UCP in TH profile. Pressure test the top of UCP to 12;600 psia. Pressure test between UCP and LCP via IWOCS to 12;600 psia. Displaced base oil in surface lines and kill line with seawater. R/D slickline equipment. Unlatch THRT and displace landing string to seawater. Rig down surface control lines; Chiksans; and Torpedo packers. R/D SFT and move to center mousehole. R/D CTLF. R/U landing string handling equipment. DPO ballasting rig due to Expro umbilical rubbing at rotary. 
"},{"   ":381,"WELL_NAME":"PS007","API12":608124012200,"WAR_START_DT":"2018-06-03","TEXT_REMARK":"06/03/2018: TOH with Land & Lock (L&L) on 7-5/8" LS. Transfer L&L to Aux and L/O same. Slip and cut 155 ft of drill line. R/U riser handling equipment. P/U diverter running tool. L/O diverter and running tool. M/U landing joint to slip joint. Unlatch BOP/LMRP at 22:22 hrs. Move 50 ft towards DOZ @ 270-deg vessel heading. ROV install trash cap on XT. Move 1;080 ft to DOZ @ 270-deg vessel heading. R/D moonpool drape hoses/ goosenecks.

06/04/2018: R/D and secure drape hoses and goosenecks in moonpool. Pull landing joint; riser pup; termination joint; BLAT pup; spacer pup and L/O same. Pull riser from 6;900' to surface (BOP/LMRP in moonpool with riser double above). Averaged 7-joints per hour for riser pull. Raise riser catwalk bridge. 

06/05/2018: Remove work platform from BOP transporter. Secure BOP/LMRP onto BOP transporter (BOP on beam at 00:30 hrs). B/O riser double and L/O same. R/D IWOCS guillotine from BOP stack. Secure drape hoses for transit. Install tertiary cap on XT and pump TransAqua. Recover UDB with flying leads to surface. ROV repair tether at surface. ROV perform final PS-007 XT survey. ROV recover remaining 4 compatts to surface. Depart Jack/ St. Malo field to Tahiti field. Commence between well work per agreed schedule. 
"}]
